2a1(mdo sde): bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sas rgyas dang ngang rluchung sems
2b1(mdo sde): sod par/ rdul bu rgya lab kyi la gon reng zas sbyin bye gan dag
2b2(mdo sde): ga nga/ sleng khrims sde gi dge slong gi dge 'dun che dpe la'ang
2b3(mdo sde): lnga ste/ tshed nga ldan pa kun shes ke'u de na dang / tshe dang ldan pa rta
2b4(mdo sde): thul dang / tshe dang ldan pa rlis pa dang / tshe dang ldan med chen dang tshed ldan pa bzang po dang / chad
2b5(mdo sde): ldan pa grag sbyin dang / tshe dang ldan pa dri ma med pa dang tshe dang ldan pa lag bzas dang / tshe dang ldan gang po dang
3a1(mdo sde): // tshe dang ldan pa lang bdag dang / tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa du klung 'od srung dag che ldan pag la
3a2(mdo sde): 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po dang / 
3a3(mdo sde): dang ldan pa 'od srung che na po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan
3a4(mdo sde): pa ka pi na chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che dang / tshe dang ldan pa skul byed dang / tshe
3a5(mdo sde): dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga'
3a6(mdo sde): byed dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'ug pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa nam gru dang / 
3b1(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa seng lteng nags dang / tshe dang ldan pa don yod rgyal po dang / tshe dang ldan pa pha rol tu 'gro ba chen po dang / tshe dang ldan
3b2(mdo sde): pa ba ku la dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin dang / tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs dang / tshe dang ldan
3b3(mdo sde): pa kun dga' bo dang / de dag la sogs pa dge slong khra nyis stong dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// byang chub sems dpa'
3b4(mdo sde): sum khri nyis stong thams cad kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/ byang chub sa mas dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thabs
3b5(mdo sde): cad las nges par skyes pa byang chu ba sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa thams cad kyis rnam par rtse ba/ byang chub
3b6(mdo sde): sems dpa'i gzungs tha~Md thob pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spobs pa thams cad thob pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon las
3b7(mdo sde): thams cad shin tu yangs sa rdzogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i so so yang dag par rig pa thams cad rtogs par khong du
4a1(mdo sde): chud pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad la dbang thob pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dbang thams cad
4a2(mdo sde): thob pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa thams cad la zhugs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad rab tu rdzogs pa sha stag ste/ 
4a3(mdo sde): 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs kyi dbang phyug
4a4(mdo sde): rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i tog dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
4a5(mdo sde): po don grub blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa rab tu zhi ba'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sem
4a6(mdo sde): dpa' chen po so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus rtag par sbyor dang / byang
4a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje cher sems pa dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sum khrinyis stong dang yang
4b1(mdo sde): thabs gcig go/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen po na 'khor bzhi dang / rgyal po dang rgyal po'i sras dang / rgyal po'i blon po chen po dang / 
4b2(mdo sde): chags 'og gi rgyal phran dang / rgyal po'i zhabs 'bring ba rdza rags dang / bram ze dang / tshong dpon dang khyim bdag dang / blon po dang / 'khor gyi mi dang / grong
4b3(mdo sde): khyer dang / yul gyi mi dang / mu stegs can dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / spyod pa dang / kun tu sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas/ bla mar byas/ ste
4b4(mdo sde): stang du byas/ mchod par byas so// bcom ldan 'das ni bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba bsod cing mang ba dang / na bza' dang
4b5(mdo sde): bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun gyis gsos sman dang / yo byad rung ba brnyes shing bcom ldan 'das ni brnyas pa dam pa dang
4b6(mdo sde): grags pa dam pa brnyes kyang / pad+ma la chus mi gos pa lngar thams cad du ma chags ma gos par bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das kyi grags pa dang sgra dab
4b7(mdo sde): snyan pa ni 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde
4b8(mdo sde): bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lnga dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shes bya bar 'jig rten
5a1(mdo sde): du mngon par grags par gyur to// de ni spyan lnga dang ldan pa ste/ 'jig rten 'di dang 'jig rten pha rol lnga dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa
5a2(mdo sde): dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye rgu lnga dang mir bcas pa dag rang gis mngon par mkhyen pas mngon du mdzad nas nye bar bsgrubs te rab tu ston to// 
5a3(mdo sde): de thog mar dge ba bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa yongs su dag pa
5a4(mdo sde): yongs su dkar ba'i chos ston te/ tshangs dpa'i spyod pa yang dag par ston to// de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyis nam gyi gung thun la/ sangs
5a5(mdo sde): rgyas kyi rgyan bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la na/ mas par zhugs par gyur to// bcom lda na 'das rgyan bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin de la
5a6(mdo sde): snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ skad cig de nyid la bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi/ gtsug tor gyi gseb nas sngon gyi sangs rgyas rjes su dran par
5a7(mdo sde): bya ba la chags pa med pa'i ye shes snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer byung ste/ des gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i gnas thams cad snang bar byas nas lnga'i bu dbang phyug chen
5a8(mdo sde): po la sogs pa/ lha'i bu tshad med pa dag yang dag par bskul lo// de bzhin gsheg pa 'od zer gyi tshogs de las skul ba'i tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang
5b1(mdo sde): byung / ye shes 'od ldan mun bcom 'od mdzad pa// 'od bzang gzi brjid dpa pa dri med pa/ su lus rab brjed thugs dge nib po/ shAkya'i seng gzub dang drang ba ces
5b2(mdo sde): ye shes rgya mtsho mthu chen dag pa ste// chos kyi mnga' bdag kun mkhyen thub pa'i dbang // mi dang lhas mchod lha yi lhar gyur pa// chos la rang byung mnga' dbang mdzad la rton// gang zhig gdul dka'i
5b3(mdo sde): sems la mnga' mdzad de// gang zhig bdud kyi snying las grol ba'i thugs// de 'dir mthong thos don med ma yin gyis// rnam grol mthar phyin zhi ba'i drung du deng // mtshungs med chos la snang bar gyur pa
5b4(mdo sde): sde/ mun sel tshul bzang ston pa rab mdzad pa// sangs rgyas spyod ni mkhyen pa dpag med pa// de yi drung du dad pa mchog gis dang // de ni sman pa'i rgyal po bdud rtsi gtong // de ni smra ba'i dpa'o tshogs pa
5b5(mdo sde): 'joms// de ni chos kyi rtsa lag don dam mkhas// de ni 'dren pa bla na med lam ston pa'o// gnas gtsang ma'i rigs kyi lha'i bu de dag sngon gyi sangs rgyas rje su dran par bya ba la chags pa
5b6(mdo sde): med pa'i ye shes snang ba'i 'od zer nges phog cing / tshig su bcad pa rnam pa de lta bu de dag gis kyang bskul ma thag tu/ rab tu zhi ba'i ting 'dzin de las langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyis mthus bskal pa
5b7(mdo sde): grangs med pa tshad med pa bgrang ba las shin tu 'das pa dag las/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams rjesu dran zhing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan
5b8(mdo sde): bkod pa gang yin pa dag dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gang yin pa dag dang / chos bstan pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang rjesu dran par gyur to// de nas de'i nub mo mi nyal tsam na gnas gtsang ma'i ris
6a1(mdo sde): kyi lha'i bu dbang phyug ces bya ba dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / dga' ro dang / shin tu dga' bo dang / tsan dan dang mchog byas dang / rab ni rje rnal ba rab zhi dbang phyug la sogs pa de
6a2(mdo sde): dag dag gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu gzhan shin tu mang po kha dog 'phags shing shin tu 'phags pa dang ldan pa dag gis lnga'i snang bas rgyal bu rgyal byad kyi tshal thams cad snang bar byas te/ 
6a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong nas byin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas kyang / gnas gtsang ma'i
6a4(mdo sde): ris kyi lha'i bu de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyal cher rol pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs mdo sde'ang shin tu rgyas pa chen po bsdus
6a5(mdo sde): pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bstan pa/ dga' ldan gyi pho brang dam pa nas 'bab pa dang // ched du dgongs te/ lhum su 'jug pa'i rnam par rol pa dang / 
6a6(mdo sde): mngal gyi gnas kyi khyad par kun 'bastan pa/ rigs bzang por skye ba'i sa'i mthu kun tu bstan pa/ byis pa'i spyod pa thams cad las yon tan gyi khyad par gyis shin tu 'da' bstan pa/ 'jig rten du
6a7(mdo sde): bzo'i gnas dang / las kyi gnas dang / yi ge dang grangs dang / lag cis dang / rtsis dpal gri'i thabs dang 'phong dang stobs dang / gyad kyi 'dzin stangs rnams sems can thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa
6a8(mdo sde): kun tu bstan pa/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang / yul gyi lo spyod dang yongasu spyad pa kun tu bstan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyi rgyu mthun pas yongasu grub pa'i 'bras bu brnyes pa yong su brjod pa/ 
6b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par rol pa dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jigs pa bstan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa bsdus pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad ma
6b2(mdo sde): mchis pa nges par bstan pa/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sngon chad gsungs pa mchis te/ 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i bla ma dang / chos kyi tog dang / mar me mdzad dang / yon
6b3(mdo sde): gyi tog dang / yon tan gyi 'byung gnas dang / 'od zer chen po dang / drang srong lha dang / dpal gyi gzi brjid dang / bden pa'i tog dang / rdo rje mkhregs dang / thams cad zil gyis gnon dang / gser mngan
6b4(mdo sde): dang / shin tu mthor gshegs dang byi ru'i rgya mtsho dang / me tog gi tog dang / gzugs bzang dang / spyan bzang dang / drang srong sbeng dang / dmag tshogs las rgyal dang / mtho ba dang / me dog rgyas pa dang / 
6b5(mdo sde): mdzod spu gzi brjid dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / 'od zer bzang po dang / bkra shis ldan dang bldan bzang dang / seng ge'i gzi brje da chen po dang / blo brtan pas byin dang / sos ka'i spos dri dang bdes
6b6(mdo sde): pa'i chos grags rgya chen pa dang / 'od ldan dang / skar rgyal dang / 'jig rten mdzes dang / 'od rgya chen dang / rin chen grags dang / drag shul gzi brjid dang / rin tshe'i gzi brjid dang / tshangs pa'i gzi brjid dang
6b7(mdo sde): sgra snyan dang / me tog bzang po dang / ri rab dang / rab tu yid 'ong dbyangs dang / dge ba tshul bzangs dang / rab tu 'dzum pa'i spyan dang / yon tan phung po dang / 'brug sgra dang / kha dog mdzes dang / tshe'i gzing brjid
6b8(mdo sde): dang / ngom dag glang po'i 'gros dang / 'jig rten mngon par smon dang / dgra las rgyal dang / yang dag mchod dang / rnam par gzigs dang / gtsug tor can dang / thams cad skyob dang / 'khor ba 'jig dang / gas
7a1(mdo sde): thub dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dag gis sngon chad gsungs pa lags na/ de bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang skye bo mang po la
7a2(mdo sde): sman pa dang / skye ngo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lnga dang mi rnams kyi don du 'gyur ba dang / sman pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ba dang / theg pa chen po 'di'ang brjod
7a3(mdo sde): pa dang khas kyi rgol ba thams cad tshar gcad pa dang / bdud thams cad zil gyis mnan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag thang
7a4(mdo sde): kyi brtson 'grus brtsam pa bskyed pa dang / dam pa'i chos yod sa su bzung ba dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi gcad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa yongasu rdzogs pa yang kun tu bstan
7a5(mdo sde): pa'i slad du bstan du gsol zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu de dag dang / lnga dang bcas pa'i 'jig rta na la thugs brtse ba'i phyir cang mi gsung bar gnang ngo // de nas
7a6(mdo sde): lnga'i bu de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis bcang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs shing / rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis nabs
7a7(mdo sde): la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ tsan+dan gyi phye ma dang / a ka ru'i phye ma dang / me tog man da ra ba dag gis kyang mngon par gtor te/ de nyid du mi snang bar gyur
7a8(mdo sde): to// de nas bcom ldan 'das nub mo de'i nam nangs pa dang / smig ma'i ldum pa'i 'khor gyis khyams ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su
7b1(mdo sde): bskor zhing nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyis mdun gyis bltas nas gdan gshams pa la bzhug so// bzhugs nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mdang 'dir nga'i
7b2(mdo sde): drung du gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu dbang phyug ces bya ba dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / dga' bo dang / shin tu dga' bo dang / tsan dan dang / mchod byas dang / rab zhi dang / dul ba rab zhi dang / dbang phyug la
7b3(mdo sde): sogs pa de dag dang gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu gzhan shin tu mang po zhes bya ba nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur ces bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du gsungs so// de nas byang chub sems
7b4(mdo sde): dpa' de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgya
7b5(mdo sde): cher rol pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs legs par bsten du gso la/ de ni skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde dang 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba mdzad pa dang / skye bo phal po che dang / 
7b6(mdo sde): lnga dang mi rnams dang / da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi don dang sman pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ro zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'
7b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / lnga dang mi dang lda ma yin dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba'i phyir cang mi gsungs pas gnang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dge slong
7b8(mdo sde): tshogs dag nga ni mdang gsum 'dir// gnas pa bzang pos bde bar gnas gyur cing // 'on mo ldan par rab tu gnas gyur la// rtse gcig sems su mnyam par bzhag drung du// rdzu 'phrul che zhing kha dog
8a1(mdo sde): bzang ldan la// dri med dpal 'bar lnga'i bu ljags nas// dpal gyis rgyal byed tshal 'di snang byas te// dga' bas nga yi gan du mngon par lpags// dbang phyug dbang phyug chen po
8a2(mdo sde): tsan dan dang // dga' bo rab tu sems shing mchod byas dang // shin tu dga' bo zhi ba lha'i bu// bye ba lnga mang de dang de dag rnams// da yi zhabs phyag tshal bskor byas te/ nga'i mdun du 'dir ni 'khod
8a3(mdo sde): par gyur// de dag sor mo thal sbyar gus bcas par// de dag 'dir ni ngal gsol ba bdag// 'jig rten kun la sman pa'i don slad du// rgyal ba kun gyis sngon chad gang gsungs pa// shin tu
8a4(mdo sde): rgyas mdo gleng gzhi chen po 'di// thub pa 'dod chags pas la bas de ring yang // byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs su na bzung bzhed pas// pas kyi rgol dang bdud rnams 'dul mdzad
8a5(mdo sde): la 'theg pa chen po mchog 'di rab gsung zhing // thub pa de slad legs par bshad du gsol// lha yi tshogs kyis gsol ba de gnang phyir// mi gsung gyur pas gnang ba mdzad
8a6(mdo sde): pas ma thams cad tshim zhing rab dga' mgu gyur nas// dga' ba thob pas me tog sil ma gtor// de phyir dge slong ga gi rgyas pa'i mdo// 'jig rten kun la phan pa'i don gyi phyir// de bzhin
8a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa kun gyis sngon bshad pa// gleng gzhi chen po khyed kun 'dir nyon cig/ gleng bzhi'i le'u sde dang po'o// / dge slong dag de la chos kyi rnam grangs shin
8a8(mdo sde): tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba de gang zhe na/ dge slong dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas mchog na gnas pa mchod par bya bas/ mchod pa dbang bskur ba thob pa/ 
8b1(mdo sde): brgya sdong gis bstod cing bkur te brjod cing bsngags pa dang / bsam pa thob pa smon lam gyis yang dag par 'phags pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par thob pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ 
8b2(mdo sde): ye shes kyi mig shin tu rgyas shing yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang khrel yod pa dang / dga' ba 'bar ba'i blo brlabs po che dang ldan pa/ sbyin pa
8b3(mdo sde): dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / thabs la mkhas pa chen po'i dam pa'i pha rol du som pa/ tshas
8b4(mdo sde): pa'i lam byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms chen po la mkhas pa/ ma ngon par shes pa dang / rig pa chen pos sgrib pa med cing chags
8b5(mdo sde): pa med pa'i ye shes mthong bar mngon du gyur pa/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu' phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang
8b6(mdo sde): chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad shin tu yongs su rdzogs pa'i mthar phyin pa/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa'i mtshan da
8b7(mdo sde): dpe byang bzang pos lus legs par brgyan pa/ yun ring por rjes su 'brang ba dang ldan pa/ ji skad du smras pa de ltar byed pas log pa med pa'i tshig gi las yang dag par smra ba dra zhing ma
8b8(mdo sde): yo la gya gyu med pa'i yid thogs pa med pa dang ldan pa/ nga rgyal dang rgyags pa dang / dregs pa dang / 'jigs pa dang / zhum pa thams cad med pa/ sems can thams
9a1(mdo sde): cad la sems mnyam pa/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med pa la bstan dkur byas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'abye ba khrag khrig brgya
9a2(mdo sde): stong mang pos ngor lnga zhing / blta ba'i bzhin dang ldan pa/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / lnga dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang dr-i
9a3(mdo sde): za dang / lA ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / srin po rnams kyis mngon par dga' bar bya ba'i grags pa dang ldan pa/ tshigs thams cad rab tu phye ste bstan pa la
9a4(mdo sde): thogs pa med pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa 'i shes pa la mkhas pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa/ bzung ba la dran pa'i snod 'a drug
9a5(mdo sde): phra med pa dang / gzungs mtha' yas mu med pa rab tu thob pa/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / 
9a6(mdo sde): stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa'i chos rin po che dang / bsod nams kyis yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i chos
9a7(mdo sde): kyi gru chen po'i ded dpon chen po chu bo bzhi re pha rol tu 'gro ba'i bsam pa can/ bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom pa// phas kyi rgol ba thams cad shin tu tshar bcad pa// g.yul ngo'i thog ma la
9a8(mdo sde): rab tu 'dug pa// nyon mongs pa'i dgra'i tshogs 'joms pa// ye shes mchog gi rdo rje'i mtshon cha sra ba dang ldan pa// byang chub kyi sems kyi rtsa ba las snying rje chen po'i chu 'os pa'i
9b1(mdo sde): bsam pas skyes pa/ zab cing brtan pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi chos kyi chus mngon par brlan pa/ thabs mkhas pa'i snying po dang ldan pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang / bsam gtan gyi zab
9b2(mdo sde): can ting nge 'dzin gyi ze 'bru dang ldan pa/ yon tan gyi tshogs rgya chen po'i mtsho las skyes pa nga rgyal dang / dregs pa'i gdung ba med pa'i zla bas/ dri ma med pa'i 'dab ma rgyas pa/ tshul
9b3(mdo sde): khrims dang / thos pa dang / bag yod pa'i gsung gi ngang phyogs bcur thogs pa med par ldang ba/ 'jig rten shes pa thu bor gyur pa/ 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis ma gos pa
9b4(mdo sde): skyes bu chen po'i pad+ma/ bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi chog sa kyi dri zhim po 'byung ba/ shes rab dang ye shes kyi nyi ma'i 'o/ dazer gyis mig shin tu rnam par dag pa'i pad+ma 'dab ma brgya pa
9b5(mdo sde): rgyas pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi mchog tu mgyogs pa'i shugs dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i sngar mo dang / mche ba shin tu rno ba/ tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi'i
9b6(mdo sde): so drang ba brnyed pa/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis shin tu bsdus pa'i mgo dang ldan pa/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis pa khong du chud pas/ rim gyis 'phags pa'i lus
9b7(mdo sde): dang ldan pa/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yang dag par yongs su rdzogs pas ral pa can du byas shing rig pa dang / ye shes kyi ze bcan rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyi
9b8(mdo sde): kha gdangs pa/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong shin tu rnam par dag pa'i mig dang ldan pa/ bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i ri sul gyi bug
10a1(mdo sde): na gnas pa/ spyod lam bzhi dang / 'dul ba'i nags tshal dang / nags 'dab nas skyes pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / nye ba'i
10a2(mdo sde): stobs dang ldan pa skye ba dang / 'jig pa'i 'jigs pa dang / spu g.yo ba med pa/ rtsal la zhum pa med pa/ mu stegs can gyi bong bu dang / ri dgas mang po'i tshogs rab tu 'joms pa/ bdag
10a3(mdo sde): med par sgra brjod pa'i seng+ge'i nga ro chen po sgrog pa/ skyes bus seng ge rnam par grol ba dang / bsam gtan gyi dkyil 'khor las shes rab kyi 'od dang / 'od zer gyis mu stegs byed srin bu me
10a4(mdo sde): khyer gyi tshogs 'od med par byed pa/ ma rig pa'i mun pa mu na nag gi ling rtog dang / rab rib med par byed pa/ stobs dang brtson 'grus 'bar ba/ lha dang mi'i nang du bsod nams kyi
10a5(mdo sde): gzi brjid kyi gzi dang ldan pa/ skyes bu chen po'i nyi ma nag po'i phyogs med pa/ dkar po'i phyogs yongs su rdzogs pa/ blta na sdug cing yid du 'ong ba/ mig gi dab
10a6(mdo sde): bo la thogs pa med pa/ lha brgya stong gi skar ma'i tshogs kyis shin tu brgyan pa/ bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor can/ byang chub kyi yan lag gi bde
10a7(mdo sde): bas zla ba'i 'od zer du gyur pa/ mi dang lha mkhas pa'i me tog ku mu da kha 'byed pa/ skyes bu chen po zla ba 'khor gyi gling bzhir song ba byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi rin po che dang ldan pa
10a8(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la sems mnyam par sbyor ba/ blo gra mogs med pa/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi dka' thub dang / brtul zhugs shin tu phun sum tshogs shing rab tu rdzog
10b1(mdo sde): bas khyad par du ngogs dbyung bar bya ba'i bsam pa can/ chos kyi rgyal po'i chos kyi 'khor lo rin po che mchog dam pa thogs pa med par bskor ba/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs kyi rgyud
10b2(mdo sde): du byung ba/ chos kyi 'khor lo sgyur ba chen po rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab cing gting dpag dka' ba/ chos rin po che thams cad kyis rab tu gang ba/ thos pas mi ngoms pas
10b3(mdo sde): yangs shing rgya che la mtha' yas pa'i ye shes dang / tshul khrims kyi tshod las mi 'da' ba/ blo rgya mtsho dang / sa ltar che ba'i mchog tu gyur pa/ sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang mnyam
10b4(mdo sde): pa'i sems su gyur pa/ ri rab ltar brtan zhing mi g.yo la bskyod par mi nus pa'i yid dang ldan pa/ rjes su 'chags pa dang khong khro ba med pa/ namakha'i dkyil lta
10b5(mdo sde): dri ma med cing yangs la 'dra ba med par rgya tsha ba'i blo dang ldan pa/ lhag pa'i bsam pa shin tu yongs su dag pa/ sbyin pa legs par byin pa sngon gyi sbyor ba legs
10b6(mdo sde): par byas pa lhag pa'i bya ba legs par byas pa/ bden pa'i rgyan gyis legs par brgyan pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su btsal ba/ gos par bya ba zhos pa dge
10b7(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba nges par byas pa/ skal pa grangs med pa bdun du dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par bsgrubs pa/ sbyin pa rnam pa bdun byin pa/ bsod nams bya ba'i dngos
10b8(mdo sde): bo lnga la shin tu bsten pa/ legs par spyad pa/ lus kyis rnam gsum/ ngag gis rnam bzhi/ yid kyis rnam gsum spyang par gyur pa/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam bste
11a1(mdo sde): // ldan pa/ yang dag pa'i sbyor ba yan lag bzhi bcu dang ldan pa/ bsten par gyur pa yang dag pa'i smon lam yan lag pani bcu dang ldan pa'i smon lam btang ba lhag pa'i
11a2(mdo sde): bsam pa yan lag bzhi bcu dang ldan pa la zhugs pa/ yang dag pa'i rnam par thar pa/ yan lag pa ni bcu dang ldan pa dang / yongs su rdzogs par byas pa/ yang dag pa'i
11a3(mdo sde): mos pa yan lag bzhi bcu dang ldan pa dang / drang por byas pa sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu'i rjes su rab tu 'byung ba/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
11a4(mdo sde): lnga bcu rtsa lnga la/ sbyin pa phul bar gyur pa/ rang sangs rgyas bye ba brgya drag phyed dang bzhi la lhag par bya ba byas pa/ sems can tshad med pa grangs med pa dag
11a5(mdo sde): mtho ris dang / thar pa'i lam du btsud par gyur pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mang na par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa tshe gcig gis
11a6(mdo sde): thogs pa/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas dga' ldan gyi gnas dam pa na gnas pa/ lha'i bu dam pa tog dkar po zhes bya ba lha'i tshogs rnams kyis 'di ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas mi'i
11a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten du skye ste/ ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes der shin tu mchod pa gzhal med khang
11a8(mdo sde): gnas sum khri nyis stong la gnas pa de/ stegs bu dang / ba gam dang / rta babs dang / sker khung dang / bsil khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / khyams kyis legs
11b1(mdo sde): bar brgyan pa/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng ba/ rin po che'i dril bu g.yer kha'i dra ba'i bla bre bres pa/ me tog man da ra ba dang / ya das la dang nachos/ 
11b2(mdo sde): bar bkram pa/ lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong glu dbyangs len pa/ me tog a ti mug ta dang / tsam pa ka dang / skya nar dang / sa brtol dang / btang zung dang / btang
11b3(mdo sde): zung chen po dang / mya ngan 'tshang dang / n+ya gro da dang / tin tu ka dang / a sa na dang / tong ka'i me tog dang / shing ke sa ra dang / ta ma la dang / sa la dang / rin po che'i shing ljon pa chen
11b4(mdo sde): pos brgyan pa/ gser gyi dra bas g.yogs pa/ gzhi mnyam zhing bkod pas mdzes par byas pa/ me tog snang 'od dang / ma li ka dang / sna ma'i me tog dang / bar shi ka
11b5(mdo sde): dang / ta ra ni dang / ba li dang / go tar ni dang / mchogatu dri zhim dang / da nus ka ri dang / lha'i sna ma'i ma tog dang / ud ba la dang / bad ma dang / ku mu da dang / 
11b6(mdo sde): pad ma dkar po dang / dri rab tu zhim pa'i bla bre chen po phyogs phyogs su bres pa/ bya 'dab sbed dang / ne tso dang / ri skegs dang / khu byug dang / ngang pa dang / rma bya dang / du
11b7(mdo sde): ba dang / kun la dang / ka la bing ka dang / shang shang te'u la sogs pa bya sna tshog sgra snyan pa 'byin pa/ lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis mig mngon du phyogs te blta zhing ltad mor bya ba
11b8(mdo sde): chos rgya ba chen po yang dag par brjod pas 'dod pa la dga' ba'i shugs kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad gcod pa/ nga rgyal dang rgyags pa dang / dregs pa dang / khro ba dang / tha ba dang / 
12a1(mdo sde): khang khrob med par 'gyur ba/ dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / mchog tu dga' bdag dran pa rgya ma zhing / gas pa bsgre ba'i gzhal med khang chen/ 
12a2(mdo sde): bo de na/ bde bar gnas shing / chos kyi yang dag pa'i gtam 'byung ba dang / sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs brgyad khri bzhi stong po'i sgra de dag las/ byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi las
12a3(mdo sde): dge ba'i tshogs kyis yang dag par bskul ba'i tshigs su gcad pa 'di dag byung ngo // bsod nams rgya chen tshogs mnga' dran rtogs dang // blo gros mtha' yas shes rab 'ong mdzad
12a4(mdo sde): bang mtshungs med stobs mnga' sgyu rtsal rgya che ba/ mar me mdzad kyis lung bstan dgongs par mdzod// rgya chen dri ma med pa'i thugs mnga' ba/ dri ma gsum spangs
12a5(mdo sde): rgyags dang skyon zhi ba/ dge ba'i dri med rnam par dag pa'i thugs// sngon chad ji ltar sbyin spyad dgongs par mdzod// zhi gnas tshul khrims brtul zhugs bzod pa dang / 
12a6(mdo sde): dul dang brtson 'grus bsam gtan shes rab stobs// skal pa bye ba khrag khrig rnam spyang pa// spyod rigs cher byung dgongs mdzod dgongs par mdzod// sems can rnams la thugs
12a7(mdo sde): rtse mdzad gyur cing / sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig khyod kyis mchod// dgongs mdzod dgongs par mdzod cig grags mtha' yas// de dus lag kyis btang snyoms ma mdzad cig/ rga shi
12a8(mdo sde): nyon mongs 'jig mdzad rdul bral ba// lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dri za dang // lha min dbang po dag kyang sdod lags kyis// 'chi 'pho'i tshul mkhyen 'pho ba bstan par mdzod// skal pa
12b1(mdo sde): stong du da' ba spyad gyur kyang // rgya mtsho chu yis ji bzhin mi ngoms kyis// ngoms pa khyod kyis thugs dam dge ba ste// yun ring skom nyen skye bo tshim par mdzod// smad pa med pa'i
12b2(mdo sde): grags pa mnga' ba khyod// chos la dgyes par khyod dgyes 'dod mi dgyes// 'on kyang dri ma med pa'i spyan mnga' ba// lhar bcas 'jig rten dag la thugs brtse mdzod// lha rnams bye/ 
12b3(mdo sde): ba khyod la chos thos pas// ngoms par 'gyur ba ma lags 'on gyis kyang // dal dang mi lnga gyur pa'i ngan song du// gnas par gyur pa dag la gzigs su gsol/ dri ma med pa'i
12b4(mdo sde): spyan mnga' phyogs bcu yis// 'jig rten dag gi sangs rgyas gzigs gyur cing // de dag rnams las chos gsan chos mchog de// 'jig rten dag la rnam par dbye ba mdzod// 
12b5(mdo sde): dpal ldan khyod kyi bsod nams dpal gyis ni// dga' ldan pho brang shin tu mdzes mod kyi// 'on kyang thugs rje thugs dang ldan pas na// 'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan du ni
12b6(mdo sde): char pa phob// brtul zhugs grub pa byang chub reg ces te// 'dod pa'i khams las rab tu 'das pa yis// gzugs kyi khams na lha rnams gang 'khod pa/ du ma thams cad
12b7(mdo sde): mngon par rab tu dga'// mgon po khyod kyis bdud kyi las rnams bcom// khyod gzhan mu stegs can rnams pham mdzad de// khyod ni byang chub phyag mthil gzhag dang 'dra/ 
12b8(mdo sde): dedus lags kyis btang snyoms ma mdzad cig/ nyon mongs rab tu 'bar ba'i 'jig rten la// dpa' bo khyod kyis sprin ltar khyab mdzod de// bdud rtsi 'char pa mngon par rab tu
13a1(mdo sde): phob// lha mi rnams kyi nyon mongs zhi bar mdzod// khyod ni sman pa khams la mkhas pa ste// yun ring nang pa sman pas bor ba yi// sems can rnam thar
13a2(mdo sde): gsum gyi sbyar sman gyis// mya ngan 'das pa'i bde la myur du khod// seng ge'i nga ro thos par ma gyur pas// wa rnams 'jigs pa med par sgra sgrogs kyis// sangs rgyas seng ge'i sgra ni
13a3(mdo sde): rab sgrogs te// mu stegs can gzhan wa rnams skrag par mdzod// sa yid dkyil na stobs dang brtson 'grus kyis// stobs ldan phyag na shes rab sgron me bsnams// phyag mthil
13a4(mdo sde): dam pas sa la brda ba mdzod de// 'di rnams khyod kyis rab tu pham par mdzod// gang dag khyod la lhung zed dbul ba yi// 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po sdod cing mchis
13a5(mdo sde): khyod bltam gang dag len par 'gyur ba yi// brgya byin tshangs pa khrag khrig sdod cing mchis// blo gros bza nga bo rin chen rig ldan pa// gang la gnas nas byang
13a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' yi// spyod pa ston gyur dam pa rigs skyes pa// rigs kyi nang na btsun pa'i rigs la gzigs// snod gyur gang du nor bu rin po che// gzhag na dpal dang ldan
13a7(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba bzhin// nor bu rin chen lta bur dri med thugs// 'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan du ni char pa phob// glu dbyangs sgra las rnam pa 'di lta yi// tshigs su gcad pa mang po drung
13a8(mdo sde): gyur nas// 'di ni dus lag btang snyoms ma mdzad ces// snying rje'i yid dang ldan la bskul bar byed// yang dag par spro bar bya ba'i le'u ste/ gnyis pa'o// 
13b1(mdo sde): dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi dus de lta bus yang dag par bskul ba dang / gzhal med khang chen po de nas byung ste/ chos kyi mtho ba zhes bya ba'i khang bzangs chen
13b2(mdo sde): po gang byang chub sems dpa' 'dug cing dga' ldan gyi lha rnams la chos ston pa der byang chub sems dpa' zhugs so// zhugs nas kyang seng ge'i khri chis bzang po zhes bya ba la 'dug
13b3(mdo sde): go/ de nas lha'i bu gang dag byang chub sems dpa' dang skal pa mnyam par theg pa mtshungs pa la zhugs pa de dag kyang khang bzangs de nyid du zhugs so// gang yang byang chub sems dpa'
13b4(mdo sde): phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa byang chub sems dpa' dang / spyod pa 'dra ba dag dang / lha'i bu de dag kyang lha'i bu mo'i tshogs rnams gsal zhing lha'i bu phal rnams kyang bas
13b5(mdo sde): nas lhag pa'i bsam pa mthun pa'i 'khor can du byas te/ 'khor bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad brgyad dang / khang bzangs der zhugs nas/ so so ci rigs
13b6(mdo sde): pas rang rang gi seng ge khri la 'khod par gyur to// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' lo bcu gnyis na ma'i mngal du 'jug par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tshe/ gnas gtsang ma'i
13b7(mdo sde): ris kyi lha'i bu dag 'dzam bu'i gling du ldugs nas/ lnga'i kha dog mi snang bar byas te/ bram ze'i cha byang du bsgyur nas bram ze rnams rig byed slob tu 'jud de// gang zhig rnam pa 'di
13b8(mdo sde): lta bur mngal du zhugs par gyur na/ de ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de dag dang ldan na rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur gyi/ gsum du 'gyur ba med de/ 
14a1(mdo sde): de gal te khyim na gnas na ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba chos dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rgyal po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te/ 
14a2(mdo sde): de'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di lta ste/ 'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / rta rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / blon po rin po che
14a3(mdo sde): dang / bdun no// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'khor lo rin po che rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan du 'gyur zhe na/ 'di la rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba/ gso sbyong gi nyi ma tshes bco
14a4(mdo sde): lnga la mgo khrus byas te/ dbu zungs su gnas shing steng gi khyams na bud med kyi tshogs kyis kun nas bskor zhing 'a dug pa'i tshe/ shar phyogs nas lha'i 'khor lo rin po che
14a5(mdo sde): rtsibs stong yod pa/ mu khyud dang ldan pa/ lte ba dang bcas pa thams cad gser las grub pa mgar bas ma byas pa/ 'phang du shing rta la bdun tsam nas 'byung ste/ rgyal po
14a6(mdo sde): rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas/ lha'i 'khor lo rin po che de mthong bas 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis thos pa rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba/ gso sbyong gi nyi ma
14a7(mdo sde): tshes bco lnga la mgo khrus byas te/ dbu zungs su gnas shing / steng gi khyams na bud med kyi tshogs kyis kun nas bskor zhing 'dug pa'i tshe/ shar phyogs nas lha'i 'khor lo rin po
14a8(mdo sde): che 'byung bar 'gyur na/ de ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyuraro zhes thos na bdag gi drung du lha'i 'khor lo rin po che 'ongs pa las na/ bdag kyang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po
14b1(mdo sde): yin du nges so snyam ste/ de nas rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba de bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ lag pa g.yas pas
14b2(mdo sde): lha'i 'khor lo rin po che bskor zhing 'di skad du btsun pa lha'i 'khor lo rin po che chos kyis bskor cig/ chos ma yin pas ni ma yin no// zhes bya ba'i tshig smras pa dang / de nas lha'i 'khor lo
14b3(mdo sde): rin po che de/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas/ rdzu 'phrul gyis na mkha' las shar phyogs su legs par 'gro ste/ rgyal po 'khor los sgyur ba yang dpung gi tshogs
14b4(mdo sde): yan lag bzhi pa dang / lhan cig tu rjes su 'gro'o// sa'i phyogs gang du lha'i 'khor lo rin po che gnas par gyur pa der rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba de yang / 
14b5(mdo sde): dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan gcig tu gan sa par 'gyur ro// de nas shar phyogs kyi yokyi rgya la po gang yin pa de dag dngul gyi snod ni gser phyes
14b6(mdo sde): bkang ste thogs/ gser gyi snod ni dngul sil mas bkang ste/ thogs nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bsu zhing 'di skad du lha 'dir legs par gshegs so// lha tshur gshegs
14b7(mdo sde): su gsol// lha'i chab srid ni shin tu rgyas shing 'byor la bde ste/ lo legs shing nyams dgyes la skye bo mang po dang mis lham pa lags na/ lha nyid kyi yul du byon nas bzhugs su
14b8(mdo sde): gsol// de skad ces smras pa dang / rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas/ khams kyi rgyal po de dag la 'di skad du khyed rang rang gi rgyal srid dag chos kyis gyis shig/ chos
15a1(mdo sde): ma yin pas ni ma yin no// khyed srog chags ma gsod cig/ ma byin par ma len cig/ 'dod pa la log par g.yeng ba ma byed cig/ brdzun du ma smra shig/ 
15a2(mdo sde): bram ma zer cig/ ngag rtsub po ma smra shig/ tshig kyal pa ma smra shig/ brdab sems can du ma gyur cig/ gnod sems can du ma gyur cig/ log par lta bar ma gyur cig/ srog gcod
15a3(mdo sde): pa la byams par ma gyur cig/ log par lta ba can gyi bar la sems par ma gyur cig/ nga'i yul du chos ma yin pa byung nga re// chos ma yin pa spyod pa la byams par ma byed cig ces
15a4(mdo sde): bsgonas/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dngang bskur bas/ de ltar shar phyogs su rnam par rgyal bar byed/ do// shar phyogs la rgyal bar byas nas/ shar phyogs kyi
15a5(mdo sde): rgya mtsho la 'gro'o// shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho la song nas shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho las rgal lo// rgal na sa kyang lho phyogs su nam mkha' las rdzu 'phrul gyis le
15a6(mdo sde): par 'gro ste/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po yang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang / lhan gcig tu 'gro'o// snga ma bzhin du lho phyogs su rnam par rgyal bar byed do// 
15a7(mdo sde): lho phyogs su ji lta ba de bzhin du/ nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs su rnam par rgyal bar byed do// byang phyogs su rnam par rgyal bar byas nas/ byang phyogs kyi rgya mtsho la 'gro'o// byang
15a8(mdo sde): phyogs kyi rgya mtsho la song nas/ byang phyogs kyi rgya mtsho las rgal lo// rgal nas kyang na mkha' las rdzu 'phrul gyis rgyal po'i pho brang du legs par 'ongs nas/ btsun mo'i 'khor gyi
15b1(mdo sde): sgo'i steng du nyams pa med par gnas so// rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba ni 'khor lo rin po che rnam pa de lta bu dang ldan pa yin no// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal
15b2(mdo sde): bo glang po rin po che rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa yin zhe na/ 'di la rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i glang po rin po che snga ma bzhin du 'byung ste/ thams cad thal dkar du gyur pa/ 
15b3(mdo sde): lag bdun ni shin tu gnas pa/ gtsug gser gyis brgyan pa/ gser gyi rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa/ gser gyis rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ gser gyi dra bas g.yogs pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ namakha'
15b4(mdo sde): las 'gro ba/ rnam par 'phrul pa'i chos can te/ 'di ltar glang po'i rgyal po byang chub ces bya'o// gang gi tshe rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba/ glang po rin po che de sa
15b5(mdo sde): bar 'dod par gyur pa de'i tshe nyi ma 'char kar glang po rin po che de la zhon te/ sa chen po 'di rgya mtsho'i mtha' skor dang bcas pa/ rgya mtsho'i mur thug pa dang bcas pa/ kun tu
15b6(mdo sde): te phyir rgyal po'i pho brang du 'ongs nas/ khye'u sus kyi dga' ba myong bar byed de/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni glang po rin po che rnam pa de lta bu dang ldan pa yin no// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rje rin
15b7(mdo sde): po che ras pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa yin ne na/ 'di la rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rta rin po che snga ma bzhin du 'byung ste/ thams cad sngon por gyur pa/ mgo gnag pa rdog ma lcang lo
15b8(mdo sde): 'dug pa/ zhon na gus par byed pa/ gser gyi rgyal mtshan dang bcas pa/ gser gyi rgyan dang ldan pa/ gser gyi dra bas g.yogs pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ na mkha' las 'gro ba/ rnam par 'drul
16a1(mdo sde): pa'i chos can de/ 'di ltar rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can zhes bya'o// gang gi tshe rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba/ rta rin po che brtag par 'dod par
16a2(mdo sde): 'gyur ba de'i tshe/ nyi ma 'char kar rta rin po che de la zhon nas/ sa chen po 'ding rgya mtsho'i mtha' skor dang bcas pa/ rgya mtsho mur thugs pa dang bcas pa kun tu bskor te/ phyir rgyal po'i pho
16a3(mdo sde): brang du 'khor nas/ khye'u sus kyi bde ba myong bar byed de/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni rta rin po che rnam pa de lta bu dang ldan pa yin no// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po nor bu rin po che rnam pa
16a4(mdo sde): ji lta bu dang ldan pa yin zhe na/ 'di la rgyal po rgyal rig sa spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i nor bu rin po che snga ma bzhi na du 'byung ste/ thams cad du sngo ba/ bai DUr+ya'i rang bzhin zu
16a5(mdo sde): brgyad du 'dug pa/ shin tu sbyangs pa 'byung ste/ nor bu ri na po che de'i 'od kyis btsun mo'i 'khor thams cad kyang snang bas khyab par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe rgyal po rgyal
16a6(mdo sde): rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba nor bu rin po che de brtag par 'dod par gyur pa de'i tshe/ mtshan mo nam gyi gung la mun pa mun nag gi nang du nor bu rin po che rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la brtags
16a7(mdo sde): te skyeng mas tshal gyis bzang po blta ba'i phyir song na/ nor bu rin po che de'i 'od kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa thams cad dpag tshad khor yug tu snang bas
16a8(mdo sde): bsal bar 'gyuraro// nor bu rin po che de'i 'khor na gnas pa'i mi de dag kyang snang ba des gsal bar gyur pa dang / gcig gis gcig mthong gcig gis gcig shes nas/ gcig la gcig 'di
16b1(mdo sde): 'di skad du smras te/ bzhin bzangs dag longs las kyi mtha' dag byos shig/ tshong 'dus dag khrom nyi ma shar te/ nyin mor shes so zhes zer te/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur
16b2(mdo sde): ba de nor bu rin po che rnam pa de lta bu dang ldan pa yin no// rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba bud med rin po che rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa yin zhe na/ 'di la rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi ba
16b3(mdo sde): nas dbang bskur ba'i bud med rin po che snga ma bzhin du 'byung ste/ tshul dang mthun pa rgyal rigs su skyes pa/ ha cang yang mi ring ba/ ha cang yang mi thung ba/ ha cang yang mi sbom pa/ ha cang yang mi
16b4(mdo sde): skyes pa/ ha cang yang mi dkar ba/ ha cang yang mi gnag pa/ gzugs mdzes pa/ tshul du shis pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa/ mchog dang ldan pa/ 
16b5(mdo sde): de'i spu'i khung bu thams cad nas/ tsan dan gyi dri 'byung ba/ kha nas ud pa la'i ngang ldang bar/ ka tsa yin ri'i gos ltar re ga na bde ba/ de grang ba'i dus na ni lus la reg na dro ba/ dro ba'i
16b6(mdo sde): dus na lus la reg na bsil ba ste/ de 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ma gtogs par/ gzhan la yid kyis kyang 'dod chags su mi byed na/ lus kyi lta ci smos te/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni bud med
16b7(mdo sde): rin po che rnam pa de lta bu dang ldan pa yin no// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po khyim bdag rin po che rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa yin zhe na/ 'di la rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i khyim
16b8(mdo sde): bdag rin po che snga ma bzhin du 'byung ste/ mkhas pa gsal ba yid bzhungs pa lha'i mig dang ldan pa 'byung ngo // de lha'i mig des dpag tshad khor yug tu bdag po dang bcas pa'i gter dag kyang ma
17a1(mdo sde): bdag po med pa'i gter dag kyang mthong ste/ bdag po med pa'i gter gyi nor gang yin pa de dag gis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i nor gyi dgos pa byed de/ 
17a2(mdo sde): los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni khyim bdag rin po che rnam pa de lta bu dang ldan pa yin no// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po blon po rin po che rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa yin zhes na/ 'di la 'khor los sgyur
17a3(mdo sde): ba'i rgyal po'i blon po rin po che snga ma bzhin du 'byung ste/ mkhas shing gsamya la yid gzhung /  'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po des/ bsam pa tsam gyis bsko bar bya ba'i dpung rnams bsko'o// 
17a4(mdo sde): 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i blon po rin po che rnam pa de lta bu dang ldan pa yin te/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni rin po che sna bdun de dag dang ldan pa yin no// de la stong 'byung
17a5(mdo sde): ste dpa' brtul po dang / yan lag mchog gis zugs da nga ldan pa/ pha rol gyi sde rab tu mjoms pa sha stag ste// des rgya mtsho la thug pa'i sa chen ma lus pa gnod par sngor
17a6(mdo sde): med cing 'tshe ba med pa 'di nyid chad pa med cing mtshon gyis bda' ba med la chos kyis legs par nga ba ste/ gnaso// gal te khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung na/ sangs rgyas su 'gyur te/ 'dod
17a7(mdo sde): pa'i 'dod chags spangs pa/ 'dren pa gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston par 'gyuraro// zhes rig byed 'don du 'dzud do// de bzhin du lha'i bu gzhan dag kyang 'dzam bu'i gling du lhag
17a8(mdo sde): shing / rang sangs rgyas dag la bskul ma 'debs te/ 'phags pa dag da ste lo bcu gnyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhum su 'jug gis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di 'or cig ces zer
17b1(mdo sde): ro// dge slong dag de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen pon 'jug ma bsgyur ba zhes bya ba'i ri la rang sangs rgyas glang po zhes bya ba 'dus nas/ sgra de thos nas rdo ba'i steng du 'jib la bya bzhin du
17b2(mdo sde): 'dug ste/ na mkha' la shing ta la bdun srid du gyen du 'phags so// gyen du 'phags nas kyang me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs te/ sgron ma bzhin du mya ngan las 'das so// de'i
17b3(mdo sde): mkhris pa dang / bad kan dang / chu rgyus dang / rus pa dang / sha dang khrag tu gyur pa/ gang yin pa de thams cad ni mes yongs su zad par gyur te/ ring bsrel 'ba' shigs la lhag
17b4(mdo sde): nas rkang rjes de dag ni da dung yang drang srong gi rjes she sa grags te yod de/ dge slong dag de'i tshe yul dA ra na se 'i ri dwags kyi nags drang srong lhung ba na/ rang sangs rgyas lnga
17b5(mdo sde): brgya 'khod pa de dag gis kyang sgra de thos nas/ na mkha 'al shing ta la bdun srid du gyen du 'phags nas/ me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs te/ sgron ma bzhin du yongs mya
17b6(mdo sde): ngan las 'das so// de dag gi mkhris pa dang / bad kan dang / chu rgyas dang / rus pa dang / sha dang / khrag du gyur pa gang yin pa de thams cad ni mes yongs su zad par gyur te/ ring bsrel 'ba' shig
17b7(mdo sde): sa la lhag so// de ltar 'dir drang srong rnams lhung ngo zhes/ de phyin chad drang srong lhung ba zhes bya ba yang drang srong lhung ba zhes ming du gyur to// mi 'jigs pa byin pa'i ri dgas kyang de na gnas pas de
17b8(mdo sde): phyin chad ri dgas kyi nags shes bya ba yang ri dgas kyi nags ri dag kyinas shes ming du gyur to// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas dam pa na 'dug pa ni rnam par blta ba chen po bzhis rna
18a1(mdo sde): par lta ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dus la rnam par blta ba dang / gling la rnam par lta ba dang / yul la rnam par lta ba dang / rigs la rnam par lta ba'o// dge slong dag ci'i phyir
18a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' dus rnam par lta ba la rnam par lta zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni thog ma'i dus sems can 'du ba'i tshe ma'i mngal du mi 'jug gi/ gang gi tshe 'jig rten gsal bar
18a3(mdo sde): kun nas gnas par gyur te/ skye ba snang bar gyur/ rga ba snang bar gyur/ na ba snang bar gyur/ 'chi ba snang bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' ma'i mngal du 'jug go// dge slong
18a4(mdo sde): dag ci'i byang chub sems dpa' gling rnam par blta ba rnam pa ra lta zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni mtha' 'khob kyi gyi dadu mi skye/ shar gyi lus 'phags por mi skye/ nub kyi ba'ang
18a5(mdo sde): spyod du mi skye/ byang gi sgra mi snyan du mi skye'i// lho'i 'dzam bu gling nyid du skye'o// dge slong dag ci'i phyir/ byang chub se mas dpa' yul rnam par blta ba la rnam par lta zhe na/ byang
18a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' ni mtha' 'khob kyi yul gang na mi rnams dbang po rtul zhing blun la lug ltar lkug pa'i rang bzhin can legs par bstan pa dang / nyes par bstan pa'i don shes par bya ba'i
18a7(mdo sde): skal pa med pa dag yod pa dag tu mi skye'i/ byang chub sems dpa' ni yul gyi dbus nyid du skye'o// dge slong dag ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rigs rnam par lta ba la rnam par lta zhe na/ 
18a8(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' ni rigs dma' ba gdol ba'i rigs sam/ smig ma mkhan gyi rigs sam/ shing rta mkhan gyi rigs sam/ g.yung rigs su mi skye'o// bram ze'i rigs sam/ 
18b1(mdo sde): rgyal rigs kho na ste/ rigs gnyis su skye'o// de la gang gi tshe bram ze'i rigs btsun par bya ba de'i tshe/ bram ze'i rigs su skye'o// gang gi tshe rgyal rigs btsun par bya ba de'i tshe/ rgyal rigs su skye ste/ 
18b2(mdo sde): dge slong dag da ltar ni rgyal rigs btsun par bya bas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rgyal po'i rigs su skye ste/ dge slong dag don gyi dbang de la brten nas/ byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan
18b3(mdo sde): gyi gnas dam pa na gnas pa rnam par blta ba chen po bzhi la rnam par lta ste/ de ltar bltas nas cang mi zer bar gyur to// 'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// 
18b4(mdo sde): dge slong dag de ltar lha'i bu de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag gcig la gcig 'di skad du/ byang chub sems dpa' rigs rin po che ni ji lta bu zhig tu skye ba
18b5(mdo sde): 'gyur/ yum ni ji lta bu zhig gi lhums su 'jug par 'gyur/ zhes 'dri'o// de la la la na re yul ma ga d+ha na lus 'phags kyi rigs 'di 'byor zhing rgyas la lo legs pa dang / bde ba dang
18b6(mdo sde): ldan pa yin te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhum su 'jug pa'i gnas su rung ngo // zhes zer to// la la na re de ni tshul dang mthun pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni ma'i rgyud kyis dag pa
18b7(mdo sde): ma yin/ pa'i rgyud kyis dag pa yang ma yin la/ bsod nams chung ngus byung gi/ bsod nams rgya chen popos byung ba ma yin zhing rgod la mi brtan te/ mi gnas pa yin la/ yul de yang nye 'khor bseg
18b8(mdo sde): mas/ gang bskyed mos tshal dang / mtsho dang / mtshe'u dag kyang mi mang la ri brags ltar mtha' 'khor kyi gnas su gyur pa ste/ de'i phyir de ni tshul dang mthun pa ma yin no// 
19a1(mdo sde): / zhes zer ro// la lan re go sa la'i rigs 'di 'khor mang shing bzhon pa mang la nor che ba ste// de ni byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi ldum sa su 'jug pa'i gnas su rung
19a2(mdo sde): zhes zer ro// la lan de yang tshul dang mthun pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir she na/ 'di ltar go sa la'i rigs ni gdol ba'i rigs las shi 'phos nas skyes pa yin te/ pa dang mas dag pa yang ma yin pa
19a3(mdo sde): dpa' ba la mos pa ste/ rigs mtho bar yang mi bya/ nor dang rin po che'i gter yang chad med pas phun sub tshogs pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir de'i tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin no zhes zer ro// la la na re rgya
19a4(mdo sde): bo bad sa'i rigs 'di 'byor shing rgyas la yo legs pa dang bde ba dang ldan pa yin te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums su 'jug pa'i gnas su rung ngo // zhes zer ro// 
19a5(mdo sde): la la na re de yang de'i tshul dang mthun pa ma yin te/ 'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rgyal po bad sa'i rigs ni bal bste/ gtum la gzi brjid 'bar ba yang ma yin zhing skye
19a6(mdo sde): ba gzhan las skye ba 'grub pa pha ma nyid kyis gzi brjid kyi las kyis grub pa ma yin la/ de'i rgyal po yang chad par smra ba ste/ de'i phyir de yang tshul dang mthun pa ma yin no zhes zer ro/ 
19a7(mdo sde): la la na re grong khyer chen po yangs pa can 'di ni 'byor zhing rgyas la lo legs pa dang / bde ba dang ldan pa yin te/ nyams dga' la skye bo mang po dang / mis kun tu gang gastegs bu dang ba
19a8(mdo sde): dang rta babs dang / skar khung dang / bsil khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / khang bzangs dag gis legs par brgyan pa ste/ me tog gi ra ba dang / nags tshal gyi phreng ba dang / me tog
19b1(mdo sde): kun tu rgyas pa dang ldan pa yin la/ lha'i pho brang 'dra ba yin te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhums su 'jug pa'i gnas su rung ngo zhes zer ro// la la na re de yang tshul dang mthun pa ma yin te/ 
19b2(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag la ni phan tshun du rigs par smra ba med do// chos spyod pa med do// gong ma dang / bar ma dang / rgan pa dang / gtso bo dag la yang rim gror bya ba med cing / 
19b3(mdo sde): re re zhing yang 'di snyam du bdag ni rgyal po'o// bdag ni rgyal po'o snyam du sems pas slob mar khas len pa med cing / chos khas len pa med pa ste/ de'i phyir de yang tshul dang mthun pa ma
19b4(mdo sde): yin no zhes zer ro// la la na re grong khyer 'phags rgyal na rab snang gi rigs 'di ni dpung che zhing gzhon pa mang ba dang / pha rol gyi g.yul ngor rgyal bar thob pa yin te/ de ni byang chub
19b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' yum gyi lhums su 'jug pa'i gnas su rung ngo zhes zer ro// la la na re de yang tshul dang mthun pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag ni khro zhing gtum la
19b6(mdo sde): brlang zhing gzu lums can rgod pa ste/ las yod par lta ba yang ma yin pas/ de'i phyir de yang byang chub sems dpa' de lhums su 'jug pa'i gnas kyi 'os ma yin no zhes zer ro// la
19b7(mdo sde): la na re grong khyer bcom brlag 'di 'byor zhing rgyas la lo legs pa dang / bde ba dang ldan pa skye bo mang po dang mis kun tu gang ba yin pas/ rgyal po lag bzangs sde dpa' ba'i bdag por
19b8(mdo sde): rgyal po'i pho brang ni/ byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi lhum su 'jug pa'i gnas su rung ngo zhes zer ro// la la na re de yang tshul dang mthun pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rgyal po de ni lo
20a1(mdo sde): bar lta ba'i rigs kyi rgyud du skyes pa ste/ mi rgod dang 'dra ba'i rgyal po yin pas/ byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa ni log par blta ba'i rigs su skye bar ma
20a2(mdo sde): rigs te ka de'i phyir de yang tshul dang mthun pa ma yin no zhes zer ro// la la na re grong khyer ha sti pu ra 'di'i rgyal po ni skyab seng gi bu'i rigs kyi rgyud la skyes pa/ dpa' zhing rtul pod pa
20a3(mdo sde): dang ldan pa yan lag mchog gi gzugs phun sum tshogs pa gzhan gyi sde 'joms pa ste/ rigs de ni byang chub sems dpa' de lhums su 'jug pa'i gnas kyi 'os yin no zhes zer ro// 
20a4(mdo sde): la la na re de yang tshul dang mthun pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar skya bseng gi bu'i rigs su skyes pa dag gis ni rigs kyi rgyud rnam par 'khrugs par byas te/ g.yul ngor
20a5(mdo sde): brtan pa la ni chos kyi bu zhes zer/ 'jigs sde la ni rlung gi bu zhes zer/ srid grub la ni dbang po'i bu zhes zer/ 'jigs med dang lhar bcas la ni tha skar gyi bu zhes zer te/ de'i pir
20a6(mdo sde): rigs de yang byang chub sems dpa' de lhums su 'jug pa'i gnas kyi 'os ma yin no zhes zer ro// la la na re grong khyer bcom brlag 'di ni shin tu yang nyams dga' zhing phan tshun khyong sa ste dang/ rgyal po/ 
20a7(mdo sde): bzang po'i bshes gnyen bzhugs pa'i sa yang yin la/ rgyal po de yang glang po dang / rta dang / shing rta dang / dpung bu chung dang / dpung gi tshogs mang po dang ldan pa/ gser dang dngul dang / nor bu dang / mu
20a8(mdo sde): tig dang / bai DUr+ya dang / dung dang / man shes dang / byi ru dang / sa le sbram dang / nor dang yo byad shin tu mang ba/ rgyal po dang / blon po thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa'i stobs dang / pha rol gnos
20b1(mdo sde): ba dang / ldan pa mdza' ba dang ldan zhing chos la dga' ba ste/ rigs de ni byang chub sems dpa' de yum gyi lhums su 'jug pa'i gnas su rung ngo zhes zer ro// la lan re de yang tshul dang mthun pa ma
20b2(mdo sde): yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po bzang po'i bshes gnyen yon tan de lta bu dang ldan pa de yod mod kyi de ni shin tu rgas pas bu skyed pa'i mthu yang med la bu myang bas de'i phyir rigs de yang byang chub
20b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' de yum gyi lhums su 'jug pa'i gnas kyi 'os pa ma yin no zhes zer ro// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang lha de dag gis 'dzam bu'i gling gi yul chen po bcu drug po thams cad
20b4(mdo sde): na rgyal po'i rigs mthong 'i yon po ji snyed yod pa de dag thams ca nga la bltas na// thams cad kyang nyes pa dang bcas par mthong ste/ de dag de ltar sems dpa'i yid la byed pa'i tshe/ 
20b5(mdo sde): lha'i bu ye shes tog gi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa theg pa chen po 'di la nges par gyur pa zhig/ yod pa des byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang lha'i 'khor chen
20b6(mdo sde): bo yod pa de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po dag tshur shog byang chub sems dpa' de nyid kyi drung du dong ste/ rigs rin po che yon tan ji lta bur phun sum tshogs pa zhig tu srid pa tha ma
20b7(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' skye bar 'gyur ba dri'o zhes smras pa dang / legs so zhes te de dag thams cad kyang thal mo sbyar nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i drung du phyin te dris pa/ skyes bu dam pa rig
20b8(mdo sde): rin po che yon tan phun sum tshogs pa ji lta bu zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa skye bar 'gyur/ de nas byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po dag dang / lnga'i tshogs chen
21a1(mdo sde): po de dag la rnam par bltas te/ 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po dag byang chu sems dpa' srid pa tham pa gang du skye bar 'gyur ba'i rigs de ni rnam pa drug bcu rtsa bzhi
21a2(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa yin te/ drug bcu rtsa ba ni gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste ka rigs de ni btsun pa yin/ rigs de ni kun gyis mngon par shes pa yin/ rigs de ni bran tshegs med cing gnod par byede ba
21a3(mdo sde): med pa yin// rigs de ni rgyud phun sum tshogs pa yin/ rigs de ni tshe 'brang phun sum tshogs pa yin/ rigs de ni skyes bu zung phun sum tshogs pa yin// rigs de ni sngon gyi skyes bu zung dun sa
21a4(mdo sde): tshegs pa yin// rigs de ni btsun pa'i skyes bu zung phun su mtshogs pa yin/ rigs de ni kun gyi mngon par shes pa'i skyes bu zung bur sum tshogs pa yin/ rigs de ni
21a5(mdo sde): dbang che bar grags pa'i skyes bu zung phun sum tshogs pa yin/ rigs de ni skyes bu mang ba yin/ rigs de ni bud med mang ba yin/ rigs de ni 'jigs pa med pa yin/ 
21a6(mdo sde): rigs de ni dman pa med cing zhum pa med pa yin/ rigs de ni brkam pa med pa yin/ rigs de ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin/ rigs de ni shes rab dang ldan pa yin/ rigs de ni blon
21a7(mdo sde): pos blta zhing longs spyod la spyod pa yin/ rigs de ni bzo don yod pas bshams shing longs spyod la spyod pa yin/ rigs de ni mdza' brtan pa yin/ rigs de ni dud 'gro'i skyes gnas
21a8(mdo sde): su skyes pa'i srog chags kyi srog la lta ba yin/ rigs de ni byas pa bzo ba dang ldan pa yin// rigs de ni brtul zhugs shes pa yin/ rigs de ni 'dun pas mi 'gro ba yin/ rigs
21b1(mdo sde): de ni de sdang gis mi 'gro ba yin/ rigs de ni gti mug gis mi 'gro ba yin/ rigs de ni 'jigs pas mi 'gro ba yin/ rigs de ni kha na ma tho bas/ 'jigs pa yin/ rigs de ni gti mug
21b2(mdo sde): la mi gnas pa yin/ rigs de ni lag pags che ba yin/ rigs de ni bya ba la mos pa yin/ rigs de ni gtong ba la mos pa yin/ rigs de ni sbyin pa la mos pa yin/ rigs de ni na
21b3(mdo sde): sha shes pa yin/ rigs de ni rtsal brtan pa yin/ rigs de ni mthu rtsal dang ldan pa yin/ rigs de ni rtsal mchog dang ldan pa yin/ rigs de ni drang srong mchog ma yin/ 
21b4(mdo sde): rigs de ni lha mchod pa yin/ rigs de ni mchod rten mchod pa yin/ rigs de ni mtshun brjed pa yin/ rigs de ni 'khon du 'dzin pa med pa yin/ rigs de ni phyog
21b5(mdo sde): bcur sgra bsgrags pa yin/ rigs de ni 'khor chen po dang ldan pa yin/ rigs de ni 'khor mi phyed pa dang ldan ba yin/ rigs de ni bla na med pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa yin
21b6(mdo sde): rigs de ni rigs kyi nang na gtso bor bya ba yin/ rigs de ni rigs la dbang thob pa yin/ rigs de ni dbang che bar grags pa yin/ rigs de ni par 'dzin pa yin/ rigs de ni mar 'ji
21b7(mdo sde): pa yin/ rigs de ni dge sbyong du 'dzin pa yin// rigs de ni bram zer 'dzin pa yin/ rigs de ni nor dang 'bru'i bang mdzod mang ba yin/ rigs de ni dbyig dang gser dang / nor bu dang / 
21b8(mdo sde): mu tig dang / bai DUr+ya dang / dung dang man shel dang / byi ru dang / sa le sbram dang / dngul dang / rdzas dang / yo byad mang ba yin/ rigs de ni glang po che dang / rta dang / rnga mo dang
22a1(mdo sde): ba lang dang / lug shin tu mang ba yin// rigs de ni bran po dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba shin tu mang ba yin/ rigs de ni thub par dka'
22a2(mdo sde): ba yin ka rigs de ni don thams cad grub pa yin// rigs de ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs kyi rgyud du skyes pa yin/ rigs de ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i grogs kyis bskyed pa yin/ rigs
22a3(mdo sde): de ni byang chub sems dpa'i rigs su rigs btsun par skyes pa yin/ rigs de yang 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ dge sbyong dang bram ze'i
22a4(mdo sde): skye dgu dang bcas pa'i nang na/ rigs las mos pa'i sgo na gyi kha na ma thob thams cad dang bral ba ste/ grogs po ngag gang du byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa 'byung bar
22a5(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'i rigs de ni rnam pa drug bcu rtsa bzhi po de dag dang ldan pa yin no// grogs po dag srid pa tha ma pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bud med gang gi mngal du 'jug par
22a6(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'i bud med da ni yon tan gyi rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa yin te/ sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa ni kun gyis mngon par
22a7(mdo sde): shes pa'i bud med gyis mngal du 'jug go/ kun gyis mngon par rig pa dang / spyod pa la glags mi thod pa dang / rigs phun sum tshogs pa dang / cho 'brang phun sum tshogs pa dang
22a8(mdo sde): gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dang / ming phun sum tshogs pa dang / chu zheng phun sum tshogs pa dang / sngon chad ma btsas pa dang / tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa dang / gtong ba phun sum
22b1(mdo sde): tshogs pa dang / bzhin 'dzum pa dang / mthun par 'dzin pa dang / gsil ba dang / dul ba dang / 'jigs pa med pa dang / mang du thos pa dang / mkhas pa dang / sgyu med pa dang / g.yo med pa dang / 
22b2(mdo sde): mi 'khro ba dang / phrag dog med pa dang / ser sna med pa dang / mi rgod pa dang / mi g.yeng ba dang / ca co med pa dang / bzod cing des pa dang ldan pa dang / ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa dang / 'dod chags dang
22b3(mdo sde): zhe sdang dang gti mug gi shas chung ba dang / bud med kyi skyon dang bral ba dang / khyim thab kyi rtul zhugs dang ldan pa dang / yon thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'i bud med kyi mngal du byang chub sems dpa'
22b4(mdo sde): srid pa tha ma pa 'jug go/ grogs po dag byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa bud med gang gi mngal du 'jug pa'i bud med de ni yon tan gyi rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag dang ldan pa yin no// 
22b5(mdo sde): grogs po dag byang chub sems dpa' ni zla ba mar gyi ngo la ma 'i mngal du mi 'jug go/ byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa ni zla ba yar gyi tshes bco lnga'i zla ba nya ste/ rgyas pa la/ skar
22b6(mdo sde): ma rgyal dang ldan pa'i tshe/ ma gso sbyong blangs pa'i mngal du 'jug go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha'i bu de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' las rigs yongs su dag pa dang / ma yongs
22b7(mdo sde): su dag pa'i rnam pa de lta bu de dag thos nas 'di snyam du sems te/ skyes bu dam pa 'dis rnam pa ji snyed bstan pa de lta bus yon tan dang ldan pa'i rigs de gang zhig yod snyam sems so// de
22b8(mdo sde): ltar sems shing yid la byed pa la zhugs pa de dag 'di du 59/ shAkya'i grong 'di 'byor zhing rgyas la bde zhing lo legs pa dang ldan te/ nyams dga' zhing skye bo mang po dang mis gang ba yin la/ rgyal
23a1(mdo sde): po zas gtsang ma'i rgyud kyis dag pa/ pa'i rgyud kyis dag pa/ chung ma dag pa dang ldan pa/ las gyi mtha' la nyon mongs pa med pa/ dpe byad bzang ba shin tu 'dzangs
23a2(mdo sde): pa bsod nams kyi gzi brjid dang ldan pa/ grags pa chen po'i rigs su skyes pa/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs kyi rgyud du skyes pa/ nor dang gter dang rin po che dpag tu med pa dang ldan pas las yod
23a3(mdo sde): par lta ba/ sdig pa'i lta ba med pa/ shAkya'i yul kun na yang rgyal po de gcig pur zad// tsheng dpon dang khyim bdag dang blon po dang / 'khor gyi mi thams cad kyis rim gror ba zhing mchod pa/ mdzes
23a4(mdo sde): pa blta na sdug pa/ ha cang yang mi rgan/ ha cang yang mig zhon zhing / gzugs mdzes la yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa/ bzo shes pa dus shes pa/ bdag shes pa chos she
23a5(mdo sde): pa/ sems can shes pa/ 'jig rten shes pa/ mtshan shes pa/ chos kyi rgyal po chos kyi rjes su ston pa'o// ser skya 'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po de ni sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba
23a6(mdo sde): bskyed pa rnams kyi gnas te gang dag der skyes par gyur pa/ de dag kyang de dang skal pa 'dra ba dag go/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma de la lha mo sgyu 'phrul zhes bya ba shAkya'i bdag po shin tu legs par
23a7(mdo sde): rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i bu mo zhig yod pa'ang phyug cung gzhon zhing dar la bab pa'i gzugs phun sum tshogs pa sngon chad ma btsas pi bu dang / bu mo med pa gzugs mdzes pa/ bu don la bris
23a8(mdo sde): pa ltar blta na sdug pa lha'i bu mo ltar rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ bud med kyi skyon rnams dang / bral ba bden par smra ga/ mi drag pa mi brlang ba/ mi gcor ba kha na ma tho ba med pa/ gyo mo'i sgra lta/ 
23b1(mdo sde): bu med pa/ ca co med pa/ 'jam zhing snyan la yid du 'ong bar smra ba/ mi nges pa dang / khong khro ba dang / nga rgyal dang / dregs pa dang / rgyags pa dang / khro ba med pa/ phrag dog med ga/ dus su sma ga gtong ba
23b2(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa// khos chog par 'dzin pa/ khyim thab kyi brtul zhugs can/ skyes pa gzhan la bsam pa'i yid la bya ba dang bral ba/ mgo dang / rna ba dang / sna gnas
23b3(mdo sde): su phebs pa/ bung ba'i mchog gi kha dog lta bu'i sku dang ldan pa/ bral ba legs pa smin tshugs legs pa khro gnyer med pa/ bzhin 'dzum pa gsong bopor smra ba 'jam zhing snyan pa'i tshig dang ldan
23b4(mdo sde): ba mthun par 'dzin pa/ drang ba gya gyu med ga sgyu med pa kra/ yo med pa/ khrel yod cing ngo tsha shes pa/ mi rgod pa mi g.yeng ba/ kha ngan mi smra ba/ 'tshal ba'i tshig med pa/ 'dod
23b5(mdo sde): chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi shas chung ga dang de sa shing bzod pa dang ldan pa / rkang lag dang mig dang blo shin tu bsrungs pa/ rga lag shin tu 'jab pa ka tsa lin
23b6(mdo sde): da'i gos ltar reg na bde ba pad ma gzhon nu'i 'dab ma ltar mig shin tu rnam par dag pa/ sna dbyibs legs shing mdog sdug pa yan lag shin tu brtan pa/ 'ja'i dbyibs ltar shin tu 'dud
23b7(mdo sde): bad yan lag dang / nyin lag shin tu 'bras pa/ yan lag la smad du me dang ma chu bim pa ltar dmar ba/ bltan mdzes pa mgul rims bzhin du 'dug pa/ rgyan dam pa dang ldan ga sna ma'i me tog
23b8(mdo sde): dang par shi ka ltar shin tu rnam par dag pa/ phrag pa legs par byin gyis 'tsham pa/ rims gyis legs par grub pa'i dpung go dang ldan pa/ byed pa gzhu'i chang gzungs ltar pra ba
24a1(mdo sde): / gzhogs nyams pa med pa/ lte ba khung zab pa/ lta zur 'jam zhing yangs la zlub zhing brtan par grub pa/ rdo rje ltar mkhregs shing mtshungs pa med pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ 
24a2(mdo sde): glang po'i sna ltar mnyam zhing legs pa'i brla dang ldan pa/ byin pa ri dgas e na ya'i byin pa lta bu// lag pa dang rkang pa'i mthil rgya skegs kyi khu ba ltar 'dug pa/ 'gro ba'i mig tu sdug pa/ mig gi
24a3(mdo sde): dbang po nyams pa med pa/ yid du 'ong zhing blta na sdug pa/ bud med rin po che'i gzugs las kyang khyad par du 'phags pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ sgyu 'phrul sprul pa lta bu'i gzugs su 'dug
24a4(mdo sde): ga sgyu 'phrul zhes ming gi brdar brtags pa/ sgyu rtsal la ma khas pa/ dga' tshal gyi lha'i bu mo lta bu zhig/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug pa de ni bang chub
24a5(mdo sde): sems dpa'i yum du tshul dang mthun gyis// gang byang chu ba sems dpas rigs dag pa bstan pa/ de ni shAkya'i rigs nyid la snang gi gzhan la ma yin no// de la 'di skad
24a6(mdo sde): ces bya ste/ dag pa'i sems can chos mthong khang bzangs na// chos bzang seng ge'i khri la rab tu 'dug/ byang chub sems dpa' grags chen ldan pa dang // skal ba mnyam pa'i lha rnams
24a7(mdo sde): drang srong 'khor// de na 'dug cing de ni 'di snyam sems// rigs gang rnam dag rab tu shes dang ldan// byang chub sems dpa' skyed dang tshul mthun gang // pha ma gang zhig dag pa'i dngos dang
24a8(mdo sde): ldan// 'dzam bu'i gling 'di kun tu rnam ltas na// rgyal rigs rgyal rgyud che ba gang yin pa// kun kyang skyon dang bcas par brjed bsams nas// shAkya'i rigs ni skyon dang bral bar 'ayong
24b1(mdo sde): zas gtsang rgyal po'i rigs nang rigs dang ldan// mi dbang rgyud na rnam dag cho rigs can// 'byor cing rgyas la 'khrug pa med pa ste// skye bo dam pa chos ldan rim gro can// ser skya brjod pa'i
24b2(mdo sde): grong khyer sems can gzhan// kun kyang bsams pa rab dag ches dang ldan// skyed mos kun dga' gzhal med gang gis brgyan// skye ba'i sar ni ser skyar brjod pa mdzes// kun kyang mtshan chen
24b3(mdo sde): stobs dang ldan pa ste// glang po gnyis sam gsum gyi stobs kyang bdog/ 'bong rtsal bslabs pa'i pha rol mthar phyin kyang // srog gi don du gzhan la gnod mi byed// zas gtsang rgyal po'i
24b4(mdo sde): bud med dben pa ste// bud med dam pa stong gi mchog tu phyin// yid du 'ong ba sgyu 'phrul sprul pa'i gzugs// de yi ming yang lha mo sgyu 'phrul te// mdzes pa'i gzugs 'chang lha yi bu me
24b5(mdo sde): bzhin// 'dres pa lus ldan yan lag dri med sdug/ lha dang mi rnams gang yang rung bdag/ sgyu 'phrul mthong na gang ngos sa de maud kyang // 'dod chags zhen med snang bas zhe sdang med// den
24b6(mdo sde): 'jam snyan drang ba'i ngag dang ldan// mi brlang mi nu'i shin tu nges pa ste// de ni bzhin 'dzum khro gnyer rab tu spangs// ngo ma khrel yod chos spyod ldan pa ste// nga rgyal med cing ma khengs rgod pa med// phrag dog med cing
24b7(mdo sde): sgra dang g.yo med de// gtong la dga' zhing rtag tu khams sems ldan// las yod blta zhing log pa'i sbyor ba spangs// bden la gnas shing lus dang yid rab bsdams// sa la gang yong bud med skyon mang
24b8(mdo sde): tshigs// de dag thams cad de la yod ma yin// me yi 'jig rten dri za'i 'jig rten nas// lha'i 'jig rten dag na bud med gzhan// lha me sgyu 'phrul mtshungs med dag la lhag/ drang srong chen po'i mar ni
25a1(mdo sde): de 'os te// tshe rabs lnga brgya kho nar tshang bar yang // de ni byang chub sems dpa'i mar gyur to// de dang des ni yab kyang zas gtsang ste// de phyir yon tan ldan pa ma yi 'os/ 
25a2(mdo sde): dka' thub can ltar de ni brtul zhugs gnas// brtul zhugs rjes spyod rtag par chos kyang spyod// rgyal pos gnang ste mchog sbyin thob pas na// 'dod pas ma sbed zla ba sum cu gnyis// gang gi
25a3(mdo sde): phyogs na de 'dug 'greng ba 'am// nyal zhing 'gro bar gyur pa'i gnas dag kyang // de yi las dge gzhol 'ad ba'i 'od zer gyis// shin tu snang bar 'od kyis gsal bar gyur// lha dang lga
25a4(mdo sde): min mi rnams gang yang rung // 'dod chags sems kyis blta bar nus pa med// spyod lam rnams su 'phags pa'i yo na tan ldan// de la kun kyang ma dang bu mor lta// sgyu 'phrul lha mo
25a5(mdo sde): dge ba'i las kyi rgyus// rgyal po'i srid ni rab yangs rnam bar 'phel// khams kyi rgyal po 'jug par mi byed cing // rgyal po'i grangs dang brjod pa rnam par 'phel// de ltar smra
25a6(mdo sde): 'phrul snod du mthun gyur cing // de ltar sems can dam pa mchog mdzes pas// de gnyis yon tan mchog dang ldan pas na// de ni bur gyur de ni ma yi 'os// lha mo yon tan mchog dang ldan pa ste/ 
25a7(mdo sde): glang po khri yi stobs mdog ma gtogs par// 'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan 'di na mi mchog de// 'dzin par nus pa'i bud med gang yang med// de skad che ba'i lha'i bu rnams dang // byang chub sems dpa'
25a8(mdo sde): shes rab rgyan chen dag/ shAkya'i rigs 'dis dga' bar mdzad pa yi// yum du legs ldan sgyu 'phrul 'gyur zhes zer// rigs yongs su dag pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / 
25b1(mdo sde): dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' skye ba'i rigs la rnam par bltas nas// dga' ldan gyi gnas kyi gzhal med khang chen po chu dang rgyar dpag tshad drug bcu rtsa bzhi yod pa gang du byang
25b2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' 'dug ste// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams la chos ston pa// rgyal mtshan mthon po zhes bya ba yod de// byang chub sems dpa' de gzhal med khang chen po dang song nas byin pa dang / 
25b3(mdo sde): dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad la smras pa// khyed rnams 'dir 'du bar gyis shig/ shi 'pho ba rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba chos rjes su dran pa/ rjes su bstan pa/ tha ma'i chos
25b4(mdo sde): ma tshan pa byang chub sems dpa' las nyon cig/ de skad kyi tshig thos nas/ dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad lha'i bu mo'i tshogs dang bcas te/ gzhal med khang chen po da
25b5(mdo sde): 'dus so// der byang chub sems dpas 'khor gyi khams gling bzhi pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshad tsam du yangs par byin gyis brlabs par gyur nas/ de de tsam du
25b6(mdo sde): bzang zhing de tsam du blta na sdug la de tsam du rgyan gyis brgyan zhing de tsam du yid du 'ong bar gyur pa des/ 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lnga'i bu thams cad rang rang gi khyim gyi bkod pa
25b7(mdo sde): la dur khrod lta bu'i 'du shes skye bar gyur to// de la byang chub sems dpa' rang gi bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa'i rgyu mthun pa yongs su brgyan seng ge'i khri nor bu'i rin po che du mas rtsa ba
25b8(mdo sde): spras pa/ lha'i ras bcos bu'i stan du ma bting ba lha'i spos zhim po du mas bsgos pa/ bdug spos dam pa mchog tu bya ba du mas bdugs pa/ lha'i me tog kha dog du ma'i bgram
26a1(mdo sde): bkram pa/ nor bu dang rin po che'i 'od brgya stong du ma 'bar ba'i gzi brjid can/ nor bu rin po ma du ma'i dra ba g.yogs pa/ rin po che'i dril bu gser kha'i drang du ma'i
26a2(mdo sde): sgra byung bas mngon par dga' ba dang ldan pa rin po che'i dril bu brgya stong du ma mngon par dkrol ba'i sgra dang ldan pa/ rin po che'i dra ba brgya stong du mas yongs su gsal bar gyur pa/ 
26a3(mdo sde): rin po che'i gdugs brgya stong du mas kun nas bkab pa/ dar brgya stong du mas rab tu sbyangs pa/ dar gyi phreng ba lnga ldi brgya stong du mas shin tu brgyan pa/ lnga'i bu mo brgya stong du mas
26a4(mdo sde): glu blangs gar byas/ rol mo byas pa yon tan brgya stong du ma kun tu brjod pa/ 'jig rten skyong ba brgya stong du mas rjes su bsrungs pa/ brgya byin brgya stong du mas phyag byas pa/ 
26a5(mdo sde): tshangs pa brgya stong du mas rab tu btud pa/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongs su bzung ba/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma
26a6(mdo sde): mtha' yas pas dgongs pa bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med par pha rol tu phyin pa/ tshogs su byas pa'i bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa'i rgyu mthun pa las byung ba
26a7(mdo sde): de lta bu la 'dug go// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i khri chen po yon tan de lta bu dang ldan pa la 'dug nas/ lnga'i 'khor chen po de dag la smras pa/ grogs
26a8(mdo sde): po dag byang chub sems dpa'i lus bsod nams brgya'i mtshan gyis legs par brgyan pa la ltos/ shar dang lho dang / nub dang byang dang / 'og dang / steng dang phyogs bcu kun
26b1(mdo sde): nas byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas dam pa na 'khod cing thams cad kyang srid pa tha ma la mngon par phyogs pa/ lha'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ shing po'i rnam pas lha rnams
26b2(mdo sde): dga' bar byed pa'i chos snang ba'i sgo yang dag par ston pa/ tshad med grangs med pa bgrang ba las 'das pa dag la ltos/ de nas lha'i 'khor de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi
26b3(mdo sde): brlabs kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag mthong bar gyur te/ mthong bar gyur nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal nas/ 
26b4(mdo sde): 'di skad du 'di ltar bdag cag gis bltas pa tsam gyi byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyed cig mthong ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i byi na gyis brlabs bsams kyis mi khyab ste/ legs so zhe
26b5(mdo sde): ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do// de nas byang chub sems dang sa yang lha'i 'khor chen po de dag la bos nas/ 'di skad ce sa smras te/ grogs po dag de bas na byang chub sems dpa'
26b6(mdo sde): de dag lha'i bu de dag la gang ston pa shi 'pho'i rnam pas lha rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos snang ba'i sgo nyon cig/ grogs po dag chos snang ba'i sgo brgya rtsa brgyad po 'di dag ni/ byang chub
26b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' shi 'do'i dus la bab pa'i tshe/ lha'i 'khor la gdon mi za bar yang dag par bstan par bya ste/ brgya rtsa brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ grogs po dag dang pa ni chos snang ba'i
26b8(mdo sde): sgo steng bsam pa mi byed par 'gyur ro// dang ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ sems rtogs pa can dang bral bar 'gyur ro// mchog tu dga' ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ lus shin tu sbyangs par 'gyur ro// 
27a1(mdo sde): dga' ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ sems rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// lus kyi sdom pa ni ngos snang ba'i sgo ste/  gsum yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// ngag gi sdom pa ni chos sdang
27a2(mdo sde): ba'i sgo ste/ ngag gi nyes pa bzhi yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro// yid kyi sdom pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ brdab sems dang gnod sems dang log par blta ba spong bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ni
27a3(mdo sde): chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ sangs rgyas mthong ba rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// chos rjes su dran pa ni chos snang ba'i ske ste/ chos bstan pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// dge 'dun rjes su dran pa ni chos snang
27a4(mdo sde): ba'i sgo ste/ skyon med par 'jug par 'gyur ro// gtong ba rjes su dran pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ rdzas thams cad rab tu spong bar 'gyur ro// tshul khrims rjes su drad pa
27a5(mdo sde): ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ smon lam yongs su rdzogs par 'a gyur ro// lha rjes su dran pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ sems rgya chen por 'gyur ro// byams pa ni chos snang ba
27a6(mdo sde): ste rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po thams cad zil gyis gnon par 'gyuraro// snying rjes ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ rnam par gtse ba med pa lhur len par 'gyur ro// dga' ba ni chos snang
27a7(mdo sde): ba'i sgo ste/ mi dga' ba thams cad sel bar 'gyur ro// btang snyoms ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ 'dod pa la smod par 'gyur ro// mi rtag par so sor rtogs pa ni chos snang ba'i
27a8(mdo sde): sgo ste/ 'dod pa dang / gzugs yod pa dang / gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ro// sdug bsngal du so sor rtogs pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo
27b1(mdo sde): ste/ smon las kun chad par 'gyur ro// bdag med par so ma brtog pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ bdag la mngon par zhen pa med par 'gyur ro// zhi bar so sor rtog pa ni chos sdang ba'i sgo ste/ 
27b2(mdo sde): rjes su chags pa 'bar ba med par 'gyur ro// ngo tsha shes pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ nang nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro// khrel yod pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ phyi rol nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro// bden
27b3(mdo sde): ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ lha dang mi rnams la mi slu bar 'gyur ro// yang dag pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ bdag la slu ba med par 'gyur ro// chos spyod pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ chos la
27b4(mdo sde): rtod par 'gyur ro// gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba ni chos sna nga ba'i sgo ste/ ngan song gsum las yang dag par 'da' ba ra 'gyur ro// byas pa bzo ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ dge ba'i
27b5(mdo sde): rtsa ba byas pa rnams chud mi za bar 'gyur ro// byas pa rig pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ gzhan la brnyas pa med par 'a gyur ro// bdag shes pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ bdag la
27b6(mdo sde): stod pa med par 'gyur ro// sems can shes pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ gzhan la smod pa med par 'gyur ro// chos shes pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos la nan
27b7(mdo sde): tan byed par 'gyur ro// 'du shes pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ mthong ba don yod par 'gyur ro// nga rgyal bcom pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ ye shes yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// zhe 'gras pa
27b8(mdo sde): med pa'i sems ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ bdag dang gzhan rjes su bsrung bar 'gyur ro// khon du mi 'dzin pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ 'gyod pa med par 'gyur ro// mos pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ the tsom
28a1(mdo sde): / med pa lhur len par 'gyur ro// mi sdug par so sor rtog pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa spong bar 'gyur ro// gnod sems red pa ni chos sdang ba'i
28a2(mdo sde): sgo ste/ gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa spong bar 'gyur ro// gti mug med pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ mi shes pa rnam par sel bar 'gyur ro// chos don du gnyer ba ni chos sdang ba'i
28a3(mdo sde): sgo ste/ don la rton par 'gyur ro// chos 'dod pa ni snang ba'i sgo ste/ chos snang bar thob par 'gyur ro// thos pa tshol ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ tshul bzhin du chos la so sor rtog par 'gyur
28a4(mdo sde): ro ra yang dag pa'i sbyor ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ yang dag par nan tan byed par 'gyur ro// ming dang gzugs yongs su shes pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ chags pa thams cad
28a5(mdo sde): las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ro// rgyur lta ba las/ yang dag par 'joms pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ rigs pa dang rnam par grol ba thob par 'gyur ro// 
28a6(mdo sde): rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba spong ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ mtho bar sems pa med cing dma' bar sems pa med par 'gyur ro// phung po la mkhas pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ sdug
28a7(mdo sde): bsngal yongs su shes par 'gyur ro// khams mnyam pa nyid ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ kun 'byung ba spong bar 'gyur ro// skye mchod bsal ba ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ lam bsgom
28a8(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro// mi skye ba'i brjod pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ 'gog pa mngon du byed par 'gyur ro// lus la song gi'i dran pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ lus dben par 'gyur ro// tshor
28b1(mdo sde): bal song ba'i dran pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ tshor ba thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro// sems la song ba'i dran snang ba'i sgo ste/ sems la sgyu ma ltablang so sor rtogs par 'gyur ro// 
28b2(mdo sde): la song ba dran pa ni chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ rab rib dang bral ba'i ye shes su 'gyur ro// yang dag par spong ba bzhin chos snang ba'i sgo ste/ mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong ba dang / dge
