102a6(mdo sde): rung ltar lha khang ra spos dang phreng bas mchod te de ni sus kyang brdung ba/ ma nus na/ dgang bar lta smos kyang ci dgos pa zhig yod do// byang chub sems dpas smras pa// lha de blang du gsol// sad
102a7(mdo sde): bar bgyi'o// de nas gzhung blangs te 'os pa dang / shAkya gzhin nu thams cad kyis nan tan gyi mchog gis bsgrims kyang gzhu brdung bar yang ma nus na dgang ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te ma nus so// de nas shAkya
102a8(mdo sde): la ga na be con can gyis lus kyi mthu stobs thams cad phung ste gzhung ba rdung bar rgal na ma brdung so// de nas des gzhu de byang chub sems dpa' la byin no// de nas byang chub sems dpas gzhung blangs te stan las
102b1(mdo sde): ma langs par skyil mo dkrugs phyed bcas te/ lag pa g.yon pas bzung nas lag pa g.yas pa'i sor mo gcig gis brdungs so// gzhu de de ltar brdzus pa'i tshe/ ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po thams
102b2(mdo sde): du sgra mngon par grags par gyur to// grong khyer gyi mi thams cad kyang skrag smug por gyur to// gcig la gcig 'dri zhing 'di lta bu'i sgra ci zhig ces zer ro// de la la na re gzhon nu don grub kyis mes
102b3(mdo sde): kyi snam ru brdungs nas de'i sgra byung ba 'di yin no zhes zer ro// de nas lha dang mi brgya stong dag e ma a la la zhes zer zhing ca co dang gzha'i sgra brgya stong 'byin par gyur to// nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod pa'i lha'i bu
102b4(mdo sde): ngag gis kyang rgyal po zas gtsang mdang skye bo'i tshogs phal poche de dag la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ gdan las ma gzhes brtsal bo ma mchis su// thub pas snam bu 'di 'dra brdzus pa
102b5(mdo sde): las// gdon mi 'tshal bar dgongs pa rdzogs gyur te// bdud kyi sde bcom myur du thub par byed// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub se mas dpas pad blangs nas gzhu de dang sbyar te dkang ras
102b6(mdo sde): 'phas pa'i mthu stobs kyis kun dga' bo'i 'ben du rnga btsugs pa dang / lha sbyin pa nga chu pa/ ma lhag na po con can gyis 'ben du rnga btsugs pa de dag thams cad las thal nas rgyang
102b7(mdo sde): grags bcu'i pha rol tu dag gis 'ben lcags kyi rnga btsugs pa dang shing ta la bdun mngar ba dang phag rgod kyi gzugs 'khral 'khor du byas pa las kyang thal te/ mnga' des la zug nas mi snang bar nub
102b8(mdo sde): bar gyur to// sa phyogs gang du mda' de zug ste nu pa'i sa phyogs dang khron pa lta bu'i khung bu zhig byung nas da ltar yang mdire khro pa zhes bya ba yin no// de'i tshe lha dang ma brgya stong dag e ma a la la
103a1(mdo sde): / zhes zeng zhing ca co dag na'i sgra brgya stong 'byin par gyur to// rashAkya tshogs thams cad kyang ngo mtshar rmad du byung bathob ste// kye ngo mtshar to 'dis ni bslabs kyang ma bslabs
103a2(mdo sde): bar rtsal gyi shes pa de lta bu dang ldan pa ni ngo mtshar che zhes zer ro// na mkha'i dkyil ri 'khod pa'i lha'i bu dag gis kyang / rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang skye ba'i tshogs phal po che de dag la 'di skad ces smraso// 
103a3(mdo sde): de ltar ngo mtshar ci che ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni sa yi snying po sngon gyi sangs rgyas gdan la zhugs// zhi gnas snam du thogs shing stong sa bdag med mdang rnams kyis// nyon mongs dag rnams bcom ste lta
103a4(mdo sde): bde ra ba dral nas su// byang chub dpa pa zhi brdul med mya ngan me da pa thob// de skad ces smras nas lha'i bu de dag gis byang chub se/ mas dpa' la lha'i me tog gis mngon par gtor te dong ngo // 
103a5(mdo sde): de bzhin du mchongs pa dang yi ge dang / bag cis dang / rtsis dang / grangs dang gyad kyi 'dzin sta sa dang / rgyang nas blo dang bang nga tshar dang / rgyal dang 'beng dang / dpyod dang / glang po che'i gzhang
103a6(mdo sde): gon pa dang / rta rtsal dang / shing ti'i thabs dang mda' gzhu'i thabs dang / brtan pa dang / mthu dang dpa' ba dang / 'gyed stobs dang / lcags kyus sbyar thabs dang zhags pa'i thobs dang mdun du bsnur ba dang / 
103a7(mdo sde): phyir bsnur ba dang / khazur ba dang / 'dzin stangs dang / gem sta sa dang / thong tshugs dang gcas pa dang dal ba dang / 'byung ba dang / gzhig pa dang gshegs pa dang mi 'tsher bar phog pa dang / gnang du phog
103a8(mdo sde): ba dang / sgra grag par phog pa dang / tshabs che ba dang / cho lo'i rtsed mo dang / snyan dag sbyar ba dang / lam dang ri mo dang gzugs dang gzugs kyi las dang / thabs kyi dpyang dang / me'i las dang / rol mo'i
103b1(mdo sde): dpangs sgra dang gang dang / klu dang / yi ge klag pa'i mig lo dang / gtam dang gzhad gang dang / rtsed mo nga gro nga / sgeg pa dang / bre ba rgyu dang / rlung g.yab g.yob ba dang / mo bu tshon gyis bsgyur ba dang / 
103b2(mdo sde): gis tshon gyis bsrung ba dang / mig 'phrul gyi cho ga dang / rmi lam gyi byad dang / phyi'i skad dang / dud med kyi mtshan dang / skyes pa'i mtshan dang / byung ba che'i mtshan dang / rta'i mtshan dang / b.lang gi mtshan dang / ri
103b3(mdo sde): mtshan dang / lug gi mtshan dang / khyi'i mtshan dang / shes gsal dang / sgra nges par sbyor ba dang / nga ro bsgyur ba dang / sngon gyi zas dang sngon byung ba dang / rig byed dang / lung bstan pa dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / yi
103b4(mdo sde): ge'i lI yang dang / tshig bsdeb pa dang / mchod sprin gyi cho ga dang / skar mar lugs dang / grangs can gyi lugs dang / rnal 'byor gyi lugs dang / las kyi tshogs dang / bye brag gi lugs dang / 
103b5(mdo sde): nor gyi rigs pa dang / bur bu'i lugs dang / tshul lugs dang / lha ma yin gyi lugs dang / bya dang ririgs kyi skad/ dang / gtan tshigs kyi rigs pa dang / rgya skags kyi 'bru/ 
103b6(mdo sde): 'khor dang / spra tshil gyi las dang / 'drub shu dang / brko bzhog dang / lo ma dra ba dang / spos sbyar ba la sogs pa sgyu rtsal 'jig rten pa dang / lha dang mi'i las 'das pa thams cad langang byang chub
103b7(mdo sde): sems dpang 'ba' shig khyad par da 'phags par gyur to// de'i tshe shAkya lag na ba con can gyis rang gi bu mos 'tshem byang chub sems dpa' la phul lo// rgyal po zas gtsang mas kyang de rim gyis bag mar blangs
103b8(mdo sde): te/ byang chub sems dpa' la phulo// de nas byang chub sems dpas 'jig rten dang 'thun pa bya ba'i phyir bud med brgyad khro ba ni stong gi nang na 'dug ste/ dga' zhing rtse la yongasu spyod pa ston to// bud med
104a1(mdo sde): brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag thams cad kyi nangan/ shAkya'i bu mos 'tshom btsun mo'i mchog tu bang bsku bar gyur to// de na shAkya'i bu mos 'tshom gyis skyugs gam rang mag
104a2(mdo sde): mthong mang rung ste// gdong mi sbed de do ngag kyang de la bag gsang mo ni num zhum por dge ba'i rigs na/ di na ta tum g.yog so zhes 'bya smod cing mi snyan par zer ngo // de'i tshe shAkya'i bums 'tshoms gtam de
104a3(mdo sde): thos nas/ nang mi rnams kyi mdun du 'dug ste/ tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// dug dang phreng dang 'chag pa la/ 'phags padag ni ma g.yogs mdzes// nor bu rin chen 'od gsal ba// rgyal mtshan rtse mong
104a4(mdo sde): gsapan mdzes// 'phags pa 'gro na'ang mdzes pa ste/ 'o na 'ang de bzhin mdzes pa yin// 'greng ba 'am de bzhin 'dug pa dang / thams cad du yang 'phags pa mdzes// 'phags pa sman rang mdzes pa ste/ 
104a5(mdo sde): mi sgrer 'dug kyang de bzhin mdzes// dper na ka la bing ka ni// ma/ thong dang sgra thos ji bzhin no// ku shi'i gos ni gyon pa dang // go sa ngan gyo dang lus ring dang // de ni rang gi gzi brjid mdzes// yon
104a6(mdo sde): tan ldan pa yon tan brgyan// gang la sdig pa med 'gyur ba// 'phags pa kun tu dge ba yin// byis pa sdig pa byed pa ni// ji snyed brgyan kyang mdzes ma yin// gang dag snying la sdig pa yod cing tshig 'jab pa// de
104a7(mdo sde): dag dug gi bum par bdud rtsi blugs pa bzhin// brag gi ser kha rtsub pa lta bur nang yang rtsub// de dag de dag sbrul gyi kha la nyug pa bzhin// des pa de dag gang du kun 'ong kun phyag 'tshal// 'bab stegs thams cad
104a8(mdo sde): lta bur 'gro ba kun gyi gsoso// 'phags pa dag ni rtag tu ro zhes bkang bus 'dra// bdag nyid dag pa de 'dra mthong na dkra shis dge/ gang dag sdig pa'i grogs po yun ris yongs spong zhing // dge ba'i bshes
104b1(mdo sde): gnyen rin po chos ni yongs brdung la// sdig pa rnam spong sangs rgyas chos la mngod chags pa// de lta bu dag mthong na bkra shis 'bras bu yod// gang dag lus bsdams lus kyi skyon rnams rab bsdams dang // 
104b2(mdo sde): gang dag tshig bsdams rtag tu tshig 'tshal med gyur la// dbang po spos shing shin tu bsdams la yid dang ba// de lta bu dag gdong g.yogs te ni ci zhig bya// gal te lus gos ni stong gis g.yog gyur kyang // 
104b3(mdo sde): de dag sems pashus ngo tsha med cing khrel med dang // gang dag 'di 'dra'i yon tan med cing bden tshig med// de dag sgren mo bas kyang sgren mor 'jig rten rgyu gang zhig sems sbas rtag tu dbang po bsdams gyur zhing // 
104b4(mdo sde): bdag gi khyos chog sems can gzhan la mi sems dpa'// de 'dra ba dag 'i zla bzhin du ma g.yog snang // de 'dra ba dag gdong g.yog rten ci zhig bya// gzhan yang drang srong bdag nyid tshe dang gzhan sems blo
104b5(mdo sde): mkhas dang // de bzhin lha tshogs dag gis kho mo'i bsam pa dang // kho mo tshul khrims yon tan sdom dang bag yod mkhyen// de lta bas na kho mos gdong bka ba ci zhig dgos// ke slo rgyal po zas
104b6(mdo sde): gtsang mas shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tsho ma'i spobs pa bstan pa'i tshig su bcad pa rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di thos// thos nas kyang tshim zhing mgul yi rangs te rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas ras bcos bu bzang po rin po che
104b7(mdo sde): dums spras bzung gcig dang / mu tig gi do sha la sang bye ba brgya stong rib dang mu tig dmar po bzang pos spras pa'i gser gyi phreng bas shAkya'i bu mos 'tshom la bkab nas ched du brjo pa 'di cheng du brjod do// kho bo'i bu
104b8(mdo sde): ni yon tan ci 'dras brgyan pa dang / mna' ma rang gi yon tan ji ltar rab smra ba// sems can dag pade gnyis phrad par gyur pa ni// mar dang mar gyi zhing khung ji ltar 'dra ba bzhin// sgyu rtsal bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis
105a1(mdo sde): pa'o// / 'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i ma // / dge slong gde lta btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'jug pa na gang dag byang chub
105a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las byed par spro bar gyur pa dang // lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten
105a3(mdo sde): skyong ba du ma de dag rang rang gi dga' ba'i sgra 'byin zhing lhags par gyur zhing // de la dge slong dag dus gzhan zhig na lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang namakha' lding dang mi'am ci nga lto 'phye
105a4(mdo sde): chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang 'jog rten skyong ba mang po/ drag 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ ma la skyes bu dam pa ni bcu na mo'i 'khor gyi mang du ha cang yun ri du thogs par gyuran
105a5(mdo sde): sems can gang dag 'dis yun ring po nas bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po sbyin pa dang / snyan par smra ba dang don spyad pa dang / don la thun pas yongs su sbyin par byasmra pa dang gang dag 'dis byang chub
105a6(mdo sde): thob nas chos bstan pa shes par 'gyur ba chos kyi snod du gyur pa'i sems can de dag med par gyur nas phyis byang chub sems dpa' mngon par byung ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
105a7(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba 'am/ gcig tu mi 'gyur grang snyam mo// de nas de dag gus pa dang bcas// zhes dang bcas par thal mo sbyar te byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal nas nam zhig na
105a8(mdo sde): bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa' das pa mchog rab dag pa 'di mngon par 'byung ba dang // mngon par byung nas kyang shing gi rgyal po chen po de'i drung du 'dug ste bdud dpung dang bcas pa brtul
105b1(mdo sde): nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas
105b2(mdo sde): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang ldan pa dang lan gsum du bzlas te/ rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med pa bskor zhing // sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa chen pos lha dang bcas pa'i jig
105b3(mdo sde): rten mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du legs par bshad pas tshim par byed pa mthong bar 'gyur/ snyam pa'i bsam pa de lta bus sdod cing 'khod par gyur to// dge slong dag de la byang chub sems dpa' ni skal ba grangs med
105b4(mdo sde): pa'i yang grangs med pa nas bzung ste/ yun ring po nas rtag pa ra rgyun tu 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos tham sa cad la gzhan gyi drongo la mi 'jog par gyur zhing dge ba'i chos spyod
105b5(mdo sde): pa thams cad la bdag nyid slob dpon du gyur pa yin la yun ring po nas dus shes pa dang / chod shes pa dang / ran pa shes par gyu ra ba dang / mngon par shes pa la ma nyams pa dang / mngon par
105b6(mdo sde): shes pa lnga dang ldan pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas rnam par rtse ba dang / sems can gyi bsam pa dang dbang po la mkhas pa dang / dus dang dus ma yin pa shes pa dang / dus la lta zhing rgya mtsho chen po ltar dus ran
105b7(mdo sde): ba las mi'i la bar gyur pa'o// de mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi stobs dang ldan pas 'di ni rab tu gzung ba'i dus so// 'di ni tshar bcad pa'i dus so// 'di ni bsdu ba'i dus so// 'di ni phan gdags pa'i dus so// 
105b8(mdo sde): 'di ni btang snyoms su bzhag pa'i dus so// 'di smra ba'i dus so// 'di ni mi smra ba'i dus so// 'di ni khyim nas 'byung ba'i dus so// 'di ni rab tu byung ba'i dus so// 'di ni kha ton bye ba'i dus so// 'di ni tshul
106a1(mdo sde): / bzhin du yid la bya ba'i dus so// 'di ni rab tu rten par bya ba'i des so// don rgyal rigs kyi khor gyinang du 'gro ba'i dus so zhes bya ba das/ 'di ni bram ze nga khyim bag
106a2(mdo sde): gis bar gyi 'khor gyi nang du 'gro ba'i dus so// 'di ni lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang / lha ma yin dang na mkha'i lding dang / mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang brgya byini dang tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba
106a3(mdo sde): dang / dge slong dag dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor gyi nang du 'gro ba'i dus so// 'di ni chos bstan pa'i dus so// 'di ni ring du yang dag gzhag pa'i dus so zhes bya ba thams cad
106a4(mdo sde): bdag nyid kyis shes so// byang chub sems dpa' dus thams cad du rtag par dus shes par 'gyur zhing / dus la lta ba yin yang dge slong dag 'di ni chos nyid thob pa yin te/ srid pa thab pa'i
106a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'khod pa rnams la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams klu dbyangs dang sil
106a6(mdo sde): sman gyi sgra las chos kyi sgo rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di dag gis yang dag par bskul ba mdzad do// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sems can mchog gang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten bzhugs/ de dag mthu
106a7(mdo sde): yis sil snyan sgra dag las/ tshigs bcad sgra snyan 'di dag byung ba yis// mi mchog dam pa rnams la yang dag bskul// sdug bsngal brgyas gang sems can mthong nas ni/ 'gro ba'i
106a8(mdo sde): mgon dang skyabs dang gnas 'gyur zhing / phan byed mchog dang dpung gnyen gyur cig ces// khyod kyis sngon ni smon lam de skad btab// dge ba dpa' bo sngon gyi spyod pa dang / 'gro phan bya zhes smon
106b1(mdo sde): las dran par bas// 'di ni khyod kyi dus chod yin gyis// drang srong mchog rab mngon par byung bar byos// sangs rgyas lha mi 'dul byed 'jig rten mchog/ yon tan brgyas gang bar ni gyur cig ces/ de phyir
106b2(mdo sde): khyodang sngon mgo dang rkang lag dang / ner gyi dam pa sna tshogs rnams kyang btang // khyod ni khrims kyis brtul zhugs dka' thub spyad// khyod ni bzod pas 'gro la phan pa byed// khyod ni brtson 'grus yon tan brgya
106b3(mdo sde): yis gang / ngasam gtan shes rab srid gsum mnyam pa med/ khro bas non ning thaba'i dri meng ba// de dag bdegad+ma khyams pas khyab// dge ba'i yon tan bral ba loganges pa// mi mkhas rnam
106b4(mdo sde): mang dag la khyed snying rje/ bsod na pas ye shes dge bas lus khyab cing // rdul bral bsam gtan pangon tsho yong 'dug/ phyogs bsu de dag rnams su ragatugs pa// sprin med zla ba
106b5(mdo sde): dri ma med pa 'dra/ 'di dang gzhad yang snyan pa rnam mang gis// sig snyan dag las rgyal bas sgra bsgrags te// mngon par// khyod 'byung dus ni 'di yin zhes// lha mis mchod par 'os
106b6(mdo sde): la skul ma 'jebs/ dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' khyim be ma pa mchog yo byed phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa// bsam padze ba bzhin du bde bar gnas pa dang / 'thun pa lnga'i khang khyim lta bu
106b7(mdo sde): stegs bu dang / sgo khang dang / rta babs dang / skar khung dang / bsil khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / khang bzangs mchog dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi rnam pa tha dad pa 'bye ba shin tu rnam par 'phye
106b8(mdo sde): bgadugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdadang sbeng ba/ rin po che 'dril bu g.ye ba'i dra bdums legs pa brgyan pa dang gyi lnga lnga'ibargya steng dum mngon par sbyangs pa rin po mo sna tshogs kyis smras pa'i mu ga ga
107a1(mdo sde): rgyan phreng rab tu smras pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi spang leb can gyi zam pas mdzes par byas pa/ me tog gi phreng ba dang / rkun po mang po sbyangs pa bog snod nas spos kyis gdugs
107a2(mdo sde): ga dang bi bla re bres pa das thams cad pa'i me tog dri mchog zhim shing shis tu mdzes pa dag bkram pa/ rdzing me tog pad ma dkar po dang / pad ma dang ldan pa'i chu'i gnas yongasu spyad par da ba mang ba ba mdab
107a3(mdo sde): skyong dang / ne tse dang ri skegs dang / khu byug dang / ngang ba dang / rma bya dang / ngu pa dang / kun la dang / ka la bing ka dang / shang shang je'u la sogs pa/ bya rnam pa tha dad pa'i tshogs sgro snyan pa 'byin pa bai rna
107a4(mdo sde): sngo po sa gag rigangs yongs su spyad par bya ba/ gzugs thams cad kyi gzugs snyan kun tu ston pa/ bltangs ma ngoms par nyams dga' ba/ dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba das pa bskyed
107a5(mdo sde): ba'i khyim dam pa mchog den 'dug ste/ byang chub sems/ dpa' khang pa yangs pa mchog na gnas pa dri ma med pa dri ma dang bral ba yan lag dri ma med pa phreng ba dang / rgyan ma por
107a6(mdo sde): bdi mchog tu zhim pa dam pa'i byug pas lus bskus pa dkar zhing bzang la dri ma med cing / rnam par dag la dri ma dang bral ba'i gos kyi na pa'i lus dang ldan pa mal cha lci'i ras bcos bu mang po dum bting
107a7(mdo sde): ba 'jam pa ka tsa lin 'da'i gos ltar reg na bde ba/ yan lag dam pal bslus pa'i mal cha bzang po'i steng na 'dug pa'i btsun po'i 'khor dpa pa lha'i bu mo dang 'dra ba thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med pa lta ba
107a8(mdo sde): dang 'thun par spyong ba bzang pos mdzes par byas pa gzugs bzang ba'i nang ma dug pa du dang dang rdzarnga dang khang drang pabang dang / rgyud gsum dang khang pa'i sa'i dgrol dang reg dang / kim pa la dang / naku
107b1(mdo sde): la dang / sgra sman dang / glang bu klan pa'i sgra byung ba'i sgra byangs dang sa le spad dang kru phyangs sna tshogs dang ldan pas spang ba la bud med kyi tshogs kyis kyang sgra mnan zhing snyan la ying du'o mang gling bu rung ba'i
107b2(mdo sde): sgra dbyangs kyis byang chub sems dpa' slong ngo // phyogs bdun bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan ras de dag gi byin gyi rlabs kyis sil snyan gyi sgra byung ba'i sgra skad de dag las byang chub sems dpa' la sgrub
107b3(mdo sde): ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo // bud med gang dag rab tu yid dga' sems dang bas// sil snyan yid du 'ong zhing snyan pa'i sgra 'byin tshe/ phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba dam bdag gi mthu yis ni// tshig su bcad pa
107b4(mdo sde): rnam pa sna tshogs rnam mang 'di dag byung // rtag tu mgon med gyur pa'i 'gro ba 'di mthong nas// go 'phang mya ngan med mchog rdul mo da sangs rgyas te// skye dang rkadang sdug bsngal dag las dgrol
107b5(mdo sde): zhes// dpa' bo khyod sngon smon lam de skad btab par gyur// de phyi ra dge myur grong khyer mchog 'di nas// byung la sngon gyi drang sro nga zhabs bcag pa// sa phyogs de ni rab tu mnan nasu// rgyal
107b6(mdo sde): ba'i ye shes mtshangs med 'tshang rgyar gyis// khyod kyis sngon chad sna tshogs rin chen nor// rkang lag phangs pa'i lus kyang btang bar gyur// drang srong chen po 'di ring khyod dus 'dir/ chos kyi chu bo
107b7(mdo sde): mtha' yas 'gro la phye// khyod kyis tshul khrims ma nyams de med dge/ sngon chad khyod ni rtag tu mchog gis brgyan// drang srong chen po khyod khrims 'dra ba'ang med// 'gro ba nyon mongs rnam pa mang
107b8(mdo sde): las khrol/ khyed kyis srid pa brgyad ni ba zod pa spyad/ khyod de 'gro bas ngan brjod nam mang bzod// bzod pas bzod sa dul bas des pa'i bdag/ rkang gnyis dbang po mngon par 'byung blo mis
108a1(mdo sde): khyod brtson brtan zhing ma g.yo g.yo ba med/ bde bar gshegs pa sngon mthar rgya cher gyur// g.yon can dud ni sde dang bcas brtul te// ngan song gsum po mtha' dag bskams par
108a2(mdo sde): gyis/ gang bying khyod kyis bcu bzhugs da/ 'a thub spyad// dus ngan nyon mongs sdigs ma bsreg gyis la// khyod kyis bdud rtsi'i chu de'i char phong ste// mgon med ring nas skom pa tshim par gyis// 'chi med mya
108a3(mdo sde): ngan med gnas sangs rgyas te/ skom pas nyams thag dud rtsis tshim bya zhes// khyod kyis sngon smras tshig mchog dran byos te// grong khyer dam pa 'di nas myur du byung // khod ni shes rab mchog gi spyod
108a4(mdo sde): ba mkhas// khyod ni ye shes mtha' yas dri med che// rmongs pa yid gnyis lam la gnas rnams la/ shes rab 'od dge dam pa mdzes bgyis// khyed kyis song ba brgyar ni byams pa smang/ 
108a5(mdo sde): snying rje dang ni dga' mchog btang snyoms dang / khyod kyis spyod bdam pa gang spyad pa// spyod pa de nyid 'gro la rnam par phye// phye gas bcu'i rgyal bdag gi gizi brjid kyis// yon tan me tog
108a6(mdo sde): sna tshogs tshig bcad 'di// sil snyan dag las rnam mang yid 'ong grag/ mal na 'dug pa'i gzhon nu de la bskul// gang gi tshen dga' byang bud med rab tu dga' ba rnams// shin tu mdzes shing rab tu
108a7(mdo sde): snyan pa'i sil snyan sgrogs pa'i tshe// phyogs bcu dag gi rgyal ba lha mi 'dul ba mdzad rnams kyang // sil snyan dag las gsung mchog ha cang ma tshe rjes su sgrog/ 'gro la phan byed yon tan mang po ldan
108a8(mdo sde): khyed 'gro rnams su// rnam par rgyu ba'i tshe na rgyal ba'i yon tan gzhug mar byas// sngon gyi brtul zhugs dka' thub spyad pa dran gyis te// shing mchog drung du myung song 'chi med go 'phang thob par gyis
108b1(mdo sde): lnga mi ga ni shin tu sgom ning rgyal ba'i yon tan brag// khrod shin tu stobs ldan dung rtsi ri bro ga sbyid// stongs bcu brongs pa mkhas pa rnams kyis mchod byas pa// bdu rtsi do mo dag khyod kyis myung
108b2(mdo sde): du rnam par dbye// rgyal ba'i yon tan 'grol ban pa byed la dga' ba'o// khyod kyis sngor gyi srid pa nor dang nir bu gser rnams pa // chungs bu sdug dgang nga grong khyer grong rdal bcas dag dang // rang gi mgo dang / 
108b3(mdo sde): mig dang lag pa dag dang rkang pa'ang btang // mi mchog khyod ni gna' sngon rgyal po dge bar gyur pa'i tshe// mi zhig khyod la mngon du phyogs nas 'di skad ces smra ste/ grong khyer grong rdal bcas pa'i sa 'di
108b4(mdo sde): kho bo bini zhes byas// de'i tshe gang dga' shing 'khrugs par gyur ba med// gna' sngon khyod ni rgyal po'i bram ze dgo bar gyur pa'i tshe// skye bo bla ma bsnyen bkur byed cing gzhan la'ang 'khu mi byed// bram
108b5(mdo sde): ze dab pa dag dang skye bo mang po dge la bkod// de nas shi 'phos srid pa'i 'gro ba lha'i gnas su skyes// khong sngon rgyal pon khu las drang song dam par gyur pa'i che// rgyal po ngan par
108b6(mdo sde): khros pas khyod kyis yan lag bcad pa na// khyod ni yid 'khrugs gyur pa med pa 'chi ba'i dus byas te// de'i tshe na khyod kyi rkang lag dag las 'o ma zag/ khyi sngon drang srong sngo sangs zhes byangar gang tshe gyur pa na/ 
108b7(mdo sde): rimachog gnas na brtul zhugs dga' zhing bla ma pa yang dga'// mi yi bdag pos dug ma dang ngag gis khyod la bsnun pa na/ khyod ni rgyal po de la yidi 'khrugs med cing snying rtser gyur// khyod sngon
108b8(mdo sde): dgas bdag po yon tan can du gyur pa'i che// rig zar 'bab chu chen pos mi zhig khyer bar gyung ba na// phan dang ldan pa khyod kyis mi de phyung ste thang la bzhag/ khyod kyi dag po khrid de 'ongs pa na yang yid ma
109a1(mdo sde): 'khrugs// mi mchog khyod sngon bram ze'i bu gang che gyur pa na// khong sngon nong bu rgya mtsho chen po yangs par ltung ba'i tshe// khyod kyis rgya mtsho chen po zang ba babangar brnams
109a2(mdo sde): ba dang / stobs partad khyu mchog khyed kyi nong bu de che phyir yang reng // skyes bu mchog khyod gna' sngon drong srong dam par gyur pa'i tshe// bram ze zhig gis bdag gi skyabs kyur shog ces khong gan 'ongs/ 
109a3(mdo sde): smras pa dam ze dam pa kho bo dag las phyung zhes byas// khyod kyis rang lus btang gi bram ze de ni ma btang ngo // gna' sngon shing gi gnas su drang srong sngo sangs drung 'ongs te// 'dong bas smras pa shing gi lo
109a4(mdo sde): ma du yod grangs shes byas// shing de lom dza snod rab bgrangs rab mkhas pas// khyod kyis de bzhin nor ba med cing 'thun par kyi gu tu brjod// khyod sngon ne co yon tan ldan zung shing la gnas pa'i
109a5(mdo sde): tshe/ zad par gyur kyang sngon gyi drini la bsams te de ma spangs// / lha'i bdag pos khyod kyis yon tan dran nas rab tu dga'// / snga ma kho bzhin du shing mchog de ni dpal dang ldan par bas/ 
109a6(mdo sde): khyod kyis brtul zhugs dka' thub spyad pa de dag mtshungs med de// yon tan ldan pa yon tan lam la spyad pas yon tan mang // khyod kyis dus la dbang grong khyer bcas pa'i sa yang mtho'// 'gro
109a7(mdo sde): bdag ni rgyal ba'i yon tan spyod la myur du khod/ gang gi tshen bud med rin chen bzang po'i gos kyis lus brgyan te// sil sman dam pa mchog rab yid du 'ong ba'i sgra ni rab sgrog pa// de'i tshe phyogs
109a8(mdo sde): bcu'i rgyal ba'i gzi yis tshogs su bcad pa sna tshogs pa// sgra dbyangs snyan pa 'di dag sali snyan dag gi sgra las rab tu byung // rga dang shi bas zin pa'i 'jig rten dag la bdag ni skyabs byur ces/ 
109b1(mdo sde): 'jig rte spyon pa khyod kyis skal yang lnga 'ob smo las de sa dag pa// ma mo seng ge khyod kyis sdon kyi smon lam dag dri gyis shig/ rkang gnyis dang po khyod mngon pa byung ba'i dris ni 'di yir ro// 
109b2(mdo sde): khyod 'ding sring pa khrag khrig dag tu sbyin pa mang po dus byin// nor dang rin po tshe dang gser dang gos bzang rin chen smras pa dang // rkang lag dag dang mig dang bangs pa'i bu dang rgyal si'i 'byor ba dag/ khong
109b3(mdo sde): kyis ba'ang yang khri darang slong ba rnams la tha ba zhe sdang med// khyod ding zla ba'i tog dang mche ba bzang dang rgyal po zhi bar gyur// snying brtse snying rje'i yid dang zla ba'i sgron dang gdug na nang bur gyur // rgyal
109b4(mdo sde): bo dpa' bo brtan dang mige bzangs dang ni de la sogs pa byas// rgyal po khrag khrig mang po sbyin dga' rnam par 'phrul pa de nyid khyod// bde bar gshegs pa khyod kyis skal ba mang por tshul
109b5(mdo sde): khrims spyod pa spyad // nor bu ri chen dri ma med pa lta bur chu khrims rnam dag gyur// khyod kyis 'bri yi rngam si dra da 'drang tshul khrims srung zhing spyad// tshul khrims dga' bes
109b6(mdo sde): khyod kyis 'dir ni 'gro la rgya chen dor yang byas// 'dir khyod glang po mchog tu gyur te dron pa dag yis mda' bsnan tshe// gtum po sgra la snying brtse snying rje bskyed nas de ni khyod kyis bskyabs// bzang zhing
109b7(mdo sde): mdzes pa'i che ba yongs su btang ste tshul khrims longs bang // khyod kyis de la sogs pa tshul khrims rnam par 'grul pa mang po byas// bzod pa dga' bas khyod kyis 'gro ba'i mi bar sdug bsngal stong
109b8(mdo sde): mang dang / tshig nub dag dang gsang pa dang ni bcing ba mang po bdod par byos// khyod kyis gan sdeng mo gang dag pa bang bkun gyis ros grogs dedag phyis khyod kyis bshed kyang byed kyis de dag bapong / 
110a1(mdo sde): mgon po khyod de ri mchog gnas na gang me dreng por gyu pa'i tshe// khab pab cing chu thug pas nis 'jigs ning skrag pa'i mi zung ste// rtsab 'bras bu rnam pa mang dang bde ba
110a2(mdo sde): kun gyis rim gro byas// de yis myur du khyod la gsod pa khrid 'ongs khyod kyis de la bzod// byang chub btsal byir brtul zhugs paka' thub yon tan rnam mang ye shes la// khyod kyi brtson 'grus shin tu brtan
110a3(mdo sde): par gnas shing mi g.yo g.yo ba med// dbang spud bdud kyang khyod kyis brtson 'grus stobs kyi stobs na mong bar byas// mi yi seng ge khyod 'di mngon par byung ba'i rjes la dbab bo// khyed dang gan
110a4(mdo sde): sdo kha ba'i kha dog 'dra ba'i rnamachog srung ba che/ snying rdzo baspyad nas namakha'i las ni srin pa'i gling du myung du song // deci chos shong dug pa'i ma de zlas 'di'i rab tu banag/ khyod kyis 'di la sogs
110a5(mdo sde): ba brtson 'grus rnam par 'phrul pa mang po byas// myur du 'gyur/ zhing g.yo la yul la dga' zhing rgod pa'i sems btul te// bsam gtan par gyur du la des zhig nas rnams kyis nyon
110a6(mdo sde): mos gtso bo bcom// khyod 'dir bsam gtan dga' bas rang gi yon tan dag gis 'gro don byas// da 'dir sems can mchog khyod bsam gtan rnam 'phrul bya ba'i dus la bab// gnang sngon
110a7(mdo sde): khyod ni drang srong bsam gtan dga' zhing rab tu gnas par 'gyur// rgyal po med pa'i mi dag gis ni khyod khrid rgyal srid dbang yang bskur// khyod kyis skye bo dag ni dge ba bcu dang tshangs pa'i lam la bkod// 
110a8(mdo sde): do yi tshan mi las shi phos thams cad tshangs pa'i gnas su dong // phyogs dang phyogs mtshams 'gro ba rnam mang shes pa'i tshig khyod pang mkhas// gzhan gyi spyod dang 'gro ba'i skad shes pa dang dbang po
110b1(mdo sde): shes pa dang // tshul dang dul dang blo gros rnam mang rgyu ba'i pha rol khyod byin gyur// rgyal po'i sras khyod 'dir ni mngon par byung ba'i dus la dbab bo// khyod kyis gnar sngon skye bo lta ba
110b2(mdo sde): log par zhugs par gyur pa dag/ rga shi sdug bsngal rnam pa mang po nyam thag 'khod pa 'dir thong nas// srid pa rnam par gzhig pa'i drang lam nyid kyis khong du chud byas te// mun pa
110b3(mdo sde): bcom pa khyod kyis 'jig rten dag la don cher rab tu byas// tshigs su bcang ba rnam pa dang po mdzes pa yon tan ldan pa sna tshogs 'dis/ si'i skad sgra sgrags de las rgyal ba'i gzi yis dpa'o/ 
110b4(mdo sde): bskal bar gyur// blo mchog ldan pa khyod 'ding mngon par byung ba'i dus ni dbab gyis// sdug bsngal gang ba'i skye bo 'di dag mtho ngadra nas btang snyoms ma byed cig/ bud med gos dang rin po che dang
110b5(mdo sde): ro shel spos phreng sna tshogs kyis// brgyan pa dag kyang sems dang phangs pa skyes nas rab tu dga' ba rnams// sems can mchog la sil snyan rab tu sgrogs cing
110b6(mdo sde): slong bar bad ba na// rgyal ba'i mthu yis sil snyan dag las tshigs su bcad pa 'di 'dra byung // gang gi don du khyod kyis 'gro la ban phyir skal pa du mar ni// btang ba dka' ba btang zhing
110b7(mdo sde): tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus shin tu spyad// bsam gtan shes rab shin tu bsgoms pa khyod kyi dus la dbab kyis// 'dred pa mngon par 'byung ba'i blo la myur soms phyi bshol ma
110b8(mdo sde): byed cig/ sngod chad rin chen mdzod dang gser dang ngul dang rgyan rnams rab tu btang / skye ba de dang de dag tu ni mchod sbyin rnam pa mang po byas// khyod kyis chung ma bu bo bu
111a1(mdo sde): // mo lus dang rgyal srid srog btang ste/ byang chub don du btang bar dka' ba dpag tu med pa khyod kyis btang // khyod ni rgyal po mi dman bsod nams dpal gyis rnam par grag par
111a2(mdo sde): gyur/ mu khyed 'dzin dang mu khyud nag po tshangs pas byin dang ral pa can// mchod sprin stong ldan dang ni chos sems 'od 'phro can dang nor brtan dang // shin tu don bsams gyur te sems can dpan la
111a3(mdo sde): bdang bar dka' bar btang // zla ba'i bu dang brtson 'grus 'bar dang bsod nams 'od zer can du gyur// gtong ba che dang ldan zhing mthu ldan khyod ni byas pa bzo bar gyur// drang srong zla ba gzungs ldan dpa'
111a4(mdo sde): bden pa 'phel 'dang / rgyal po legs par smra ba tshal dang blo gros bzang dang nges par gyur/ zla ba'i 'od dang khyab par 'gro dang dus dang phyogs kyi bdag par gyur/ rang 'byin dpa'ang ga shi rgya
111a5(mdo sde): be rin chen gtsug bud zhi ba bstod// mi dbang de dag rnams dang gzhan gyur te gtang bar dka' ba btang // khyod kyis ji ltar gting ba'i char pa ba de bzhin ches kyi char pa pob// khyod kyis sngon
111a6(mdo sde): chad sems can snying po gang+gA'i bye ma snyed cig mthong // sems can thar bar bya phyir byang chub dam pa'i mchog ni tshol ba na// khyod kyis mchong ba dpag med bsam mi khyab pas sangs rgyas de dag pamed/ 
111a7(mdo sde): dpa' bo grong khyer dam pa 'di nas byung ba'i dus la dbab bo// theg mar khyod kyis don yad mazeng la sa la'i me tog gis ni mchod// rnam par snang mdzad la ni dang ba'i sems kyis skad cig rab tu bltas rnga
111a8(mdo sde): dbyangs ldan pa la ni khyod kyis a ru ra'i 'bru gcig phul/ tsan dar mthong nas khyod kyis rtsa'i me sgror blangs te khyim du bzung // rdul be grang khyer 'jug pa mthong nas bye ma spar gang rab tu gtem chos kyi
111b1(mdo sde): dbang phyug chos 'chad pa na legs shes bya ba rab tu byin// kun tu gzigs pa mthong nas phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig tu brjod// 'od 'phro chen po'i phung po la ni khyod kyis dga' bas gser phreng ga
111b2(mdo sde): 'od zer rgyal mtshan la ni kha char phul zhing gsal la bal sran gtor// ye shes tog la mya ngan med pa'i me tog kha lo sgrar la 'jams// rin chen gtsug tor can la mar me pad+ma ldan la sman yang phul
111b3(mdo sde): thams cad zil gner mu tig do shal rgya mtsho la ni pad+ma phul// pad+ma'i snying po la ni bla bre seng ge char gding phul// sa la'i dbang po rgyal la mar phul me tog rgyas la 'o ma phul// grags byin kun da'i me tog
111b4(mdo sde): phul te bden pa gzigs la zhal zas phul// ye shes lhan la lus bdud klus byin la ni na bza' dbul ba byas// rab 'a thor gshegs dang tsan dan mchog dang 'od ldan la ni tsha spar re// 
111b5(mdo sde): bkod pa che la pad+ma dbul byas 'od zer rgyal la rin chen bu la/ shAkya thub la spar gang gser phul dbang po'i tig la steng pa byas// nyi ma'i zhal la me tog rna rgya me tog zla gres bzang la
111b6(mdo sde): gser cod par// klu zil gnon la ner bu phul te rgyal la ras bcos gding ba phul// sman gyi rgyal la rin chen gdugs phul seng ge'i tog la khri gdan phul// yon tan mchog ldan rin chen dra ba 'od srung la ni glu
111b7(mdo sde): dbyangs kun// spos mcheg phul zhing 'ad 'phro'i tig la rtag tu me tog phul// mi 'khrugs rgyal la khang brtsegs phul zhing 'jig rten mched la phreng ba phul// rgya spos gtsug la rgyal srid dbul byas rgyal bar
111b8(mdo sde): dka' la spos kun phul// sgren ma che la bdag phul pad+ma'i mcheg la rgyan rnams dbul ba byas// ches kyi rtag la me tog sna tshogs sgron pa mdzad la ut+pa la// mched pa rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad gzhan dang gan
112a1(mdo sde): / ngag byed pa na// khyod kyis sems can snying po de dag rnams dang gzhan yang sngon pang mchod// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang sten pa de dag khyod mched dran par gyis// sems can mgon med
112a2(mdo sde): mya ngan yal bar mdor mngon par byung // mar me mdzad pa mthong ba tsam gyis khyed kyis bzed pa mchog theb ste// rjes su mthun pa'i mngon par shes pa lnga po nyams pa med pa theb/ de nas rab tu dga' bas skal
112a3(mdo sde): pa grangs med 'jig rten khams kun tu// sangs rgyas dag ni re re la yang mchod pa bsam gyis mi khyab byas// bskal pa dpag med de dag zang gyur sangs rgyas de dag mya ngan 'das// khyed kyis lus rnams thams
112a4(mdo sde): cad de dag ming yang gang du song // dngos po thams cad tha mar zad pa'i ches de 'das byas rtag pa med// 'dod pa rgyal srid lengs spred rtag pa min gyis grong khyer mcheg gnas byung // bskal pa
112a5(mdo sde): zad par gyur tshe gzi brjid drag po 'jigs pa'i me 'ong ltar/ 6/ dang na dang 'chib mi bzang 'jigs pa chen po 'ongs par 'gyu ra// dngos po thams cad tha mar zad pa'i nges de 'dus byas rtag
112a6(mdo sde): pa med/ shin tu sdug bsngal sems cad ltos la yon tan ldan pa mngon par byung / rgyal po bde ba'i mal na nyal gyur cing / gang che ma tshogs gling bu rgyud gcig dang // sil snya/ 
112a7(mdo sde): snga rogs sgra yis slong bye ba// de sil skad sgra las 'di dag byung // sring gsum rga dang rad kyis sdug bsngal 'bar// 'di meng rab 'bar 'di bgod med pa// srid las 'byung
112a8(mdo sde): la 'gro ba rtag tu grangs// bub par chung pa'i bung ba 'khor ba bzhid// srid gsum pi star sten ka'i sprin dang 'dra// 'gro ba'i ske 'ji gar la lha dang padangs// 'gre ba 'gre
112b1(mdo sde): nam mkha'i glog 'dra ste// ri bzar 'bab chu lta bur myur mgyogs 'gro// srid sred ma rig dbang gis skye bo rnams// mi dang lha gnas ngan seng lam gsum po// 'gro ba lnga po dag tu mi
112b2(mdo sde): mkhas 'khor// dper na rdza mkhan 'phang lo 'khor bar bzhin// rtag tu gzugs sdug mchog dang sgra snyan dang // dri zhim ro mchog reg pa bde byed pa// dus ngan sI la 'gro ba 'di dag thos
112b3(mdo sde): dper na rngon pa'i snyi la spre'u thogs pa bzhin// 'dod pa'i yon tan mya ngan gnod pa mang // 'jigs bcas rtag tu dgra byed nyon mongs bcas// ral gri so 'dra dug sdong lo ma mtshungs// ngan skyugs snod
112b4(mdo sde): ltar 'phags pa'i skye bas spangs// 'dod pa'i yon tan 'jigs bcas nyon mongs bcas// rtag tu brjod par byed pa mun pa 'dra// rtag tu 'jigs pa'i rgyu byed sdug bsngal rtsa// srid pa sred pa 'khri
112b5(mdo sde): zhing 'phel bar byed// ji ltar me 'bar 'obs ni 'jigs baHsa pa// de ltar 'dod 'di 'phags pa'i skye bas rig 'das rdza ba che 'dra ral gri gshed gnas 'dra// ral gri so la sbrang rtsis
112b6(mdo sde): bskas dang mtshungs// ji ltar sbrul gyi mgo dang ngar skyugs sngon// de ltar 'dod 'di mkhas pa rnams kyis rig bya sha kham bu 'dra zhing gsal shing 'dra// rol khyi ltar dgra dang bcas pa yin// 'dod pa'i yod/ 
112b7(mdo sde): tan 'di dag tu zla 'dra// gzugs brnyan mtshungs shing brag cha 'dra ba dang // mig yer 'dra zhing gar la lta 'dra dang // rmil ba mnyam par 'phags pa'i skye bas rig/ 'deng pa'i yer tar skad cig ya pa rla/ sgra ma'i
112b8(mdo sde): smig rgyu 'dra zhing brdzun pa can// chu bur dbu pa lta bur yang dag min// yengasu brtags las byung bar mkhas pas rtogs// na chod theg mar gzugs pa chog 'dzin pa'i tshe// langs shing sngag 'deng 'di byas
113a1(mdo sde): // man sdug bsngal gzi brjid lus bcom ras/ rnam par spong ste'i dgas lung skam bzhin// dor thungs pa rdzas yang skabs ldan pa// khangs shing sdug 'ding 'dzi byis pa'i spyod/ 
113a2(mdo sde): sdug bsngal bar ri gyur pa'i nga// rnam par spang ste pi yi 'breg steng bzhir// ji ltar me teg shing dang 'bras bcas shing // de ltar spyon 'deng pa la dga' bar byed// ner ga mes rga bas zer cing spong ba dang / de
113a3(mdo sde): dge' bar mi 'gyur bya nang ba'in// rdzas ldan gzugs mchog ldan med per po bzhin// phrang na sdug cing dbang po dga' bar byed// dga' ras sdug bsngal zhen cing ner zad na// de mi 'dod pa mi 'grur
113a4(mdo sde): bdag bzhin/ rgabs cha byas na tshong yal gyur na// sdeng po gan lugs kyis ni btsem pa bzhin/ rgabs 'khog na 'jigs becas khang rul 'dra// rga las 'byung ba thub pa myur du spros/ 
113a5(mdo sde): bu per skyes pa'i tshogs rnams rgabs skabs ma lu'i 'bri shing sa le'i nags sdug bzhin/ rlabs brtson 'grus rtsa la dang shugs 'breg ste/ dper ra skyes bu 'das du byung
113a6(mdo sde): bzhin// rgabs gzugs sdug gzugs ni mi sdug byed// rga bas gzi brjid 'phrogs cing mthu stebs 'phrogs// rgabs bde ba 'breg cing brnyas par byed// rga bas 'chi byed rgabs mdangs kyang
113a7(mdo sde): 'phrogs// nad brgya mang dang ni da thibs sdug bsngal gyis// 'gro ba gtses te mi yis ri dwags bzhin// rga dang na bas btsem pa'i 'gre ltes la// sdug bsngal las ni 'byung ba myur shed cig
113a8(mdo sde): dper na dgun slar rlung dang kha ba che// mu shing gal pa nags sman mdangs kyang 'bregs// de ltar nang 'di 'gro ba'i mdangs 'phrogs cing // dbang po gzugs dang stebs ni nyams par byed// ner bu ri chen
113b1(mdo sde): tha mar zad zad par byed// nang ni rtag tu 'gro ba brnyas par byed// gded par byed cing sdug la sdang bar byed// yongs su gdung byed nam mkha' las ni nyi ma bzhin// 'chi dang 'pho dang 'chi 'pho dus byed pa/ 
113b2(mdo sde): pangs shing sdug pa'i skye bo rtag tu 'bral// phyir mi 'ong zhing phrad par 'gyur ba yin// shing las le 'phrul 'dra zhing klu yi rgyan dang mtshungs// 'chi ba dbang yod pa dag dbang med byed// 'tsho ba 'phrog
113b3(mdo sde): byed chu bas re shing deng bzhin// mi ni gnyis min grogs med gcig pu 'gro// rang las 'bras bu ldan pas dbang yang med// 'chi bas srog chags brgya phrag mang 'dzin te// 'byung ba'i tshig
113b4(mdo sde): la rgya mtsho cha srin bzhin// klu la mkha' lding glang chen seng dge 'dra// rtsa rtsi 'byung po'i tshigs la me dang mtshungs// sgron brgya mang po 'di 'dra 'di dag las// 'gro ba sbrel
113b5(mdo sde): zhes khyod kyis smon lam btab// sngon gyi smon lam spyod pa de 'dra byes// khyed ni mngon par 'byung ba'i dus la bab gong tshe bud med tshegs ni rab dga' zhing // sil snyan dag
113b6(mdo sde): gis thub chen gleng byed pa// de tshe bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis mthus// tshig bcad sna tshogs sil snyan sgra las byung // 'du byas thams cad myur du 'jigs pa ste// mkha' las gleg
113b7(mdo sde): rgyun ring du mi gnas bzhin// khyed kyi dus 'di nye bar gnas gyur gyis// brtul zhugs bzang po mngon 'byung dus la bab// 'du byed mi rtag brtan pa ma yin te/ rdza som btang lta bur 'jig pa'i bdag
113b8(mdo sde): gnar gyis rdzas ni brnyad pa byas dang mi tshungs// bye ma'i grong khyer lta bur ring po thegs// 'du byed 'di dag 'jig pa'i chos can te// dbar gyi zhal zhal ji ltar gegs pa bzhin// chu ngogs bye
114a1(mdo sde): yod pa 'dra ba ste/ rkyen la rag las rang bzhin nyams chung ba// 'du byed mar me'i 'od 'phro 'dra ba ste// myur du 'byung zhing 'gag pa'i chos can yin// rlung dang mtshungs par ring du
114a2(mdo sde): mi gnas la// dbu ba lta bur nyams chung snying po med// 'du byed g.yo ba med cing steng pa ste// brtags na rku shing ngag gi phung po 'dra// sgyu ma lta bur sems ni rmongs par byed// lag bcangs steng bas bus
114a3(mdo sde): ba bring dang mtshungs// 'das byas gyur pa thams cad rgyu dag dang // rkyen rnams kyis ni rab tu 'byung ba ste// gcig gi gcig rgyu byas te brten ras byung // byis pa'i skye bos 'di 'dra 'dim gtogs/ 
114a4(mdo sde): dper na gres ma mun rdza brtin byas la// brtsol ba'i stobs kyis thag par gyur pa dang // ze chur gyur po 'khor ler ba sa ba dang // de dag re res 'grub par 'gyur ba med// de ltar srid
114a5(mdo sde): ba'i yang lag kun 'grub pa// gzhan rang gzhan tshogs pa la brten nas ni// de dgas so re rer 'grub par 'gyur// sden gyi mtha' dadu phyi ma'i mtha' bo dpags// sa ben yed dmyu
114a6(mdo sde): gu ji bzhin te// sa ben gang yid myu gu de nyid mir// de las gzhan min de yang ma yin te/ de ltar rtag pan chad mi de res nyid de// ma rig pa ni 'du byed rkyen yin te// 'du byed de yang yang dag nyid
114a7(mdo sde): du med ka pa rig pa dang 'du byed de dag kyang // rang bzhin steng ste g.yo ba med pa yin// rgya las rgya yi 'bur ni snang med kyi// rgya de 'phes par dmigs pa'ang yid ma yin// de la de ring gzhan las ma yin te/ 
114a8(mdo sde): de ltar 'dus byas rtag med rkang pa med// mig dang gzugs la brten pa byas nas su// mig gi rnam par shes pa 'dir byung yang // mig ni gzugs la brten pa ma yin la// gzugs kyang mig la
114b1(mdo sde): 'be ba yang ma yin// 'di dag bdag med mi sdug chos can yin// de dag bdag dang sdug bsngal brtags pa ste/ nor pa yang dag ma yin brtags yin yang // de las mig gi rnam par shes pa 'drung
114b2(mdo sde): rnam par shes pa 'gags nas 'byung 'gyur te// mkhas pas skye dang 'jig pa rnam par mthong // gang du ma seng gang nas 'ongs pa min// rnal 'byer pas ni steng pa sgra ltar mthong // dper na gtsub shing
114b3(mdo sde): dang ni gtsub stan dang // lag pas rtsal pa byas pa gsum tshogs pa// de la brten nas me ni 'byung 'gyur te// byung nas ring por mi thegs 'gag par 'gyur// de nas mkhas pa la las brtags byas te/ 
114b4(mdo sde): 'di ni gang nas 'ongs la gar song zhes// phyogs dang phyogs ma tshams kun tu brtags byas na// de'i 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba mi dmigs so// phung po dag dang skye mched khams rnams kyi// rkyen ni ma
114b5(mdo sde): rig pa dang sred dang las// de dag tshogs pa sems can zhes pa rjod kyang // de ni dam pa'i don du dmigasu med// bdu dang lkog ma dkan la brten nas ni// lce bsgyur ba las yi ge'i sgra 'byung
114b6(mdo sde): yang / ldeg mar brten nas ma yin dkan las min// re re la ni yi ge dmig su med// tshogs pa de la brtertan nas ngag de ni// yid kyi blo yi dbang gis 'byung mod kyi// yid dang ngag ni snang gzugs med de// nang dang phyi
114b7(mdo sde): rel na yang dmigs su med// mkhas pas ngag skad sgra dang dbyangs rnams kyis// skye ba 'jig la rnam par brtags na/ de tshe ngag kun brag cha lta bu dang // skad cig pa dang snying po med par mthong // dper na shing dang
114b8(mdo sde): rlung la brten byas la/ lag pas brtsal ba byas pa gsum tshogs ra// sgra brnyan pi wang gling bu la sogs pa// de dag las ni sgra yang 'thung bar 'gyur// de nas mkhas pa la las brtags byas te/ 'di
115a1(mdo sde): ni gang nas 'ongs la gar song zhes// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams kun tu brtags byas na// sgra'i 'ong ba'i 'gro ba mi dmigs so// de ltar rgyu dag dang ni rkyen rnam sa las// 'du byed
115a2(mdo sde): byung ba thams cad gyur pa ste// yang dag mthong ba'i rnal 'byor pa yis ni// 'du byed stong pa g.yo ba med par mthong // phung po dag dang skye mched khams rnams ni// nang yang stong la phyi rol steng pa ste/ dzadas/ 
115a3(mdo sde): na la ma man ma tsha yad// chos kyi mtshan nyid 'di 'dra 'di dag ni// mar me mdzad pa mthong nas khyod kyis rtogs// ji ltar nyid du rjes su rtogs pa ltar// de bzhin lha mir bcas pas
115a4(mdo sde): rdzogs par 'gyur/ 'dod pa yang dag ma yin brtags pa yi na// 'dod chags zhe sdang dag gis 'gro ba gdungs/ snying rje 'i sprin las zhi ba bsil ba'i chu// 'dren pa bdud rtsi'i rgyud ni
115a5(mdo sde): rab tu pho// byang chung dam pa yang dag theb nas ni// 'phags bi'i nor gyis srog chags bsdu'o zhes// mkhas pa khyad kyis gang gi nged kyi phyir// bskal pa bye ba mang por sbyin pa byin// spyan/ 
115a6(mdo sde): gyi sbed de rjes su 'dran gyis te// 'phags pa'i nor gyis dman dbul sdug bsngal la// sems can kha lo sbyar ba ma g.yol bar// 'phags pa'i nor gyis de dag bsdu bgyis// ngan song sa yi 'am ni
115a7(mdo sde): bcang ba dang // mthe ris bdud rtsi'i sgo mo mchog de ni// sems can bya ba mang la bstan zhes te// khyod kyis rtag tu tshul khrims shin tu bsrungs// tshul khrims ldan pa'i bsam pa 'grub 'gyur gyis/ 
115a8(mdo sde): sngon gyi spyod de rje su dran gyis la// ngan song gsum po'i sa yi sgo chod de// mtho ris bdud rtsi'i sgo ni dbye bar gyis// srog chags rnams kyi khong khre khrogazhil dang // srid pa'i mtsho las sems can bsgral byas
115b1(mdo sde): te zhi bde rims nang med la dgod de zhes// khyed kyis rtag tu bzed la shin tu bsgoms// sngon gyi spyod de rjes su dran gyis te// dgra dang gnod sems 'tshe bas dkrugs pa yi// 'che ba spyod pa yal bar ma der
115b2(mdo sde): bar 'gro ba 'di dag bzed pa'i sa la khed// ches kyi glu ni legs par sbar byas la/ srid pa'i mtsho las 'gro ba rnams bsgral te// zhi bde rims nang med la dgeng de zhes// gang gi den du khyed kyis brtson
115b3(mdo sde): 'grus bsten// sngon gyi sbed de rjes su dran gyis la// 'gre ba chu bo bzhi yis khyer gyur pa// sems can mgon med pa dag brtson stobs dang // brtun pa'i shugs kyis myur du 'di dag zin// dbang po 'khrul
115b4(mdo sde): dang pal pa'i dbang po dang // spre'u 'dri sems las zhi gnas ngas dgod ces// 'dren pa khyed kyis gang gi ched kyi phyir// nyen mongs bzhil ba'i bsam gtan skems gyur pa/ sngon gyi sbed de rje su dran gyis te/ 
115b5(mdo sde): zhen rengs dra bas dkrugs par gyur pa yin// 'gre la ma g.yel nyon mongs gtses pa las// bsam gtan cho ga la skyed gu 'di dag kheng// gti mug ma rig mur pas 'gribs pa yi/ 'gro
115b6(mdo sde): la ches brgya mang ber zeng byed pa// yang dag mthong ba'i mig ni sprin ne zhes// khyed kyis sngon chad shes rab shin tu bsgoms// sngon gyi spyad de rje su dran gyis la// gti ru gar rig mun pas bsgribs pa yi// 'gro la
115b7(mdo sde): shes rab dam pa 'od bzang ba// ches mig dri med nyon mongs med pa byin// bud med rnams kyi sil snyan gla dbyangs las// tshig su bcad pa 'di 'dra 'di byung ste// de thos nas ni rgyags pa rnam spangs nas// byang
115b8(mdo sde): chub dam pa mchog tu sems btang ngo // dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' btsun re'i 'khor gyi nang du 'dug pa'i tshe yang ches mnyan pa dang bral bar ma gyur te// chos yid la byed pa dang bral ba ra gyur to// 
116a1(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni yun ring po nas ches dang ches smra ba rnams la gus pa dang bcas par gyur cing bsapa pa zag pa nas chos den du
116a2(mdo sde): gnyer ba/ ches 'dod pa chos kyi kun dga' la dga' zhing mos par gyur pa chos tshol bas ngoms mi shes pa ji ltar thos pa'i ches yang dag par ston pa bla na med pa'i ches chen po'i sbyin bdag tu gyur pa/ zang
116a3(mdo sde): zing med par ches sten pa ches sbyin pa la ser sna med pa sleb dpor gyi dpe 'khyad dang bral ba/ chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i ches sgrub pa/ ches la nan tan byed pa la dpa' ba ches la gnas su 'dzin pa ches la
116a4(mdo sde): skabs su 'dzin pa/ chos la dpung gnyen du 'dzin pa ros la s+ho/ rapa/ ches la nges par sems pa'i bzed pas nges par byu ba/ shes ragyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyang pa ste/ thabs mkhas pa
116a5(mdo sde): ga par 'ong du chung pa yin de/ dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sem sadapa' thabs la mkhas pa chen pos rnam par rtse zhing btsun mo'i 'khor thams cad kyis mes pa ji lta ba bzhin du spyad la na
116a6(mdo sde): brtan/ sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa rnams kyi 'jig rten dang 'thun par bya ba'i chos nyid dang 'thun par ni byas/ yun ring po nas 'dod pa'i skyer shing
116a7(mdo sde): tu rtogs pa yin yang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i dbang gis 'dod pa'i longs sbed ni kun tu bstan/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dpag tu med pa bsags pa'i bsod nams kyi stobs kyi tshogs kyi khyad par gyis
116a8(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi dbang du bya ba mtshungs pa med pa ni kun tu bstan// lha dang mi'i las shin tu 'das pa snying po dang ldan zhing rgya che la rnam pa tha dad pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg mchog tu dga' ba/ 
116b1(mdo sde): nyams dga' ba'i 'dod ba ni bstan 'dod pa'i yul thams cad 'dzin pa med par rang gis sems la dbang bsgyur ba ni bstan/ sngon gyi smed lam gyi stobs kyis grogasu gyur pa dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i
116b2(mdo sde): sems can rnams ni mtshungs par gnas pas yongasu smin par byas nas/ 'jig rten gyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i dri ma thams cad kyis ni sems la kun nas nyon rengs pa med par btsun mo'i 'khor gyi dang na gnas te
116b3(mdo sde): ltar 'gron du gnyer ba'i sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par bya ba'i dus la lta zhing de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' shin tu rgya cher sngon gyi dang bcas pa rje su dran de// sangs rgyas dang chos kyang mngon du byed pa/ smod
116b4(mdo sde): lam gyi stengs kyang bangon par bsgrub pa// sems can rnams la yang snying rje chen po gtang ngo // sems can rab tu thar par bya ba sems so// 'byer pa thams cad kyi mtha' ni chung ba yid par yang so sor rdeg ge 'khor ba
116b5(mdo sde): la gnong ba dang / 'jigs pa mang po du ma yed bar yang rtog geng du dang nyes pa'i 'gas pa yang yang dag par gcod de// 'khor ba'i rgyud las kyang bdag nyid 'da' bar byed de// mya ngan las 'das la la
116b6(mdo sde): yang sems yang dag par gtong ngo // // 'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po dag pa// dge slong dag de la byang chub sems dpa' ni sngon gyi mtha' nyid nas kyang 'khor ba'i
116b7(mdo sde): skyen shin tu rig pa yin/ 'dus byas las bsam pa thag pa nas den du mi gnyer ba yin// nye bar len pa yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad don du mi gnyer ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi ches don du gnyer ba yin mya ngan las
116b8(mdo sde): 'das pa la mngon du phyogs pa yin/ 'khor ba las rgyab kyis bltas pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sbeng yul la mngon du dga' ba yin/ bdud kyi spyod yul dang ma 'dres pa yin/ srid pa la 'bar skyen du mthong
117a1(mdo sde): yin/ khams gsum las 'byung ba'i bsam pa can yin 'khor ba'i skyon dang nyes dmigs las 'byung ba la mkhas pa yin rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa yin// mngon par 'byung ba'i bsam pa can
117a2(mdo sde): dben pa la gzhol ba yin dben pa la 'bab pa yin// dben pa la 'bab pa yan dgon pa dang bas mthar mngon par dga' ba yin rab tu dben pas rab tu zhi bar 'dod pa yin bdag dang gzhan la phan par zhugs pa
117a3(mdo sde): yin/ bla na med pa'i nan tan la dga' ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi don du 'dod pa yin/ phan par 'dod pa yin bde bar 'dod pa yin grub pa dang bde bar 'dod pa yin/ 'jig rten la snying brtse ba can yin/ phan par
117a4(mdo sde): 'dod pa can yin byams pa gnas pa yin/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa yin bsdu ba'i dngos po la mkhas pa yin rtag tu yid yod su me yo ba yin/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang
117a5(mdo sde): 'dul ba la mkhas pa yin/ sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa dang 'dra bar sdug par sems pa yid la byed pa dang ldan pa yin/ dngos po thams cad la mi lta bar yongasu gtang ba yin/ sbyin pa
117a6(mdo sde): 'gyed pa la dga' ba yin/ lhug par gtong ba yin/ lag brgyang ba yin gtong ba la dpa' ba yin/ mchod sprin byas pa yin bsod nams shin tu phun sum tshogs pa yin/ bsod nams kyi yo byad shin tu bzung ba
117a7(mdo sde): yin dri ma dang ser sna dang bral ba yin sems kun tu bzung ba yin/ bla na med pa'i sbyin bdag chen po yon byin nas kyang rnam par smin pa la mi re ba yin// sbyin pa la dang rab yin 'dod pa dang 'dod pa che ba dang
117a8(mdo sde): chags pa dang / zhe sdang dang rgyags pa dang / nga rgyal dang gti mug dang ser sna la sogs pa nyon mongs pa'i dgra'i tshogs phyir rgol ba thams cad tshar bcad pa'i phyir mngon par byung ba yin/ thams cad mkhyen pa
117b1(mdo sde): sems bskyed pa'i rgyun las mi g.yo ba yin gtong ba chen po'i sems kyi go cha shin tu bgos pa yin/ 'jig rten la snying brtse ba can yin phan pa 'dod pa can yin ya lang bgos pa yin/ go cha bgos pa
117b2(mdo sde): yin/ sems can rab tu thar par bya ba la dmigs pa yin snying rje chen po'i stobs dang rnam par gnon pa dang / la ro la gnon pa dang ldan pa yin/ phyir mi ldog pa yin/ sems can thams cad la sems
117b3(mdo sde): mnyam pa yin gtong ba'i lag cha can yin/ sems can gyi bsam pa dang re ba ji lta ba bzhin du tshim par byed pa yin/ byang chub kyi snod du gyur pa yin dus dang chad par chos rtogs pa yin
117b4(mdo sde): smon lam byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa yin rgyal mtshan ma bskal pa yin 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i sbyin pa yongs su ga/ tong ba dang ldan pa yin/ ye shes mchog gi rdo rje'i mtshon
117b5(mdo sde): sra ba dang ldan pa yin nyon mongs pa'i phyir rgol ba shin tu tshar gtso dpa yin/ tshul khrims dang yon tan dang sbed pa la zhugs pa yin/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' legs par
117b6(mdo sde): bsrungs pa yin kha na ma tho ba phra rab tsam la yang 'jigs par lta ba yin/ tshul khrims yongs su dag pa yin dri ma med cing dri ma dang bral 'dri ma spangs pa'i sems dang ldan pa yin/ ngan du smras pa dang ngan
117b7(mdo sde): du brjod pa'i tshig gi lam dang rgyad pa dang spro ba dang smad pa dang ba shung ba dang rdeg pa dang bsdig pa dang gsad pa dang / bcing ba dang bzung ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis sems ma rnyogs pa yin/ sems ma 'khrugs pa/ 
117b8(mdo sde): yin bzod pa dang nges pa phun sum tshogs pa yin gnod par mi sems pa yin// gnod pa mi byed pa yin gnod sems med pa'i sems dang ldan pa yin/ sems can thams cad la phan par bya ba'i brtson 'grus 'bar ba
118a1(mdo sde): // brtsams pa yin// mi ngas la bstan pa yin/ dge ba'i chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrub par phyir mi ldog pa yin/ dran pa dang ldan pa yin shes bzhin can yin shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa yin
118a2(mdo sde): sems ma g.yengs pa yin bsam gtan la rtse gcig tu yid la byed pa yin/ chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pa yin snang ba thob pa yin/ mun pa mun nag dang bral ba yin/ mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal
118a3(mdo sde): ba dang bdag med pa dang mi sdug pa'i rnam par sems yongasu bsgoms pa yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang rdzu 'bru gyi rkang pa dang dbang po dang stobs dang byang chub kyi yan lag dang lam dang
118a4(mdo sde): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad shin tu yongs su snang ba byas pa'i yid la byed pa dang ldan pa yin// zhi gnas dang lhag ma zong gis shin tu dka' bar byas pa'i blo dang ldan pa yin/ rten cing
118a5(mdo sde): 'brel ba byung ba la lta ba dang / bden pa rje su rtogs gzhan gyi/ dring mi 'jog pa yin rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyis rnam pa rtse ba yin / chos thams cad kyi tshul sgyum dang smig rtsu dang uR+sha pa
118a6(mdo sde): brag cha dang mig yor lta bur rtogs pa yin no// dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' ni de ltar rang bzhin gyis chos la gnas pa yin de ltar ye shes la gnas pa yin de ltar yon tan gyi che ba nyid la gnas pa
118a7(mdo sde): yin de ltar sems can gyi don la brtson par gnas pa yin te/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pas sil snyan dang glu dbyangs las 'byung ba'i tshigasu bcad pa de dag gis
118a8(mdo sde): rgya cher bskul ba dang de'i tshe sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' srid pa pham par gyur pa rnams kyi btsun mo'i 'khor yongs su smin par bya ba'i chos kyi sgo bzhi mngon du byed do// bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa dang sna
118b1(mdo sde): par smra ba dang / don bya ba dang don 'thun pa bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la sbyor bsgrub pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo mngon du byed pa dang dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs yang dag par 'dzin pa'i bsam pa chud mi
118b2(mdo sde): za'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems smon lam gyi stobs bskyod pa phyir mi ldog pa'i yul zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo mngon du byed pa dang sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtang ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa
118b3(mdo sde): snying rje chen po'i stobs la zhugs pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo mngon du byed pa dang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu dbye ba dang don la rnam par nges pa'i ye shes kyi tshogs kyi stobs kyi
118b4(mdo sde): khyad par yang dag par bsgrub pa bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo mngon du byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sgo bzhi po de dag mngon du byas nas/ btsun mo'i 'khor thams cad yongs
118b5(mdo sde): su smin par bya ba'i phyir de'i tshe rnam pa ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mdo na par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byas pas byang chub sems/ dpa'i mthus sil snyan dang glu dbyangs de dag las chos kyi sgo rnam
118b6(mdo sde): ba'ang lta bu brgya stong 'byung ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byed do// mos pa rgya chen dang ni sems pa dang lhag pa'i bsam dang srog chags snying rje bas// byang chub dam pa mchog tu
118b7(mdo sde): sems skye zhes// de 'dra'i sgra dag sil snyan rnams las byung // dang zhing dad dang mos dang gus pa dang // nga rgyal med cing bla la 'dud pa dang // 'dri dang dge ba ci zhes tshol ba dang // rjes su dran pa sgom pa'i sgra byung
118b8(mdo sde): ngo sbyin dang dul dang sdom dang tshul khrims smra// bzod pa'i sgra dang de bzhin brtson 'grus sgra// bsam gtan mngon par smra ba dang ting 'dzin sgra// shes rab dang ni thabs kyi sgra yang byung // byams pa'i sgra dang
119a1(mdo sde): de bzhin snying rje'i sgra// dga' dang btang snyoms mngon par shes pa'i sgra// bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po rnams nges pas// sems can yongs su smin bya'i sgra yang byung // dran pa nye bar gnas
119a2(mdo sde): ba rab bye smra// yang dag spong dang de bzhin rdzu 'phrul dang // dbang po lnga dang stobs lnga rab dpe dang // byang chub yan lag sgra ni sil snyan byung // yan lag brgyad pa'i 'phags lam mchog dbye dang // zhi gnas
119a3(mdo sde): sgra dang de bzhin lhag mthong sbra// mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal bdag med sgra// mi sdug sgra yong sil snyan rnams lus byung // 'dod chags bral sgra de bzhin dben pa'i sgra/ zad pa shes pa'i sgra dang mi skye ste/ 
119a4(mdo sde): 'gog pa'i sgra dang de bzhin gnas med sgra// mya ngan 'das pa'i sta yang si laM snyan byung // rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ma/ dbus yis ni// sil snyan dag las 'di 'dra'i sgra phyung ste/ sku
119a5(mdo sde): de thos nas bud med thams cad kyis// sems can mchogar ba rjes brlabs byang chub smon// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug pas/ bud med
119a6(mdo sde): brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / lha'i bu brgyad stong mang po gang dag der 'dus par gyur pa dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas par gyur te// de nas byang chub sems
119a7(mdo sde): dpa' mngon par byung ba'i dus la bab pa dang / dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu khrel yod pa'i lha zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa des/ mtshan mo mi nyal
119a8(mdo sde): tsar ra lha'i bu 'bum phrag sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis bskor zhing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub sems dpa' la rim gro bya ba'i khang bzangs ga la der song ste phyin nas/ nam mkha'i dkyil na 'dug ste/ byang chub
119b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' la tshigs su bcad de smras pa 'chi 'pho ba ni shin tu bstan// skyes bu seng ge tshe yang bstan// btsun mo'i 'khor kyang bstan mdzad pa// khyod kyis 'jig rten rjes 'thun mdzad// 'jig
119b2(mdo sde): rten chos ni rjes thob pas// lha mi mang po yongs smin mdzad// mngon par 'byung ba'i blo dgongs pa'i// de'i dus la deng bab bo// ma grol bas ni dgrol mi nus/ long bas lam yang ston mi nus// grol bas
119b3(mdo sde): dgrol bar byed par nus// mig ldan long ba lam ston nus// sems can gang dag 'dod pas 'khol// khyim nor bu dang chung ma chags// de dag khyod kyi rjes slob cing // mngon par 'byung bar bzhed par mdzod/ 
119b4(mdo sde): dbang phyug 'dod pas rtse ba dang / gling bzhi'i rin chen bdun spangs/ te// khyod ni mngon par 'byung rig nas/ lha mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten mos// khyod ni 'dod la mi dgyes te/ bsam gtan bde bas gnas
119b5(mdo sde): mdzad kyang // lha mo brgya phrag mang po dag/ gnyid kyis log na sa sad par mdzad// dar la bab 'di shin tu 'da'// ri gzar 'bab chu mgyogs pa bzhin// dar la bab pa yal gyur nas// mngon
119b6(mdo sde): par 'byung ba mdzes ma lags// de slad thog mar gzhon pa'i tshe// dar bab dam par mngon byung ste// thugs dam nyams 'og chung mdzod la// lha ma'i don ni mdzad pa'i rigs// 'dod pa'i yon tan mi ngoms te/ 
119b7(mdo sde): dper na lan tshwa'i chu dang mtshungs// 'phags pa rdul med 'jig rten 'das// shes rab gang ldan de dag ngoms// khyod 'dir rgyal po zas gtsang dang // yul 'khor rnams kyi yid 'ong sdug 'dab ma brgya'i
119b8(mdo sde): zhal 'dra ba// mngon par 'byung bar dgongs su gsol// nyon mongs gdung bas rab gdungs shing // 'byung med bcings pas dam bcings rnams// dpa' bos myur du mtshungs med pa// thar lam zhi la
120a1(mdo sde): / dgong du gsol// khyod ni sman pa thabs la mkhas// sems can yun ring na rnams la// chos kyi sman ni sgrar mdzod de/ mya ngan 'das bde myur du khod// mig med mun pa gti mug glags/ 
120a2(mdo sde): lta ba'i dra bas dkris pa yi// lha rnams dang ni mi yi mig/ shes rab sgron ma myur du spongs// byang chub thob pa blta bya zhing // bla na med pa'i chos mnyan shes// lha dang lha min klu dag dang // gnod sprin dri za
120a3(mdo sde): mang po sdong // klu yi rgyal pos rang gis gnas// khyod kyi dpal gyis snang bar mthong // mchod pa dag ni mtha' yas bgyid// de yi brtul zhugs bsam pa skongs// byang chub shing drung yid rdzogs la// 
120a4(mdo sde): lhung bzed bzhi ni dbul lo zhes// 'jig rten skyong bzhi sder bcas pa// de dag khyod la sdod cing mchis// tshangs pa rab tu ni spyod la/ byams ldan snying rje thob pa yang // bla med 'khor lo rab bskor
120a5(mdo sde): b.rang mi dbang gsol snyam sdod cing mchis// byang chu/ ba bsnyen bkur byed pa'i lha// byang chub snying por gnas rnam sa kyang // byang chub rnam par 'tshang rgya la// blta'o zhes te sbed cing
120a6(mdo sde): mchis byang chub sems dpa' btsun mo'i nang // bya ba ston pa gzhan yang mchis// de dag thog mar khyod myur mdzod// de dag 'og tu lus sa re// dbyangs snyan cing ni dbyangs 'jam pa/ 
120a7(mdo sde): mar me mdzad kyi lung stan dgongs// yang dag de bzhin ma nor ba/ rgyal ba'i dbyangs sgra bsgrags du gsel// bskal ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / dge slong dag da ltar lha'i bu des byad/ 
120a8(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' bskul ma thag tu// rgyal po zas gtsang ma la rmi lam 'di bstan to// rgyal po zas gtsang ma gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam du rmis pa/ byang chub sems dpa' mtshan mo mi nyal
120b1(mdo sde): tsam na lha'i tshogs kyis bskor te mngon par byung zhing mngon par byung nas kyang rab tu byung ste gos ngur smrig gyon pa rmis so// de nas de sad pa dang ris pa rings par nyung rum la dris pa/ gzhon nu btsun mo'i
120b2(mdo sde): 'khor gyi nang na 'dug gam des smras pa lha bzhugs so// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di snyam du gzhon nu ni gdon mi za bar mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur te/ snga ltas su snang ba ni 'di dag yin snyam nas
120b3(mdo sde): khong ba'i snying la mya ngan gyi zug rngus zug par gyur to// de yang 'di snyam du sems te// bdag gi gzhon nu ni skyed mos tshal gyi sar yang nam yang 'gro bar mi 'gyur te bud med kyi tshogs kyi nang na mngon par
120b4(mdo sde): dga' bas 'di nyid du chags par gyur te mngon par 'thung / bar ni mi 'gyur ro snyam mo// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas/ gzhon nu'i longs spyod kyi phyir/ dpyid dang dbyar dang ston gyi dus ji ltar
120b5(mdo sde): bzhin du 'ang bzangs gsum byed du bcug go// de la dbyings gang yin pa de ni shini su bsil ba'o// dbyang sa gang yin pa de ni grang ngadra ran pa'o// dgunas gang yin pa do ni rang bzhin gyis dro ba'o// khang
120b6(mdo sde): bzangs re re gru skas rnams kyang mo lnga brgya lnga brgya 'dzugs shing 'beb so// de dag de ltar 'dzugs shing 'bebs pa na gzhon nu sus kyang mtshor bar mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes sgra dpag tshad phyed du grag
120b7(mdo sde): bar byung ngo // ltas pa dang mtshan mkhan kun gyis kyang gzhon nu ni chab sgo bkra shis pa nas mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to// de nas rgyal pos bkra shis kyi sgo 'phar chen po byed du bcug ste/ sgo 'phar re re yang
120b8(mdo sde): mi lnga brgya lnga brgyas 'byed cing gcod do// de dag gi yang dpag tshad byed du grag go// de la 'dod pa'i yon tan mtshungs pa med pa yang sbyar ro glu dang rol mo'i sgra dbyangs len pa dang / gar byed pa'i na chung dag kyang rtag tu bzhag
121a1(mdo sde): par gyur te dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' kha lo sgyur ba la smras pa/ deng skyed pos tshal gyi sar 'gros shing rta myur du spror cig/ de nas kha le sbyar ba rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i gan du song
121a2(mdo sde): ste 'di skad ces smras so// lha gzhon nu skyed mos tshal gyi sar 'byung ngo zhes gsung ngo // de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi gzhon nu skyed mos tshal gyi sar nam yang ma byung bas sa
121a3(mdo sde): bzang po blta bar bya ba'i phyir bdag gos gzhon nu skyed mos tshal gyi sar phyung na 'on tam gzhon nu bud med kyi tshogs kyis bskor te dga' ba myong bar 'gyur bas mngon par mi 'azung ngo snyam mo// de nas
121a4(mdo sde): rgyal po zas gtsang ma byang chub sems dpa' la byams pa dang / rim gro byed pas da ste zhag bdun na gzhon nu sa bzang po blta ba nga'i phyir skyed mes tshal gyi sar 'byung gis der khyed kyis gzhon
121a5(mdo sde): nu mig tu mi 'ong ba mthong bar mi 'gyur bar yid du mi 'ong ba tha/ mas cad ni sol cig/ yid du 'ong ba dang yul nyams dga' ba thams cad ni sbyor cig ces grong khyer du dril bsgrags so/ 
121a6(mdo sde): de nas zhag bdun gyi nyin par grong khyer thams cad brgyan to// skyed mos tshal yang mdzes par byas te/ ras bcos bu kha dog tha dad pa'i bla bre ni bris/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan gyis ni legs
121a7(mdo sde): par brgyan to// byang chub sems dpa' lam gang nas 'gro ba'i lam de yang chag chag btab ste/ phyags nas spos chu'i chag chag btab ste/ me tog sil ma ni chal bar bkram/ khog por gnas ni bdug
121a8(mdo sde): bum pa gang ba ni mdzes par byas/ chu shing ljon pa ni bsgreng dar tha dad pa sna tshogs kyi bla bre ni bris/ rin po che dril bu g.yer kha'i dra ba dang / rgyan phreng dang chun po ni sbyangs/ dpung bzhi'i bkod pa ni byas so/ 
121b1(mdo sde): g.yog 'khor yang gzhon nu'i btsun mo'i 'khor brgyan pa'i phyir brtson par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' bkod pa chen pos/ grong khyer gyi shar phyogs kyi sgo nas skyed mos tshal gyi sar byung ngo // 
121b2(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyi mthus gnas gtsang mo'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis/ mi rgan po gtugs pa 'khogs pa lus la rtsa rgyus 'thon pa/ so rgal ba lus gnyer mas gang gaska byi
121b3(mdo sde): skar ba/ gdung rten ltar dgu gzhum pa khar ba la rten pa mthu zad ga/ dang yal ba mi pa nas sgra ngar ngar po 'byung ga lus sku bas khar ba la rten nas yan lag dang nying lag thams cad 'dar ba zhig la mkhar
121b4(mdo sde): bsten par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpas shes bzhin du' lo bsgyur ba la 'di skad ces smras so// kha lo sgyur ba mi ring nyam chung zhing / sha khrag skams la rgyus lpags nyi tshes dkris
121b5(mdo sde): mgo dkar sa rgal lus nir skem la// khar brten cing mi bde 'khyir 'gro su// kha lo bsgyur bas smras pa/ lha cig mi 'din bas zil gyis non// dbang po nyams shing sdug bsngal brtson stob
121b6(mdo sde): nyams// gnyen gyi skye bos brnyas shing mgon med gyur// don bgyid mi nus nags khrod shing ltar bor// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ 'di yi chos rigs kyi yin nas 'on tam ni// 'gro ba 'di kun la yang 'di srid
121b7(mdo sde): de smros shig tshig 'di yang dag ji bzhin myur du smos shig dang // thos nas de bzhin don la 'dir ni tshul bzhin bsam// kha lo sgyur bas smras pa/ lha 'di rigs chos ma lags yul 'khor chos ma lags
121b8(mdo sde): skye'i kun gyi ngar la dab pa rga bas 'joms// khyod kyis yab dang yum dang nye du gnyen tshogs kyang // rgal mthar 'gro ba'i thabs ni gzhan ma mchis// byang chu sems dpas smras pa kha lo sgyur ba byis pa'i skye ba
122a1(mdo sde): mi mkhas pa yi blo ngan gzhon pas rgyags shing mong bas rga ba mthong // nga ni slar 'gro nga yi shing rta myur du bsgyur// nga yang dga' la gnas pa rtse dgas ci zhig bya// de nas byang chub sems
122a2(mdo sde): dpa' shing rta'i mcheg de slar bsgyur te phyir grong khyer du zhugs so// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dus gzhan zhig na/ bkod pa chen pos grong khyer gyi lho phyogs kyi sgo nas skyed mos
122a3(mdo sde): tshal gyi sar zhugs pa dang / des lam ka na mi nad kyis nyen pa/ dmu rdzing can/ lus nyar chung nga rang gi gcin rgyag tu bying nga mgon med ba skyabs med gshin tu shaM thang bar dbugs dbyung zhing brngub dgos pa
122a4(mdo sde): zhig mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang yang byang chub sems dpas shes pa zhin du nga lo bsgyur ba la 'di skad ces smras so// kha lo bsgyur ba mi rngub lus kyi mdog ngan la/ dbang po thams cad nyams shing
122a5(mdo sde): dbugs dpung rab tu gal yan lag kun skams lto bsad/ krugs shing nyims thag gyur/ rang gi gcin drug smad zil gnas na 'dug 'disu/ kha lo bsgyur bas smras pa lnga rtsi/ 
122a6(mdo sde): 'di ni shin tu nad kyis btab pa ste/ nad kyis 'jigs pa nye bar mchis pos 'gum la thug/ nad med gzi brjid ma mchis stobs kyang rnam por nyams// mgo na dang skabs dang gling dang dpung gnyen ma mchis
122a7(mdo sde): lags// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ na med pa yang rmi lam na ni rtse dang mtshungs// nad kyi 'jigs pa 'di ltar shin tu mi bzad pa// skyes bu mkhas pas gnas 'di mthong nas ji lta bur/ rtse la dga' dang / 
122a8(mdo sde): sdug pa'i 'du shes skyed par 'gyur// dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' shing rta'i mchog de slar bsgyur te phyir yang greng khyer du zhugs/ dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dus gzhan zhig na bkod
122b1(mdo sde): ba chen pos grong khyer gyi nub phyogs kyi ske nas skyed mes tshal gyi sar zhugs pa dang / des lam ka na mi shi bar gyur pa khyegs gnag pa ras kyi bla bre phub ba nye du'i tshogs kyis bskor te kun kyang ngu'ang skad phyung ste/ 
122b2(mdo sde): dul sde sngags 'den zhing skab shig la/ mge la sas 'thor zhing brang rdung la che nge 'dren zhing phyi bzhin 'brang bar gyur pa mthong ngo // mtheng nas kyang yang byang chub sems dpa' shes bzhin du/ kha lo sgyur ba la
122b3(mdo sde): 'di skad ces smras so// kha le sgyur ba mi 'di khyegs la gzhag nas ni// mi dag ska bshig mgo la sa yis 'thor byed cing // sna tshogs dag gi tshig ni brjed la brang rdungs pas// kun nas bskor ba byas te khyer ba
122b4(mdo sde): su zhig yin/ kha le sgyur bas smos pa/ lha cig mi 'di dzang+ga gling du gu pa ste/ sman dang pa ma mchis drang bu rnams mthong ba 'gyur/ leng spyod khyim dang mdza' bshes tshogs rnams spangs nas mi/ 'jig rten pa
122b5(mdo sde): ro la mchis te sman chad gnyen mi mthong // byang chub sems dpas/ smras pa/ zhangs gnod par 'gyur ba'i gzhon pa cing mi rung / sna tshogs nad kyis gnod 'gyur nang med cir mo rug ring du mi
122b6(mdo sde): gnas bson pa mkhas la cir mi rung // dga' la chags pa skyes bu mkhas la cir mi rung // gal te dga' med nang med 'chi ba med gyur // ngan kyang phung po lnga 'dzin sdug bsngal cha yin na/ rgan 'ching rtag tu
122b7(mdo sde): 'brang ba smos ci dges// legs par slar bzlog rab tu thar bar bya ba bsam// dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' shing rta mchog de bslar bzlog ste phyir yang grong khyer du zhugs so// dge slong dag
122b8(mdo sde): de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dus gzhan zhig ma grong khyer gyi byang phyogs kyi ske nas skyed mos tshal gyi sar zhugs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthus lha de nyid kyis lam ka der dge sdang zhig mngon
123a1(mdo sde): par sprul pa dang / byang chub sems dpas dge slong ni bdul ba yang dag par bsdams pa tshangs par spyod ba mig phab pa gzha' shing gang tsam du ltub spyad lam mdzes pa/ #
123a2(mdo sde): ldeg pa mdzes pa/ phun sum tshogs pa mdun du lta ba dang g.yas g.yon du lta ba mdzes pa/ bskum pa dang bskang ba mdzes pa chos gos snam sbyar dang lhung zed dang chos gos thogs pa mdzes pa zhig la kan
123a3(mdo sde): 'dug pa de mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang byang chub sems dpas shes bzhin du// kha lo sgyur ba la 'di skad ces smras so// kha lo sbyar ba skyes bu sems ni rab zhi zhing // mig phab 'gro la gnya' shing gang tsam lta
123a4(mdo sde): byed cing / ngur smrig gos gyon shin tu rab tu ni bar spyod// lhung zed thogs nas ma rgod ma khengs su zhig yin// kha mo sbyar bas smras pa/ lha cig mi 'di dge slong zhes bgyi ba lags/ 'dod pa'i
123a5(mdo sde): dga' nga spangs shing shin tu dul bar spyod/ bdag nyid ni ngachizhing rab tu byung bar gyur/ 'dod chags ni sdang bral bar byas mas spyod cing rgyu// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ 'di ni dge bar
123a6(mdo sde): legs smras nga yang 'dod ste/ rab tu byung ba mangs pa rnams kyi ga tu bsngags/ de na bdag la phan ning sems can gzhan la'ang ban// 'tsho ba de ning nyams 'thun 'tsho med 'bras bur 'grur/ dge slong dag de
123a7(mdo sde): nas byang chub sems dpas shing rtamachog de slar bsgyur te phyir yang grong khyer du zhugs so// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' la skul ba rnam pa 'di lta burtul po zas gtsang mas mthong zhing thos nas byung/ 
123a8(mdo sde): sems dpa' yongasu bsrung ba'i phyir/ rab rgya chen po byeng du bcug ste 'obs kyang rkor bcug/ sgo brtan po yang 'jug su bcug srungs ma yang bkod// dpa' bo rnams kyang sprin/ gzhon pa yang sta gon byas go cha yang rgyan
123b1(mdo sde): dubacug go// byang chub sems dpa' bsrung ba'i phyir grong khyer chen po'i sgo'i lam gyi mdo/ sum rnams dpung chen po'i bkod pa bzhag ste/ byang chub sems dpa' mngon par byung nga re zhes de dag de srung du bcug go btsun/ 
123b2(mdo sde): mo'i 'khor la yang res dga' yang glu dbyangs kyi rgyun chad de// dga' ba dang rtse ba thams cad kyang sbyar cig ci nas kyang gzhon nu chags nas rab tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang / mgu ber 'gyur bar bud med kyi sgyu yang ston
123b3(mdo sde): cig ces bsgre'o// de la 'di skad ces byas te/ thab mo mos pa'i skyes bu lag na ral gri mtshon thogs sge gar bkod// go bags mi rta grang po shing rta mo skyon glang ba'i phreng ba'ang bkod// 'bas dang shing thags dag dang
123b4(mdo sde): rta babs phyir mthen po'ang byed du bcug/ skeme rgyang grags grag pa'i sgra 'byung ba yang gtan 'dam po bcug/ shAkya'i tshogs rnams thams cad yod mi dga' zhing nyin mtshan srung bar byed// dpung chen de
123b5(mdo sde): dag rnams kyang sgra skad chen po shin tu grags par byed// nges pa 'di nas 'byung du 'ong zhe grong khyer 'khrugs shing yid snga/ ngas skrag shAkya'i rigs skyes song na rigs 'di chad par mi 'gyu
123b6(mdo sde): grang snyam byed// skye bo bud med dag la sgo ba rtag tu gla dbyangs rgyun ma bcad// rtse bas dga' ba rnams kyi bsnyen bkur gyis shing yid kyang mgu bar gyis// bud med smra thabs spyod pa gang yin rnam pa du ma mang po/ 
123b7(mdo sde): stong nges pa 'gror mi 'gyur bar bsrung bar byos shig bgegs kyang rab tu byos// kha lo sgyur ba mchog de mngon par 'byung ba'i lnga lngas 'di dag te// dang pa khrung khring dag dang ma bya ri skegs dag dang no so rnams
123b8(mdo sde): khang bzang skar khung rta babs mchog dang yang rngog khri la 'khod nas ni// dman zhing dman la mi dga' mi bde mge smang sems shing sgra mi 'byin/ rdzing dang rdzing chen dag gi pad+ma dag kyang rnyis shing rnyis par gyur/ 
124a1(mdo sde): // shing ldan skams shing yal ga me tog lpags la me tog slar mi chags/ pi wang gling bu rgyud gsum rgyud kyis brgyan pa de'i blo bur chad// rnga dang rdzang dag kyang lag pas brdungs na 'chag cing
124a2(mdo sde): sgra mi 'byung / grong khyer de dag thams cad 'khrugs par gyur cing shin tu gnyid kyis non// gang gi yid kyang glu len pa dang gar byed pa la dga' ba med// rgyal po'ang mchog tu yid dman gyur te sems na/ 
124a3(mdo sde): khengs su chud cing 'dug e ma ma rung shag rigs rdzu 'phrul rgyal chen mi tshig grang snyam byed// sa mtsho ma dang rgyal bu ma la gcig na ni nyal zhing 'khod pa'i tshe// nam phyed tsam na sa mtshe mami'i rmi lam du ni 'di
124a4(mdo sde): dag rmis// sa 'di thams cad rtse mor ldan pa'i ri dang bcas te ga yos par gyur/ shing ljon rnams kyang rlung gis bskyod nas rtsa nas mthon te sa la skyel/ nyi ma zla ba skar ma'i rgyan dang bcas
124a5(mdo sde): te mkha' las sa la lhung // lag pa g.yon pas skra yang rab tu 'bal zhing cid pan lhung ba mthong // lag pa chad la de bzhin/ rkang pa'ang chad cing bdag ni sgren mor mthong // bdag gi mu tig
124a6(mdo sde): dashal nor bu gser gyi 'og bag chad par mthong // nyal khri de yi rkang pa bzhi chag sa'i steng na nyal ba mthong // rgyal po'i gdugs kyi yub spras pa dpal ldan mdzes pa chags par mthong // rgyan rnams
124a7(mdo sde): kun kyang rnam par 'thor zhing chu yis khyer bar gyur pa dang / khyim thab rgyan yang gos dang cod pan bcas te mal teng 'thor ba mthong / grong khyer dag nas me sgron phyir byung grong khyer mun pas non pa dang / rin po che las
124a8(mdo sde): byas pa'i dra ba mdzes pa'ang chang par gyur pa rmis/ mu tig do shal 'phyang ba lhung nas rgya mtsho chen po dkrugs pa dang / de'i tshe na ri'i rgyal po ri rab gnas nas g.yos pa rmis/ shAt+tha'i bu ro'i rmi lam du ni 'di 'dra 'di
124b1(mdo sde): dag rmis gyur nas// des dmiganas mchi ma zag cing rang gi khyol 'di skad smras// lha cig rmi lam 'di 'dra rmis pa cir 'gyur ba ni bka' stsol cig bdag ni dran pa 'khrul zhing mig kyang 'khrul la yid ni mya ngan
124b2(mdo sde): non de yis de thos ka la bing ka rnga sgra tshangs dbyangs sgra snyan pas// sa mtshe ma la smras pa khyod ni rab tu dgar 'gyur sdig pa med// sems can gang dag bsod nams sngon spung de dag rmi lam 'di 'dra mi// sdug
124b3(mdo sde): bsngal dums nye nang rmi lam 'di 'dra thib ga la yod// khyod kyis sa ni rab tu g.yos pa dang / 'i rtser bcas te sa la lhung rmis pa// lha dang klu dang srin po 'byung po'i tshogs/ kun gyis khyod mched gtso bor byed par
124b4(mdo sde): 'gyur/ khyod kyis shing rnams rtsa nas mthon rmis shing / lag pa g.yon pas skra 'bal rmis pa ni// sa mtsho myur du nyon mongs dra ba bcad/ 2dus byas dag las lta ba'i dra ba 'byin// khyod kyis nyi zla sa la lcang
124b5(mdo sde): rmis shing / skar ma rnams kyang ltung bar rmis pa ni/ sa mtsho myur du/ nyan mongs dgra bcom ste/ khyed ni 'jig rten mchod pa bsdu/ gas par 'gyur/ khyod kyis mu tig do shal mthor rmis shing
124b6(mdo sde): lus kun chad dang sgren mo rmis pa no// sa mtsho myur du bud med lus spangs te// ring por mi thogs skyes pa'i lus su 'gyur// khyod kyis khri rkang chog par rmis pa dang // gdugs yu rin chen spras pa chag rmis pa/ 
124b7(mdo sde): sa ma myur du chu ba bzhi rgal cing // nga ni 'jig rten gdugs gcig 'gyur ba mthong // khyod kyis rgyun maN+Das chus khyer rmis pa dang / nga yi gos dang cod pan khri steng rmis// sa mtsho myur du mtshan gyis brgyan
124b8(mdo sde): nas ni/ 'jig rten kun gyis ngal bstod pa mthong // khyod kyis me sngon brgya phrag bye ba dag grong khyer byung nas mun nag gyur rmis pa/ sa mtsho myur du ma rig rmongs pa'i sun/ 'jig rten kun la shes rab sna byed
125a1(mdo sde): 'gyur// khyed kyis mu tig do shal chad pa dang // gser gyi cong tsong spras pa chad rmis pa// sa mtsho myur du nyon mongs dra ba bcad// 'dus byas dag las 'du shes skud pa 'byin// sa mtshe gang
125a2(mdo sde): phyir ngal gus par ni// rtag tu rim gre mchog gis mchod byed na// khyod la ngan 'gro med cing mya ngan med// myur du dga' zhing mchog tu dga' ba thob// ngas ni sngon chang sprin pa gya nam byin// tshul khrims bsrungs
125a3(mdo sde): dang rtag tu bzod pa bsgoms// de bas nga la dad pa gang rnyed pa// de dag dga' zhing rab dga' rnyed// 'khor bar bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas su// ngas ni byang chub lam mchog rnam par spangs// de bas ngal dad pa
125a4(mdo sde): gang byed pa// de dag thams cad ngan song gsum po chad// dga' ba thob kyis mi dag ma skyed cig tshim pa thob par gyis la mgu skyed cig/ dga' dang mchog tu dga' ba myur 'theb ste// khyed kyis rmi ltas bzang
