125a5(mdo sde): gis sa mtsho nyol// sngon chad dge ba'i las ni gang dag bsags gyur pa// mi mchog rnams ni mngon par 'byung ba'i dus bab tshe mtshan ma 'di dag bsod nams gzi brjid bsags pa dang / 
125a6(mdo sde): dpal gyi gzi brjid snying po can des rmi lam 'gyur// de ni rkang pa dag dang lag pa chen po yis// rgya mtsho chen po bzhi po dag gis chu dkrug dang // sa 'di thams cad sna tshogs mal char gyur pa dang // ri be ldan pa
125a7(mdo sde): mchog kyang sngas su gyur pa ni// rmi lam na ni 'od rab bkye bas 'jig rten na/ mun pa mun nag chen po rnam par gsal ba dang la shig byung bas 'jig rten gsum khyab dang // 'od kyis reg pas log
125a8(mdo sde): lhang sdug bsngal rab zhi rmi// dkar gnag sreg chags bzhi zhig rkang pa ldag pa dang / kha dog bzhi pa'i bya 'ongs kha dog gcig gyur dang // mchog tu ngan pa smad pa ngan skyugs ri la yang // 'dzegs nas 'gro yang
125b1(mdo sde): den gos pa med pa rmi/ rmi lam na ni chu nga'i chu yis rab gang nas// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig mang po khyer ba la// de ni grur byas bsgral te gzhan dag bsgral nas ni/ de yis 'jig med mya ngan med mchog
125b2(mdo sde): zang dgong rmi/ rmi lam na ni nang pa mang po nang btabs pa/ nad med gzi brjing bral zhing stobs kyang nyams rnams la// de ni sman par gyur nas rtsi sman mang byin nas// nang btab sems can khrag khrig mang po
125b3(mdo sde): thar byed cing // ri rab ngos la seng ge'i khri la 'dug nas ni// slob ma thal mo spor cing lha rnams phyag 'tshal la// bdag ni g.yul las rgyal zhing lha rnams na mkha' las// kun tu dga' ba'i sgra skrag par ni
125b4(mdo sde): rmi lam rmi// bkra shis brtul zhugs bzang po yongasu rdzogs par yang // byang chub sems dpa' rmi lam rnam pa de dag rmi// de thos nas ni 'di ni ring po mi thigs par/ mi yi lha'i ltar 'gyur snyam ste lha mi dga'// 
125b5(mdo sde): rmi lam gyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / dge slong dag de ltar bya nga chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te bdag gis rgyal po chen po zas gtsang ma la yang ma byas shing // bas gnang ba med
125b6(mdo sde): par mngon par 'byung ba 'di ni las mi rigs te/ byas pa bzo ba ma yin par 'gyur snyam nas/ de mtshan mo mo nyal tsam na/ rang gi gnas kyi khang bzangs nas byung ste/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i khang bzangs su phyin nas
125b7(mdo sde): 'dag gi byang chub sems dpa' 'dug ma thag tu/ khang bzangs thams cad 'od kyis gsal bar gyur te/ de nas rgyal po sad pa dang 'od der thong ste/ mthong nas kyang myur ba myur bar nyung ru pa la smras pa/ kye nyung rung ci nyi
125b8(mdo sde): shar tam gang gis na 'di 'od kyis rnam par mdzes/ nyang rung gyis smras pa/ lhang dung dgung byed kyang ma bas se// lha gzhan yang nyi ma'i 'od ni shing dang rtsig pa thal mi phyin/ lus la gdung bar bgyid cing tsha bar rab tu bgyid/ 
126a1(mdo sde): / nang bar dus na dang bdag dang rma bya dang // ne tse khu byug ngur pa dag kyang rang sgra 'byin// 'od 'di lha mi'i yid du mchi zhing bde ba ste// rab tu sim bgyid dge bgyid gdung bar bgyid ma lags// shing dang
126a2(mdo sde): rtsig pa thal byung sgrib pa yang ma mchis// yon tan ldan pa gcig tsog deng ni 'dir byon des// rgyal po de ni mi dga' phyogs bcur bltas pa dang // sems can dag pa pad+ma'i mig can de mthong nas// de ni mal nas lda
126a3(mdo sde): bar 'dod na nus te// rnam dag blo can dam pa pa la gus pa skyed// de ni rgyal po'i mdun du 'dug nas 'di skad smras// lha gcig bdag ni mngon par 'byung ba'i dus bab rigs// bgegs kyang ma mdzad mi bgyes pa yang ma
126a4(mdo sde): mdzad cig rgyal po gnyen bcas yul 'khor bcas te bzod par gsol// rgyal po de ni mchi mas rig gang 'di skad smras// khyod ni phyir mi ldeg pa'i dgos pa ci zhig yod// bdag la dam pa ci sleng smos shig
126a5(mdo sde): thams cad sbyin// bdag dang po brang 'khor dang yul 'khor 'di/ pan thogs// de tshe byang chub sems dpas snyan pa'i tshig smrab// lha cig dam pa bzhi 'tshal de ni bdag la stsol// gal te stsal
126a6(mdo sde): par spong na mnga' ni khyod la mchis// 'on dang rtag tu khyim na gzigs shong 'byung mi 'gyur/ lha cig bdag ni dga' bas tshugs par mi 'gyur zhing // rtag tu mdog bzangs dar la bab par gnas pa dang // nad ma
126a7(mdo sde): mchis pathob cing nad kyis mi btab dang / chang pag ma mchis pa dang rgud par mi 'gyur 'tshal// rgyal pos tshig zos shin tu sdug bsngal nyam thag ste// gzhon nu gnas min spong bas bdag la mthu med do// 
126a8(mdo sde): bskal bar gnas pa'i drang srong rnams kyang nam du yang // man 'chi ba'i 'jigs dang rlung las ma thar to// rgan 'chi ba'i 'jigs dang rgud par mi 'gyur ga lha cig gal te mchog bzhi 'di dag mi su la na// gnan
126b1(mdo sde): yang mchog cig gsol gyis rgyal pos gsan du gsol// 'di nas shi 'phos nying mtshams sbyor ba mi 'gyur mdzod/ mi yi dam pa'i tshig ni de skad thos pa dang / sred pa bsrabs te bu la chags pa yongasu
126b2(mdo sde): gcod/ pan byed 'gro ba bar byed rjes su yi rang // khyod kyis bsam pa rnams ni yongs su rdzogs gyur cig dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' slar song ste/ nga gis khyim du phyin nas mal na 'dug/ 
126b3(mdo sde): desang ba'am 'ongs par sus kyang mtshor ro// dge slong dag de'i nam nangs pa dang rgyal po zas gtsang mas shAkya'i tshogs thams cad sogs te/ de'i lo rgyus rnams smos nas/ gzhon nu de mngon par 'byung mdze
126b4(mdo sde): ltar bya zhes smras so// shAkya rnams kyis smras pa lha bsrungs par ba gri'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ shAkya'i tshogs 'di ni mang la/ de ni gcig pur gyur pas mthus mngon par 'byung ba'i nus pa de la ma mchis
126b5(mdo sde): se den shAkya de ngag dang rgyal po zas gtsang mas shAkya gzhon nu thab chos sbyangs pa 'os su gyur pa/ 'bong bslabs pa chen po che chen po'o stobs dang ldan pa lnga brgya// byang chub sems
126b6(mdo sde): dpa' bsrung ba'i phyir grong khyer gyi shar sker dkod de/ byang chub sems dpa' bsrung ngo'i phyir shAkya gzhon nu re re la yang 'khor shing rta lnga brgya lnga brgya dang / shing rta re re la yang 'khor dpung bu chung lnga brgya
126b7(mdo sde): lnga brgya bkong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' bsrung ba'i phyir/ de bzhin du gleng khyer gyi lho dang nub dang byang gi sgor yang shAkya gzhon nu 'thang chos sbyangs pa 'os su gyur pa 'bongs bslabs pa mtshan po che chen po'i stobs
126b8(mdo sde): dang ldan pa lnga brgya lnga brgya dang / shAkya gzhon nu re re la yang 'khor shing rta lnga brgya lnga brgya dang / shing ta re re la yang 'khor dpung bu chung lnga brgya lnga brgya bkod do// byang chub sems dpa' bsrung ba'i phyir shAkya rgan rabs rgan
127a1(mdo sde): rabs rnams kyang lam gyi bzhi mdo dang mngon gsum dang / lam po che mang po thams cad 'khod do// rgyal po zas gtsang ma yang shAkya gzhan du lnga brgyas bkor zhing mdun gyis bltas te/ rta dang
127a2(mdo sde): glang po che la zhon nas rang gi khyim sgo na me la tshe byed do// skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo ge'u ta mis kyang rang gi bran mo'i tshogs la smras pa/ mar me'i dri ma med pa bus la nor bu rgyan mtshan rtse mor thogs// mu tig rgyan
127a3(mdo sde): phreng rnams kyang spongs la khyim 'di kun tu bod kyis snang bar byas/ klu dbyangs dag kyang sbyor la de med g.yel bar med par me la tshe dam du gyis// gzhon nu ci nas ma tsher bas ni 'gre bar mi 'gyur tshul du bsrung bar
127a4(mdo sde): gyis dge bgos lag na lag cha ral gri dang / mdung zung mda' dang mtshan ma rtse gnyis thogs// sdug pa'i bu ni srung bar bya ba'i phyir// kun kyang rab tu bsgrim pa chen po gyis// sgo kun cheng la gtan pa dam du chud/ ske
127a5(mdo sde): 'bar sra ba rked par gtan chug la// dus la ma dab par ni sgom da dbye// sems can dam pa 'di ni sher ta re// ner bu do shal/ mu tig do shal thogs// me tog zla ba seng ge shing le ris/ 
127a6(mdo sde): ska rags sor gdub rna rgyan bcings shing thogs// rkang gdub dag kyang shin tu legs par thogs// lha mi'i phan pa glang po'i gros bzhin 'gre// gal te gle bur mngon par byung nga re// ci nas mi
127a7(mdo sde): bde rnyed par ma gyur par// de lta de ltar nan tan cher gyis shig/ bud med gang dag mdung thung thogs pa dag/ dri ma med pa mal na 'dug pa skor// ci nas gnyid kyis log par ma gyur pa// phye ma leb bzhin mig
127a8(mdo sde): gis bsrang ba gyis// rgyal po 'di ni bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir// khyim 'dir rin po che yi dra ba bres/ gling bu dag kyang rab tu bud cing long // de mang rdub dang bral ba bsrung bar gyis// phan tshun gcig la gcig ni sgren
127b1(mdo sde): gyis te// de mod ma nyal shin tu bsrung ba gyis// rgyal srid dang ni yul 'khor spangs nas su// khyim nas sngon du chung bar gyur ta re// 'di ni mngon par byung bar gyur na go// rgyal po'i pho brang 'di kun nyams mi dga'
127b2(mdo sde): rgyal po'i rigs rgyud yun ring gnas pa yang // rgyal po'i rigs kyi rgyud ni chad par 'gyur// dge slong dag de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon lngas rtsen la sogs pa gnod sprin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad
127b3(mdo sde): dang 'brog ma'i bu lnga brgya rnams gcig tu 'dus nas 'di skad ces smras te/ grogs po dag do mong byang chub sems dpa' mngon par byung gis/ khyed cag de la mchod pa byed pa'i las spro bar gyis shig/ rgyal po
127b4(mdo sde): chen po pani yang lung lo can gyi pho brang du zhugs nas// gnod sbyin gyi 'khor chen po la smras pa/ grogs po dag do med byang chub sems dpa' mngon par byung gis khyed kyis bcibs pa'i rkang lag nas
127b5(mdo sde): theg la 'byung bar gyis shig/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor gyis smras pa/ sku ni sred med bu'i stobs ldan rdo rje lta bur mi phyed sra la lci/ sems can kun gyi dam pa de ni brtson 'grus stobs ldan g.yo
127b6(mdo sde): ba mi mnga' ste// ri yi dam pa lhun po chen po rmang nas phyung ste na mkhar gzung nus kyis// rgyal ba'i yon tan lhun po ri lci bsod nams ye shes gnas pa sus kyang gang du bkur mi nus// rnam thos kyi bus
127b7(mdo sde): smras pa mi gang nga rgyal bgying ba de la ston pa lI// gang dag dga' gus gnas pa de dag yang bar tshor// ngas mang zag pas brtson par byas la gus pa yis/ bya yi sha kham bzhin du yang bar shes par gyis/ kho
127b8(mdo sde): nga bdun nas 'gro yis khyed cag rnams kyis bcibs pa theg byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'thung che bsod nams mang po bsogs/ dge slong dag de nas lha'i dbang pe rgya byid kyis sum dus gsum
128a1(mdo sde): gyi lha rnams la smras pa/ kye grogs po dag de mod byang chub sems dpa' mngon par 'byung gis/ de la khyed thams cad mchod pa'i las la spro ba gyis shig/ de nas lha'i bu zhi ba'i blo gros
128a2(mdo sde): zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so// bdag gis ni ser skya'i grong khyer cher po'i skyes pa dang // bud med dang khye'u dang bu re thams cad gnyid kyis leg par bgyi'o// lha'i bu rtse ba bkong ba zhes bya bas 'di
128a3(mdo sde): skad ces smras so// bdag gis ni rta dang glang po che dang / beng bu dang rnga me dang / ba lang dang pa he dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang khye'u dang / bu me rnams kyi sgra mi grag par bgyi'o// lha'i bu bked pa'i blo gres zhes bya ba des
128a4(mdo sde): 'di skad ces smras so// bdag gis ni na mkha'i dkyil la shing rta che na po bdan rin po che'i stegs bus 'khor bar bskor ba/ ner bu chen po me shel gyi 'ang 'bar ba gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng
128a5(mdo sde): ba me tog sna tshogs chal bar bkram pa ngeg bor nas bdug sde sa sna tshogs kyis bdugs pa dag/ byang chub sems dpa'/ lam gang nas 'byung ba'i lam der bged pa bgyi'o/ klu'i
128a6(mdo sde): rgyal be sa srang gi bu zhes bya bas 'di skad ces smras so// bdag gis ni bdag nyid kyi sA la khang pa brtsegs pa dpag tshad sum cu rtsa gnyis po bgyis te der lha'i bu me dag bkang la sil snyan dang glu dbyangs
128a7(mdo sde): len du stsal zhing / glu dang rol me'i dbyangs sgra chen pos byang chub sems dpa' la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur bgyid cing mchi bar bgyi'o// lha'i dbang po brgya byin nyid kyis 'di skad ces smras// kho bas ni ske dbye'o// 
128a8(mdo sde): lam mtshon bya'o lha'i bu chos spyod kyis 'di skad ces smras so// bdag gis ni btsun mo'i 'khor rnams mi sdug par bstan par bgyi'o// lha'i bu yang dag skal pos smras pa/ bdag gis ni byang chub sems dpa
128b1(mdo sde): gzims mal nas bzhengs gsel bar bgyi'o// de nas klu'i rgyal po chu lnga dang klu'i rgyal po gzi can dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bes
128b2(mdo sde): 'di skad ces smras so// bdag cag gis ni byang chub sems dpa' mchod pa'i las kyi phyir dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i tsan dan gyi sprin mngon par sprul te/ tsan dang sbrul gyi snying po'i phye ma'i char dbab bo// dge slong
128b3(mdo sde): dag de ltar lha dang klu dang gnod sprin dang dri za rnams kyis rnam pa 'di lta bu bsam pa nges par bsam ste brtsams so// byang chub sems dpa' ches sems pa la zhugs pa/ glu dbangs len pa'i khang bzangs na/ 
128b4(mdo sde): ma la bde ba na 'dug pa btsun pa'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug pa ni sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa rnam par sems shing / sems can la phan par bya ba rjes su sems la/ sngon gyi sman lam gyi tshig mngon du byed
128b5(mdo sde): bzhi gang zhe na/ sden nga rang byung gi bdag po 'dod cing thams cad/ mkhyen pa nyid don du gnyer ba na ge cha 'di lta bu bgos par gyur te/ sems can sdug bsngal ba dag thong nas kye ma'o
128b6(mdo sde): bdag gis 'jig rten gnas pa bcings te/ 'khor ba'i btson ra chen por bcug la/ 'khor ba'i btson ra dral te bcing ba bkrol ba'i sgra bsgrag go// sred pa'i zhags pa dang / sgrog dam pos bcings pa'i
128b7(mdo sde): sems can rnams kyang rab tu dgrol lo zhes bya ba sngon gyi smon lam gyi tshig dang po 'di mngon du gyur to// kye ma'o bdag gis ma rig pa'i mun pa mun nag thibs po chen por zhugs pa/ mi shes pa'i
128b8(mdo sde): ling tog dag rang rib kyis mig bsgribs pa/ shes rab kyi mig dang bral ba ma rig pa dang gti mug gis ldongs pa la chos kyi snang ba chen po bya zhing ye shes kyi skrod pa yang nye bar bsgrubs la/ rnam par thar pa'i
129a1(mdo sde): / sgo gsum shes pa'i rig smad ril lu dang / sman thabs dang shes rab dang ye shes dang ldan pa btang ste ma rig pa'i mud pa mun dag dang / gti mug gi bur pa dang / rab rib dang ling teg dang
129a2(mdo sde): rnyog pa thams cad bsal nas/ shes rab kyi mig rnam par sbyang nge zhes bya ba sngon gyi sprin lam gyi rig gnyis pa 'di mngon du gyur te// kye ma bdag gis 'jig rten nga rgyal gyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba ngar 'dzin
129a3(mdo sde): ba dang nga yir 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen te/ bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa dang ldan pa'i yid can 'du shes dang sems dang lta ba byin ci leg gis phyin ci log tu gyur pa gzu ba ngan pas zin pa la 'phags
129a4(mdo sde): ba'i lam bstan te/ khar snyam pa'i nga rgyal bskal bar bya'o// zhes bya ba sngon gyi smon lam gyi cho ga gsum pa 'di mngon du gyur to// kye ma'i bdag gis 'jig rten rnam par pa zhi ba thags 'khrug
129a5(mdo sde): ba lta bur gyur pa/ gru bu 'dzings pa lta bur gyur pa 'ong ba dang 'gre bar gyur pa/ 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol dang 'jig rten pha rol nas 'jig rten 'dir kun tu rgyug cing 'khor
129a6(mdo sde): lang la deg las mi ldeg pa 'gal me'i 'khor le lta bur gyur pa la nye bar zhi bar byed pa'i ye shes rab kyi chog par byed pa'i chos kyang bstan to zhes bya ba sngon gyi smon lam gyi tshig bzhi po 'di mngon du gyur te/ 
129a7(mdo sde): sngon gyi smen lam gyi tshig bzhi po de dag mngon du gyur to// skad cig de la lha'i bu chos spyod dang gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis/ btsun me'i 'khor mi sdug par bsgyur te mi sdug par gnas pa dang
129a8(mdo sde): smang ba'i gzugs bstan nas na mkha' la 'khong de byang chub sems dpa' la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ de nas lha'i bu rdzu 'phrul che rnams kyis/ pad+ma rgyas pa yangs pa'i spyan la smras pa/ dur khrod dbus
129b1(mdo sde): 'dir bzhugs par gyur lags na// khyed ni ji ltar bgyes par skye bar 'gyur// lha'i bu dbang phyug rnams kyis de skul nas yud tsam btsun mo'i 'khor la lta zhing rtog bltas nas smad par gyur pa de dag mthong
129b2(mdo sde): dur khrod gnas par gyur pa bden snyam byed// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang ldan pa'i bud med kyi tshogs la rnam par bltas pa dang / kha cig ni gos lhung bar gyur kha cig ni skra zhig kha cig/ 
129b3(mdo sde): ni rgyan bral/ kha cig ni cod pan lhung / kha cig ni phrag pa mi sdug par gyur kha cig ni lus rnam par 'khrugs kha cig ni bzhin mi sdug par gnas/ kha cig ni mig gyur kha cig ni kha chu zag kha cig ni
129b4(mdo sde): sngar kha cig ni lud pa lu/ kha cig ni dgod/ kha cig ni brdol kha cig ni so 'khrig kha cig ni bzhin mdog 'gyur kha cig ni gzugs mi sdug par gyur te lag pa ring por gyur kha cig ni rkang pa pra khA
129b5(mdo sde): cig ni mgo phyung kha cig ni mgo g.yogs kha cig ni bzhi na gyi dbyibs gyur kha cig ni lus ma rung bar gyur kha cig ni lus sgren mor gyur/ kha cig ni lus bskams shing ngur kha
129b6(mdo sde): cig ni rdza rnga la 'khyud nas lus gan rgyal du 'chel kha cig na pi wang dang rgyud gsum pa'i steng du lag pa brkyang / kha cig ni gling bu la sos 'debs kha cig ni rol mo'i cha byad kim bai la dang / na ku la
129b7(mdo sde): dang khar ba'i sol khrel dang phegs la 'dzin kha cig ni rig 'dzums shing 'byed la sgur kha cig ni kha gdangs par gyur de ltar sa la mi sdug par gnas par gyur pa'i btsun mo'i 'khor la lta zhing / byang chub
129b8(mdo sde): sems dpa' dung khrod kyi 'du shes skyed de// de la 'di skad ces bya ste 'jig rten mgon des de mthong yid byung ste/ snying rje shugs phyung nas ni 'di skad smras/ e ma skye thu dag ni sdug bsngal gyur/ srin mo'i tshigs la dga' ba
130a1(mdo sde): ji ltar rnyed// 'dod pa'i yon tan 'dzin// gti mug mun pas rab bsgribs blo gros ngan// dper na bya ni bya rgyar chud pa bzhin// nam yang 'byung ba rnyed par 'gyur ma yin// 
130a2(mdo sde): 'phags pargya cher rel ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i ra // bam po bcu pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' ches snang ba'i sgo 'dis/ yang btsur re'i 'khor la rtog cing snying rje dpe'i sme bas sems can gyi pir spes
130a3(mdo sde): te 'dir byis pa de dag ni bsed pa ste bsad pa'i gnas su bsad par bya ba bsod pa dang batshungs so// 'dir byis pa de dag ni chags pa ste/ ngar skyugs kyis gang ba'i sted ri me can rnams la mi mkhas par chags pa
130a4(mdo sde): dang batshungs so// 'dir byis pa de dag ni 'bying ba ste/ glang po che rkur 'bying ba dang mtshungs so// 'dir byis pa de dag ni btsas pa ste/ ba tsan ra'i nang gi btson bcas pa dang batshungs so// 'di na byis pa de
130a5(mdo sde): dag ni mngon par dga' ste/ bag pi gtsang ba la dga' ba dang btu ngas so// 'din byis pa de dag ni chags pa ste/ khyi rkeng rus lags pa dang brdungs so// 'dir byis pa de dag ni rab tu lhung ba ste/ 
130a6(mdo sde): phye ma leng mar me'i be lcer lhung ba dang mtshungs so// 'dir dbyis pa thams cad ni thegs pa ste/ spre'u rnyeng la thogs pa dang mtshungs so// 'dir byis pa de dag ni yongs su gdung ba ste/ nya rgyas zin pa dang mtshungs// 
130a7(mdo sde): 'di na bris pa de dag ni yongs su gtugs pa ste/ sha mchong gi gnas kyi lug dang mtshungs so// 'dir byis pa de dag ni btsugs pa ste/ sdig pa byed pa gsal shing gi rtse mo la btsugs pa dang mtshungs so// 
130a8(mdo sde): 'dir byis pa de dag ni 'bying zhing thegs pa ste/ glang po che rgan po 'dam du song ba dang pa dnges so// 'din byis pa de dag ni phengs pa ste/ rgya mtsho chen por gru'i snam bu zhig pa dang mtshungs so// 'dir byis pa de dag
130b1(mdo sde): ni rab tu lhung ba ste/ dmus long g.yang sa chen por lhung ba dang mtshungs so// 'din byis pa de dag ni yongs su zad par 'gyur ba ste/ sa'i gting gi mtshangs su song ba'i chu dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni
130b2(mdo sde): dub 'thul ba ste/ bskal pa zad pa'i sa chen po dang ritshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni 'khor ba ste/ rdza mkhan gyi 'khor lo'i shugs dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni 'breg 'tshol ba ste/ dmus
130b3(mdo sde): ling ri la byin pa dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni btags pa shing 'khor ba ste/ khyi steng gis btags pa dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa de dag ni rnyis pa ste/ dpyid kyi rtsa dang nags tshal dang mtshungs// 
130b4(mdo sde): 'diran byis pa de dag ni yongs su nyams pa ste/ zla ba mar gyi ngo'i zla ba dang mtshungs so// 'di na byis pa rnams la za ba ste/ klu la na mkha' lding dang ramatshungs so// 'di dag ni byis pa rnams la 'cha' ba ste/ gru
130b5(mdo sde): be che la chu srin po dang mtshungs so// 'di dag ni byis pa rnams la 'joms pa ste/ 'gron po la chem po mang po dang mtshung sa so// 'di dag ni byis pa rnams la 'jig pa ste/ shing sa la
130b6(mdo sde): rlung mar chen po dang mtshungs so// 'di dag ni byis pa rnams la gsod pa ste/ skye ba po la sbrul mi gdug pa dang mtshungs so// byis pa 'di dge na ri myang ba'i 'du shes kyis chod pa ste/ ral gri se sbrang rtsis bskas
130b7(mdo sde): bas ched ba bzhin no 'di dag ni byis pa rnams khyer ba ste/ shing gi phung po chu bo'i chus khyer ba dang mtshungs so// 'di dag ni byis pa rnams la brtsed pa ste/ byis pa chung ngu rung gi gcin rtug la rtse ba dang mchings
130b8(mdo sde): 'di dag ni byis pa rnams kun tu bsgyur ba ste/ glang po che la lcags kyu dang mtshungs so// 'di dag ni byis pa rnams la slu ba ste/ g.yon can gyis byis pa'i rang bzhin can dag bring ba bzhin// 'din byis pa de dag de
131a1(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba zang bar byed pa ste/ rgyan po la dga' ba ni dor dang mtshungs so// 'di dag gis byis pa rnams 'ches pa ste/ srin mo rnams kyis tshong ba 'ches dang mtshungs so// byang chub sems dpa'
131a2(mdo sde): rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag gis btsun me'i 'khor la yongs su brtag pa byas nas lus la mi gtsang ba'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom/ mi mthun pa'i 'du shes nye bar bsgrag/ smad pa'i 'du shes
131a3(mdo sde): bskyed rang gi lus la yang de dang 'dra bar rnam par bsgom/ lus kyi nyes dmigs yang dag par 'thong lus la lus su mngon par zhen pa las skyed/ sdug pa'i 'du shes rnam par 'jig mi sdug pa'i 'du
131a4(mdo sde): shes 'jug par byed 'og gi rkang pa'i mthil nas steng gi glang pa mar chad mi gtsang ba las byung ba dang mi gtsang ba las gyur pa dang / rtag tu mi gtsang ba zag pa mthong // de'i tshigs su bcad pa
131a5(mdo sde): 'di dag kyang smras so// las kyi zhing las skyes shing srid ba'i/ las byung ba 'jigs tshigs ming du btags/ mchil mdzu la dang mchi bas brnyan la gcin gyis bsgyur zhing khrag gi
131a6(mdo sde): thigs pas gang // zhag dang rnag dang lgang pa dang ni glang rgyas dag dang sdig pa rnams kyis gang // rtag tu ngan skyugs zag cing kun kyang dri ma sna tshogs tha dad pa// lpags dang se dang skra dang spu yis bsgyur zhing
131a7(mdo sde): lpags pas g.yogs la spu dang ldan// sgru ba mchin pa mcher ba chu ser kha chu 'di dag bsags nyam chung// rkang dang chu rgyus dag gis sbrul te 'khrul 'khor 'dra zhing sha yis mdzes par byas// sna
131a8(mdo sde): tshegs nad kyis gang zhing mya ngan khyab la bkres dang skoms pas kun tu nyen// skyeb po dag lus ni bu ga mang zhing 'chi dang rga ba'i gnas gyur pa/ mthong nas mkhas pa su zhig rang gi lus la dgra dang
131b1(mdo sde): mtshungs par sems mi gyur/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' lus la lus su song ba'i dran pas gnas par gyur to// na mkha'i dkyil na 'khod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis/ lha'i bu chos spong la 'di skad ces smras
131b2(mdo sde): se grags po don grub 'di ni btsun mo'i 'khor la rnam par lta zhing 'dzum yang ston// sems ni mi dga' mig ni phyir zhing ltan phyi shol byed dam ci// yang na 'di ni rgya mtsho'i zabs dang mtshungs te 'di tshad
131b3(mdo sde): bzung bar mi nus so// yang na chags pa med pa'i yul rnams la yid chags par mi 'gyur grang / lha rnams kyis bskul ba'i yid ma brjed par ma gyur grang // lha'i bu ches spyod kyi smras pa/ de skad snga
131b4(mdo sde): ci dges/ 'di sngon byang chub kyi phyir spong ba na yang mngon par 'byung ba drang / gtong ba la rnam pa de lta bur chags pa med par gyur pa khyed la mngon sum du gyur pa yin na/ nga sring pa tha ma la gnas
131b5(mdo sde): chags par mi 'gyur ba lta smos kyang cing gos// dge slong dag/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' nges par byas pa yid byung bar/ gyur pa blo brtul ba tshul du shes shing rings thabs med
131b6(mdo sde): bar skyil me klungs bshig ste/ glu dbyangs len pa'i khang bzangs da shar phyogs su blta zhing 'dug nas lag pa g.yas pas rin po cha'i dra ba smad de/ khang bzangs kyi steng du seng na sor po bcu
131b7(mdo sde): thal ma sbyar te sangs rgyas thams cad bsams nas sangs rgyas tham cad la phyag 'tsha rten mkha'i dkyil du bltas pa dang / des mthong ba na mkha'i dkyil na lha'i dbang po rig steng dang ldan pa lnga ba
131b8(mdo sde): stang gis skor zhing me tog dang spos dang / phreng ba dang brug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang ba dar dang / me tog rna rgyan dang / rin po che'i do shal gyi chun po thogs te/ lus btud
132a1(mdo sde): gnas byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi yang gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang dri za dang / klu'i tshogs kyis bskor zhing gon sra ba bgos
132a2(mdo sde): ya lang bges te ral gri dang mnga' gzhu dang / mdung thung dang / mtshon rtse gnyis pa dang / rtse gsum pa lag na thogs shing tshul du shis par nor bu'i cang pan dang gtsug pud 'phyang bar byang chub
132a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' la phyag sa me 'dug pa mthong ngo // lha'i bu nyi ma dang zla ba gnyis kyang blo g.yas g.yon du 'dug par mthong ngo // skar ma'i bdag po rgyal yang nam phyed na shar ba mthong ngo // mthong nas
132a4(mdo sde): kyang byang chub sems dpas mdun pa la smras pa/ nga yi bak+Sha da shis 'di ni den kun grub// ngo mod gdon mi za bar don grub kyis// 'dun pa phyi shel ma phyed la gong du//  rgyal rgyar bris
132a5(mdo sde): brgyan pa nga la byin// de nas 'dun pas tshig de zos nas// yid mi dga' zhing 'di skad ces smras so// smin ma ring zhing pad+ma'i 'dab ma rgyas 'dra'i spun mnga' mi'i seng ge sten ka'i zla ba nya
132a6(mdo sde): ba lta bu dang / me tog ku mu da dang zla ba dang ni dga' ba'i pad+ma'i rdzing bu sar par 'jam pa'i pad+ma rgyas 'dra'i zhal// spangs pa'i gser dang nyi ma shar ma thag dang zla ba dri med gzi dang mar blag me'i 'od
132a7(mdo sde): 'phro nor bu glog 'od 'bar ba'i gzi brjid can// glang po rgyags pa 'gying ba'i glang po'i stobs can ba lang khyu mchog ri dwags rgyal dang ngang pa'i stabs can stobs mdzes shin tu zhabs legs gang
132a8(mdo sde): du bzhud// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ 'dun pa gang gi don du nga yis sngon chad lag pa rkang pa mig dang de bzhin mgo dang lus btang zhing // chung ma dang ni phangs pa'i rgyal srid nor gser go sa dang
132b1(mdo sde): rin chen gang ba'i shing rta glang po rlung mgyogs shugs ldan rta pho rtsal mchog ldan pa btang // bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig mang nas tshul khrims ngas bsrungs bzod pa yongs sgoms brtson 'grus stobs
132b2(mdo sde): dang bsam gtan shes rab dag ji lta mod kyi byang chub zhi pa shes pa thos nas rga shi'i rgya mtsho chung ba'i sems can nga yis yongs su dgrol ba'i dus la bab// 'dun pas smras pa/ jo bo khyod bltam ma thag
132b3(mdo sde): tu bltam pa'i phyir bram ze bltas mkhan rnams la bstan na/ de dag gis khyod rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i spyan sngar lha khyod kyi rgyal po'i pho brang 'phel bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan zhes bdag gis thos
132b4(mdo sde): so smras pa ji lta bur 'gyur/ smras pa gzhon nu 'di ni bsod nams rgyal mtshan ldan// khyod kyi bu btsas bsod nams gzi brjid can/ de ni gling bzhi'i dbang phyug 'khor los sgyur// nor bdun dang ni
132b5(mdo sde): rab tu ldan par 'gyur// gal te 'jig rten sdug bsngal blta sa nas ni// btsun mo'i 'khor spangs mngon par byung gyur na// byang chub rga shi med pa'i gnas thob ste/ chos kyi chu yis
132b6(mdo sde): skye rgu 'di tshim byed// jo bo lung bstan pa 'di ni mchis te/ 'di ma mchis pa ma lags mod kyi/ 'on gyis kyang phan par 'tshal ba da ga gi tshig gsan par gsol/ smras pa ci zhig smras pa/ lha gcig
132b7(mdo sde): gang gi don du 'di na kha cig brtul zhugs dang dka' thub rnam pa du ma rtsom ste ri dwags kyi lpags pa dang ral pa'i thor tshugs dang / rtswa dang shing shun gyon pa dang / sen mo dang skra dang ag tsho ma ring por 'jog
132b8(mdo sde): ba dang / lus la gdung ba dang yongs su gdung ba rnam pa du ma spro bar bgyid bdag cag ji ltar lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par 'gyur zhes brtul zhugs dang dka' thu drag po rtsom mo// jo bo
133a1(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa de ni khyod kyis brnyes pa lags te/ rgyal srid 'byor zhing rgyas la bde zhing lo legs te nyams dga' zhing mi skye bo mang pos gang ba 'di dang skyed pos tshal
133a2(mdo sde): dam pa mchog me tog dang / 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa bya'i tshogs sgra skad yid du 'ong ba 'byin pa 'di dag dang / rdzing me tog ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang ku mu da dang pad+ma dkar pos mdzes par
133a3(mdo sde): gyur gangang ba dang rma bya dang khu byug dang ngur ba dang khrung khrung dang / ngang sgra sgra skang 'byin pa shing a mra dang mya ngan tshang dang tsam pa ka dang / ku ra ba ka dang ke sar la sogs pa shing me tog tshogs kyi 'gram
133a4(mdo sde): 'khor ga/ rin po che'i shing sna tshogs kyis phreng gis legs par brgyan pa mig mangs ris su bkod pa rin po che sna tshogs kyi stegs bus bkod pa rin po che'i dra ba bris pa/ dus ji lta ba bzhin du
133a5(mdo sde): yongs su spang ba/ dgun dang dbyar dang ston dang dpyid gnas bar bde ba rnams dang / khang bzangs chen po chos dang / chos bzangs dang bde ba dang mya ngan bral la sogs pa/ 
133a6(mdo sde): rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa lta bu ston ka'i sprin 'dra ba/ gangs ti se lta bu stegs bu dang sgo khang dang rta bapra dang / skar khung dang bsil khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang khyams kyis legs par
133a7(mdo sde): brgyan pa rin po che'i dril bu g.yer kha'i dra ba sgra 'byung ba 'di dag dang btsun mo'i 'khor rol mo'i cha byad rgyud gcig pa dang bi wang dang khar rnga dang / gling bu dang khar ba'i sil khrol dang pheg dang
133a8(mdo sde): kim pa la dang na ku la dang / sgra brnyan dang rdza rnga pa ta ha dang glu dang gar dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra dang glu dbyangs sbyar ba legs par bslabs pa dgod pa dang / 'jo ba dang brtse ba dang dga' ba dang / tshul
133b1(mdo sde): du shis pa dang / spyod lam mdzes pa 'di dang ni ldan la lha khyod kyang dang ni ma yol te gnon pa zor bu dar la bab pa lus 'jam pa lang tshol bab pa dbu skra gnag pa 'dod pa la ma rol pa lags kyis/ 
133b2(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i bdag po mig stong dang ldan pa lha'i bdag po lta bur re shig dgyes par rol la slad kyis bgres nas mngon par 'byung bar mdzod cig/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di yang smras so/ 
133b3(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gsum 'jig rten lha dbang ltar// dgyes pa'i cho ga mkhyen pa dgyes par rol// slad kyis 'gres par gyur nas brtul zhugs dang // dka' thub dang ni yang dag brtsam par mdzod// byang chub sems
133b4(mdo sde): dbas smras pa/ 'dun pa mi dgos te 'dod pa 'di dag ni mi rtag pa/ mi brtan pa ther zug ma yin par 'gyur ba'i chos can myur du gro ba g.yo ba ri bzar po'i chu'i shugs dang 'dra ga zil pa'i thigs
133b5(mdo sde): ba ltar ring du mi gnas pa lag pa bcangs pa stong pas byis pa bri dpa ltar snying po med pa/ chu shing gi snying po ltar mthu me par snod so ma btang ba ltar mthar 'jig pa ston ka'i sprin ltar skad
133b6(mdo sde): cig byung nas med par gyur pa/ nam mkha'i glog ltar ring du mi gnas pa dug dang bcas pa'i snod ltar 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal can 'khri shing ma lu ta ltar mi bde ba 'byin pa/ byis pa'i blo can rnams kyis 'dod par bya
133b7(mdo sde): ga chu'i chu bur lta bur myur du 'gyur ba'i chos can smig rgyu ltar 'du shes phyin ci log las byung ba/ sgyu ma ltar sems phyin ci log gis rnam par bsgrubs pa/ rmi lam ltar lta ba phyin ci log gis yongasu zin
133b8(mdo sde): brgya mtsho dgang dka' ba ltar ngoms mi shes par byed pa/ tsha chu ltar snyoms par byed pa sbrul gyi mgo ltar reg par bya dka' nga g.yangs chen po ltar mkhas pa rnams kyis yongasu spangs pa/ 
134a1(mdo sde): shes rab can rnams kyis 'jigs pa dang / bcas pa dang brtsed pa dang sa ba dang bcas pa dang sbyin pa dang bcas par shes nas rnam par spangs pa rigs pa rnams kyis smad pa
134a2(mdo sde): 'phags pa rnams kyis bshungs pa/ mkhas pa rnams kyi ma sngags pa mi mkhas pa rnams kyis yongs su gzung ba byis pa rnams kyis sten pa yin no// de'i tshe tshigs su bcang ba 'di yang
134a3(mdo sde): smras so// mkhas pa rnams kyis sbrul gyi mag bzhin spangs// ngan skyugs snod bzhin mi gtsang rnam par spangs// 'dun pa dge ba thams cad 'jig byed par// 'dod pa shes nas nga ni dga'i ma skye
134a4(mdo sde): de'i tshe 'dun pa zug rngus zug pa bzhin du skad phyung ste/ ngu zhing de nas mig nas mchi ma zag la sdug bsngal zhing tshig 'di skad ces smras so// lha cig gang gi don du 'di na kha cig
134a5(mdo sde): brtul zhugs rnam pa mang po rtsom ste ri dwags lpags ba 'chang // skra dang sen mo ag tshom ring du 'jog cing de bzhin shing shun gyon la yan lag skams shing brtul
134a6(mdo sde): zhugs gnas// sred pa dang ni ldam ldam dag dang ma dras 'bras za kha cig spri'u btsugs 'dug dang ba lang brtul zhugs gnas// ji ltar bdag cag 'gro ba'i gtso bo khyad 'phags 'khor los
134a7(mdo sde): sbyar ba mchog dang de bzhin 'jig rten skyong ba dang // brgya byin rdo rje 'chang dang 'thab bral lha dbang 'phrul par 'gyur snyam tshangs pa'i 'jig rten bsam gtan bde ba 'dod// mi yi dam pa khyod kyi
134a8(mdo sde): rgyal sring 'di ni shin tu 'byor zhing rab tu rgyas la shin tu lo legs pa// de bzhin kun dga'i rang dag dang skyed mos tshal dang khang bzangs mthon po rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa mtshungs// bud med 'di dag rnams
134b1(mdo sde): kyang pi wang dang ni gling bu dag dang glu dang rol me'i dbyangs sgra len zhing mchis// dga' bar bgyid ba gar dang glu dbyangs sbyar ba shin tu bslabs pa 'di dag spyod cing des pa ma bzhud cig byang chub sems
134b2(mdo sde): dpas smras pa/ 'dun pa nyon cig 'dong ba'i rgyus ni sngon gyi tshe rangs dag ni bcings dang bcad dang rdegs dang sdigs pa sdug bsngal brgya dag ngas ni bzed byas 'du byas rnams la nga yis yid byung byas
134b3(mdo sde): ma gyur// sngon chad bag med dbang song zhing gti mug dkrugs la lta ba'i dra bas dkris shing mun gyur chos 'di mi shes pa las byung ste bdag tu 'du shes 'dzin dang tsher ba po las 'das// dngos po 'di
134b4(mdo sde): dag thams cad g.yo zhing 'gyur la mi rtag sprin dang mtshungs shing glog dang 'dra ste zil pa'i thigs pa 'dra zhing gsob gsog snying po med la bdag yod ma yin stong par gyur pa ste// nga yi yid ni yul
134b5(mdo sde): la chags pa med kyis 'dun pa rta rgyal dam pa bsngags lnga nang byin nga sngon bsams pa'i bkra shis rdzogs kyis tha/ mas cad zil gnod chos kun dbang phyug chos rgyal thub par
134b6(mdo sde): 'gyur// 'dun pas smras pa/ pad+ma 'dab ma rgyas pa 'dra ba'i mig ldan zhing // de shal nor bu rin chen sna tshogs rnams kyis brgyan// mkha' lo sprin tshogs dag las byung ba'i glog 'dra ba// mal na rnam par
134b7(mdo sde): mdzes pa 'di la mi gzigs sam// pi ldir dang ri khar rnga dag dang sgra snyan dang // rdza rnga dag dang gling bu glu dbyangs len pa dang // bya bar rma bya ka la bing ka'i sgra 'byin pa/ mi 'am ci me'i khyim 'dra 'di yang der
134b8(mdo sde): lags sam/ su ma na dang ut+pa la dang ba rA ka dang // tsa ra pa ka dang dri mchog phreng nga me tog rgyus// dus kyi a ka ru mchog bdug pas rab bdugs dang / brub pa dam pa de dag la yang mi gzigs sam// shin
135a1(mdo sde): tu dri gad 'dri ldan re bro gya rom dang / skya rums dag dang bshos gtsang shin tu legs sbyar dang // skyems kyi ro dang khar bcas par rab sbyar ba// 'di la'ang mi gzigs par ni lnga khyod
135a2(mdo sde): gang du bzhud// grang ba'i dus na byug pa dam pa dro ba dang // tsha ba'i des na tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po dang ku shi pa yin bza' bzang po mang po dang // de dag la yang mi gzigs lha khyod gang du bzhud// lha yul dag
135a3(mdo sde): na lha rnams dag ni ci 'dra bar// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po 'di dag reb 'byor pa// dga' zhing bde dang ldan la dgyes par rol mdzad do// de nas shAkya'i dam pa nags tshal bzhad par mdzod// byang chub sems
135a4(mdo sde): dpas smras pa/ 'dun pa ngas ni bskal pa mtha' yas dpag tu med par gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg dang mi dang lha'i 'a dod pa rnam pa sna tshogs spad kyang ngoms pagyur pa med// rgyal
135a5(mdo sde): de'i sras mchog gyur te dbang phyug byas shing gang tshe gling bzhi dag tu 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur nas rin che na sna bdun ldan zhing bud med nang na 'dug pa dang // sum cu rtsa
135a6(mdo sde): gsum dbang dang 'thab bral rab kyi lha dbang byas shing de dag nas ni shi 'phos 'dir 'ongs sprul po'i lha'i nang na yid 'ong dpal ldan dam pa nga yis sngan chad sprad// lha yi gnas su dbang bsgyur bdud
135a7(mdo sde): kyi dbang po byas shing 'dod pa 'byor ba mchog tu spyad kyang ngoms ma gyur nang cing man 'di la bsten ngas ngems 'gyur ram de ni gnas min no// 'dun pa nga ni sdug bsngal mya ngan dgong pa'i 'khor bar
135a8(mdo sde): gnas pa nyon mongs gdug ngas dkrugs shing nyams ngas rtag tu khyer te mgon med skyabs med cig gti mug ma rig mun pa ngag na rga dang na dang 'chi nga'i 'jigs pa dag gis nyen la skye ba'i sdug bsnga
135b1(mdo sde): dgra yis kun tu gnon cing rnam par gnod pa'i 'gro ba 'di bltas nas// ngas 'dir chos kyi gru bzang gtong dang tshul khrims brtul zhugs bzod pa brtson 'grus stobs can dag gi shing tshogs bsogs te
135b2(mdo sde): sbar nas lhag pa'i bsam pa snying po ldan pa rdo rje lta bus brtan por gzungs btab sbar// gru der nga nyid zhugs nas bdag nyid rgal te bdag gis 'gre ba mtha' yas pa dag 'khor ba'i chu bo 'dal bar che ba
135b3(mdo sde): khri ba'i// rnga brlabs ldan pa 'dod chags 'dzin khri glong 'khyil dgra yis rnam par dkrugs pa rgal bar dka' las bsgral lo snyam ste sems de 'dra'o// de phyir srid mtsho dgra bcas lta ba'i 'dzin khri dang / 
135b4(mdo sde): nyen mongs srin po yod pa 'di las bdag rgal te// bdag nyid rgal bar gyur nas 'gro ba mtha' yas pa// rga med 'di med zhi med zhi ba'i thang la dgod par bya// de'i tshe 'dun pa de bas kyang rab tu ngu zhing 'di skad ces
135b5(mdo sde): smras so// lha de ltar nges par mdzad dam/ byang chub sems dpas smra sa pa 'dun dang yis nges par byas pa nyon// sems can nga / grel phyir phan par bya phyir brtson// mi g.yo las kyang mi
135b6(mdo sde): g.ye gnod pa med// ri rgyal lhun po lta bur brtan mi g.yo// 'dun pa sa smras pa/ je bo'i nges pa ci 'dra ba zhig lags// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ rdo rje'i gnam lcags dgra sta mdang thung mda' char
135b7(mdo sde): dang lugs sker glog gi tshogs ltar rab tu 'bar ba dang / ri rtse kun du 'bar ba mgo steng rab 'ang kyang / nga ni khyim la 'dod pa phyir yang mi skyed de/ de'i tshe lha'i bu na mkha' la 'khod pa dag gis ca co dang gnas ci steng phyung ste me
135b8(mdo sde): tog gi char yang phab nas/ tshig su bcang pa 'di dag smras yul rnams la ni yod kyang ba chags shing / sems can dgang snying rje snying brtser ldan/ khri gres mchog ldan rgyal gyur cog mgon po 'grol mi 'jigs sbyin mdza sa / mnga' la rdul
136a1(mdo sde): / gnag dub mjug rings dag mi chags bzhin du skyes mchog thugs mi chags/ di med yul gyi bde bas mi ges te/ chu las pad+ma ji ltar 'phags pa bzhin// dge slong dag de nas lha'i bu zhi ba'i blo gros dang lha'i bu
136a2(mdo sde): brtse ba bkod pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i nges pa rig nas ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po'i skyes pa dang / bud med dang khye'u dang dang bu mo thams cad gnyid kyis log par byas so// sgra thams cad kyang mi grag par byas so// 
136a3(mdo sde): dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpas grong khyer gyi skye bo thams cad gnyid kyis log par rig/ nam gyi gung la bab par rig skar ma'i bdag po rgyal dang ldan par rig/ de kho na mngon par 'byung ba'i dus la bab par
136a4(mdo sde): rig nas 'dun pa la smras pa/ 'dun pa da skyo bar ma byed par rta bsnga gas ldan legs par brgyan te ma thogs pa rang la byin/ byang chub sems dpas tshig de skad smras ma thag tu de nas skad cig
136a5(mdo sde): de nyid la rgyal ngo chen po bzhis byang chub sems dpa'i tshig zos na sa rang rang gi gnas nas byung ste byang chub sems dpa' lam tshong ba'i las kyi phyir rang rang gi bkong bas rings pa rings par yang
136a6(mdo sde): ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por 'ongs so// de na dri za'i bdag po chen po yul 'khor srungs ni dri za bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag dang lhan cig tu sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs sna tshogs len zhing shar
136a7(mdo sde): phyogs nas 'ongs par gyur te/ 'ongs nas kyang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po la skor ba byas te/ ji ltar 'ongs pa'i shar phyogs nyid du gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug go// rgyal
136a8(mdo sde): po chen po 'phags skyes po ni grul bum mu tig gi do shal sna tshogs lag na 'phyang ba nor bu rin po che sna tshogs thogs pa spos chu sna tshogs kyis gang ba'i bum pa thogs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma
136b1(mdo sde): dag dang lhan cig tu lde phyogs nas 'ongs par gyur te/ 'ongs nas kyang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po la skor ba byas te/ ji ltar 'ongs pa'i lde phyogs nyid du gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' la phyag
136b2(mdo sde): 'tshal zhing 'dug ge/ rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang ni klu pu tig gi do shal sna tshogs lag na 'phyang ba ner bu rin po che sna tshogs thogs pa spos kyi bye ba dang / me tog gi char gyi sprin kun sreng ba'i rlung
136b3(mdo sde): dal zhing dri zhim pa sna tshogs gtong ba'i bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag dang lhan cig tu nub phyogs nas 'ongs par gyur te/ 'ongs nas kyang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer cheran po la skor ba byas
136b4(mdo sde): te/ ji ltar 'ongs pa'i nub begs nyid du gnas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug go/ rgyal po lus ngan ni gnad sprin nor bu rir po che skar ma'i 'ong
136b5(mdo sde): zer thegs pa lag na mar me thegs pa sgren pa 'bar ba lag na thegs pa mnga' gzhu dang / ral gri dang mdung thung dang mtshon rtse gnyis pa dang rtse gsum pa dang / 'khor le dang
136b6(mdo sde): mtshon rtse gcig pa dang mnga' dang mdung la sogs pa mtshon ma sra ba thogs pa go cha dang ya lang sra ba bgos pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dag dang lhan cig tu byang phyogs nas 'ongs par
136b7(mdo sde): gyur te/ rengs nas kyang ser skya'i gnas kyi gleng khyer chen po la skor ba byas te/ ji ltar 'ongs pa'i byang phyogs nyid du gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug ge lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang
136b8(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i me tog dang / spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang gis dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang me tog rna rgyan dang rkyen theg pa rnams dang lhan cig tu 'ongs par gyur te/ rengs nas kyang ser skya'i
137a1(mdo sde): // gnas kyi grong khyer chen po la skor ba byas te ji ltar 'ongs pa'i steng gi bar snang la 'khor dang bcas te/ byang chub sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug dge slong dag de ltar 'dun
137a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i tshig thos nas mig mchi mas gang zhing byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces smras so// jo bo khod ni dus mkhyen pa tshod mkhyen ran pa mkhyen pa lags na/ da ltar ni bzhud pa'i dus
137a3(mdo sde): dang tshod ma lags na/ ci'i slad du bka' de skad su la byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ 'dun pa da ni dus la bab bo// smras pajo bo gang gi dus la bag/ byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ sems can rnams kyi don
137a4(mdo sde): ni tshol ba na/ byang chub rga shi med pa'i gnas thob nas/ 'gro ba grol zhes nga yis yun ring nas/ smon lam btab pa de'i dus la bab// 'don 'di ni chos nyid de de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sa bla ba dang bar snang de
137a5(mdo sde): bzhin skyong / lha dbang brgya byin rang gi phyogs dang bcas/ 'thab bral lha dang dga' ldan 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed lha rnams brtson par gyur/ klu rgyal chu lha dang ni gzi can
137a6(mdo sde): dang / ma dros pa dang de bzhin rgya mtsho yang / mi mchog mngon par 'byung ba'i dus bab pas// de dag rnams kyang mchod phyir brtson par 'gyur/ gang dag gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams dang / rtag tu bsam gtan
137a7(mdo sde): spyod yul rab zhi spyod// de dag rnams kyang 'jig rten gsum mchod pa// mi mchog de la mchod phyir mngon par brtson// mngon chad spong tshe grogs bor gyur pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu lhags
137a8(mdo sde): pa yang // rgyal ba mngon par 'byung la lta byed cing // rjesu 'thun pas mchod pa bya snyam byed// gsang ba'i bdag po bdag nyid chen po de// rdo rje 'bar thogs na mkha'i dkyil na gnas// lus la go dgos
137b1(mdo sde): stobs brtson rtsal dang ldan// gsang ba lag na rdo rje 'bar ba thogs// lha'i bu nyi ma zla ba de gnyis kyang // g.yas dang g.yon na rab tu gnas par gyur// sor mo bcu'i thal mo rab sbyar te// mngon par 'byung
137b2(mdo sde): la rjesu rtogs par byed// skar ma rgyal de 'khor dang bcas pa yang // rang gi lus ni rgya chen sgra 69/ mi'i dam pa de'i mdun 'dug nas/ yid du 'ongs pa'i sgra ni rab 'byin te/ skar ma rgyal ldan bzhud pa'i
137b3(mdo sde): dus la bab/ do mo khyod dge bkra shis thams cad grub/ bdag kyang khyod dang thabs gcig mchi bar bgyi// 'dod chags sel ba bar chad byung ma gyur/ lha bu yang dag bskul mas bskul byas pa/ 
137b4(mdo sde): stobs dang brtson 'grus 'phags pa myur du bzhengs// sdug pa sngal nyen pa'i sems can thams cad sgrol// de ni mngon par 'byung ba'i dus la bag/ lha rnams bye ba stong phrag mang po yang / yid
137b5(mdo sde): 'od me tog char pa 'bebs shing lhags// de ni skyil mo krungs bcas mchog la 'dug lha yis bskor zhing mdzes lag zi brjid 'bar// grong khyer na ni skyes pa bud med khye'u dang bu mog
137b6(mdo sde): yod pa// de dag thams cad yid la ngal gyur nas nyal te spyod lam rnams las nyams// rta dang glang po ba lang ne tso khrung khrung rma ba ri skegs rnams// de dag kun kyang yid ngal gyur nas nyal te de dag gzugs
137b7(mdo sde): mi mthong / shAkya'i bu gang rdo rje sra ba'i mtshon cha rtse gnyis thogs bkod dang / glang chen rta dang shing rta rta babs mchog drung bkod pa de dag nyal// rgyal po rgyal bu rgyal po'i skye bo kun kyang gnyid kyis log
137b8(mdo sde): par gyur/ bu med tshogs rnams gnyid log gos bral gcer bur gyur kyang yong ma tshor// de ni tshangs dbyangs yid du 'ong tshig ka la bing ka'i sgra dbyangs kyis// nam phyed 'das te nam gyi gung la bab nas
138a1(mdo sde): 'dun pa de la smras// 'dun pa rta bo bsngags ldan bzang po legs par ngal byin/ gal te nga la byams par sems na bgegs ma byed par myur du byin/ 'dun pas tshig thos mchi ma
138a2(mdo sde): mig gang rang gi jo bo de la smras/ sems can kha lo bsgyur mchog gar bzhud bcibs pas khyod la ci zhig bgyi/ dus mkhyen zhing ni chod mkhyen chos spyod gang du'ang gshegs pa'i dus ma lags// khyod kyi
138a3(mdo sde): sgo bkum gtan pa dam stsal su yang chab sgo 'byed mi 'gyur// brgya byin gyi ni yid kyi sems pa'i dbang gis sgo yang bye bar gyur// 'dun pas de 'dra mthong nas dga' zhing sdug bsngal de ni mchi ma 'khor// 
138a4(mdo sde): kyi hud bdag grog su yod ci ltar bya zhing phyogs ni gar brgyug sa ma/ gzi brjid ldan pas drags shul can gyi tshig smras brgya byin 'ba' zhig zos// yan lag bzhi ldan dpung dang bcas pa 'ang
138a5(mdo sde): yang 'din ci zhig byed// rgyal po rgyal bu rgyal po'i skye bo de dag rnams kyis 'di mchor/ bud med tshogs kyang gnyid log lha rnams kyis ni grags ldan gnyid log byas// kyi hud 'di
138a6(mdo sde): yis sngon chad bsam pa'i smon lam thams cad grub gyur cig/ lha stong bye ba de dag dga' ba'i yid kyis mdun pa de la smras// 'dun pa rta mchog bsngags ldan legs par phul cig 'dren pa skyo mi bya// lha
138a7(mdo sde): dang lha min dag gis rnga rdung rdza rnga rol mo khrag khrig byas/ 'on kyang lhas bsnyal ba'i grong ba grong khyer mchog 'di sad par yong ma gyur// 'dun pa bar snang dri ma med la lha'i 'od rab mdzes la ltos// khyod kyis
138a8(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' bye ba mang po mchod phyir gang lhags ltos// de sogs khyim thab brgya byin dpung bskor sgon mdzes par 'dug pa dang // lha dang lha min mi 'am ci tshogs gang dag mchod phyir lhags
138b1(mdo sde): la ltos// 'dun pa des kyang lha tshig de thos bsngags ldan rta bo de la smras// sems can kha lo sgyur mchog 'di bzhud khyod ni rta skad sgrogs shing shog/ de yis dbyar gyi kha dog can de rmig pa gser
138b2(mdo sde): gyis brgyan byas nas/ yid mi dga' bzhin yon tan rgya mtsho mnga' ba'i bcibs par dbul ba byas// mtshan mchog mnga' zhing phan mdzad khyod kyi tshabs 'di rigs bzang dge ba lags// khyod kyi
138b3(mdo sde): sngon chad gang dgongs smon lam de grub gyur cig gshegasu gsol// gang dag bgegs bgyid bzhi par gyur cig dgongs pa'i brtul zhugs grub gyur cig/ 'gro ba kun la bde dang mtho ris pa
138b4(mdo sde): dang zhi ba sbyin gyur cig/ de na gang tshe mal nas langs chos 'di thams cad rnam drug g.yos// rta rgyal dam pa zla ba nya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba de la zhol// spyod pa'i lag pa rnam dag par
138b5(mdo sde): ma dri med 'dra bas rta mchog brteg/ brgya byin tshangs pa de ga nyis de'i mdun na lam ni 'di zhes ston// de yi sa gas la ba dri ma med pa'i 'od btang sa rnams snang bas gsal de
138b6(mdo sde): tshe ngan song kun zhi sems can bde ldan nyon mongs gnod pa med// me tog char bas sil snyan bye ba sgra byung lha dang lha min bstod// thams cad dga' dang ldan nas grong khyer mchog la bskor ba
138b7(mdo sde): byas te dong // skyes bu chen po song bas grong khyer dam pa'i lha yang yid ni dman par gyur nas 'ongs/ mdun du 'dug nas snying rjer bu pa'i yid ldan de yid pad ma 'dra ba'i bzhin las smras/ khyod
138b8(mdo sde): bral sgren mor mo mdzes sa 'di grong khyer thams cad mun pas kun dkrugs par gyur// do mod khyod kyis khab 'di spang na bdag la dga' bde bgyid pa 'di na dga' ma mchis// slan chad bu tshogs
139a1(mdo sde): rnams kyi sgra dag dang grags pa mtha' yas khyod ni sang bgyid ba'i// btsun mo 'khor gyi gling bu snyan pa dang / bkra shis sgra dang glu sgra thos mi 'gyur// nyon mongs bcom pa
139a2(mdo sde): khyod ni gshegs gyur na// gdug mtshan khyod la mchod pa bgyid pa yi/ lha dang grub tshogs slan chad mthong mi 'gyur// lha'i dri yang slan chad snom mi 'gyur// phreng ba btags nas zhag lon gyur pa ltar// 
139a3(mdo sde): khyod kyis do mod pho brang de bzhin spangs// khyod bzhud slan chad gzi brjid dpal ma mchis// gar la lta ba bzhin du bdag la dga'// grong khyer kun gyi byin dang stobs phrogs ste// 'di ni dgon pa 'dra zhing mdzes
139a4(mdo sde): ma lags// gang gis sa 'dir 'khor lo stobs can du// lung bstan drang song tshig ni deng brdzun gyur// bsod nams sdong po chen po khyod byung na// sa 'dir shAkya'i stobs ni stobs ma mchis
139a5(mdo sde): rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor 'dir gdung yang chad/ shAkya'i tshogs 'di bsam pa rab tu nyams// dri med dri bral khyod ni gar bcu dper// bdag kyang khyod dang lhan cig mchi bar bgyi// 'on kyang
139a6(mdo sde): thugs rtse thugs rje bskyed nas ni// khyod kyis pho brang 'di la gzigasu gsol// blo gros ldan pa khyim la bstas nas ni// snyan pa'i nga ros 'di skad tshig smras ste/ skye 'chi mthar 'byin ma thob bar du ni// 
139a7(mdo sde): nga yis ser skya'i grong khyer 'dug mi bya// rga shi med pa'i gnas mchog 'chi med pa// byang chub dam pa nga yis ma thob par// nga yi ser skya'i gnasu mngon phyogs te// 'grong 'dug nyal dang 'chag pa mi bya'o// 
139a8(mdo sde): gang tshe 'gro ba'i gtso bo pa// byang chub sems dpa' de byung zhing // de ni mkha' las 'gro ba'i tshe/ lha'i bu mo rnams kyis stong// 'di ni sbyin pa'i gnas chen yin// 'di ni bsod nams zhing chen yin// 'di
139b1(mdo sde): ni bsod nams 'dod pa'i zhing // 'chi med 'bras bu smin mdzad pa// sems can rnams la thugs rje bas// 'di yis skal pa bye mang du// sbyin dang dul dang sdom pa yis// 'dis ni byang chub yang dag bsgrubs// 'dir ni
139b2(mdo sde): / tshul khrims yongasu dag/ brtul bzhugs bzang zhing spyod ma nyams// 'dod pa gang dang long spyod rnams/ don du mi gnyer tshul khrims srung // sems can yongasu bskyabs pa'i phyir// 'di ni rtag tu bzod pa bsrung
139b3(mdo sde): yan lag nyid lag gcad gyur kyang / khro ba mi mnga' sdang mi mnga'/ 'di ni rtag tu brtson 'grus ldan/ skal pa bye bar skyo ma mnga'// 'di yis byang chub yang dag bsgrubs// mchod sbyin dag ni bye ba mdzad// 'di rtag bsam
139b4(mdo sde): gtan bsam gtan pa// thugs ni zhi zhing rab tu zhi// nyon mongs thams cad bsregs nas ni// sems can bye bgrol bar 'gyur// de ni shes rab chags mi mnga'// rtog dang rnam par rtog ldan las/ 
139b5(mdo sde): grol zhing thugs ni rnam grol te/ rang byung ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur/ la de ni rtag tu byams thugs ldan// thugs rje yi ni pha rol byon//  ga' dang btang snyoms bsam gtan pa/ tshangs pa'i lam ni chog
139b6(mdo sde): mkhyen/ 'di ni shin tu lha'i lha// lha rnams kyi ni mchod pa'i 'os// thugs dge dag cing dri ma bral// yon tan khrag khrig pha rol byon// 'jigs pas nyen pa rnams kyi skyabs// mig med rnams kyi sgron ma ste// gnod pa rnam
139b7(mdo sde): kyi sbubs kyang lags/ ring nas na ba'i sman pa lags/ rgyal po dam pa chos kyi rgyal// dbang po lta bur spyan stong mngal/ tshangs pa lta bur rab byung gyur/ lus dang sims ni rab sbyangs pa/ brtan zhing shes rabarab tu
139b8(mdo sde): mnga'// dpa' zhing thugs ni 'dod chags bral/ nyon mongs 'joms pas dpa' bo ste/ ma rgyal dgra las rgyal ba lags/ seng ge lta bur brnyengs pa spang / glang po lta bur rab dul thugs// khyu mchog lta bur tshogs kyi
140a1(mdo sde): / gso ba nga 'khrugs parab tu spang ga/ zlab lta bu ragatugs gnyis lta bur snang bas dang /  pa sgru rdu gas la mdzad gan sa lta su mun pa phral bad+mal bu gas mim sas / 
140a2(mdo sde): bur khrims mi bdal// ston pa lhun po ltar mi g.yo// dog sa lta bur gso su gyur/ rin chen 'byung gnas ltar mi 'khrugs// 'di ni phung po'i bdud las rgyal/ 'di ni 'chi bdag bdud las rgyal// 'di ni lha'i bad kyang bcom
140a3(mdo sde): 'di ni ded dpon chen po ste/ lam ngan dag na gnas rnams la/ yan lag brgyad pa lam gyi mchog ring por mi thogs ston par 'gyur// rga shi nyon mongs 'joms pa po// mun pa rab rib rnam par grol// sa dang lha yul graH
140a4(mdo sde): pa yi// rang byung rgyal bar byon pa lags// skyes bu mchog gi gzugs mnga' ba/ dpag tu med la stod pas bstod// khyod la bstod pa'i bsod nams des// snang ba'i seng ge 'dra bar shog/ dge slong dag de ltar byang chub se/ 
140a5(mdo sde): dpa' mngon par byung nas// shAkya'i yul dang ke'u ta'i yul dang gyad lungawa 'das te/ me ne ya'i yul gyi grong rdal rjesu dpag pa/ zhes bya ba nas/ dpag tshad drug tu byang chub sems dpa' phyin pa dang / 
140a6(mdo sde): nam langs par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rta bsngags ldan las babs te/ sa la 'dug nas lha dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang na mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po'i tshig/ 
140a7(mdo sde): chen po slar bkye'o// slar bkye nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te rgyan 'di dag dang rta sngags ldan kyang 'dun pa'i lag tu gtad de slar btangango snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpas 'dun pa pos ste/ 'di skad ces smras so// 
140a8(mdo sde): 'dun pa khyod songs rgyan 'di dag dang / rta bsngags ldan khyer te slar lag shigs phyogs gang nas 'dun pa slar lago pa der / mchod rten brtsigs te/ ding sangadza du yang mchod rten de la 'dun pa slar log pa'i mtsha
140b1(mdo sde): rten zhes grags pa yin no// yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te// ji ltar na gtsug phud kyang yod la rab tu byung ba zhes bya bar yang 'gyur snyab nas/ des ral gris gtsug pud bcad de bar snang la bor ba
140b2(mdo sde): dang / de sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lho rnams kyis mchod pa'i phyir blangs te/ deng sang du'ang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams gtsug phud kyi dus ston bye// der mchod rten yang byas ste deng sang yang mchod rten de gtsu/ 
140b3(mdo sde): bud blangs pa'i mchod rten zhes ming du chag so// yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ rab tu byung yang gos ka shi ba gyon par ji ltar rung gis gal te nags tshal gyi gnas nas tshul dang mthun pa'i gos
140b4(mdo sde): shig rnyed na ni legaso snyam du sem pa dang / de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams 'di snyam du sems te byang chub sems dpa' la ngur smrig dgos par gyur to snyamo// de nas lha'i bu gcig lha'i gzug
140b5(mdo sde): mi mngon par byas te rngon pa'i gzugs lta bus gos ngur smrig bgos nas byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du phyin to// de nas byang chub se mas dpas de la 'di skad ces smras so// gal te grogs po khyod kyis
140b6(mdo sde): gos ngur smrig rnams kho bo la byin la kho bo'i gos ka shi pa 'di rnams kyang khyod la sbyin no// des smras pa gos 'di dag kyang khod la mdzes la/ 'o na rnams kyang kho bo la mdzeso// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ kho zas
140b7(mdo sde): khyod la bslang// de nas lha'i bu rngon pa'i gzugs lta bu des gos ngur smrig rnams byang chub sems dpa' la byin te gos ka shi ba rnams blang so// de nas lha'i bu des gus pa bskyed lag pa gnyigs gos de dag blangs
140b8(mdo sde): nas spyi bo la bzhag ste/ de dag mchod pa dang bkur bsti bya ba'i phyir de nyid nas lha'i 'jig rten du song ngo // de nas 'dun pas mthong bar gyur nas der mchod rten brtsigs deng sad mchod rten de ngur smrig blangs pa zhes
141a1(mdo sde): / ming du chag so// gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas gtsug pud bcad nas/ gos ngur smrig rnams bgos pa de'i tshe lha'i bu brgyad stong dag dga' shing mgu la tshos zhing yid rangs te/ mchog tu rab tu
141a2(mdo sde): dga' nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ kye grogs po dag gzhon nu rab tu byung ngo // kye grogs po dag gzhon nu don grub rab tu byung ngo // de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sa
141a3(mdo sde): rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur te/ sems can skye ba'i chos can grangs med pa dag skye ba las yongasu 'grol bar 'gyur ba nas/ rga ba dang 'chi ba dang na ba dang / mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug
141a4(mdo sde): bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba dang 'khrug pa dag las sems can rnam sa yongasu bkrol te/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu bsgral nas bde ba 'jigs pa med pa/ mya ngan med pa gnod pa med pa zhi ba rdul
141a5(mdo sde): dang bral ba/ 'chi ba med pa'i chos kyi dbyings la 'gong par 'gyuraro/ zhes nas a la la zhes bya ba dang ca co dang gzha'i sgra skad byung bar gyur to// sgra de yang gcig nas gcig tu brgyud nas/ 'og
141a6(mdo sde): min gyi gnas kyi bar du grags par gyur to// de nas btsun mo'i 'khor rnams kyis gzhon nu ma mthong nas/ dpyid dang dgun dang dbyar gnas pa'i khang bzangs rnams dang khri rnams dang khyim rnamasu tshol zhing
141a7(mdo sde): gang gi tshe ma rnyed pa de'i tshe gcig tu 'dus nas/ bya ku ra ra mo bzhin du dung mo 'thon par gyur to// de nas bud med kha cig ni shin tu mya ngan gyis nyam thag nas kha cig ni kyi hud bu 'dzer zhing du'o// kha cig ni
141a8(mdo sde): kyi hud ming po zhes mdzer cing ngu'o// kha cig ni kyi hung khyim thab ces 'dzer to// kha cig na dza'o zhes mdzerd to// ba cig ni sdug pa'i tshig sna tshogs smra'o// kha cig ni lus je ba tsang ngul kha cig ni mgo 'bal lo kha cig ni
141b1(mdo sde): gcig gi gdong du gcig lta zhing du'o// kha cig ni mig bsgyur ning du'o// kha cig ni lag pa 'dral rnga ba cang du'o// kha cig ni brang rdung shing du'o// kha cig na lag pa dpung bar rdob cing ngu'o// kha cig na mgo rdung na
141b2(mdo sde): du'o// kha cig ni mgo las 'thor shing ngu'o// kha cig ni sgra 'jig cing ngu'o// kha cig ni skra 'bal zhing ngu'o// kha cig ni lag pa sted de 'greng nas tshong 'don to// kha cig ni ri dgas mo dug mangs pog po bzhin
141b3(mdo sde): du glo bur du rgyugs cing ngu'o// kha cig ni gdong gos kyis g.yag cing ngu'o// kha cig ni chu shing rlung mar gyis skyong ba bzhin du lus 'khor zhing du'o// kha cig ni sa la 'gyel te ma sho tsam du gyur to// 
141b4(mdo sde): cig ni nya rgu nas bton pa bzhin du sa la 'gre ldog cing du'o// kha cig ni shing rtsa nas phyung ba bzhin glo bur dus la 'gyel nas ngu'o// sgra de yang rgyal pos thos nas shAkya rnams la smras pa ci'i phyir btsun
141b5(mdo sde): mo'i 'khor na sgra chen po 'di grags// shAkya rnams kyis shes nas smras pa/ rgyal po chen po gzhon nu btsun mo'i 'khor dan mi gda' zhes gda'o// rgyal po chur du grong khyer gyi sgra
141b6(mdo sde): rnams chod la nang du gzhon nu tshol cig de dag gis phyi nang du dutsu la kyang ma rnyed nas/ skye rgu'i bdag mtshon ma go'u ta mi smai sngags 'don te sa la 'gre ldog cing rgyal po zas gtsang ma la
141b7(mdo sde): 'di skang smras sa// rgyal ba chen po bdag bu dang sprad dugs so/ de nas rgyal po chen pos phyogs banor po nya rta pa bkye ste/ khyed dang la gnon nu ma rnyed kyi bar du slar ma ldag shig mtshan mkhan dang
141b8(mdo sde): ltas mkhan rnams kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' ni bkra shis kyi chab sgo nas mngon par byung ngo zhes lung bstan nas// de dag bkra shis kyi sgor dong ba dang / lam gyi bar zhig na me tog gi char bab par
142a1(mdo sde): mthong ngo // de nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ gzhon nu ni lam 'di nas byung snyam nas de dag cung zad cig pa zad song ba dang / lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i gos ka shi pa rnam
142a2(mdo sde): mgo la thogs te 'gro ba de mthong nas/ de dag 'di snyam du sems te 'di dag ni gzhon nu'i gos ka shi ba rnams yin na/ gos 'di dag gi phyir 'dis gzhon nu bsad de 'di dag khyer bar ma gyur tam snyam/ 
142a3(mdo sde): de nas yang de dgis de'i phyi bzhin du 'dun pa rta bsngags ldan dang / rgyan rnams thogs te 'ong ba mthong ngo // de nas de dag phan du smras pa/ kye ma bdun pa rta bsngags ldan khrid de 'ong gis/ de la ma dris
142a4(mdo sde): kyi bar du hur 'dums ma byed cig ces smras nas/ de dag gis 'du na pa la dris pa kye 'dun pa gos ka shi pa 'di'i phyir mi 'dis gzhon nu bkrongs par ma gyur grang 'dun pas smras pa/ de lta ma yin
142a5(mdo sde): te 'dis kyang gzhon nu la gos ngur smrig rnams pu'o// gzhon nus kyang na bza' ka shi ba rnams 'di la byin no// de nas/ lha'i bu des de dag mchod pa'i phyir gos de rnams lag pa gnyi
142a6(mdo sde): gas spyi bo la thogs te de nyid nas lha'i 'jig rten du song ngo // de dag gis kyang 'dun pa la dris pa 'di snyam du sems kho bo cag shAkya gzhon nu zlog du 'dong na nus sam/ des smras pa mi nus so// gzhon/ 
142a7(mdo sde): nu ni brtson 'grus dang brtul ba brtan pa ste/ nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nga ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por mi 'jug go zhes de
142a8(mdo sde): skang gsungs pas mi ldag ste gzhon nus ji skad gsungs pa de bzhin du 'gyur// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gnon nu ni brtson 'grus dang brtul ba brtan pas slar mi ldog go// de nas 'dun pa rta bsngags ldan
142b1(mdo sde): dang rgyan rnams khyer te btsun me'i 'khor gyi nang du phyin to// de nas ring po zhig lon pa dang rgyan de dag shAkya gzhon nu bzang po dang / ming chen dang ma 'gags pas brteg pa dang / sred med kyi bu chen po
142b2(mdo sde): ltar mkhregs pa dang sred med kyi bu phyed ltar mkhregs pa'i rgyan de dag gis ma thegs go gang gi tshe de dag gis kyang theg par ma nus pa de'i tshe/ skye gu'i bdag mo tshan mo go'u ta mi 'di snyam du
142b3(mdo sde): sems te bdag gis ji srid du rgyan 'di dag mthong ba de sring du bdag gi snying la mya ngan du 'gyur gyis/ bdag gis rgyan 'di dag rdzing du dor ro snyam mo// de nas skye rgu'i bdag mtshan ma go'u ta mas rgyan
142b4(mdo sde): de dag rdzing du bor te deng sang du'ang rgyan gyi rdzing zhes ming du chags// de la'ang skad ces byas te/ gang tshe byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa dpa'o byung // de tshe ser skya'i grong khyer ba dag mtha' dag sang // kun
142b5(mdo sde): gyi snying la gzhon nu mal na nyal snyam du sems// mgu zhing rab tu dga' nas phan tshun tshig kyang smra// sa 'tsho ma dang / de bzhin btsun mo'i 'khor rnams sad // mal du bstas na byang chu
142b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' ma mthong nas/ kyi hud bdag bslus byang chub sems dpa' gar bzhud ces// rgyal po'i khyim du dud mo'i sgra yang byung bar gyur// rgyal pos sgra de thos nas sa la 'gyel gyur te// e ma nga
142b7(mdo sde): bu gcig pa zhes dud mo phyung // de nas de la bum pa'i chus blugs 'khrus byas nas/ shAkya mang po dag gis de'i dbugs kyang phyung // sa 'tsho ma yang mal nas sa la ltung bar gyur// sgra rnams 'bal
142b8(mdo sde): zhing rgyan rnams dag kyang bkrol bar gyur// sdug pa kun dang bral ba ring bar mi thogs shes/ 'dren pas bdag la sngon gsungs kye ma legs par gsungs// gzugs ni gzugs bzang zhing du dri med
143a1(mdo sde): yan lag slas dgas la zhing rnam dag 'gro ba rnams kyi yid 'ong sdug dpal yon ldan pa sngags pa lha mis mchod pa'i 'og/ bdag ni mal du bor te khyod na gang du bzhud/ 
143a2(mdo sde): yon tan mnga' ba'i byang chub ma mthong bar// skom yang mi 'tshal rgyags pa rnams kyis rgyags mi 'gyi/ sa la nyal zhing ral pa rnams kyang thogs par bgyi// khrus bgyi spangs te brtul zhugs
143a3(mdo sde): dkara' thub sbyang bar bgyi// skung mos cha la kun lo ma me tog 'bras ma mchis// rnam dag se mo do yang mun rdul phyag dar 'dra// mi mchog dam pa khyod kyi spangs par gang gyur pa'i// grong khyer khrims rnam
143a4(mdo sde): mdzes pa ma lags 'brogs dang mtshungs kyi hud glu dbyangs rab tu snyan pa'i sgra skad can/ kyi hud lhub lhub po'i rgyan thogs pa/ tsun mo'i 'khor/ kyi hud gser gyi dra bas khyab pa'i bar snang
143a5(mdo sde): yon tan ldan dang bral bas byin chad mo blta'o// u mi de yang shin tu sdug bsngal thob gyur cing // shAkya'i bu mo mdzu shig ces dbugs kyang 'byin// nga ni 'jig rten dag na rga shi thar
143a6(mdo sde): byed ces// mi mchog dam pa de yis sngon yang smras pa yin// drang srong chen po dge ba stong dag spyad pa de// nam phyed nas ni dpag tshad drug tu song gyur nas// 'dun pa de la rta mchog dang ni rgyan rnams gtang // du/ 
143a7(mdo sde): ba 'di dag khyer la ser skya'i grong song shig/ yab dang yum dag la yang nga yi tshig gis ni// gzhon nu song gis slar zhing thugs ngan ma mdzad cig/ byang chub sangs rgyas nas ni slar 'di mchi bar bgyi/ 
143a8(mdo sde): chos rnams gsan nas thugs kyang zhi bar 'gyur zhes sgrog// 'dun pa de bzhin 'dren pa la slar smras pa/ 'dun pa legs na byang chub sems dpa' gar khrid ces/ mi mchog gnyen gyi tshogs
143b1(mdo sde): nam bdag la rdeg 'gyur gyis dag la nus pa ma mchis stobs dang mthum mchis byang chub sems dpas slar smras 'dun pa ma 'jigs shig ngari gnyen tshogs rnams dga' bar gyur nas ni khyod la/ 
143b2(mdo sde): ston pa'i 'du shes rtag tu bsgoms 'gyur te// nga la byams pa bzhin du khyod la'ang byams par 'gyur// 'dun pa rta mchog dang ni rgyan rnams khyer na su// mi mchog dam pa de'i skyed mos tshal du phyin// 
143b3(mdo sde): skyed mos tshal gyi srungs ma dga' ba'i shugs skyes nas// kun tu dga'i sgra ni shAkya rnams la smras// gzhon nu 'di yi rta mchog dang ni 'dun pa yang / bskyed mos tshal du phyin gyis thugs ngan ma mdzad cig
143b4(mdo sde): rgyal pos de skad zas nas shAkyas bskor nas ni// rab tu dga' bra'i shugs ba skyes bskyed mos tshal du phyin// sa mchos byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan rig nas// tshig de la ni yid mches te dgar
143b5(mdo sde): ma gyur// gzhon nu byang chub ma thob bar du phyir 'dir yang // byon zhing ldog par 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin// rgyal po sa rta mchog dang ni 'dun pa de mthong nas// dud mos btab ste sa
143b6(mdo sde): steng du 'gyel bar gyur/ kyi hu dnga'i bu glu dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra mkhas// rgyal srid thams cad bor te khyod ni gang du song // 'du na pa khyod kyis nga la 'dir ni legs par smros// byang chub sems dpa'
143b7(mdo sde): gar song sbyor ba ci 'dra zhig/ sgo ni su yis phye zhing gang gis khrid par gyur// lha tshogs rnams kyis de la mchod pa ji ltar byas// 'dun pas smras pa// rgyal po'i dbang po bdag la gson// dgung byed
143b8(mdo sde): grong khyer byas pa rgan po gnyid log nas/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jams dbyangs bdag la 'di skad du// 'dun pas rta rgyal nga la myur du byin zhes gsungs// bdag gis skyes pa'i tshogs dang bung
144a1(mdo sde): med tshogs kyang ba bslang / de dag la gtsang rab tu lag pas tshigs pog/ bdagan du zhing bdas gis tshi kyi rgyal ba dzul khan 'amadzad pa gang du byas par gshegs shes
144a2(mdo sde): bgyig 'acushin kyangs khrul 'khor ldan pa'i chab slo/ 'jig rten srung ba bzhis na chings kyi rkang lag bteg dpa' bos bcibs nas stong gsus las rnams ra tu g.yos nam pa' shin tu yangs
144a3(mdo sde): ba'ajams gshegs gyur te/ 'od ni rab tu gtang bas mun pa sun na gsal/ me tog 'bab cing sil snyan brgya dag sgra yang byung / lha dang de bzhin lha'i bu mo rnams kyis stong // na mkha' las ni lha tshogs
144a4(mdo sde): mang pos bskor te gshegs/ 'dun pa rta mchog dang ni rgyan rnams khyer nasu// dan du zhing btsun ma'i 'khor du phyin pa dang / sa 'chos 'dun pa de dang rta mchog mthong gyur nas/ rab tu brgyal bar gyur te/ 
144a5(mdo sde): sa'i steng du 'gyel// bud med cho gas mang thams cad rab tu brtson par ni// chu dag blangs shing shAkya'i bu mo 'khru bar khyed mya ngan rnyed pas 'chi ba'i dus byed 'gyur du 'ong // phangs pa
144a6(mdo sde): gnyis dang bral bar 'gyur du 'ong snyam byed/ shAkya'i bu mo sdug bsngal gyur pa mthu skyed nas// rta'i rgyal po rta mchog de'i mgul nas 'jus// sngon chad dga' bas rtse ba dag kyang dran byas nas// ma
144a7(mdo sde): ngan gyur zhing sna tshogs tshig kyang rab tu smra/ kyi hud bdag gi do byed bad da sa mnga' ba// kyi hud bdag gis gzugs can gyi hud bdag gi mtshan mchog dri med gzi brjid ldan// kyi hud
144a8(mdo sde): bdag gi yan lag ma smad legs par 'khrugs pa rim gyis 'phags pa mnyam med ga kyi hud bdag gi yon tan mchog ldan lha mis mchod pa thugs rje chen po mchog ldan pa// kyi hud bdag
144b1(mdo sde): gi stobs ldan sred med bu yi mthu dang ldan pa dag yi tshogs bcom pa// kyi hud bdag gi shin tu 'jams dbyangs ka la bing ka'i sgra skad tshangs dbyangs snyan ldan pa/ kyi hud bdag gi grags pa mtha' ya
144b2(mdo sde): bsod nas brgyas 'phags bsod nams rgya chen mnga' ba bo// kyi hud bdag gi bsngags pa mtha' yas yon tan tshogs brgyan drang srong tshogs rnams dga' mdzad pa/ kyi hud bdag ginags mchog
144b3(mdo sde): zung ba sgra 'byin lum po ni der bltam pa legs bltas pa/ kyi hud bdag gi sgra grags lha mi rnams kyis mngon par mchod pa ye shes sdong po tsha// kyi hud bdag gi ro bro dam pa'i bis smros can pad ma'i
144b4(mdo sde): sman mngar gser mdog 'dra/ kyi hud bdag gi shin tu rnam dag tshems ldan pa zho ba mo lta bu'i tshems ldan pa/ kyi hud bdag gi shangs legs tha~M na legs smin mtshams bar na dri med mdzod su
144b5(mdo sde): gnas pa bo// kyi hud bdag gi dpung mgo rab zlum 'dra'i/ rked pa e na'i byin pa rkeng ba zlum/ kyi hud bdag gi glang / pho'i sna 'dra bar ldan phyag zhabs rnam dag mdzes pa'i senam
144b6(mdo sde): can/ de yi rgyan rnams 'di dag bsod nams dag gis byas pa rgyal po rab tu dga' byed pa// kyi hud bdag gi glu dang dbyangs sgra dam pa me tog byug pa bzangs pa'i dus bzang ba/ kyi hud bdag gi
144b7(mdo sde): me tog spos rnams glu len dag dang btsun mo'i 'khor ni dga' byed pa/ kyi hud bsngags ldan legs skyes nga yi khyim thab grogs po yin na khyod kyis gang du khrid// kyi hud 'dun pa snying rje med pa
144b8(mdo sde): mi yi dam pa bzhud tshe sgron zhing slong ma bod// do mod grong khyer dam pa 'di nas mi yi kha lo bsgyur ba thugs rje ldan gshegs te// phan pa mdzad pa 'di ni gshegs shes skabs der tshig gcig tsam
145a1(mdo sde): zhig ci yi phyir ma smras/ phan pa mdzad pa ji ltar gshegs shing rgyal po'i pho brang 'di nas su yis phyung ba byas// gang gi phyogs gshegs nags tshal gyel ba'i lha me de yi grogasu gyur
145a2(mdo sde): yon ldan/ 'dun pa kho mo shin tu sdug bsngal bter stan nas ni mig phyung 'dra bas mig byin cig/ 'dun pa rgyal ba kun gyi pha dang ma dag mchod pa'i 'os shes rtag tu bsngags mdzad na/ de dag rnams
145a3(mdo sde): kyang spangs te byung na bud med 'dod pa'i dka' ba 'di lta smos ci dgos// kyi hud sdug pa rnams dang bral ba gar la lta ba'i rang bzhin 'dra ste rtag ma yin// byis pa 'du shes kyis bzung lta ba phyin ci
145a4(mdo sde): log pas skye dang 'chi 'phoganas par gyur// de yis sngon chad rga shi ldan pa'i 'dus byas dag la grogs po 'ga' yang med ces stan// khyod kyis dgongs pa yongasu rdzogs nas shing mchog drung du
145a5(mdo sde): byang chub dam pa mchog thob gyur// rdul med byang chub sang / sa rgyas nas ni grong khyer dam pa 'dir ni slar yang gsheg/ su gsol// 'dun pa de yang mchog tu yid mi dga' zhing sa 'chi
145a6(mdo sde): ma yis tshig ni thos gyur nas// de ni nga ro 'don zhing tshig tu smras pas 'tsho ma khyod bdag tshig par gson// nam gyi gung thung bu da med tshogs rnams thams cad rab tu gnyid kyis logs ste
145a7(mdo sde): dben gyur pa// de'i tshe na bsod nams brgyas 'phags de yis bdag la bsngags ldan nga la byin zhes gsung // de skad tshig thos nas ni de ma thag tu bdag gis khyod ni gzims mal gzims la bltas// 
145a8(mdo sde): de tshe khyod kyi sdug pa 'di ni gshegs kyis sa 'tsho bzhengs shes sgra skad chen po phyung // lha yis tshig de bkag par gyur pas bud med rnams las dga' tsam zhig kyang sad ma gyur// bdag ni rab tu ngu/ 
145b1(mdo sde): zhing rta yi rgyal po brgyan pa bgyis nas mi mchog de la phul// sngags ldan drag shul can gyi gzi ldan sgra phyung de'i sgra ni rgyang grags tsam du grags// 'on kyang lha yis gnyid kyis log par bgyis pas grong
145b2(mdo sde): khyer pa las dgar yang sang ma gyur// gser dang dngul dang nor bu rnams kyis g.yogs pa'i sa la bsngags ldan rkang lag rab tu 'ardabs/ de la snyan dang 'jigs dang mdzes pa'i sgra byung 'on kyang mi
145b3(mdo sde): las dga' tsam sang ma gyur/ de yi bar skabs skar ma rgyal dang ldan gyur zla bskar ma dag kyang mkha' la gnas/ mkha' las lha rnams bye ba thal mo sbyar te btud nas phyag kyang rab tu 'tshal// gnod
145b4(mdo sde): sbyar srin po tshogs rnams nye bar gnas shing 'jig rten skyong ba rdzu 'phrul che ldan bzhis/ pad+ma'i ze ba lta bur rnam dag dri med lag pas bsngags ldan gyi ni rkang lag bteg/ bsod nams gaH
145b5(mdo sde): brjid brgyas 'phags de yang ku mu dang bar sha lta bur de la bcibs// sa ni rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos shing sangs rgyas zhing rnams dri med 'od kyis khyab/ bde sogs khyim thab pa
145b6(mdo sde): byin lha'i gtso bo nyid kyis de'i tshe chab sgo dbye ba bgyis de ni bye bo khrag khrig lha yis mdun du bdar te lha dang klu yis mchod nas gshegs// bsngags ldan gyis ni 'du shes tsam gyis de na 'jig rten
145b7(mdo sde): mgon po mkha' la bkur bar shes/ lha dang lha ma yin tshogs dbang por bcas pa de dag bcabs te bde ba gshegs pa gshegs/ lha'i bu mo glu dbyangs mkhas pa rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'
145b8(mdo sde): yon tan rab brjod cing / de dag bsngags ldan la yang stobs ma bu byed la snyan la yid du 'ong ba'i sgra yang 'byim bsngags ldan 'jig rten 'dren pa myur bar khyed la skyob mi dga' ma skyeng cag 'jig rten
146a1(mdo sde): mgon po mnyes par byas na khyod la 'jigs dang ngan song ngan 'gro med par 'gyur/ lha rnams re re zhing yang bdag la 'jig rten mgon po bcibs par mngon du dga' bar 'gyur// yulas
146a2(mdo sde): 'di na bye ba lha yi rkang pa dag gis non par ma gyur cung zad med/ bsngags ldan na mkha'i skabs na sna tshogs spras shing mdzes pa'i lam gnas rin chen stegs bu ni// rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis brgyan zhing
146a3(mdo sde): lha yi 'dug pa snying po mchog 'dugs 'di la ltos// bsngags ldan dge ba'i las 'dis sum cu rtsa gsum lha gnas shin du legs par sprul pa der// lha'i bu mos bskor zhing mdun gyis bltas
146a4(mdo sde): la lha'i 'dod pa'i dga' bas dga' bar gyis// legs par sa 'tshom khyod phyir zhing ma la shums dgyes par mdzes cing mchog tu dgyes par mdzod// mi mchog byang chub brnyes nas lha'i
146a5(mdo sde): mdun du bdar ba ring por mi thogs gzigs par 'gyur/ sa 'tsho mo rnams gang dag legs pa'i las bgyis de da ga rtag tu bshums par bgyi ma lags// de ni bsod nams gan
146a6(mdo sde): brjid brgyas 'phags lags kyis dgyes par mdzod la bshums mo ma mdzad cig rgyal po mngon par byung ba de na lha dang mi yis mchod pa'i bkod pa gang lags pa/ bkod pa de ni sa 'tsho bdag
146a7(mdo sde): gis dgung bdun par du brjod kyang rdzogs par brjod mi nus// khyod kyis 'gro la phan mdzad pa la bsnyen bkur mdzad pas brnyes mchog bsam gyis mi khyab rnyes/ bdag gis bsam+ba na khyod kyang mi
146a8(mdo sde): yi dam pa de ni ci 'dra de 'drar 'gyur snyam bgyid// mngon par 'byung ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// 'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po bcu gca
146b1(mdo sde): dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis/ 'dun pas rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang / shAkya'i bu mo mo mchom dang btsun mo'i 'khor thams cad dang / shAkya'i tshogs thams cad kyi
146b2(mdo sde): mya ngan gsang ba'i gtam smra so// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' lha'i bu rngon pa'i gzugs lta bu la gos ka shi pa rnams byin nas de las gos ngur smrig rnams blangs te/ 'jig rten dang / 
146b3(mdo sde): mthun par bya ba dang / sems can la snying brtse ba dang sems can yongasu smin par bya ba'i phyir bdag nyid rab tu byung ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' bram ze rig ldan gyi gnas ga la ba der
146b4(mdo sde): song ba dang / des byang chub sems dpa' gnas par bya ba dang / zas la mgron du bos so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' bram ze pad+ma'i gnas su song ba dang des kyang byang chub sems dpa'
146b5(mdo sde): gnas par bya ba dang zas la mgron du bos so// de nas bram ze'i drang song nam gru'i gnas su song ba dang des kyang de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' mgron du ba so// de bzhin du gdus
146b6(mdo sde): ba'i be con can gyi bu 'od ldan gyis kyang byang chub sems dpa 'a mgron du bos te// dge slong de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ri ma gyis grong khyer chen po yangs pa can du phyin to// de'i tshe sgyu rtsa la shA
146b7(mdo sde): kyi bu ring 'bur nyan thos kyi dge 'dun chen po slob ma sum brgya dang lhan cig tu grong khyer yangs pa can du gnas bcas shing gnas te/ de slob ma dag la ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi brtul zhugs
146b8(mdo sde): dang 'thun pa'i chos ston pa de byang chub sems dpa' rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/ slob ma rnams la smras pa/ kye 'di'i gzugs la ltos shig/ de dag gis smras pa/ de bzhin du de la
147a1(mdo sde): blta bar bgyis ste/ 'di ni ya mtshan che'o// dge slong dag de nas nga sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur ga la ba der song ste sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur la 'di skad ces smras// kye sgyu
147a2(mdo sde): rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur khyod las bad gis tshangs par spyad spyod do// des smras pa kye go'u ta ma dad pa'i rigs kyi bus gang la sbyad na chags pa chu dus kun shes pa thob par 'gyur ba'i chos bstan pa de
147a3(mdo sde): lta bu la spyod cig/ dge slong dag ngas 'di snyam du bsams te/ ngal mos pa yod// ngal brtson 'grus kyang yod/ dran pa yang yod ting nge 'dzin kyang yod/ shes rab kyang yod kyis/ chos de nyid thob par bya
147a4(mdo sde): ba dang / mngon du bya ba'i phyir bdag cig pu bag yod pa dang / brtul ba dang dben par gnas nas tshigs chung ngus chos de khong du chud cing mngon du gyur to// dge slong dag de nas nga sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'ju
147a5(mdo sde): ga la ba der song ste 'di skad ces smras// kye ring 'phur khyod kyis chos 'di tsam zhig khong du chud cing mngon du gyur tam de// sa smras pa kye go'u ta ma de bzhin no// ngas smras pa kye kho bos
147a6(mdo sde): kyang chos de mngon du byas shing khong du chud do// des smras pa kye go'u ta ma de bas na chos gang kho bos shes pa de khyod kyis shes la/ gong khyod kyis shes pa de yang kho bos shes te de bas na bdag cag
147a7(mdo sde): gnyis kas slob ma'i tshogs 'di la stan to// dge slong dag de nas sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring 'phur gyis/ nga la mchod pa dam pas mchod de/ nga slob ma rnams la yang don mthun par byed du bcug go// dge
147a8(mdo sde): slong dag ngas 'di snyam du bsams te/ ring 'bur gyi chos 'di ni nges par 'byung ba ma yin te de byed pa yang dag par sdug bsngal zad par 'byung ba ma yin gyis/ bdag gis de las lhag pa zhig
147b1(mdo sde): 'chal ning byung ngasum po dge slong dag de nas nga ji srid dga' 'a 'grong khyer yangs pa can du gnas nas yul sa gdung yul rgyu gang / yul ma ga du rgyal ba'i khab sa grong khyer chen po ga la ba ma
147b2(mdo sde): rab rgyal ba skye ba ga la ba der mngan sa po rgyal brgyam sa pa gcig bu gnasu med cing gros med pa sa byeb khrag khrig ba rtse stong phrag dums bsrung shing gnas/ de nas ngarang bar sham tha bas da
147b3(mdo sde): chos gos bgos lhung byed sogs te/ chu dron can bya sgo nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por 'gro ba dang / ldog pa dang mdun du blta ba dang g.yas phyogs su blta ba dang bskus pa dang btung ba mdzes pa
147b4(mdo sde): dang / snam sbyar dang zang ba dang lhung zed dang / chos gos 'dzin pa ma dzes pa dang dbang po g.yengs pa dang / sprul pa bzhin du yod phyi rol du ma byung ba 'bru mer gyis gang ba'i snong thogs pa bzhin gnya'
147b5(mdo sde): zhing gang tsam du blta zhing bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhug so// de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi mi rnams kyis mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/ ci 'di tshangs pa yin nam/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam
147b6(mdo sde): 'on te rnam thos kyi bu 'am 'on to ra'i lha dga' zhig yin nam snyam mo// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ de nas gzi brjid mtha' yas dri med ldan/ byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid rab 'byung ste/ sems
147b7(mdo sde): mazhi zhing spyod lam rab dul bar// ri'i rgyal po skye bo'i ngos la gnas/ byang chub sems dpa' nam nangs shes nas mi mchog tu bltan mdzes par sham thabs bgos/ lhung zed thogs te dpa' ba'i
147b8(mdo sde): yid kyisu da ni rgyal po'i khab du bsod snyoms zhugs// gser gyis le sbram bzhin ra 'dul la/ sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyi go bgos la/ skyes pa'i tshogs dang bud med kyis mthong na/ su yang
148a1(mdo sde): lta bas ngoms par mi 'gyuraro// srang dag rin chen gos dang 'brus kyang brgyan gang gi mthus ni grong khyer kun mdzes pa'i// sngon chad ma mthong sems can 'di su zhes/ skye ba sel
148a2(mdo sde): zhing de yi phyi bzhin 'brang // bud med stong dag khang pa'i steng 'dug cing // de bzhin sgo dang de bzhin skar khung dang / srang dag bkang ste khyim ni stong byas nas/ de dag las gzhan med par mi mchog lta// skyes
148a3(mdo sde): bu mchog gi gzugs la lta ba'i tshe// nyo dang 'tshong pa dag kyang mi byed cing // chang dang can dang chang ni mi 'thung la/ khyim dang srang na 'dug par mi dga'o// rings par mi zhig rgyal po'i khab song ste/ de dag
