148a4(mdo sde): rgyal po gzugs can snying po la// grong 'dir tshangs pa bdag nyid bas ngasgoms spyod// lha khyod brnyes pa dam pa brnyes shes zer// kha cig brgya byin lha'i rgyal zhes zer// gzhan dag 'thab
148a5(mdo sde): bral lha'i bu zhes zer// de bzhin yongasu dga' ldan 'phrul ba dang // gzhan dag rab 'phrul lha'i bu zhes zer kha cig nyi ma zla ba de bzhin du/ sgra gcan stobs ldan thag bzangs ris shes zer/ 
148a6(mdo sde): kha cig dag ni tshig kyang 'di skad du/ ri rgyal skya la 'dug pa 'di yin zer/ rgyal pos tshig ni de dag zos gyur nas/ yid ni mchog tu dga' zhing skar khung 'dug shin tu spangs pa'i gser ltar dpal 'bar ba/ 
148a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems can mchog mthong ngo // rgyal po gzugs can snying pos mi de la/ bsod snyoms byin la gar song ltos shes bsgo/ ri yi mchog la de ni song mthong nas/ lha cig ri yi ngos la
148a8(mdo sde): demachos smras/ gzugs can snying pos nas nangs shes nas ni/ mi dbang skye bo mang pos yongs bskor te/ ri'i rgyal po skye bo'i drung du song / ri de dpal ni rab tu 'bar bar mthong // gzhon pa las ni babs te
148b1(mdo sde): rkang gis song / ji ltar lhun po bzhin du mi g.yo zhing / rtswa bting steng na bskyil mo krung 'dug pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu gus pas mthong // rgyal pos rkang par mgo bos phyag byas te/ rnam pa sna tshom
148b2(mdo sde): dgis gtam byas nas// khyod la rgyal srid kun gyi phyed sprin gyis 'dod pa'i yon tan 'di spyod ma 'phyan smras// byang chub sems dpas 'jam po'i tshig smras pa/ sa'i bdag po yun ring tshe srungs shig/ kho bos
148b3(mdo sde): rgyal srid sdug pa bor nas su// re ba med par zhi por rab tu byung // gzhon nu thur bu dar la bab dang ldan// lus kyi kha dog mdzes shing shugs ldan na// nor mang dag dang bud med tshogs bzhes te// bdag gi rgyal
148b4(mdo sde): srid 'dir zhugs 'dod pa spyod// ma ga d+ha yis rgyal pos byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa// bdag khyod mthong bas mchog tu dga'/ bdag gi rgyal srid kun gyi grogs mdzod cig/ bdag ni khyod la
148b5(mdo sde): mang dbul 'dod pa spyod// nags tshal stong pa dag dum bzhugs shig slad rangs gnas rtsa steng ma bzhugs shig khyod kyi skun mchog tu rab tu gzhom// bdag gi rgyal srid 'di
148b6(mdo sde): bzhugs 'dod pa spyang // byang chub sems dpas 'jam zhing gya gyu mang // dga' 'gyur ba na zhing snying rtse tshig smras pa/ rgyal po khyod na rtag tu bkra shis gyur// za bo 'dod pa'i yon tan mi 'dod do// 
148b7(mdo sde): 'dad pa drug 'dra nyos pa mtha' yas ldan sems can dmyal dang yid dgas dud 'gror lhung // mkhas pas smad cing 'dod la 'phags ma yin// kho bas ngar snabs rul pa bzhin du bor// 'dod pa shing
148b8(mdo sde): gi 'bras bu bzhin du lhung ji sa smin rje bzhin du 'gro mo brten 'gyur la ji ltar rlung bzhin 'gro/ dge ba thams cad rnam par mthor zhing sku// de bzhin 'dod pa mi rnyed phyir yang gdungs/ rnyed du zin kyang chog
149a1(mdo sde): bar 'dzin mi 'gyur// gang tshe dbang med ma rung rab 'gyur ba/ de tshe 'dod pa sdug bsngal drag chen skyed// rgyal po lha'i 'dod pa gang yin dang // mi'i 'dod pa
149a2(mdo sde): bzang po gang yin pa'i// 'dod pa thams cad mi cig gis thos kyang // de la mchog pa med de yang tshol lo// rgyal po gang dag zhi zhing dul gyur pa// 'phags pa zag med chos kyi 'du shes
149a3(mdo sde): gang // shes rab mkhas pas chog pa de legs cho ga/ 'dod pa'i yon tan chog pa cung zad med// rgyal po 'dod pa dag la bsten byas shing // sngon chad 'dus byas pa yi mtha' ma med// ji
149a4(mdo sde): ltar mi dag lan tshwa'i chu 'thungs bzhin// 'dod pa sten na phyir zhing sred pa 'phel// rgyal po lus la yang ltos de mi brtan// snying po med sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor bzhin/ bu ga dgu yi sgo nas
149a5(mdo sde): rtag tu 'dzag rgyal po kho bo 'dong ba'i 'dod chags med// kho bos 'dod pa mang dang de bzhin du// blta na sdug pa'i bud meng stong bor te// mchog bzhi byang chub dam pa thob 'ad
149a6(mdo sde): nas/ kho bos sred par mi dga' nges par byung // dge slong phyogs ni gang dang gang nas byon// gang du khyod skyes yab yum gang na bzhugs// rgyal rigs lags sam bram ze 'am rgyal po lags// 
149a7(mdo sde): dge slong khur gyi 'du shes med na gsungs// rgyal po shAkya rnams kyi ser skya'i grong / mchog tu 'byor zhing rgyas pa thob gyur tam// kho bo'i pa yi ming ni zas gtsang yin// yon tan 'dod pas
149a8(mdo sde): kho bo de rab byung // khyod mthong leg par mthong ste legs pa lags/ gang las khyod skyes bdag kyang de'i slob ma// 'dod chags bral bar 'dod pas spyan drangs pa// thugs nas bdag la bzod pa
149b1(mdo sde): mngang du gsol gang ma rgyad kyis byang chub zhes gyur tshe/ chos rjes bdag la tshas kyi bgob shA mdzod / ra 'byung ba dag gi yul na bzhugs pa'i bdagagis mchog rnyed par ba rnyed da/ 
149b2(mdo sde): nas kyang ni rkang par phyag byas te/ rgyal pos shin tu gus par bskor byas nas/ mi dbang rang gi skye bos yongs bskor te// slar yang rgyal po'i khab tu zhugs par 'gyur/ 'jig rten mgon po
149b3(mdo sde): ma ga d+ha yi grong zhugs te// ji srid 'dod par zhi ba'i yid kyis 'dug lha dang mi rnams kyi don byas nas/ mi dbang ni ran ji ne'i chu 'gram song // gzugs can snying po 'ongs pa'i le'u zhes
149b4(mdo sde): bya ste/ bcu drug pa'o// / dge slong dag yang de'i tshe rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod// rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gnas bcas nas// slob ma'i tshogs chen po slob ma
149b5(mdo sde): bdun brgya dang lhan cig tu gnas te de de dag la 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi brtul zhugs dang mthun pa'i chos ston to// dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' rangs
149b6(mdo sde): byed kyi cag spyod tshogs dang ldan/ tshogs can tshogs kyi slob dpon grags pa/ mngon par 'dod pa skye bo mang pos mchod pa mkhas pa kun gyis shes pa mthong mthong nas kyang 'di snyam
149b7(mdo sde): du sems te/ rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod 'di tshogs dang ldan pa tshogs can tshogs kyi slob dpon grags pa mngon par 'dod pa/ skye bo mang pos mchod pa mkhas pa kun gyis shes pa yin na/ ga
149b8(mdo sde): te bdag de'i drung du song ste/ brtul zhugs dang dka' thub ma brtsams na ni 'di dag la khyad par du 'phags pa'i 'du shes kyang mi skyed la/ mngon sum gyi shes pas kyang shes par mi 'gyur
150a1(mdo sde): dang / 'dus byas zag pa dang bcas pa nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'i bsam gtan dang / ting 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dag kyang sun phyung bar ma gyur te gang gis na de
150a2(mdo sde): la bsam gtan gyi spyod yul dag dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i dmigs pa dag mngon sum du 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten pa'i ting 'dzin dag kyang 'byung ba ma yin par bstan par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i
150a3(mdo sde): thabs shig bstan par bya 'am bdag rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod kyi drung du song ste bdag gi ting nge 'dzin gyi yon tan gyi khyad par bstan pa'i phyir de'i slob mar khas blangs la/ 'das pas kyi ting 'dzin snying
150a4(mdo sde): bo med par bstan par bya 'am snyamo// dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpas don de'i dbang du byas te/ rangs byed kyi bu lhag sprong ga la der song nas phyin pa dang / rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod la 'di skad
150a5(mdo sde): ces smraso// grogs po khyod kyi ston pa ni su zhig su chos bstan pa kun shes de skad ces smras pa dang / rangs byed kyi bu lkog/ spyod kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces smras so// 
150a6(mdo sde): grogs po kho bo la ston pa gang yang med de 'on kyang kho bo rang gis 'di yang dag par khong du chud do// byang chub sems dpas smras pa khyod kyis ci khong du chud smras pa 'du shes med 'du shes med min
150a7(mdo sde): skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i lam mo// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ bdag gis khyod la ting 'dzin gyi lam gyi gdam ngag dang rje su bstan pa thob par 'chalo// smras pa de ltar bya'o/ 
150a8(mdo sde): bya ba nas gdam ngag byin pa'i bar du'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyogs gcig tu song ste/ bskyil mo krung bcas nas 'dug go// 'dug ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi khyad par dang
150b1(mdo sde): ye shes kyi khyad par dang / sngon spad pa legs par spyad pa'i 'bras bu'i khyad par dang / de sems la dbang sgyur ba'i phyir/ bsam gtan la sogs pa 'jig rten pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
150b2(mdo sde): brgya stong thams cad rnam pa dang bcas bye brag dang bcas par mngon sum du gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' dran pa dang shes bzhin du stan las langs te rangs byed kyi bu lhag skrod ga/ 
150b3(mdo sde): la ba der song nas byin pa dang / rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod la 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lam las gong na gzhan dga' zhig yod dom
150b4(mdo sde): des smras pa med do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te lhag spyod 'ba' zhig la dad pa yod pa dang brtson 'grus dang dran pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab yod pa ma yin gyi
150b5(mdo sde): bdag la yang dad pa dang / brtson 'grus dang dran pa dang ti nga nge 'dzin dang / shes rab yod do snyam mo de nas byang chub sems dpas rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod la 'di skad ces smra
150b6(mdo sde): so 'a grogs po khyod gang du nges par byung ba'i chos de kho bos kyang khong du chud do// des smras pa de bas 'dod khyod dang kho bos tshogs 'di dag rjesu bslab zhes/ byang chub sems dpa' don mthun
150b7(mdo sde): ba dang slob dpon gyi gnasu gzhag go// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ grogs po lam 'di ni yid 'byung bar 'gyur ba ma yin 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ba ma yin 'gogs par 'gyur
150b8(mdo sde): ba ma yin nye bar 'gyur ba ma yin/ mngon par shes par 'gyur ba ma yin/ rdzogs par byang chub par 'gyur ba ma yin dge sbyong nyid du 'gyur ba ma yin/ mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba ma yin// 
151a1(mdo sde): dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpas lhag spong slob ma dang bcas pa 'dun par byas nas de tsam gyis chog go zhes bya ba nas/ chog par byas te song ba'i bar du'o// de'i
151a2(mdo sde): tshe lnga sde bzang po rangs byed mi rgyad ma ma sbed pa de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag gis 'di'i phyir yun ring por btsal zhing brtson par byas kyang mtha' dang mu khong du chud par ma nus kyi
151a3(mdo sde): dge slong go'u ta mas tshogs chung ngus khong du chud cing mngon du byas la/ de de yang mi 'dod cing de las gong du tshol ba las the tshom med par de ni 'jig rten gyi ston par 'gyuro// gang des mngon
151a4(mdo sde): du byed par 'gyur ba de bdag cag la yang bged par 'gyur ro snyam// de ltar dpyad nas lnga sde bzang po rangs byed kyi bu lhag sprod kyi drang nas dong ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i pi zhin 'brang ngo // dge
151a5(mdo sde): slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ji srid dga' ba'i bar du rgyal po'i kha tu gnas nas lnga ste bzang po dang lha na cig tu yul ma ga d+har yul rgyu zhing song ngo // yang de'i tshe
151a6(mdo sde): rgyal po'i khab dang ri ga ya'i bar na tshogs gzhan dag cig dus ston byed de/ tshogs pa de dag gis kyang byang chub sems da pa' lnga ste bzang po dang lhan cig tu gnas par bya ba dang / zas
151a7(mdo sde): la mgron du bos so// dge slong de nas byang chub sems dpa' yul ma ga d+har yul rgyu zhing yul ma ga d+ha'i ri ga ya ga la ba der song ste der phyin par gyur to// ri ga ya'i rtse me der yang byang chub
151a8(mdo sde): sems dpa' spong ba'i phyir gnas te de de ltar gnas pa'i sngon ma thos pa dang sngon mi shes pa'i dpe gsum mngon du gyur to// gsum gang zhe na dge sbyong dang bram ze gang la la 'dod pa dag las
151b1(mdo sde): lus dben par mi gnas/ 'dod pa dag la sems dben par mi gnas shing de dag 'dod pa la dpa' ba dang 'dod pa la chags pa dang / 'dod pa la 'dun pa dang 'dod pa la skom pa dang / 'dod pa la
151b2(mdo sde): yongasu gdung ba dang 'dod pa la zhen pa gang yin pa de nye bar zhi ba ma yin la de dag bdag nyid kyis gnod pa byed cing lus la gdung bar byed pas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba drag po chu ba myong ste/ 
151b3(mdo sde): 'on kyang de dag mi'i chos bla ma las mchog tu gyur pa/ 'phags pa ye shes mthong ba'i khyad par mngon du byed mi nu so// 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu zhig me 'dod la shIngang+ga rlon pa'i bcub shing thog
151b4(mdo sde): la chur bcug ste btsubs na des me phyin par mi nusaso// de bzhin du dge sbyong dang bram ze de dag 'dod pa rnams las lus dpe na par mi gnas/ 'dod pa rnams las sems dben par mi
151b5(mdo sde): gnas te/ de dag gi 'dod pa la dga' ba dang / 'dod pa la srid pa dang 'dod pa la 'dun pa dang 'dod pa la sgom pa dang 'dod pa la yongs su gdungs pa dang / 'dod pa la bas
151b6(mdo sde): pa dang 'dod pa la zhen pa gang yin pa de ni nye bar zhi ba ma yin gyi de dag bdag nyid kyis gnod par byed cing lus la gdung bar byed pas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba drag po ma zad pa tsha ba myong mod kyi
151b7(mdo sde): 'on kyang de dag mi'i chos bla ma las mchog tu gyur pa 'phags pa ye shes mthong ba'i khyad par mngon du byed mi nus snyam ste 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' la dpe mngon du gyur pa dang po'o// 
151b8(mdo sde): yang de 'di snyam du sems te gang dge sbyong dang bram ze 'di dag 'dod pa rnams las lus dang sems dben par gnas kyang de dag 'dod pa la dga' ba zhes bya ba nas me tshol ba zhes bya
152a1(mdo sde): ba'i bar du thams cad snga ma bzhin du sbyar te/ des shing rlon pa'i gtsu ba stan thogs la thang la bzhag ste shing rlon pa'i gtsubra shing gis gtsubs na des me byin par mi nus/ 
152a2(mdo sde): de bzhin du gang dge sbyong dang bram ze 'di dag ces bya ba nas thams cad snga ma bzhin du sbyar te mi'i chos bla ma las mchog tu gyur pa 'phags pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i khyad par mngon du bya bar
152a3(mdo sde): mi nuso// snyam ste 'di ni sngon ma thos shing mi shes pa'i dpe mngon du gyur pa gnyis pa'o// gzhan yang gang dge sbyong dang bram ze 'di dag 'dod pa rnams las lus dang / sems dben par gnas
152a4(mdo sde): shing de dag gi 'dod pa la dga' ba zhes bya ba nas thams cad de bzhin du sbyar te de dag gi ni nye bar zhi ba yin te de dag bdag nyid kyis gnod par byed cing lus la gdung bar byed pas sdug bsngal
152a5(mdo sde): gyi tshor ba drag po ma zad pa myong mod kyi de dag mi'i chos bla ma los mchog tu gyur pa 'phags pa'i ye shes mngonadu mthong ba'i khyad par mngon du bya bar nuso// 'ad lta ste dper
152a6(mdo sde): na skyes bu zhig me 'dod cing 'od 'dod pa dang 'od tshol bar gyur la des shing skam po'i gtsubs stan dang gtsubs shing thogs shing thang la bzhag ste/ gtsubs na des me 'byung ba dang 'od
152a7(mdo sde): 'bar bar byed nuso// de bzhin du gang dge sbyong dang bram ze 'di dag ces bya ba nas/ tshor ba myong zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin te/ 'on kyang de mi'i chos bla ma las mchog tu gyur pa 'phags pa'i
152a8(mdo sde): ye shes mthong ba'i khyad par mngon du bya bar nus snyam ste/ 'di ni sngon ma thos shing sngon mi shes pa'i dpe gsum pa'o// dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' de ji snyam du sems te bdag kyang
152b1(mdo sde): ltar 'dod pa rnams las lus dben par gnas/ 'dod pa rnams las sems dben par gnas la/ bdag gi 'dod pa las dga' ba zhes bya ba nas thams cad snga ma bzhin du sbyar te bdag gi de yang nye bar
152b2(mdo sde): zhi ba yin la bdag nyid kyis gnod pa byed cing lus la gdung bar byed pas/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba nas tshor ba myong zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar te 'on kyang bdag mi'i chos bla ma las mchog tu
152b3(mdo sde): gyur 'phags pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i khyad par mngon du bya bar nuso snyamo// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ji srid dga' ba'i bar du ga ya'i ri ra ga ya'i rtse mo la gnas de rkang gis yul
152b4(mdo sde): rgyu zhing sde dpon gyi grong lteng rgyas ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / de krung ner dza na chu gsal ba 'bab stegs bdeg shing dang shing grel pa mdzes pa de dag gis brgyan pa nye 'khor na spyod yul gyi
152b5(mdo sde): grong yod pa mthong ste de la byang chub sems dpa' yid shin tu dga' bar gyur nas/ 'di snyam du sems te/ e ma 'os phyon/ sa 'di ni mnyam zhing nyams dga' ba nang du yang dag 'jog
152b6(mdo sde): dang mthun pa ste rigs kyi bu spong ba don du gnyer ba la ni 'das chog go bdag kyang spong ba don du gnyer ba yin gyis bdag 'di nyid du gnas par bya'o snyam// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' 'ang
152b7(mdo sde): snyam du sems te bdag ni 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir snyigs ma lnga'i dus la bab cing // sems can rnams dman pa la mos pa dang mu stegs can gyi sdes gang ba dang lta ba sna tshogs la zhugs pa dang lus la
152b8(mdo sde): ril por 'dzin pa la zhen pa'i tshe 'ongs te blun po dag gdung bas yongasu gdung ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis dag pa tshol zhing ston pa 'di lta ste sngags spyod pa dang / lags pa la ldag pa dang / mi slong ba dang
153a1(mdo sde): / mas rtsa bdum za ba dang sha dang nya mi za ba dang dbyar mi 'byung ba dang / chang dang phub ma dang chu longasu spangs pa dang khyim gcig dang gsung lnga dang 'dun nas zas len pa dang
153a2(mdo sde): bu dang nya lcibs pa dang rtswa ku sha dang lo ma dang ba'ang gi lci ba dang ba'i gcin dang 'o thug dang zho dang mar dang bu ram dang ma btags pa za zhing mthung ba dang bya dngang pa dang / bug ron gyis zos te bor ba bkrus
153a3(mdo sde): te za ba dang so rang gnas 'tshe ba dang ba lang gi brtul zhugs dang ri dgas dang khyi dang 'phag dang / spreru dang glang po che'i brtul zhugs dang 'greng ba dang / mau smra ba dang dpa' bo'i tshul du 'dugs pa dge/ 
153a4(mdo sde): kham cig za ba dang kham bdun gyi bar du za ba dang zas lan cig za ba dang nyin zhag cig dang bzhi dang / lnga dang drag gi skabasu za ba dang zla ba phyed dang zla ba gcig zad par byed pa dang zla ba la lta ba dang
153a5(mdo sde): bya rgod dang 'ug pa'i gshogs pa thogs pa dang shing le dang rtsa mun dza dang zar ma'i shun pa dang rtsa dur ba dang / gres ma dang lnga bal gyi la ba dang / ra bal gyi la ba dang sgra'i la
153a6(mdo sde): ba dang / ko lpags gyon pa dang / gos gsher pa dang stegs bu'i steng dang / chu'i nang na nyal ba dang thal ba dang rdo dang gyo mo dang shing leb dang tsher ma dang rtswa dang / gtum shing gi steng du nyal
153a7(mdo sde): ba dang mgo thur du bstan pa dang / tsog tsog por 'dug pa dang thang lanyas pa dang gas cag dang / gos gnyis dang gsum dang bzhi dang / lnga dang drag dang bdun dang / gos mang po srel ba dang / gcer bur 'dug pa dang
153a8(mdo sde): 'khru ba dang mi 'khru ba'i cho ga can dang / skra dang sen mo dang / ag chom ring por 'jog pa dang / ral pa'i thor tshugs 'chang ba dang / rgya shugs dang til dang 'bras 'bru cig za ba dang thal ba dang / tshwa dang
153b1(mdo sde): me tog spyang spyod pa dang rtal 'bul ba dang rdul nag po dang phyag ngar ba dang rdzab kyis lus la skud pa dang baspu dang / mi'i thod pa dang skra dang sen mo dang / chal bu'i smad g.yogs dang rdzab dang keng rus thogs pa dang
153b2(mdo sde): chu dron po dang 'bras kyi khu ba dang la bar bsags pa dang khrud ma 'thung pa dang / mngag ma dang tshon rtsi dang tshon ngur smrig dang / khar ba gsum dang mgo 'dreg pa dang ril ba dang mi'i thong pa dang khri'i zur shing
153b3(mdo sde): 'chang bas blun po rnams dag par khong du chud do// rdub rngub pa dang me rngub pa dang / nyi ma lta ba dang gdung ba lnga byed pa dang / rkang pa cig pa dang / lag thacig stong pa dang rkang pa cig bcugs pa dang / gnas
153b4(mdo sde): na 'dug pas dka' thub sogs pa dang / pub ma la sogs pa dang dmangag ma sdig pa dang bum pa bsregs pa dang rdo sregs pa dang // me 'bar bar 'jug pa dang zas mi za dang mya ngan dang 'bab
153b5(mdo sde): stegasu song ste shi bas sdug pa'i 'gro ba tsholo// rab bsngags shes bya ba dang gzhi mi 'grib pa zhes bya ba dang / gzhi srung zhes bya ba dang gzhi tshugs shes bya ba dang smon lam dang bston
153b6(mdo sde): ba dang / sbyin sreg dang dbab pa dang / sngags kyi bzlas brjod dang klag pa 'dzin zhing byed pas dag par khong du chud do// bdag dag par sems shing de dag la rten te 'di lta ste tshangs pa dang dbang po dang / 
153b7(mdo sde): gu lang dang khyab 'jug dang lha mo dang / gzhon nu dang ma mo dang ka t+ya'i bu dang zla ba dang nyi ma dang / rnam thos kyi bu dang chu lha dang nor can gyi bu dang tha skar gyi bu dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lga
153b8(mdo sde): ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang srin po dang / 'byung po dang / grul bum dang / yi dwags dang 'khor dang / tshogs dang mtshun dang / sha za dang lha'i drang srong dang rgyal po'i
154a1(mdo sde): drang srong dang tshangs pa'i drang srong dag la phyag 'tshal zhing de dag la snying por sheso// sa dang chu dang me dang / rlung dang na mkha' la yang rten ri dang ri sul dang / klu la chu mig dang mchod
154a2(mdo sde): mtshe'u dang rdzing dang rgya mtsho dang / lteng ka dang khron pa dang rdzing bu dang / shing dang shing gel pa dang / 'khri shing dang rtsa dang sdong dum dang lha dang dur khrod dang / bzhi mdo dang sum mdo dang srang dag la yang
154a3(mdo sde): rten to// khang pa dang / ka ba dang rdo dang tho ba dang / ral gri dang gzhu dang dag lta dang mnga' dang / mdung thung dang rtse gsum pa dag la yang phyag 'tsha'o// zho dang mar dang yungs kar dang nas dang / shing bal gyi
154a4(mdo sde): phreng ba dang rtsa dur ba dang nor bu dang / gser dang dngul la sogs pa bkra shis par 'dzin to// gzhan mu stegs can 'di dag 'khor bas 'jigs skrag nas rnam pa de lta bu dag byed cing rten to// 'di ni
154a5(mdo sde): kha cig bdag gi mtho ris dang thar pa yang 'di lta bu 'di dag las 'grub po snyam du sems te/ de lta ba log pa'i lam/ du song bas skyabs ma yin pa la skyabasu 'du shes shing bkra
154a6(mdo sde): shis ma yin pa la bkra shis par 'du shes la dag pa ma yin pa la dag par sems kyis bdagis ci nas kyang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad cher bcad par 'gyur ba dang sems can las dang bya ba chud
154a7(mdo sde): zos pa rnams kyi las dang bya ba chud mi za ba bstan par bya ba dang gzugs na spyod pa'i lha bsam gtan spyod yul ba rnams la bsam gtan gyi khyad par bstan pas 'dun par byed pa de lta bu'i brtul
154a8(mdo sde): zhugs dang dka' thub kyi khyad par brtsam mo snyamo// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpas de snyam du bsam nas lo drug du brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub shin tu drag zo shin tu spyad par dka' ga
154b1(mdo sde): shin tu spang bar dka' ba dka' ba spyad pa brtsamaso// ci'i phyir dka' ba spang pa zhes bya zhe na de ni smad par bka' ba ste de bas na dka' ba spyad pa zhes bya ste byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma gang bsam
154b2(mdo sde): gtan mkha' khyab la snyoms par zhugs pa ma gtogs par sems can gyi ris na mi 'am miHyin pa sus kyang dka' bar spyad pa de lta bu spyod par nus pa med do ci'i phyir mkha' khyab ces bya zhe na
154b3(mdo sde): de dang po nyid du bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshe dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba nye bar 'gog kun tu 'gog ste bsam gtan de ni rtog pa med rnam par rtog pa med/ g.yo ba med sems pa
154b4(mdo sde): med 'gyur ba med cing thams cad rje su song ba thams cad la/ mi rten pa ste bsam gtan de la sngon slob pa 'am rang sangs rgyas sam/ spyod pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
154b5(mdo sde): sus kyang snyoms par ma zhug so// mkha' zhes bya ba ni namakhar ste/ khyab par ma byed pa byed pa med pa rnam par mi 'thor ba ste/ des thams cad khyab par byed pas na bsam gtan de napa
154b6(mdo sde): mkha' dang snyam pa ste de bas na mkha' khyab ces bya'o// dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten rnams la ngo mtshar yang dag par bstan par bya ba dang / mu stegs can rnams kyi rgyags pa
154b7(mdo sde): gzhil ba dang phas kyi rgol ba rnams tshar bcad pa dang lha rnams 'dun pa bar bya ba dang sems can chad pa dang rtag par smra ba las dang bya ba chungad zos pa rnams las dang bya ba la gzud pa dang / bsod nams
154b8(mdo sde): kyi 'bras bu brjod pa dang ye shes kyi 'bras bu brjod pa dang / ye shes kyi 'bras bu yang dag par bstan pa dang bsam gtan gyi yan lag rnam par dbye ba dang lus kyi stobs dang mthu yang dag par
155a1(mdo sde): bstan pa dang sems kyi dpa' ba yang dag par bskyed pa'i phyir byi dor ma byas pa'i tha mal par skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug go// 'dug nas kyang rang gi lus sems kyis tsar gcad cing
155a2(mdo sde): gzir to// dge slong dag de nas nga dgun gyi brgyad pa'i nub mo// de ltar lus tshar gcad cing gzir bas mchan khung nas kyang rdul phyung ste zags// dpral ba nas kyang rdul phyung ste zags nas sa la lhung
155a3(mdo sde): ste zil bar chags nas dro zhing rlangs pa byung ngo // 'di lta ste dper na skyes pa stobs dang ldan pas skyes bu shin tu nyams chung ba zhig mgrin pa nas bzung ste btsir ba de bzhin du dge slong dag lus 'di
155a4(mdo sde): sems kyis tshar gcad cing btsir na mchan khung nas kyang rdul thung zags/ dbral ba nas kyang rdul byung zhing zags nas sal lhung ste/ zil bar chags nas dro zhing rlangs pa byung ngo // dge slong
155a5(mdo sde): dag de nas ngas 'di snyam du bsam te bdag gis bsam ga/ tan mkha' khyab la bsam gtan du bya'o snyam nas/ dge slong dag de nas ngas bsam gtan mkha' khyab la bsam
155a6(mdo sde): gtan du byas pa dang / kha dang sna nas dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba 'gags par 'gyur te rna ba'i bug gnyis nas sgra drag po sgra chen po byung // 'di lta ste dper na skud pa bus pa'i tshe sgra drag po sgra chen po 'byung
155a7(mdo sde): bde bzhin du dge slong dag kha dang sna nas dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba 'gags par gyur pa dang / rna ba'i bu ga gnyis nas sgra drag po dang sgra chen po byung ngo // dge slong de nas ngas 'di snyam du sems te/ yang
155a8(mdo sde): ngag gis bsam gtan mkha' khyab la bsam gtan du bya'o snyam pa dang / de nas nga'i kha dang rna ba 'gags par gyur to de dag 'gags pa dang rlung gong du mgo' thod pa la gnod par gyur to// dge slong
155b1(mdo sde): dag 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu zhig gis mdung thung rtul pos mgo'i thod pa la btab pa de bzhin du dge slong dag kha dang sna dang rna ba'i dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba 'gags pa dang / gong du mgo'i thong pa
155b2(mdo sde): la gnod par gyur to// der lha'i bu gcig gis byang chub sems dpa' na ba de mthong nas 'di skad ces smraso// e ma'o kyi hud gzhon nu don grub 'di 'tsho ba'i dus byas so// gzhan zhig gis 'di
155b3(mdo sde): skad ces smras so// 'di 'chi ba'i dus byas ma yin gyi dgra bcom pa bsam gtan la gnas pa rnams kyi tshul de lta bu'o zhes smras nas de'i tshe chegasu bcad pa 'di dag smraso// mi yi dbang po shAkya
155b4(mdo sde): sras po 'di/ brnag pa ma rdzogs don kyang ma mdzad cing // 'jig rten gsum po sdug bsngal mgon med par// mdzad nas mgron 'dir grongs par mi 'gyur grangs/ kye hud sems can snying po
155b5(mdo sde): thugs dam brtan/ mgon pos sngon chad dga' ldan du/ dam chos sbyin la ni mgron du bos// sems can dag zla/ da dam bcas de ga re// de nas lha de sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha
155b6(mdo sde): nang du song ste/ lha mo sgyu 'phrul la gzhon nu ni 'chi ba'i dus byas so zhes don de brjod do// de nas lha mo sgyu 'phrul lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyis bskor nas nam phyed tsam nas klung ne ran dza na'i 'gram ga la
155b7(mdo sde): ba dang byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ba dang des/ byang chub sems dpa' lus bskams shing 'chi ba'i dus byas pa dang 'dra ba mthong ngo // mthong nas mchi mas brnangs shing dus nas// de'i
155b8(mdo sde): tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di dag smras// lum bi ni zhes bya ba'i tshol du nga bu btsas pa'i tshe/ seng ge bzhin du 'dzin pa med par gom bdun khyod nyid song / phyogs bzhir bltas shing 'di ni skye ba tha ma zhes
156a1(mdo sde): khyod kyis tshig snyen smras pa de yang khyod la yang ma rdzogs/ 'jig rten sangs rgyas 'gyur zhes drang srong nag pas bstan pa'i/ de'i lung bstan pa yang nyams la mi rtags
156a2(mdo sde): ma mthong // bus ni yid dga' 'khor los sgyur ba'i dpal yang ma myong la/ byang chub kyang ni rjes su ma thob tshal du yol la gyur// bu phyir su la bsgrub cing sdug bsngal su yi gan du mdung // bdag gi
156a3(mdo sde): bu cig cung zad gson pa'i srog ni su yis sbyin/ byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ shin tu snying rje bar ni du byed cing / skra yang bshig la mdzes pa rnams bor la/ shin tu mi smre sngags 'don
156a4(mdo sde): byed la/ sa steng 'dug cing 'gre ba 'di su zhig/ lha mo sgyu 'phrul gyis smras pa// bdag gis zla ba bcu bar du// rdo rje 'dra ba mngal du bcangs// bu de'i ma ni bdag yin te/ rab tu sdug bsngal rnam
156a5(mdo sde): par smra// de nas byang chub sems dpas ma'i dbugs 'byin du nga smras pa/ bu la byams pa khyod kyi ngal ba 'bras bu yod par byas ma 'jigs shig/ sangs rgyas par bya ba'i phyir/ yongs
156a6(mdo sde): su bting ba ni don yod pa ste/ drang song nag pos bstan pa yang mngon du gsal bar bya'o// mar mi mdzad kyis lung bstan pa yang mngon du gsal bar bya'o// sa ni rnam pa 'argyar 'bor bar 'gyur yang
156a7(mdo sde): srid/ rin chen rtse mo lhun po tshur 'phyo srod// nyi ma zla bskar tshogs sa la lhung 'gyur srid// so so'i skye bo yin yang nga mi 'chi// de phyir 'di la mya ngan khyod ma byed// ring por mi thogs byang chub sangs
156a8(mdo sde): rgyas mthong // lha ma sgyu 'phrul gyis thos ma thag tu rab tu dga' ste/ bsku g.yos nas byang chub sems dpa' la me tog man dar bas gtor te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ lha'i sil snyan
156b1(mdo sde): dkrol zhing rang gi gnas ga la ba der song ngo // dge slong dag ngas 'di snyam du bsam te dge slong dag bram ze gang dag kha cig zas chung ngus dag par sems pa yod kyis kyangs chung ngu la nan tan du
156b2(mdo sde): bya'o snyamo// dge slong dag ngas mngon par shes te zas su rgya shugs 'bru gcig pu kho na ste gnyi su med pa zos// dge slong dag khyod kyi blo 'di snyam du de'i tshe rgya shug che ba 'di snyam du sems
156b3(mdo sde): bar gyur na de ltar mi lta ste/ de'i tshe rgya shugs kyang 'di nyid tsam mo// dge slong dag ngas zas rgya shugs 'bru gcig kho na ste/ gnyi su med pa zos pas lus shin tu nyams chung zhing ring
156b4(mdo sde): bar gyur to// dge slong dag 'di lta ste dper na ldum bu a si ta ka'i tshigs pa dang ka li ka'i tshigs pa ci 'dra bar nga'i yan lag dang nying lag rnams kyang de 'dra bar gyur te// 'di lta ste dper
156b5(mdo sde): na srog chags kar ka ta'i rtsib 'ang da sa rgya'o// 'di lta ste dper na gzhon pa'i bres khang ngam glang po'i bres kha nga rnying pa ngos gnyis zhig pa ni gdung rten gyi bar snang zhing
156b6(mdo sde): mngon no// de bzhin du nga'i rtsibs logs gnyis ka nas lus kyo nang snang zhing mngon no// 'di lta ste dper na lan bur blas pa mthon dman dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam par 'gyuraro// de
156b7(mdo sde): bzhin du nga'i skal tshigs kyang mthon dman dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam par gyur to// 'di lta ste dper na sku ba kha bo che dang gzhon nur bcad pa ni rnyis pa dang kun tu rnyis pa dang rtsub rtsub por 'chu
156b8(mdo sde): rong de bzhin du nga'i mgo yang rnyis pa dang kun tu rnyis pa dang / rtsubacu 'a bor gyur to// 'di lta ste dper na sas ka'i zla ba tha ma la khron pa'i skar ma dma' bar song ste chags chen pos snang ba
157a1(mdo sde): 'gyur/ de bzhin du nga'i mig gi 'bras bu yang khong du song ste/ tshegs chen pos snang bar gyur to// 'di lta ste dper na ra'i rkang pa 'am rnga mo'i rkang pa ci 'dra bar nga'i mtshan
157a2(mdo sde): khung dang lto dang brang la sogs pa la yang de 'dra bar gyur to// dge slong dag de nas nga gang gi tshe lag pas lto la byug go snyam na sgal tshogs nyid la reg go/ ldang po snyam nas langs na yang / 
157a3(mdo sde): de bzhin du sgur por gyur te 'gyel to// sha thang ste langs nas rdul gyis lus yog pa lag pas phyis pa dang / ba spu rul pa thams cad lus las lhags so// gang sngon da kha dogs mdzes
157a4(mdo sde): shing 'jam par gyur pa de yang 'di ltar bdag nyid spong ba rtsub par gtang bas med par gyur to// nga'i spyod yul gyi grong na gnas pa'i skye bo nye 'khor ba rnams kyang / ngal 'di ltar e ma'o das
157a5(mdo sde): // e ma'o dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni nya ming gu ra'i mdog 'dra'o// sngon 'di mdog mdzes/ pa gsal bar gyur pa de yang med par gyur to snyam du
157a6(mdo sde): shes// dge slong dag ngas 'di snyam du bas mr-i te/ bdag gis de bas kyang zas chung la nan du bya'o snyam mo// dge slong dag ngas mngon par shes nas zas su 'bras 'bru cig pu kho na
157a7(mdo sde): ste gnyi su med pa zos so// dge slong dag khyed 'di snyam du ngo'i tshe 'bras che ba snyam du sems par gyur na de ltar mi lta ste de'i tshe'i 'bras kyang 'di nyid tsam mo// dge slong dag ngas zasu 'bras 'bru
157a8(mdo sde): cig zos pas lus myur du snga ma bzhin du gyur to// e ma'o dge sbyong ga'u ta ma nya ming gu ra'i mdog 'dra'o sngon 'di'i 'dog mdzes pa gsal bar gyur pa de yang med par gyur to zhes bya ba'i
157b1(mdo sde): bar du'o// dge slong dag ngas 'di snyam du bsams te/ bdag gis de bas kyang zas chung ngu nyid la nan tan du bya'o snyam// dge slong dag ngas mngon par shes te ngas za su til 'bru cig pu
157b2(mdo sde): kho na ste gnyi su med pa zos pa nas de'i kha dog 'jam po med par gyur to// zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// dge slong dag ngas 'di snyam du bsams te dge sbyong dang bram ze gang dag kha cig zas mi za
157b3(mdo sde): bas dag par sems te bdag gis kyang thams cad du zas mi za ba la nan tan bya'o snyam nas dge slong dag de nas ngas zas mi za bar 'dug go/ dge slong dag de'i tshe ngas zas zos pas lus shin
157b4(mdo sde): tu skams shing nyang chung ba dang rid par gyur to// 'di lta ste dpe ra na ldum bu a si ta ka'i tshigs pa dang / ka li ka'i tshigs pa bras kyang nyis 'gyur dang sum 'gyur dang / bzhi 'gyur dang
157b5(mdo sde): lnga 'gyur dang bcu 'gyur gyis nga'i yan lag dang nying lag skems par 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste rtsib logs ni srog cha gas kar ka ta'i rtsib logs dang / gzhon pa'i bres khang
157b6(mdo sde): lta bur gyur to// skal tshigs ni lan bur blas pa lta bur gyur to// mgo'i thod pa ni sku ba kha bo che lta bur gyur to// mig gi 'bras bu ni khron pa'i skar ma lta bur gyur to// dge slong dag
157b7(mdo sde): legs par ldang bsnyam nas lus kyis bskyod na sgur por gyur te 'gyel to// sha zang ste langs nas rdul gyis lus g.yog pa lag pas phyis pa dang bsku rul pa thams cad lus las lhasas
157b8(mdo sde): so gang sngon nga kha dog mdzes shing 'jam par gyur pa de yang 'di ltar bdag nyid spong ba rtsub bor gtang ba'i phyir med par gyur to// nga'i spyod yul gyi grong na gnas pa'i skye bo nyi
158a1(mdo sde): 'khor ba rnams kyang 'di ltar e ma'o dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni gnag go/ e ma'o dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni sngo bsangaso// e ma'o dge sbyong ga'u ta ma ni nya ming gu
158a2(mdo sde): ra'i mdog 'dra'o// sngon 'di'i kha dog mdzes pa gsal bar gyur pa de yang med par gyur to snyam du shes// de'i tshe rgyal po zas gtsang mi yang nyin re zhing byang chub sems dpa'i
158a3(mdo sde): drung du pho nya gtong ngo // dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' snga ma bzhin du 'jig rten du bya ba rmad du byung ba bstan pa dang / bya ba nyams pa'i sems can rnams las dang
158a4(mdo sde): bya ba la gzung ba dang / bsod nams kyi cho ga rjod pa dang ye shes chen po'i yon tan bstan pa dang bsam gtan gyi yan lag rnams rnam par dbye ba'i phyir til 'bru cig dang rgya shug 'bru
158a5(mdo sde): cig dang / 'bras 'bru ba nga su'i bar du dka' ba skyed pa bstan te yid dman pa med do// byang chub sems dpa'/ lo drug gi bar du bskyil mo krungs bcas nas ji ltar 'dug
158a6(mdo sde): pa bzhin du gnas te spyod lam nyams pa med do// nyi maso bab kyang grib ma las song ngo // grib ma las kyang nyi ma la ma song ngo // rlung dang nyi ma dang char pa'i skabs ma 'tshal to// sha
158a7(mdo sde): sbrang dang sbrang bu dang sdig sbrul ma bskrad do// bshang ba dang gci ba dang mchil ma dang / snabs ma bor ro// bskum pa dang smad pa ma byas so// glos phab pa'am khas bu ba 'am gan rkyal ma
158a8(mdo sde): yin par gnas pas gnas so// sprin chen po dang yul ngan dang / char pa dang ser ba dang / ston dpyid dang dgun gang yin pa de dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa'i lus la me phog go
158b1(mdo sde): za na byang chub sems dpas lag pas kyang ma bskyab so// dbang po yang ma bkag go// dbang po'i yul yang ma blangs// gang dag der 'ong bgrong gi gzhon nu 'am/ ba lang rdzi 'am phyug
158b2(mdo sde): rdzi 'am rtsa thun nam shing thun nam/ lci thun de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' la dur khrod kyi 'dre yin pa snyam sems dpa' shing / de la rtsen te 'ongs so skud do// de nas byang chub
158b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' lo drug po de dag gis lus ngan pa dang gong ba dang ring bar gyur te de'i rna ba gnyis su rtsa 'am shing bal bcug nas/ sna'i bu ga gnyi su 'byin to// sna'i bu ga gnyisu
158b4(mdo sde): bcug nas rna ba'i bug gnyi su 'byin to// rna ba'i bu ga gnyi su bcug nas khar 'byin to// khar bcug nas rna ba dang / sna'i bu gar 'byin to sngar bcug nas na ba dang sna dang kha skye
158b5(mdo sde): lha dang klu dang gnod skyon dang / dri za dang lham yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'a chen po dag byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan mngon sum du
158b6(mdo sde): gyur pa de dag nyin mtshan du gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa byed do// smon lam yang 'deb so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' lo drug gi dka' ba spyod pa ston cing lha dang mi
158b7(mdo sde): khrag khrig phrag bcu gnyis tshang dag theg pa gsum la yongasu smin par byas so// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim byung ba// yon tan ngas dang ldan pa de
158b8(mdo sde): sems can don dang phan pa'i phyir// thabs dang ldan pa'i bsam pa skyes// snyigs ma lnga'i dus kyi tshe// chos dman mos pa'i 'jig rten pa'o// las dang bya bor 'jig rten
159a1(mdo sde): du 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir skyes par gyur// mu stegs tshogs kyis rab tu gang // ltas mo dang ni lta su lta// lus la gnod par bya ba byed// byis pa de dag dag par
159a2(mdo sde): sems/ g.yang sa med dang mya ngan 'jug/ sgren mos dang thal bas skud// lus ni yongasu gdung ba'i phyir// gdung ba lnga la brtson dang ldan// lag pa brkyang ste rgyu ba dang // mi mkha
159a3(mdo sde): kha cig lag pa ldag/ bum pa khar gzhong las mi len// sgo dang ka bas chod mi len// gang na khyi yod pa nas yin// 'dug ce'am tshur shog ces las min// khyim nas kha zas
159a4(mdo sde): gcig len pas// bdag ni dag par 'gyur snyam sems// mar dang 'bru mar bu ma no// nya dang sha dang 'o ma spong // rdzam ldum sred pa pad+ma'i rtsa// gzegs dang ba lang lcib za/ 
159a5(mdo sde): rtsa ba 'bras bu lo ma za// ku sha tshal bu la ba lpags/ srel byed kha cig sgren mor rgyu// glen pa 'di bden ga/ zhen brdzun snyam// lag pa bsgreng par byed pa dang // skra
159a6(mdo sde): bsgreng ral pa bsgreng ba dag/ lam las rab tu rnam par nyams// lam min gnas shing bde 'gro 'dod// rtsa dang brtan shing thal bar nyal// tsher mar nyal zhing cog pur 'dug/ kha cig
159a7(mdo sde): rkang pa gcig pus 'greng // gdong sdong nyo dang zla la lta// chu mig mtsho dang steng ka dang // rgya mtsho chu bo nyi zla dang // shing dang ri'i rtse mo dang // rdza dang sa la phyag kyang 'tshal// glen pa
159a8(mdo sde): de dag gnod mang gis// lus ni yongasu skems par byed// log par lha dang ldan pa dag/ myur du ngan song rnams su ltung // nga ni dka' thub brtul zhugs dang // dka' spyang gang zhig lha
159b1(mdo sde): dang mis// spyad par nus pa ma yin pa'i// dka' spyang drag ba rtsol snyam sems// bsam gtan gang zhig rang rgyal gyis// blta bar nus pa ma yin pa// rdo rje lta bur brtan gnas pa
159b2(mdo sde): mkha' khab bsam gtan mag kye// mu stegs brtul zhugs ngan pa yis// dga' ba'i lha mi 'di na yod// de dag yongasu smin bya'i phyir// dka' spyad brtul zhugs drag po brtsams
159b3(mdo sde): sa steng ci yang ma bting bar// bskyil mo krungs na bcas te 'dug/ rgya shug til dang 'bras 'bru cig/ za ba'i cho ga rnam par ston// dbugs dbyung rngub pa rnam par spangs// stong
159b4(mdo sde): dang ldan pa g.yo ba med// lo drug bar du bsam gtan mchog/ nam mkha' khyab la bsam gtan byed// rtog dang rnam par rtog med pa// g.yo ba med cing sems rgyu med// namakha'i
159b5(mdo sde): kham su khyab pa yi// mkha' khyab bsam gtan bsam gtan byed// de ni nyin las grib mar ram// grib la nyes nyi mar song ma byas// lhun po lta bur mi g.yo ba'i/ 
159b6(mdo sde): mkha' khyab bsam gtan bsam gtan byed// rlung dang char dang sha sbrang dang // sdig sbrul sbrang bu skyobs mi byed// rnam par ma 'khrugs spyod pa yis// mkha' khyab bsam gtan bsam
159b7(mdo sde): gtan byed// bdag nyid gcig pu'i don gyi phyir// mkha' khyab bsam gtan byed pa min// gzhan du snying rje sems kyis ni// 'jig rten don mang ched du sbom// grong gi byis pa ba lang
159b8(mdo sde): rdzing shing thun dag dang rtsa thun dag/ de la dur khrod 'dre snyam sems// de la sa yis sku byed cing // mig tsang ba yang 'thor bar byed// de dag gnod pa mang byed kyang / g.yo ba med
160a1(mdo sde): cing 'khrugs med par/ mkha' khyab bsam gtan bsam gtan byed// mtho ba med cing dma' ba med// lus ma bsrungs par chos ma reg// bshang ba mi byed
160a2(mdo sde): gci mi byed// sgra yis mi 'jigs gzhan mi lta// sha dang khrag rnams skams gyur to// lpags pa rtsa rgyus rus pa lus// skal tshigs dag ni lto bar snang // lan bur blas pa
160a3(mdo sde): ji bzhin no// gang dag lhag par byas lha dang // lha min gnod sbyin dri za klu// yon tan ldan pa mngon sum pas// nyin dang mtshan du mchod pa byed// ji ltar mkha' 'dra'i sems
160a4(mdo sde): ldan 'di// mkha' khyab bsam gtan bsam gtan byed// de 'drar bdag cag myur gyur ces// smon lam dag kyang 'debs par byed// snying rje'i blo yis 'jig rten gyi// don ma
160a5(mdo sde): phyir byed ma btags par// bdag phyir ma yin bde bla sa min// bsam gtan ro ni myang phyir min// phas kyi rgol ba rab tu bcom// mu stegs blo nyams zil
160a6(mdo sde): gyis mnan// mgo reg byang chub ga la yod// byang chub skal mang rnyed dka' zhes// 'od srung la ni tshigs smras pa'i// las dang bya ba rab tu bstan// skye bo dag ni dga' bya'i phyir/ 
160a7(mdo sde): mkha' khyab bsam gtan bsam gtan byed// lha mi khrag khrig bcu gnyis tshang // theg pa gsum la rab tu brtul// de yis ched du blo gros bzang // mkha' khyab bsam gtan
160a8(mdo sde): byed// dka' ba spyad pa'i le'u zhes bya ste// bcu bdun pa'o// / dge slong dag bdud sdig can yang byang chub sems dpa' lo drug gi bar du dka' ba spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe
160b1(mdo sde): phyi bzhin 'brang ste glags bltas skabs btsal kyang nam yang glags chung zad kyang ma rnyed do/ de glags ma rnyed nas yid chad de yid la gcags bzhin du song ngo de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ dgo/ 
160b2(mdo sde): ba nyams ni dga' ba dang / nags tshal gel pa sgra med dang lteng rgyas kyi ni shar phyogs na/ chu klung ne ran dza na der// spong ba'i phyir ni brtson par byas// rtag tu mthu rtsa la brtan pa po// grub dang
160b3(mdo sde): bde ba thob pa'i phyir// brtson pas rab tu brtul de la// bdud ni 'jam zhing snyan pa'i tshig/ smra bar byed cing 'ongs par gyur// kye srog gces kyis 'tsho bar gyis// gson na chos ni sbrang
160b4(mdo sde): bar gyur// gson tshe bya ba gang yod pa// de dag byas na mya ngan med// khyod rke mdog nyams dman par gyur// khyod ni shel thug cing 'dug/ 'chi ba'i cha ni stong rnyed tsam
160b5(mdo sde): zang // sbyin bdag la ni rtag tu byin// me'i skyon sreg/ sbyin sreg byos// 'on tang bsod nams chen por 'gyur// spong ba yis na ci zhig bya// spong ba'i lam ni sdug bsngal
160b6(mdo sde): te/ sems dul ba ni bya dkar zhes// de tshe bdud kyis de skad tshog/ byang chub sems dpa' de la smras// de skad smras pa'i bdud de la// byang chub sems dpas 'di skad
160b7(mdo sde): smras// sdig can myos pa'i rtsa lag po// khyod ni rang gi don phyir 'ongs// nga la bsod nams cung zad kyang // ngan du gnyer ba med do 'dud// gang dang bsod nams don du gnyer// de la de
160b8(mdo sde): skang smra ba'i rigs// 'tsho ba'i mtha' ni 'chi yin pas// mi 'chi snyam du mi sems// tshangs par spyod la gna'i 'gyur bas// phyir ldog par ni mi bya'o// u krung dag ni su rgyun kyang yu
161a1(mdo sde): gis rnam par skems byed na// spangs pa nyid kyis khrag tsam lta// 'di yis ci phyir skams mi 'gyur/ khrag ni skams par 'gyur ba dang // de'i 'og tu sha skams 'gyur/ sha ni zad
161a2(mdo sde): par gyur pa dang // phyir zhing sems ni dang bar 'gyur// phyir zhing bdud dang brtson 'grus dang // ting 'dzin kyang gnas par 'gyur// da ni de ltar gnas pas na// tshor ba dam pa thob gyur kyang // lus dang / 
161a3(mdo sde): srog la mi lta ste/ sran thub dag par gyur la ltos// nga ni 'dun pa yod gyur cing // brtson 'grus dang ni shes rab yod// nga yi brtson 'grus skyong nus pa// 'jig rten na ni ngas mi mthong // srog chags shing chen
161a4(mdo sde): bla ste/ 'tsho ba ngan pa de lta min// g.yul ngor shi ba legs pa ste// pham nas gson pa de lta min// sngar ma dpung las mi rgyal te// / dpa'o dpung las rgyal bar 'gyur// rgyal yang de ni rloms sem
161a5(mdo sde): med// bdud khyod las ni myur rgyal bya// 'dod pa khyod kyis dang sa bo'i dpung / mi dga' ba ni gnyis pa yin/ khyod kyi gsu ma pa bkres dang skom// sred pa dpung tshogs bzhi pa yin/ mug
161a6(mdo sde): dang gnyid ni lnga pa ste/ 'jigs pa drug par brjod pa yin// khyod ni the tshom 'dun pa ste/ khro dang 'chab pa brgyad pa yin// thab dang tshigs bcad bkur sti dang / log par grags pa gang thob dang / bdag la bstod
161a7(mdo sde): par byed pa dang // gzhan la smod par byed pa dang // de dag nag po'i rtsa lag tu/ ltung ba'i bdud kyi dpung yin// dge sbyong bram ze kha cig ni// 'di na glags lta 'khor bar snang // khyod dpung gang yin lhar bcas kyi/ 'jig
161a8(mdo sde): rten 'di ni rab 'dul ba// so gtang ma byas snod chus bzhin// shes rab kyis ni de dag zhig/ dran pa legs pa nye bar gzhag ste/ shes rab legs par bsgom byas nas/ shes bzhin du ni spyad par bya// blo ngan khyod kyis
161b1(mdo sde): ci byar yod// de skad ces smras pa dang / bdud sdig can sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde sde// yid ma rangs na/ yid la gcags bzhin du de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// 
161b2(mdo sde): 'phags pa brgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po bcu gnyis pa'o// dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te// dge slong dang bram ze gang dag kha cig 'das pa dang / 
161b3(mdo sde): ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i dus na bdag la gnod pa byed cing lus la gdung ba byed de/ sdug bsngal drag po che ba mi bzad pa yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong bar byed pas// de dag shin tu sdug bsngal ba
161b4(mdo sde): myong ngo snyam// dge slong dag ngas 'di snyam du bsams te// spyong ba 'di dang bsgrub pa 'dis mi'i chos bla ma las mchog tu gyur pa// 'phags pa ye shes mthong ba'i khyad par gang yang mngon ma byas te/ 'di
161b5(mdo sde): ni byang chub sems kyi lam ma yin lam 'di ni ma 'ongs pa'i/ skye ba dang / rga dang 'chi ba 'byung ba nub par byed pa ma yin te/ byang chub kyi lam ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba rga ba dang / 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal
161b6(mdo sde): 'byung ba nub par byed pa gzhan zhig yod de snya mo// dge slong dag ngas 'di snyam du bsam te ngas pa'i skyed mos tshal du shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma la 'dug ste/ 'dod pa rnams las dben pa sdig pa mi
161b7(mdo sde): dag ba'i chos rnams las dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po nas bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar rdzogs par byas te/ gnas/ 
161b8(mdo sde): de byang chub kyi lam yin te skye ba dang rga ba dang 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal 'byung ba rnams nub par 'gyur ba yin snyam nas de byang chub kyi lam yin snyam ste nga'i rnam par shes pa de'i rje su 'brang bar gyur to// ngas
162a1(mdo sde): / 'di snyam du bsams te 'di ltar nyams chung bar gyur pas ni lam de mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par mi nus// gal te 'di ltar lus ngan zhing nyas chung bzhin du ngam
162a2(mdo sde): par shes pa dang ye shes kyi stobs kyis byang chub kyi snying por song na ni/ ngas phyi ma'i skye bo la snying brtse bar byas par mi 'gyur te 'di yang byang chub kyi lam ma yin gyis/ ngas kha zas rags bzos
162a3(mdo sde): la lus kyi mthu stobs bskyed de/ de nas gdod byang chub kyi snying por 'gro'o snyam mo// dge slong dag de na lha'i bu gang dag pa la mos pa de dag gis/ nga'i sems kyi yongasu rtog pa sems kyis shes nas nga
162a4(mdo sde): ga la ba der 'ongs te/ nga la 'di skad ces smraso// skyes bu dam pa zhal zas rags pa ma gsol cig/ bdag cag gis ba spu'i khung bur mdangs sprul bar bgyi'o// dge slong dag ngas 'di snyam du bsams te/ bdag
162a5(mdo sde): ni zas mi bza' bar bdag nyid kyis dam bcas la/ bdag gi/ spyod yul gyi grong na gnas pa'i skye bo nye 'khor ba rnams kyi/ sa kyang 'di ltar dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni zas mi za ba yin par yang
162a6(mdo sde): shes te/ la mos pa'i lha'i bu 'di dag gis/ nga'i baspu 'i khong bur mdangs bcug par gyur na nga shin tu rdzun smras pa ru gyur to snyam ste/ de nas byang chub sems dpas rdza na smra ba spong
162a7(mdo sde): ba'i phyir lha'i bu de dag gi tshig ma mnyan par kha zas rags pa bza' ba sems btud do// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpas le drug gi bar du brtul zhugs dang bka' thub nyam su blangs nas
162a8(mdo sde): stan de las langs te/ kha zas rags pa 'di lta ste bu ram gyi lbu ba dang mon sran sde'u li khu bcud dang / ha re nu ka'i khu bcud dang zas dang 'bras can dang 'dren ma bza'o zhes tshig tu brjod do// 
162b1(mdo sde): dge slong dag de nas lnga sde bzang po dag 'di snyam du sems te dge sbyong go'u ta mas lam 'di dang bsgrub pa 'dis mi'i chos bla ma las mchog tu gyur pa/ 'phags pa ye shes mthong ba'i
162b2(mdo sde): khyad par gang yang mngon du byed ma nus na kha zas rags pa 'di zos te bsod snyoms la sbyor ba dang ldan par gnas pas ci nus te/ mi gsal ba byis pa yin no snyam du bsams
162b3(mdo sde): nas byang chub sems dpa'i gan nas song ste/ grong khyer bA rA na ser song nas/ drang srong lhung ba ri dwags kyi gnas su gnas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' thog ma nyid du
162b4(mdo sde): dka' ba spyad pa spyod pa na grong pa'i bu gzhon nu bcus blta ba dang phyag bya ba'i phyir brnyan bkur byas so// lnga sde bzang po de dag gis kyang rim gror byas shing
162b5(mdo sde): rgya shugs 'bru cig dang / 'bras 'bru cig dang / til 'bru cig dbul ba yang phul lo// grong ba'i bu mo bcu ni stobs ldan ma zhes bya ba dang stobs
162b6(mdo sde): byed ma dang / shin tu sdug dang sde las rnam par rgyal dang / a da mug ta ka'i phreng ba cas mdzes ma dang rdza byed ma dang skra lcang lo rgyas dang / ral bu can dang lags
162b7(mdo sde): skyes ma zhes bya ste/ gnon nu de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i chod ma'i rnam pa de dag thams cad byas te phul lo// byang chub sems dpas kyang de dag zos nas/ rim gyi spyod yul gyi
162b8(mdo sde): grong du bsod snyobs sbyang bas mdog dang gzugs dang / stobs dang ldan par gyur to de tshun chad byang chub sems dpa' la dge sbyong mdzes pa/ dge sbyong chen po zhes mdzer to// 
163a1(mdo sde): dge sbyong dag de na byang chub sems dpa' dang de nyid du dka' ba spyad pa spyod pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' brtul zhugs dka' thub nyams 'og tu chud par bya ba dang / lus rngas par
163a2(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir grong pa'i bu mo legs skyes mas nyin cig bzhin du bram ze brgyad brgya zan byin ning 'di skad du/ bdag gi zas zos pas byang chub sems dpar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mdo/ 
163a3(mdo sde): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar shog shig ces smon lam yang btab bo// dge slong dag lo drug 'das nas/ dge slong dag ngas 'di snyam du bsams te/ gal te bdag gis mngoms yog 'ga' zhig rnyed
163a4(mdo sde): na re stes snyam mo// dge slong dag de'i tshe grong ba'i bu mo la gas skyes ma'i bran mo grub ma zhes bya ba shi nas ngegan ni ras kyis bkris te/ dur khrod du bor bar gyur pa'i phyag dar khrod pa dengs
163a5(mdo sde): mthong nas ngas phyag dar khrod pa de blangs pa'i phyir/ rkang pa g.yon pas gnan te gus nas lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ba dang / de nas sa bla'i lhas bar snang gi lha rnams la sgra bsgrags
163a6(mdo sde): pa/ grogs po dag 'di ltar rgyal po chen po'i rigasu skyes pa 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal sring bor te/ phyag dar khrod pa la sems btud pa ngo mtshar grogs po dag 'di ni rmad du byung ba'o// bar
163a7(mdo sde): snang gi lha rnams kyis sa bla'i lha rnams kyi sgra thos nas/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams la sgra bsgrags so// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris pas kyang sum cu rtsa gsum pa la'o// sum cu rtsa gsum
163a8(mdo sde): pas kyang 'thab bral ba la'o// 'thab bral bas kyang dga' ldan pa la'o// dga' ldan pas kyang 'phrul dga' ba la'o// 'phrul dga' bas kyang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa la'o// gzhan
163b1(mdo sde): 'phrul dbang byed pas kyang tshangs ris pa'i bar du'o// skad cig de dang thang cig de dang yud tsam de la/ grogs po dag 'di ltar rgyal po chen po'i rigs su skyes pa 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal sring bor te
163b2(mdo sde): phyag dar khrod pa la sems btud pa ngo mtshar te 'di rmad du byung ba'o sgra cig dang / brjod pa cig 'og min gyi gnas kyi bar du grags par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpas yang 'di snyam du
163b3(mdo sde): bsams te/ bdag gis phyag dar khrod pa ni rnyed na gal te chu zhig rnyed na re stes snyam mo// de nas de nyid du lhas lag pa sa la brdabs pa dang der rdzing bu zhig zung bar gyur te dengs sang du yang lag pa
163b4(mdo sde): brdabs pa'i rdzing zhes grag so// de nas yang byang chub sems drapas 'di snyam du bsams te bdag gis chu ni rnyed na gal te phyag/ dar khrod pa 'di bkru ba'i rdol ba cig rnyed na re ste snyam pa dang skad cig
163b5(mdo sde): de nyid la brgya byin gyis rdo le ba bzhag nas/ de la byang/ chub sems dpas phyag dar khrod pa de bkrus so// de na sa lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad
163b6(mdo sde): ces smras so// skyes bu dam pa 'di kho bo la stsol cig dang / kho bos bkru'o// de nas byang chub sems dpas rab tu byung ba ni bdag nyid kyis bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ brgya byin la ma byin
163b7(mdo sde): bar bdag nyid kyis bkruso// de lus ngal te chad nas rdzing nas 'byung snyam pa dang bdud sdig can phrag dog gi chos dang ldan pas rdzing bu gang ba mthon po zhig sprul to// rdzing de'i 'gram na shing sgrub
163b8(mdo sde): ces bya ba chen po zhig yod de byang chub sems dpas 'jig rten dang mthun par bya bas/ lha mo la phan gdags pa'i phyir shing de'i lha mo la smras pa lha mo shing gi yal ga smod cig/ 
164a1(mdo sde): / des kyang shing gi yal ga smad nas/ byang chub sems dpas de la 'jus te byung ngo // byung nas kyang shing sgrib byed de'i drung du phyag dar khrod pa chos gos snam sbyar du byas
164a2(mdo sde): nas drabs te deng sang du yang phyag dar khrod pa drubs pa zhes ming du grag so// de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba des lha'i gos ngur smig gi mtshon du gtses pa rung ba dge
164a3(mdo sde): sbyong gi tshul dang mthun pa dag byang chub sems dpa' la du lo// byang chub sems dpas kyang de dag blangs te/ snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos nas spyod yul gyi grong du phyogs pa dang de nas lha rnams
164a4(mdo sde): lteng rgyas kyi sde dpon gyi grong na/ dga' byed ces bya ba'i grong mi zhig yod pa'i bu mo legs skyes ma la nam phyed tsam na smras pa/ khyod kyis gang gi phyir mchod sbyin byas pa de brtul zhugs nyams 'og tu chud
164a5(mdo sde): nas de kha zas rags pa bzang po za bar sems kyis sngon khyod kyi bad ga gi zas zos nas byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa ya nga dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
164a6(mdo sde): 'tshang rgya bar shog shig ces smon lam btab pa gang yin pa'i khyod kyis bya ba de gyis shig/ dge slong dag de nas grong mi dga' byed kyis bu mo legs skyes mas/ lha de dag gi tshig de thos nas/ myur
164a7(mdo sde): myur bar ba stong gi 'o ma lan bdun du nying kur byas pa bzang po mchog tu 'gyur ba snying po can blangs te blangs nas kyang 'o ma de 'bras sar pa sar pa dag dang / phru ba sar par blugs nas/ thab sar btsugs te/ 
164a8(mdo sde): kha zas de sgrub bo// de sgrub pa na snga ltas 'di dag snang ste/ 'o ma de'i nang na dpa' be'u dang / bkra shis pa dang / g.yung drung 'khyil pa dang pad+ma dang sdong ris la sogs pa bkra shis rnams snang ngo de dag 'di snyam du
164b1(mdo sde): bsams te/ ltas 'di lta bu 'di dag snang ba las na byang chub sems dpas zas zos nas byang chub 'thob par 'gyur du the tshom med do snyam pa dang / rgya mtsho shes shing cho ga shes pa'i mtshan mkhan phyogs der
164b2(mdo sde): byin par gyur nas/ des kyang bdud rtsi 'thob pa nyid du lung bstan to// de nas legs skyes mas thug pa de tshos pa dang thang la bzhag ste me tog gis gtor spos chus gtor nas gus par bstan bting ste bran mo gong
164b3(mdo sde): ma zhes bya ba la smras pa/ gong ma song la bram ze bos shig/ ngas ni 'o thug sbrang rtsi can 'di blta'o// jo mo legs so zhes de ltar mnyan nas shar phyogs logasu song ba dang byang chub sems dpa' mthong ngo // 
164b4(mdo sde): de bzhin du lho phyogs log su song na yang byang chub sems dpa' mthong ngo // de bzhin du nub dang byang phyogs log su song na yang de dang der byang chub sems dpa' mthong ngo // de'i tshe gnas
164b5(mdo sde): gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis gnan mu stegs can thams cad tshar gcad par gyur pas 'ga' tsam yang mi snang ngo // de nas slar log ste jo mo la 'di skad ces smraso// gang
164b6(mdo sde): dang gang du mchis kyang de dang de na dge slong mdzes pa pa gda' ba las dge sbyong dang bram ze gzhan ni dga' yang mi gang 'o// legs skyes mas smras pa/ de nyid bram ze yin te/ de'i phyir 'di brtsams
164b7(mdo sde): kyis gong ma song la de nyid bos shig/ jo mo legs so zhes smras te gong ma song nas byang chub sems dpa'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te/ legs skyes ma zhes bgyi bas spyan 'dren to zhes smraso// 
164b8(mdo sde): dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' grong pa'i bu mo legs skyes ma'i khyim du song ste/ stan bting ba la 'dug go/ dge slong dag de nas grong pa'i bu mo legs skyes mas 'o thug sbrang rtsi ca
165a1(mdo sde): gyis gser gyi snong chen po bkang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' la phul lo// de nas byang chub sems dpa 'di skam du bsams te legs skyes mas la zas 'di lta bu 'di byir pa 'di
165a2(mdo sde): bdag gis deng zos te the tshom med par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpas zas de blangs nas grong pa'i bu mo legs skyes
165a3(mdo sde): ma la 'di skad ces smras so// che zhes gser gyi snod chen po 'di ji ltar bya/ des smras pa khyod snoms shig byang chub sems dpas smras pa kho bo la ni snod 'di lta bu mi dgos so// legs skyes mas
165a4(mdo sde): smras pa/ ci dges su mdzod cig bdag ni snod ma mchis par su la yang zas mi stsol lo// de nas byang chub sems dpas zas de thogs te lteng rgyas nas byung nas dro la bab pa dang // ri klung chen po
165a5(mdo sde): neran dza na'i dros su ste zas dang chos gos rnams phyogs gci gtu gnag nas byang chub sems dpa' lus bsil bar bya ba'i phyir klung ne ran dza na'i nang du zhugs so// dge slong dag byang
165a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' khrus byed pa'i tshe lha'i bu brgya stong du ma dag 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ lha'i aM ga ru dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma dang byug pa dag klung du ldug shing lha'i me tog sna tshog
165a7(mdo sde): dag kyang chu'i nang du 'thor ro// de'i tshe klung chen po na ran dza na lha'i spos rnams dang / me tog rnams kyis gang bar gyur te 'bab po// byang chub sems dpa' spos chu gang gis khrus byas par gyur pa de lha'i bu bye
165a8(mdo sde): ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag gis blangs te/ mchod rten du byas pa dang mchod pa bya ba'i phyir rang rang gis gnas su khyer ro// byang chub sems dpa'i sgra dang ag tshom gang yin pa de dag kyang grong ba'i bu mo legs
165b1(mdo sde): skyes mas bkra shis pa yin no// skam nas mchod rten du bya ba dang mchod par bya ba'i phyir khyer ro// byang chub sems dpar krung nas byung nas 'dug par 'dod de gling la lnga'o// de nas klung ner ma dza na'i
165b2(mdo sde): klu'i bu mo gang yin pa de ni sa'i 'og nas byung ste yid las byung ba'i seng gi'i khri byang chub sems dpa' la phul nas byang chub sems dpa' de la 'dug ste/ grong ba'i bu mo lags skyes ma la snying brtse ba nye bar
165b3(mdo sde): bzung nas ci tsam dgos par 'o thub snang rtsi can de 'thung so// 'thungs nas kyang gser gyi snod chen po de la ma chags par chur bor ro// bor ma thag tu klu'i rgyal po rgya mchos mchod pa'i 'os yin no nas
165b4(mdo sde): dad pa dang / gus pa bskyed de blangs nas rang gis gnasu song ngo // de nas mig stong pa grong khyer 'jig pa na mkha' lding gi gzugasu sprul nas kha rdo rje'i mchur bsgyur te klu'i rgyal po rgya
165b5(mdo sde): mtsho las gser gyi snod chen po de 'phrog du brgal nam nus nas rang gi gzugs kyis gus par byas te blangs nas mchod na du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba'i byor sum cu rtsa gsum
165b6(mdo sde): gam su khyer ro// khyer nas kyang snod chen po'i dge 'dun gyi dus ston byas te deng sang du'ang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams lo cig bzhin du snod chen po'i dus ston byed do// seng ge'i khri de yang klung
165b7(mdo sde): bu mo de nyid kyis mchod rten du bya ba dang / mchod pa bya ba'i phyir khyer ro// dge slong dag byang chub sems dpas zas rags pa zos ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyis stobs dang
165b8(mdo sde): shes rab kyi stobs kyis skad cig de nyid la lus la snga ma'i kha dog bzang po rgyas pa dang / skyes bu chen po'i mtshan su cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcu dang 'od 'dom gang ba yang
166a1(mdo sde): byung bar gyur to// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ lo drug bar du brtul zhugs 'ams 'og chung byas bcom ldan blo gros 'di snyam sems// gal te bdag ni 'di ltar
166a2(mdo sde): ring bzhin bsam gtan mngon shes stobs ldan pa// shing gi rgyal po'i drung du song ste thams cad mkhyen nyid 'tshang rgyar bya na ni// de lta na yang bdag gis phyi ma'i skye bo dag la snying brtsem byas 'gyur/ 
166a3(mdo sde): bsod nams ngan ngon tsam yang ldan pa'i lha mi 'di dag ngan pas ye shes tshol// de dag lus ni nyam chung gyur na bdud rtsi 'tshang rgya byed par mi nus pas kha zas rags pa dam pa zos te lus kyi mthu stobs
166a4(mdo sde): bskyed pa byas nas ni// shing gi rgyal po'i drung du song ste tham sa cad mkhyen cing 'tshang rgyar bya ba bsams// grong nga'i bu mo sngon chad spyod pa spyad pa legs skyes ma zhes bya ba de// 'dren
166a5(mdo sde): ba brtul zhugs grub par shog ces de lha'i yid kyis rtag tu mchod sbyin byed// de ni lha yis bskul ba thos nas de tshe'o thug sbrang rtsi can blangs te// klung gi 'gram du song nas
166a6(mdo sde): dga' ba'i yid kyis ne ran dza na'i dos na 'dug/ skal pa stong du spyod pa spyad cing dbang po zhil rab tu zhi ba de// lnga dang klu'i tshogs dang drang srong dag gis bskor te ne ran dza nar 'ongs// pha rol rgal nas
166a7(mdo sde): sems can sgro ba blo gros ldan pa khrus byar bsams nas ni// thub pa dag pa dri med snying brtse phyir ni klung du zhugs te 'khru// bye ba brag stong lha dag dga' ba'i yid kyi spos rnams dang ni
166a8(mdo sde): phye ma dag/ klung du 'thor zhing sems can dam pa bkru ba'i don du tshul gang bar byed// byang chub sems dpa' dri med des pa bkrus te ngogs ra 'dug par shes gyur nas// lha stong rab tu dga' ste sems can dag
166b1(mdo sde): pa bkrus pa'i chu de mchod phyir khyer/ ngur smrig bzang po dri ma med pa'i gos dag lha'i bu yis de la byin// rung ba dag dang sham thabs bgos nas bcom ldan 'das ni chu klung ngogs na 'dug/ klu'i bu mo
166b2(mdo sde): dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i yid kyis seng ge'i khri yang bshams// de la 'jig rten dag ni mig byed yid kyang rab tu ni bde 'dug nas// blo gros ldan pa legs skyes ma des gser gyi snod du kha zas
166b3(mdo sde): blugs te byin// rkang par phyag 'tshal nas ni de dga' kha lo bsgyur ba bdag gi gsol zhes byas// blo gros ldan pas ji tsam dgos par zas kyang zos nas snod ni chur bor te/ de ni grong khyer
166b4(mdo sde): 'jig pa lha yi bla mas bdag gi mchod pa bya zhes khyer/ gang tshe rgyal bas kha zas rags pa dam pa zos pa de yi skra da cig la// de yi lus stobs gzi brjid dag dang dpal
166b5(mdo sde): yang snga ma po bzhin du gnas// legs skyes ma dang lha rnams dag la chos gtam byas nas don kyang mang du byas// seng ge ngang ba'i stabs dang glang po'i dbang po'i 'gros kyis byang
166b6(mdo sde): chub shing drung chas// / ne ran dza ni'i le'u zhes bya ste bco brgyad pa'o// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' klung ne ran dza nar khrus byas te/ zas zos nas
166b7(mdo sde): lus kyi mthu stobs bskyed de bdud las rnam par rgyal bar bya ba'i phyir rnam pa bcu drug dang ldan pa'i sa phyogs shing gi rgyal po byang chub chen po'i drung ga la ba der/ skyes bu chen po'i stabs
166b8(mdo sde): gang yin pa'i stabs des song ste mi spyod pa'i stabs dang dbang po'i mchod sdong lta bu'i stabs dang ro'i rgyal po lhun po ltar shin tu brtan pa'i stabs dang / mi mngon pa ma yin pa'i stabs dang ya
167a1(mdo sde): yo med pa'i stabs dang / 'tshe ba med pa'i skabs dang rings pa ma yin pa'i stabs dang sdod pa med pa'i stabs dang / 'khrugs pa med pa'i stabs dang / 'byor
167a2(mdo sde): ba med pa'i stabs dang / 'dud pa med pa'i stabs dang / zhum pa med pa'i stabs dang ha cang mi sdod pa'i stabs dang mi g.yos pa'i stabs dang rab tab bo med pa'i stabs dang / tshul tu shis pa'i
167a3(mdo sde): stabs dang / dri ma med pa'i stabs dang dge ba'i stabs dang zhe sdang med pa'i stabs dang / gti mug med pa'i stabs dang chags pa med pa'i stabs dang / seng ge'i stabs dang ngang pa'i rgyal po'i stab
167a4(mdo sde): dang klu'i rgyal po'i stabs dang / sred med kyi bu'i stabs dang / sa la mi reg pa'i stabs dang / rtsibs stong dang ldan pa'i 'khor lo'i ri mo sa la snang ba'i stabs dang / sor mo dra bas 'brel zhing
167a5(mdo sde): ser mo zangs lta bu'i stabs dang so sgra 'byin pa'i stabs dang ri rdob pa'i stabs dang mthon dman mnyam par byed pa'i rkangad pa 'i mthil gyi stabs dang dra ba'i bar nas 'od dang / 'od zer
167a6(mdo sde): phyung nas sems can la reg na bde 'gror 'gro ba'i stabs dang pad+ma dri ma med pa la gom pa 'dor ba'i stabs dang / sngon dge ba legs par spyad pa'i 'gros kyi stabs dang sngon gyi sangs rgyas seng ge'i khri
167a7(mdo sde): la banu pa'i stabs dang / rdo rje ltar bsams pa brtan ning mi byed pa'i stabs dang / ngan song ngan 'gro thams cad gcod pa'i stabs dang bde ba thams cad bskyed pa'i stabs dang / thar pa'i lam
167a8(mdo sde): ston pa'i stabs dang bdud kyi stobs stobs med par byed pa'i stabs dang / ngan pa'i tshogs can gyi tshogs pas kyi rgol ba chos dang mthun pas tshar gcad pa'i stabs dang / mun pa'i ling tog dang
167b1(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa sel ba'i stabs dang / 'khor ba'i phyogs phyogs med par byed pa'i stabs dang brgya byin dang 'tshang ba dang / dbang phyug chen po dang 'jig rten skyong ba rnams zil gyis gnon pa'i stabs
167b2(mdo sde): dang stong gsum gyi stong chen po na dpa' bo gcig pu'i stabs dang rang byung zil gyis mi non pa'i stobs dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par byed pa'i stabs dang dran pa dang blo gros kyi stabs
167b3(mdo sde): dang bde 'gror 'gro ba'i stabs dang rga ba dang / 'chi ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i stabs dang zhi ba rdul med pa bdud kyi 'jigs pa med pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'gro ba'i stabs te/ de 'dra ba'i
167b4(mdo sde): skabs kyis byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por chaso// dge slong dag de ltar grung neran dzan dang / byang chub kyi snying po'i bar der rlung gi sprin gyi lha'i bu rnams kyis lam phyag dar byas par gyur ro// 
167b5(mdo sde): char sprin rnams kyis spos chus chag chag btab po// me tog kyang chal par bkram mo// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na shing ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang
167b6(mdo sde): shing byang chub ga la ba der log su rtse mo 'dud par gyur to// gang dag de'i nyin par btsas pa'i byis pa de dag kyang byang chub kyi snying po log su mgo bstan te nya lo// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
167b7(mdo sde): rjen gyi khams 'di na ri rab la sogs pa ri gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub kyi shing ga la ba der log su 'dud par gyur to// klung ne ran dzan nas bzung ste/ byang chub kyi snying po'i bar der 'dod pa na spyod
167b8(mdo sde): ba'i lha'i bu rnams kyis kha tshon rgyang grags tsam tshun chad kyi lam mngon par bkod par gyur to// lam de'i 'gram g.yas g.yon du'ang rin po che sna bdun gyi stegs bu pang du shing ta la bdun tsam du mthob
168a1(mdo sde): steng du rin po che'i dra ba bres pa lnga'i gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang bdan gyis legs brgyan pa sprul to// mdar rdzang gang tsam mngar rgyang gang cam zhing rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rnal sngags
168a2(mdo sde): bu de bas mtho ba mngon par sprul te shing rta la thams cad rin po che brgyus pas phan tshun 'brel bar 'dug go// shing rta la gnyis gnyis kyi bar du rdzing spos chus yongasu gang ba gser gyi bye ma brdal ba me tog ud
168a3(mdo sde): pa la dang pad+ma dang ku mu da dang pad+ma dkar po la sogs pas gang ba rin po che'i stegs bus bskor ba/ nor bu rin po che bai DUr+yas them skas brgyan pa chu sreg dang / bya gar dang ngang pa dang ngur pa dang / khrung khrung dang rma
168a4(mdo sde): bya dang sgra 'byin pa'i rdzing dag byas so// lam de na lha'i bu mo brgyad khri ni spos chus chag chag 'deb so// lha'i bu mo brgyad khri ni me tog gi sil ma lha'i dri gsung dang ldan pas 'thor ro// shing
168a5(mdo sde): rtal thams cad kyi mdun log su rin po che'i mkhar rten gnag go/ rin po che'i mkha' rten thad lha'i bu mo tsan dan dang / a ka/ ru'i phye ma'i phur ma thogs pa dang / dus kyi rjesu 'brang ba'i 'dug
168a6(mdo sde): ba'i pog por thogs pa brgyad khri 'khod par gyur to// rin po che'i mkha' rten thad la lha'i bu mo lha'i klu dbyangs len pa lnga khri 'khod par gyur to dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i zhing rnams ni
168a7(mdo sde): rab tu bskyod 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgyad stong ni 'byin// sil snyan brgya stong ni sgrogs me dog mang po'i char chen po 'bebs gos brgya stong gi g.yab mo ni 'dor rnga bo che brgya stong ni rdung rta dang glang po che
168a8(mdo sde): dang / glang khyu ba rnams ni sgra 'byin bya ne tso dang / ri skegs dang khu brug dang ka la bing ka dang / shang shang te'u dang ngang ba dang ngur pa dang / khrung khrung dang rma bya brgya stong ni bskor ba byed/ bkra shis pa brgya stong
168b1(mdo sde): ni 'bul zhing lam gyi bkod pa rnam pa de lta bu des byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por song ngo // gang gi nub mo byang chub sems dpa' byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'dod pa de nyid kyi ru
168b2(mdo sde): mo// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i bdag po tshangs pa dbang sgyur zhes bya ba des tshangs pa'i 'khor chen po de la bos te 'di skad ces smra so// grogs po dag shes par gyis shig byang chub sems dpa' sems
168b3(mdo sde): dpa' chen po go cha chen po mnabs padam bcas pa chen po ma bor ba/ go cha sra ba mnabs pa thugs yongasu mi skyo ba byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad tshar phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi
168b4(mdo sde): pha rol tu byon pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad la mnga' dbang brnyes pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsams pa thams cad kyi bya ba shin tu mkhyen pa sems can thams cad kyi dbang po'i
168b5(mdo sde): rjesu zhugs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba thams cad/ la shin tu zhugs pa/ bdud kyi las kyi lam thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la
168b6(mdo sde): gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyis byin gyis brlabs pa sems can thams cad la rab tu thar pa'i lam ston ba/ ded dpon chen por gyur pa/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams
168b7(mdo sde): cang 'joms par mdzad pa stong gsum na dpa'o cig pur gyur pa chos kyi spyan thams cad yang dag par bsgrubs pa sman pa'i rgyal po chen po rnam par grol ba'i thabs thob pa chos kyi rgyal po chen po shes
168b8(mdo sde): rab kyi 'od chen po gtong ba/ tog chen po'i rgyal po 'jig rten gyis chos brgyad kyis ma gos pa/ pad+ma chen po lta bu chos thams cad kyi gzungs ma bsnyel ba/ rgya mtsho chen po dang 'dra ba rjesu
168b9(mdo sde): chags pa dang khong khro ba dang bral ba mi g.yo ba/ mi spyod pa ri rab chen po lta bu shin tu dri ma med pa shin tu yongasu dag pa shin tu dkar ba'i blo dang ldan pa/ nor bu rin po che chen po dang 'dra ba chos thams
169a1(mdo sde): cad la dbang sgyur ba/ sems las su rung ba tshangs pa chen po lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' de bdud kyi sde rab tu gdul ba dang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bya
169a2(mdo sde): chub mngon par byang chub par banod pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongasu rdzogs par mdzad pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor ba dang seng ge'i sgra
169a3(mdo sde): chen po bsgrags pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pas sems can thams cad tshim par mdzad pa dang sems can thams cad kyi chos kyi mig rnam par sbyang ba dang pas kyi rgol ba thams cad chos dang mthun par tshar
169a4(mdo sde): gcad pa dang / sngon dam bcas pa yong su rdzogs pa kun tu bstan pa dang chos thams cad la dbang phyug gi mnga' dbang bsnyes par mdzad pa'i phyir byang chub kyi snying por bzhud kyis de la grogs po dag khyed byang
169a5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' la mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba'i las thams cad la spro bar gyis/ de nas tshangs pa chen po dbang sbyar gyis de'i tshe/ tshig su gcad pa 'di dag smra so// gang gi
169a6(mdo sde): bsod nams dag dang gzi brjid dpal gyis byams dang snying rje dga' ba dang // btang snyoms dang ni bsam gtan dag dang de bzhin mngon shes tshangs pa'i lam snang ba// bskal pa stong du spyod pa spyad pa
169a7(mdo sde): de ni byang chub shing drung chas par gyur// thub pa de la bsam pa'i brtul zhugs sgrub par byed pa'i mchod pa legs par bya// de la skyabasu song na ngan 'gro'i 'jigs dang mi phrad mi 'khom mi 'gyur te/ lha
169a8(mdo sde): yi nang du 'dod pa'i bde ba rnyed nas tshangs pa'i gnas yangs 'gro bar 'gyur// lo drug par du bka' ba spyad pa spyad nas 'di ni byang chub shing drung bzhud// kun kyang dga' zhing mgu ba'i yid kyis de la legs/ 
169b1(mdo sde): bar mchod pa gyis// de ni stong gsum rgyal po dbang phyug dam pa dbang phyug rgyal po ste// brgya byin tshangs pa nyi zla'i grong khyer dag na de dang mnyam pa gang yang med// gang btsas tshen zhing rnams bye ba khrag khrig rnam
169b2(mdo sde): ba drug du g.yos gyur pa// de ni de ring bdud kyi dpung las rgyal bar mdzad phyir shing chen drung bzhud// gang gi spyi gtsug tshangs pa'i gnas 'dir gnas kyang blta bar nus pa ma yin zhing // gang gi skul
169b3(mdo sde): mtshan rab dam pa ldan zhing sum cu rtsa gnyis legs brgyan la/ gang gi gsung 'dir yid du 'ong zhing snyan la rnar 'thad tshangs dbyangs sgra snyan cing // gang gi thugs ni khro dang bral ba de la mchod pa byed du 'dod
169b4(mdo sde): gang dag blo gros brgya byin tshangs pa'i gnasu bsam gtan bde bas 'da' bya dang // nyon mongs 'ching ba'i khri shing kun dang 'dra ba de dag gcong bar byed 'dod dang // gzhan las ma thos par ni rang rgyal byang chub
169b5(mdo sde): ni ba 'chi byed thob 'dod dang // gal te sa gsum dag na sangs// rgyas nyid 'dod de dag 'dren pa mchod par gyis// gang gis/ rgya mtshor bcas pa'i sa dang de bzhin rin po che rnams mthar
169b6(mdo sde): yas dang // khang bzangs skar khung bsil khang mang ldan pa dang zung du sbrel dang bzhon pa dang // me tog phreng ba shin tu mdzes pas brgyan pa bskyed mos tshal gyis rab brgyan dang // rkang lag mgo dang mig
169b7(mdo sde): rnams yongasu btang ba de ni byang chub snying por zhugs// dge slong dag de ltar stong gsum gyi tshangs pa chen po skad cig de la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir phyin te// lag
169b8(mdo sde): mthil ltar mnyam par gyur pa// gyo mo dang rngo med pa nor bu dang / mu tig dang bai dUr+ya dang / dung dang man shel dang byi ru dang gser dang dngul mang brtsa sngo ning 'jam la g.ya su 'khyil zhing g.yung drung du
170a1(mdo sde): 'khyil ba// ka tsa lin da'i gos ltar reg na bde ba de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams khyab pa 'dir byin to// de'i tshe rgya mtsho chen po thams cad sa lta bur
170a2(mdo sde): gyur kyang chun rgyu ba'i sems can rnams la gnod pa cung zad kyang med do// 'jig rten gyi khams de ltar brgyan pa 'di phyogs bcu'i brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang // 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyis mthong nas/ 
170a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong legs par brgyan to// byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi kyang lha'i
170a4(mdo sde): dang mi'i las shin tu 'das pa'i mchod pa bkod pa rnams kyis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa brgyan par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyang bkod
170a5(mdo sde): ba'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing cig lta bur snang bar gyur to// 'jig rten gyi bar dag dang / ri nag po dang khor yug dang khor yug chen po dag mi snang bar gyur to// 
170a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'od kyis gsal bar snang ngo // byang chub kyi snying po yongasu skyong ba'i lha'i bu bcu drug yod de 'di lta ste lha'i bu ud la li zhes bya ba dang / 
170a7(mdo sde): lha'i bu mud kha li zhes bya ba dang skye dgu'i bdag po dang dpa' stobs dang / dpung rgyan stobs dang / rang brtan dang sa 'dzin dang snang byed dang / dri ma med dang chos kyi dbang phyug dang / chos kyi rtog dang 'gro
170a8(mdo sde): grub dang mig thogs pa med dang / bkod pa chen po dang tshul khrims rnam dag dri ldan dang pad+ma'i 'od de lha'i bcu drug po de dag ni byang chub kyi snying po yongasu skyong ba dag ste/ thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog
170b1(mdo sde): ba'i bzod pa thob pa sha stag go// de dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i phyir/ byang chub kyi snying po rgyan te dpag tshad brgyad bcu khor yug tu rin po che sna bdun gyi stegs bu rim pa bdun
170b2(mdo sde): byis ni bskor ka shing rta la'i phreng ba rim bdun dang / rin po che'i dril bu g.yer kha'i dra ba rim bdun dang rin po che brgyus pa rim bdun gyis ni bskor/ 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi glegs bam
170b3(mdo sde): pa rin po che thams cad kyis smras pa dag dang / gser gyi tshong tshong dag dang 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi pad+ma dag gis ni khebs par byas/ snying po mchog gi spos kyis ni bdug rin po che'i dra ba ni bres so// 
170b4(mdo sde): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na sna tshogs mngon par 'phags pa bzang ba mngon du mchod pa/ lha yul ba dang mi yul ba gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub kyi snying po der snang
170b5(mdo sde): bar gyur to// phyogs bcu dag na chu nas skye ba dang thang las skyes pa'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub kyi snying por snang bar gyur to// phyogs
170b6(mdo sde): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa dag na byang chub sems dang / 'gang dag bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs tshad med pa'i bkod pa de dag gis byang chub kyi snying po brgyan par byed pa de
170b7(mdo sde): ngag kyang byang chub kyi snying po der snang bar gyur to// de ltar lha'i bu byang chub kyi snying po yongasu sbyong ba dag gis/ byang chub kyi snying por bkod pa de 'dra ba dag sprul par gyur te/ de dag lnga dang klu dang gnod sbyin
170b8(mdo sde): dang dri za dang lha ma yin dag gis mthong nas rang rang gi gnas la dur khrod tsam gyi 'du shes bskyed par gyur to// bkod pa de dag mthong nas shin tu ngo mtshar cher 'dzin te/ e ma'o bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa'i
171a1(mdo sde): mthun pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa legaso// zhes tshed du brjod pa'ang ched du brjod do// byang chub kyi shing gi lha mo bani yod de 'di lta ste 'od ma dang / snyan ldan dang yid bzangs dang / 
171a2(mdo sde): mdangs ldan ma ste byang chub kyi shing gi lha mo bzhi po de dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir byang chub kyi shing rtsa ba phun sum tshogs pa rjo su yu pa sa dang me tog dang 'bras bu sna
171a3(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa khrun dang spo phun sum tshogs pa mdzes pa shin tu 'grel ba 'phang du shing ta la bdun srid tsam du mtho ba de dang 'tsham par 'gel ba bkra ba lda na sdug pa/ yid du 'ong ba rin po che sna bdun
171a4(mdo sde): gyi stegs bu rim bdun gyis bskor ba rin po che shing rta le'i phreng ba rim bdun dang / rin po che'i dril bu g.yer kha'i dra ba rim bdun dang rin po che brgyus pa'i phreng ba rim bdun gyis kun nas bskor zhing byi
171a5(mdo sde): rim bskor ba shing yongs 'du sa brtol dang 'dra ba mig gis blta bas mi ngoms pa bskyed do// gang du byang chub sems dpa' 'dug nas byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
171a6(mdo sde): byang chub par 'dod pa'i sa phyogs de ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdo rje'i dkyil te/ sra ba snying po yod pa mi byed pa rdo rje'i rang bzhin du gnas par gyur pa'o// dge slong
171a7(mdo sde): dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba na/ lus sam rnam pa 'di lta bu'i 'od 'gyed des ngan song thams cad zhi bar gyur to// mi khom pa thams cad bcad par gyur to// nga
171a8(mdo sde): 'gro'i tshor ba thams cad bskams par gyur to// sems can dag dbang po ma tshang ba de dag gis ni dbang po yongasu rdzogs par thob par gyur to// nad kyis btab pa rnams ni nad sos par gyur to// 
171b1(mdo sde): 'jigs pas nyen pa rnams ni dbugs phyin pa thob par gyur to// bcings pas bcings pa rnams ni bcings pa las grol bar gyur to// sems can dbul po rnams ni longs spyod dang ldan par
171b2(mdo sde): gyur to// nyon mongs pas gdung ba rnams ni yongasu gdung ba med par gyur to// bkres pa rnams ni lto 'drangs par gyur to// skom pa rnams ni skom pa med par gyur to// sbrum ma rnams ni bde bar
171b3(mdo sde): kha tsas par gyur to// zhum pa nyams chung ba rnams ni stobs phun sum tshogs par gyur to// de'i tshe sems can gang la yang 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang khro ba dang chab pa dang / 
171b4(mdo sde): thab dang gnod sems dang brag dog gi gnod pa med par gyur to// de'i tshe sems can gang yang 'chi ba med// 'pho ba med skye ba med do// de'i tshe sems can thaMd byams pa'i sems
171b5(mdo sde): dang ban pa'i sems dang ldan zhing gcig la cig pa mar 'du shes skyed par gyur to// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ mnar med pa la thug pa'i bar// dmyal ba mi zad snang ba
171b6(mdo sde): yi/ sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal zhi// bde ba'i tshor ba thob par gyur// dud 'gro'i skye gnas sems can rnams// phan tshun gnod byed ji snyed pa// thub chen 'od kyis reg pas na// de dag
