171b7(mdo sde): byams pa'i sems kyang skyes/ yid btags 'jig rten yid brtags rnams/ bkres skom nyen pa ji snyed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzi brjid kyis// de dag zas skom rnyed par 'gyur/ 
171b8(mdo sde): mi lom thams cad chad gyung me ngan 'gro rnams kyang bskams par gyur// sen thams cad bder gyur te// lha'i bde bas rab tu tshim// mig dang rna ba med pa dang / gzhan yang gang dag dbang po nyams// de
172a1(mdo sde): dag dbang po kun rdzogs shing // yan lag thams cad mdzes par gyur// 'dod chags ni sdang la sogs pa'i// nyon mongs rnams kyis seMn gang // gnod gyur de che 'gro kun/ zhi bar
172a2(mdo sde): gyur te bde dang ldan// smyon pa dang ni dran ldan zhing // dbul po dag kyang nor dang ldan// nad kyis btab pa nad sos shing // bcing bas bcings pa grol bar gyur// ser sna med cing dgra med de// gnod sems dang
172a3(mdo sde): ni rtsod pa dag/ phan tshun byed pa med gyur te// de tshe byams pa'i sems su gas// pa dang ma dag bu cig la// ji ltar phangs par sems pa ltar// de bzhin sem tsA phan tshun du// de tshe bu pangs bzhin du sems// 
172a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i 'od dra yis// phyogs bcu'i phyogs ni kun tu yang // gang gA'i bye ma'i grangs rnyed kyi// zhing rnams bsam gyis mi khyab gsal// ri bo nag po rnams dang ni// khor
172a5(mdo sde): yug dag kyang mi snang gyur// rgya chen zhing rnams de dag kun/ gcig po ji bzhin de ltar snang // lag mthil lta bur gyur pa ste// byang chub sems dpa' mchod pa'i phyir// zhing rnams
172a6(mdo sde): thams cad legs brgyan pas// thams cad rin chen nyid du snang // byang chub snying po'i rim gro pa// lha ni de ltar bcu drug yod// dpag tshad brgya bcu'i sa khyon nang // byang chub snying por brgyan par gyur// zhing
172a7(mdo sde): rnams bye ba mtha' yas na// bkod pa chen po gang yod pa// byang chub sems dpa'i gzi brjid kyis// de dag thams cad der yang snang // lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang // mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye che// rang rang
172a8(mdo sde): gzhal med khang rnams la// dur khrod tsam du shes par gyur// 'dir ni bkod pa des mthong nas// lha dang mi rnams ngo mtshar gyur// bsod nams gang gi rgyu mthun 'dir// phun sum 'di 'dra 'di legs
172b1(mdo sde): mchar ka lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kyang // brtson pa bya ba med par yang // de'i yid la 'dod pa dang // bsam pa thams cad rab tu 'grub// ji ltar bsam pa gzhan dag kyang // sngon spyod chen rdzogs gyur pa// 
172b2(mdo sde): las de'i rnam par smin pa yis// 'di 'dra phun sum tshogs 'di byung // byang chub shing gi lha mo bzhis// lha'i shing ni yongs 'du ba// de bas khyad par 'bags pa yis// byang chub snying po brgyan pa byas/ 
172b3(mdo sde): byang chub snying pa'i bkod pa gang // lha yis mngon par 'dus byas pa// yon tan de dag tshig gis ni// thams cad brjod par yongs mi nus// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i lus las 'od
172b4(mdo sde): byung ba rnam par dag pa dri ma med pa// lus dang sems tshim par byed cing dga' ba bskyed pa// nyon mongs pa thams cad sel ba sems can dga' ba dang bde ba dang dad pa dang // mchog tu dga'
172b5(mdo sde): ba thams cad bskyed pa des klu'i bdag po nag po gnas blar byas par mthong nas de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po nag po rang gi 'khor gyi mdun du 'dug ste/ tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag smraso// 
172b6(mdo sde): gang phyir bdag gis gnas 'di gser gyis 'od kyis brgyan pa lha der gyur pa las// ji ltar 'khor ba 'jigs gi 'od mdzes mthong zhing gser zhes bya ba mthong ba dang / ji ltar 'od bsrungs chos kyi
172b7(mdo sde): rgyal po skyon med pa'i dri med 'od mthong ltar// mtshan mchog ldan zhing phan mdzad ye shes 'od ldan zhig byung the tshom med// sngon chad nyes par byas pa'i las kyis bdag gi khyim ni mun pas gang / 
172b8(mdo sde): khyim 'di na ni nyi ma zla ba dag gi rgya chen 'od kyang yong mi snang // me dang nor bu dag dang dri me klog dang skar ma rnams kyi 'od mi snang // brgya byin 'od dang tshangs pa'i 'od dang lha min rnams kyi 'od kyang mi snang
173a1(mdo sde): na// de ring khyim 'di'i nang du nyi ma'i 'od 'dra ba yi dge bas mdzes gyur la// sems kyang dga' bskyed cing lus kyang bde bar gyur la lus ni bsil bar gyur// lus kyi steng du
173a2(mdo sde): bye chen 'bab pa de yang bdag la bsil bar gyur pa las// skal pa bye ba mang por spyad pa byang chub shing drung bzhud pa shin tu gsal// klu mi tog mdzes dang bzang la dri zhim gos dang mu tig do shal dang / 
173a3(mdo sde): d+han dang gdu bung ga dang bye ma rnams dang bdug pa mchog rnams myur thogs la// klung byangs dag dang ma mo dbyangs snga sna tshogs kyis shing rnga dang rngarnga dag/ brdu zhing 'gro bkun gyi mchod
173a4(mdo sde): ban ba mdzad la mchod pa byed du deng // de ni langs te kA bu mo rnams dang ldan cig phyogs bzhir bltas pa dang / de nas ri bo ldan po lta bur gzi brjid rnams kyis legs par brdzun pa'is
173a5(mdo sde): ljang ba bla min bye ba dag dang tshangs pa'i dbang dang gnod sbyin rnams kyis bskor// dgara' ba'i yid kyis de la mchod/ byed bu la ni 'di zhes sngon ning 'dong ba mthong // klu'i rgyal
173a6(mdo sde): ba de ni rab tu dga' ring mgu nas 'jig rten mchog la mchod byas te// gus dang bcas pas de yi rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal thub pa'i mdun du 'dug/ klu'i bu mo rnams kyang dga' zhing mgu ba'i
173a7(mdo sde): yid kyis thub la mchod pa byed// me tog rnams dang spos dang byug pa dag kyang mthor zhing sil snyan rnams kyang byed// klu'i rgyal po rab tu dga' nas thal sbyar yang dag yon tan rnams kyis bstod/ 
173a8(mdo sde): 'dren pa 'jig rten ngam pa dgung zla' ba'i napa 'dra mthong bar gyur pa legs// bdag gis sngon chang drang srong rnams kyi mtshan ma mthong ba khyod kyang de 'dra ste// de ring khrod kyis bdud kyi dpung rnams
173b1(mdo sde): bcom ste bzhed pa'i go 'bangs brnyes par 'gyur// gang gi don du sngon mang dul dang sbyin dang bsdams shing bdog pa kun btang la// gang gi don dul dang tshul khrims byams dang snying rje ba dang bzod pa bsgoms
173b2(mdo sde): gang gi don du brtson 'grus brtan dang bsam gtan dgyes dang shes pa mdzad pa// khyed kyi smon lam de dag thams cad rab tu rdzogs nas de ring rgyal bar 'gyur// ji ltar ljon shing lo ma me tog 'bras bur
173b3(mdo sde): bcas pa byang chub shing la 'dud// ji ltar bum pa chab kyis gang ba stong dag khyod la bskor ba rab bgyid cing / ji ltar rtsa sha'i tshogs rnams rab tu dga' ste snyan pa'i sgra skad 'byin pa dang // ji ltar dang
173b4(mdo sde): ba khrung khrung tshogs kyang mkhar las mchi zhing tshul du shis ldan par// dang ba'i yid kyis drang srong la ni skor ba bgyid las de ring dgra bcom 'gyur// ji lta gser gyi kha dog lta bur mdzes
173b5(mdo sde): ba'i 'od rnams zhing ni brgyar mchis te// ji ltar ngan song / mtha' dag zhi bar bgyid cing skye rgu sdug bsngal thar bgyid/ dang // ji ltar nyi ma zla ba'i gnas kyi rgyun chad gser mngar
173b6(mdo sde): ngal bus ldang ba las// srid pa gsum du mye dang rga dang thar bar mdzad pa'i ded dpon de ring 'gyur// ji ltar lha rnams 'dod pa'i dga' bo spangs te khyod la mchod du lhags pa dang // tshangs dang tshangs pa'i
173b7(mdo sde): mdun na 'don dang lha rnams bsam gtan bde ba spangs pa dang // gang yang srid pa gsum na dbang phyug dam pa mchis pa thams cad 'di lhags las// srid pa gsum du skye rga thar par mdzad pa'i sman pa'i
173b8(mdo sde): rgyal por de ring byon// ji ltar lha rnams dag gis phyag dar bgyis pa'i shul de nas ni khyod gshegs la// bcom ldan 'khor ba 'jigs dang gser zhes bgyi dang 'od srung dag kyang de nas gshegs/ 
174a1(mdo sde): ji ltar pad+ma bzang po dri ma ma mchis rnam dag dogs brtol byung ste// de la stobs chen ldan pa zhabs kyi gom pa 'dor las de ring dgra bcom 'gyur// bye ba khrag khrig
174a2(mdo sde): stong phrag dum gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bdud // de dag rnams kyis byang chub shing drung nas ni khyod la bskyod pa g.yos ma nus// mchod sbyin khrag khrig brgya stong rnam pa du ma gang gA'i klung gi bye ma
174a3(mdo sde): snyed// khyod kyis mdzad cing 'gro la pan phyir spyad pa des na 'dir ni rnam par mdzes// rgyu skar zla bar bcas shing skar ma nyi mar bcas par mkha' las sar lhung gda'// ri mchog chen po rang gi kan+da
174a4(mdo sde): nas g.yo zhing rgya mtsho skams 'gyur yang gda'// skyes bu mkha sa pa la las khams bzhi po dag re re nas ni ston nus gda'// khyod ni shing gi rgyal po'i drung du gshegs nas byang chub
174a5(mdo sde): ma thob bzhengs mi gdar/ gang gi slad du kha lo sbyar ba mthong zhing mchod bgyis yon tan brjod pa dang // byang chub tu ma nga spo bas bdag gis rnyed pa 'phel ba rgya chen rnyed par 'gyur
174a6(mdo sde): bur bcas bdag dang klu'i bu mo thams cad skye gnas 'di las thar gyur cing // glang po dregs pa'i stabasu bzhud pa khyod kyi stabs des bdag cag mchi bar bgyi// dge slong dag de ltar klu'i rgyal po nag
174a7(mdo sde): bo'i chung ma dam pa gser gyi 'od ces bya ba// klu'i bu mo rin po che'i gdugs sna tshogs pra dang sil snyan sna tshogs thogs pa dang // mu tig gi do shal sna tshogs thogs pa dang // nor bu rin po che sna tshogs pa dang / lha'i
174a8(mdo sde): dang mi'i phreng ba brgyus pa thogs pa dang / khog bor sna tshogs thogs pa dang sil snyan dang klung byangs sna tshogs len pa rab tu mang pos yongasu bskor ning / mdun du bdang de byang chub sems dpa'i gan du 'dong zhing rin
174b1(mdo sde): bo che'i me tog mngon par gtor te tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gis kyang bstod do// 'khrul pa mi mnga' mi bsnyengs mi mdzes pag mi cha// mazhum mi dman rab tu dgyes pa gdul dka' ba// ma chags mi sdang ma chos
174b2(mdo sde): brnam pa mi mnga' ba// chags bral rnam grol drang srong khyod la phyag 'tshalo// sman pa zug rngu bral gdul bya 'dul mdzad pa// 'gro ba sdug bsngal rnams las thar mdzad sman pa mchog/ gnas dang skyabs ma
174b3(mdo sde): mchis shing dman pa mkhyen nas ni// 'jig rten gsum 'dir gnas dang skyabasu khyod byung ngo // ji ltar lha tshogs rab tu dad cing dgar gyur te// me tog char pa chen po mkha' las 'bebs pa dang / 
174b4(mdo sde): 'di dag ji ltar gos chen 'thor bar bgyid pa las// de ring rgyal bar 'gyur gyis rab tu dgos par mdzod// shing dbang drung du gshegs la bsnyengs pa mi mngar bzhugs// bdud kyi sde las rgyal
174b5(mdo sde): mdzod nyon mongs dra ba drol// sngon gyi rgyal dbang rnams kyis ji ltar sangs rgyas ltar// byang chub zhi pa dam pa mchog ni 'tshang rgyar mdzod// khyod kyis gang gis don du skal pa bye
174b6(mdo sde): mang du ka 'gro ba sgrol ba'i don du dka' ba spyad pa mdzad// khyod kyis dgongs pa rdzogs te dus la dbab kyis// shing dbang drung du gshegs te byang chub mchog reg mdzod// dge slong dag de nas byang chub
174b7(mdo sde): sems dpas 'di snyam du bsams te// sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ci zhig la zhugs nas// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas snyam mo// de nas
174b8(mdo sde): de yang 'di snyam du bsam te rtsa bting nas bzhug so snyam mo// de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyis lha'i tshogs brgya stong par snang la 'khod pa dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyis yongasu rtog pa
175a1(mdo sde): sems kyis shes nas// tshig 'di skad ces smras so// de de bzhin no// skyes bu chen po de de bzhin te sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa de dag rngu bting ba la bzhugs nas bla na med/ 
175a2(mdo sde): ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas so// dge slong dag byang chub sems dpas las gyi g.yas rol na 'tshong bkra shis pa zhes bya ba cu sngob 'jam pa shin tu gnon pa
175a3(mdo sde): nyams dga' ba/ lcang lor 'khyil ba lta bur 'dug pa/ g.yasu 'khyil ba lta bur 'dug pa rma bya'i mgrin pa lta bu/ ka tsa lin da'i gos ltar reg na bde ba dri rab tu zhim pa kha dog dang ldan pa yid
175a4(mdo sde): du 'ong ba dag rnga zhing 'dug pa dag mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang byang chub sems dpas lam bor te rtsa tshong bkra shis pa ga lwa ba der song nas phyin pa dang / rtswa tshong bkra shis pa la sAn ni
175a5(mdo sde): tshig gis smras te/ tshig de ni kun shes par byed pa dang / rnam par shes par byed pa dang rnam par gsal ba dang / mi gcod pa dang chags par byed pa dang / snyan zhing 'jebs pa
175a6(mdo sde): dang mkhan par 'os pa dang sdum pa dang dran par byed pa dang skul ba dang tshim par byed pa dang / dga' bar byed pa dang / mi rtsub pa dang sha sha bo ma yin pa dang / mi brlang ba dang / mi brkam pa dang / 'jam pa
175a7(mdo sde): dang snyan pa dang / rna ba bde ba dang lus dang sems shin tu dga' bar byed pa dang / 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang 'thab pa dang rnyogs pa sel ba dang / ka la bing ka'i sgra skad lta bu dang / bya ku/ 
175a8(mdo sde): na la dang / shang shang te'u la sogs pa sgra 'byin pa'i nga ro lta bu dang / rnga bo che dang klu dbyangs kyi sgra skad kyi nga ro dang ldan pa dang / gnod pa med pa dang bden pa dang / gsal ba dang yang dag pa dang tshangs/ 
175b1(mdo sde): ba'i sgra skad bsgrags pa'i gdams lta bu dang rgya mtsho'i sgra'i shugs lta bu dang / ri rdob pa'i sgra lta bu dang ldan pa dang / lha'i dbang po dang / lha ma yin gyis dbang pos mngon par bstod pa dang zab
175b2(mdo sde): pa dang gting dpag dka' ba dang / bdud kyi stobs stobs med par byed pa dang / phas kyi rgol ba'i smra ba 'joms pa dang / seng ge'i sgra'i shugs lta bu dang / rta dang glang po che'i sgra 'byin pa'i nga ro lta bu
175b3(mdo sde): dang klu sgra sgrogs pa lta bu dang 'brug zer ba'i sgra lta bu dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa dang / 'dul ba'i sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa dang tab
175b4(mdo sde): ta ba po ma yin pa dang / 'tshe ba med pa dang mi shol ba dang 'tsham pa dang rigs pa dang / dus su smra ba dang dus las mi yol ba dang chos brgya stong legs par brgyus pa dang / mnyen pa dang thogs pa
175b5(mdo sde): med pa dang / rgyun chad med pa'i spobs pa dang / ldan pa dang / skad cig gi skad thams cad sgrogs pa dang / bsam pa/ thams cad shes par byed pa dang bde ba thams cad bskyed pa
175b6(mdo sde): dang thar pa'i lam yang dag par ston pa dang / lam gyi tshig sa smra ba dang / 'khor las mi 'da' ba dang / 'khor thams cod tshim par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs
175b7(mdo sde): ba dang mthun pa ste/ byang chub sems dpas de lta bu'i tshig gis rtswa mchong bkra shis pa la tshig su bcad de smras pa/ bkra shis rnga dgang la myur du byin// de ring ngal du byin don chen 'gyur/ 
175b8(mdo sde): dpung dang bcas pa'i bdud ni bcom nas su// byang chub dam pa ni ba reg par 'gyur// gang gi ched du nga yis skal stong du sbyin dang dul// dul dang sdom dang gtong byas dang // tshul khrims brtu
176a1(mdo sde): zhugs dka' thub rab spyad pa// de ni de ring nga yis thos par 'gyur// bzod pa'i stobs dang de bzhin brtson 'grus stobs// bsam gtan stobs dang de bzhin shes rab stobs
176a2(mdo sde): bsod nams stobs dang mngon shes rnam thar stobs// de ni de ring la grub par gyur// shes rab stobs dang thabs kyi stobs dag dang // rdzu 'phrul stobs dang chags med byams pa'i stobs// sas
176a3(mdo sde): yang dag rigs dang bden pa'i stobs// de ni de ring nga la 'grub par 'gyur// de ring nga la na sbyin byas na ni// khyod la bsod nams stobs ni mtha' yas te// de ni khyod kyi ngan pa'i rgyur mi 'gyur// khyod
176a4(mdo sde): kyang ston pa bla na med par 'gyur// bkra shis pas ni 'dren pa'i tshig snyan rab rdzob nas// dga' zhing mgul yid rangs rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis ni// rtswa 'jams gzhon ning bzang la
176a5(mdo sde): reg par ldan pa spar gang thogs// mdun du 'dug nas rab tu dga' ba'i sems kyis 'di skad smras// gal te rtsa yis bya nga chub go 'phang dam pa 'chi med pa// mchog 'gyur ni ba balnga
176a6(mdo sde): dka' sngon gyi rgyal ba'i lam thob na// yon tan chen po'i rgya mtsho grags pa dpag med khyod bzhes shing bdag gis go 'phang dam pa 'chi med thogs mar 'tshang rgyar bgyi// brtul zhugs dka' thub rnam
176a7(mdo sde): mang bya dka' skal mang ma spyad par// bkra shis rtswa mchog bting bas byang chub 'di ni thob mi 'gyur// gang tshe blo gros ldan pa shes rab bsod nams thabs kyis 'phags// de nas rgyal ba thub pas
176a8(mdo sde): rdul med 'gyur zhes lung sngon to// bkra shis gal te byang chub skye bo gzhan la sbyin nus na// srog chags bsdub bya ste sbyin par yid gnyis khyodas pa// gang cheng yis byang chub thob shes bdud ci rnam
176b1(mdo sde): par dbyes// khyod 'ongs chos kyi dam pa nyon dang rdul dang bral bar 'gyur// 'dren pas shin tu 'dzum pa'i rtsa ni spar gang blangs// seng ge ngang ba'i stabs kyis chas nas sa ni rab tu g.yos// lha klu tshogs rnams
176b2(mdo sde): thal mo sbyar te rab tu dga' yid kyis deng 'dis bdud dpung bcom nas bdud rtsi reg par 'gyur snyam sems// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi shing drung du 'gro ba na lha'i bu rnams dang byang
176b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' deng 'dir 'dug nas byang chub thob par 'gyur zhing mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur snyam ste byang chub kyi shing brgyad khri brgyan par gyur to// 
176b4(mdo sde): de na byang chub kyi shing kha cig ni me tog gi rang bzhin lnga 'phang du dpag tshad brgya pa yang yod// byang chub kyi shing kha cig ni spos kyi rang bzhin can la 'bang du dpag tshad stong pa yang yod// byang chub
176b5(mdo sde): kyi shing kha cig ni tsan dan gyi rang bzhin can 'phang du dpagatshad 'bum pa yang yod// byang chub kyi shing kha cig ni gos kyi rang bzhin can la 'phang du dpag tshad lnga 'bum yang
176b6(mdo sde): yod// byang chub kyi shing kha cig ni rin po che'i rang bzhin can la 'phang du dpag tshad 'bum phrag bcu pa yang yod/ byang chub kyi shing kha cig ni rin po thams cad kyi rang bzhin la
176b7(mdo sde): 'phang du dpag tshad bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong pa yang yod do// byang chub kyi shing de dag thams cad kyi drung na yang ji ltar 'tsham pa'i seng+ge'i khri lha'i ras bcos bu sna tshogs bting pa bshams par
176b8(mdo sde): gyur to// byang chub kyi shing kha cig gi drung du ni padra'i khri stan bshams par gyur to// kha cig gi drung du ni spos kyi khri stan no// kha cig gi drung du ni rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi khri stan no// byang
177a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' ni rol pa bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rol pa bkod pa 'di la byang chub
177a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas skad cig de nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos legs par brgyan pa'i lus kyis byang chub kyi shing drung gi seng+ge re khri de
177a3(mdo sde): thams cad la 'dug par kun tu snang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' dang / lha'i bu so so'i yid la yang byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag nyid kyi seng ge'i khri la snyoms par zhugs shing 'dug
177a4(mdo sde): gi gzhan gyi la ni ma yin par sheso// ji ltar de dag gis shes pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rol pa bkod pa 'di nyid kyi mthus sems can dmyal ba dang / 
177a5(mdo sde): dud 'gro'i skyes gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad dang lha dang mi thams cad dang 'gro ba thams cad du skyes pa'i sems can gyi byang chub sems dpa' byang
177a6(mdo sde): chub kyi shing drung na seng ge'i khri la 'dug par mthong ngo // de lta mod kyi 'on kyang dman pa la mos pa'i sems can rnams kyi blo gros yongasu tshim par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rtsa spar gang
177a7(mdo sde): thogs te byang chub kyi shing ga la ba der byin pa dang / byang chub kyi shing la lan bdun bskor ba byas te bdag nyid kyis rtsa'i rtse mo nang du bstan rtsa ba ni phyir bstan nas rtsa'i gding ba kun nas bzang po bting
177a8(mdo sde): ste seng ge lta bu dang dpa' bo lta bu dang stobs lta bu dang / brtan pa lta bu dang brtson 'grus lta bu dang / glang po lta bu dang dbang phyug lta bu dang rang byung lta bu dang / ye shes can lta bu dang / bla na med pa
177b1(mdo sde): lta bu dang khyad par lta bu dang mngon par 'phags pa lta bu dang / grags pa lta bu dang brjod pa lta bu dang / sbyin pa lta bu dang / tshul khrims lta bu dang bzod pa lta bu dang brtson 'grus lta bu dang bsam gtan
177b2(mdo sde): lta bu dang / shes rab lta bung ye shes lta bu dang bsod nams lta bu dang bdud phyir rgol ba bcom pa lta bu dang / tshogs lta bur skyil mo krung bcas nas rtswa bting ba de la shar phyogasu bltas te
177b3(mdo sde): 'dug nas/ lus drang por bsrang ste dran pa mngon du bzhag nas 'di 'dra ba'i yid dam brtan po byaso// stan 'dir bdag gi lus ni skams kyang rung // lpags pa rus pa sha rnams zhig kyang rung // 
177b4(mdo sde): skal mang rnyed dkar byang chub ma thob par// stan 'di las ni lus bskyod mi bya'o// / byang chub kyi snying por b.rung ba'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu dgu pa'o// 
177b5(mdo sde): 'phags pa rgya cher rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po bcu gsum pa'o// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa dang 'dod pa na/ 
177b6(mdo sde): spyod pa drug gi lha rnams byang chub sems dpa' la bar chad byed par mi 'byung grangs snyam ste/ shar phyogs log su gnas par gyur to// de bzhin du lho dang nub dang byang phyogs kyang lha rnams
177b7(mdo sde): kyi yongasu bsrungs par gyur to// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' bskul ba zhes bya ba'i 'od byung nas 'ong des phyogs bcu kun tu
177b8(mdo sde): grangs med dpag tu med pa chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam kha'i mthas gtugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad sdang bar gyur to// de nas shar phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i
178a1(mdo sde): 'od kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bde ba bkod pa zhes bya ba 'od des bskul bas byang chub sems
178a2(mdo sde): dpa' bgrangs pa las 'das pa dag gi yongasu bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las
178a3(mdo sde): kyi phyirade'i tshe rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par 'du bya de lta bu byas te rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba de byas pas/ phyogs bcu na mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad 'khor gyi khyam
178a4(mdo sde): bai DUr+ya sngon po dag pa las byas pa gcig tu bstan to// 'gro bsngar skyes pa'i sems can thams cad kyi mdun du yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa ston to// sems ca
178a5(mdo sde): de dag kyang phan tshun du sor mo gcig gis byang chub sems dpa/ 'a ston cing sems can tshul shis pa'i gzugs 'di lta bu dang ldan pa 'di su zhig 'di ltar rnam par yangs pa'i sems can
178a6(mdo sde): 'di su zhig ces 'dzer to// sems can de dag gi mdun du byang chub sems dpa' des byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang sprul te/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs de dag gis tshig su bcad pa 'di
178a7(mdo sde): dag smras so// ci yang med pa'i 'dod chags zhe sdang rnyog pa gang yin bag chags bcas ston pa// gang gis lus las 'od phyung phyogs bcu'i 'od rnams thams cad 'od ni med par byas// gang gis
178a8(mdo sde): bsod nams ting 'dzin ye shes tshogs ni skal pa mang kun spel ba/ shAkya thub pa thub pa chen po dam pa 'di ni phyogs rnams kun tu mdzes// de nas lho phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phro ba'i
178b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che bkod par// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i gdugs brtsegs pa kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba 'od des skul bas byang chub sems dpa'
178b2(mdo sde): bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongasu bskor zhing mdun du bdar te byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir rin po
178b3(mdo sde): che'i bdugs gcig gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi khyams de bka go// de nas brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba dag kyang phan tshun 'di skad 'dzer to// gang gi phyir rin po che'i gdugs
178b4(mdo sde): bkod pa rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di snang bar gyur pa 'di su'i 'bras bu zhes 'dzer te de nas rin po che'i gdugs de la tshigasu bcad pa 'di byung ngo // gang gis rin po che dang gdugs spos stong phrag bye ba khrag
178b5(mdo sde): khrig dag/ byams pa'i yid kyis do zla med pa bzhugs dang mya ngan 'das la phul// de yis mtshan mchog ldan pa phan mdzad sred med bu'i mthu ldan pa// yon tan mnga' ba
178b6(mdo sde): byang chub shing drung gshegs pa de la mchod pa byas// de nas nub phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa me tog gi phreng ba dang / nags tshal gyi phreng ba me tog kun tu rgyas pa mngon par mkhyen pa'i sangs
178b7(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten khams me tog tsam pa ka'i kha dog du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+mo sa can zhes bya ba 'od nges bskul bas/ byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa
178b8(mdo sde): las 'das pa dag gis yongasu bskor zhing mdun du bdar te byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang byang chub sems dpa' gal ba der song sngo byin nas byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ rin po cher
179a1(mdo sde): dra ba gcig gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi khyams de bkab bo// de nas phyogs bcu'i lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dag phan tshun 'di skad mdzer te 'od
179a2(mdo sde): kyi bkod pa rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di su'i yin 'dzer to// de nas rin po che'i dra ba de las tshigasu bcad pa 'di byung ngo // rin chen 'byung gnas 'jig rten gsum dga' rin chen tog rin chen dam pa rin
179a3(mdo sde): chen grags pa de chos dgyes// dkon mchog gsum po rgyun mi gcad pa'i brtson 'grus brnyes// byang chub mchog brnyes gyur te de'i mchod pa 'di// de nas byang phyogs na de bzhin gshegs
179a4(mdo sde): nyi zla zil brlag par byed pa'i 'od dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams nyi ma 'khor bar// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'od des bskul
179a5(mdo sde): bas byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongasu bskor cing mdun du bdar te byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin nas
179a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir phyogs bcu 'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji snyed pa de snyed kyi 'khor gyi khams der kun tu bstan
179a7(mdo sde): to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kha cig 'di skad 'dzer te// bkod pa rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di su'i yin zhes mdzer to// de nas bkod pa de dag thams cad las tshigasu bcad pa 'di byung ngo // 
179a8(mdo sde): gang gis bsod nams ye shes shin tu mang pos lus ni rnam sbyangs shing // gang gis brtul zhugs dka' thub dag dang bden pa'i chos kyis dag sbyangs la// gang gis khrel yod mos pa byam
179b1(mdo sde): dang de bzhin snying rjes sems sbyangs pa// de ni shing rgyal drung gshegs shAkya khyu mchog de la mchod pa byed// de nas shar lce'i phyogs mtshams na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi rgyal po
179b2(mdo sde): snang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan gyi 'byung gnas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan gyi blo gros shes bya ba 'od des bskul bas// byang chub sems dpa'
179b3(mdo sde): bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongasu bskor zhing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi
179b4(mdo sde): phyir 'khor gyi khyams der yon tan gyi bkod pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa mngon par sprul te khang pa brtsegs pa de las sa tshig su bcad pa 'di byung ngo // gang gis yon tan
179b5(mdo sde): ngag gis lha dang lha min dang / gnod sbyin lto 'phye che dag / rtag tu yon tan bsgos// yon tan can te yon tan lnga/ na pa'i rgyal rigs skyes// yon tan rgya mtsho byang chub shing
179b6(mdo sde): gi drung na bzhugs// de nas lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen srog shing gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che 'byung bar byang chub sems dpa' sems
179b7(mdo sde): dpa' chen po rin po che 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'od des bskul bas// byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongasu bskor zhing mdun du bdar te byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang byang chub sem
179b8(mdo sde): dpa' ga la ba der song ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ 'khor gyi khyams der rin po che'i mkhan rten grangs med dpag tu med pa mngon par sprul te rin po che'i mkhar
180a1(mdo sde): teng de dag las tshigasu bcad pa 'di byung ngo // gang gis rgya mtshor bcas pa'i sa dang de bzhin rin chen rnam dag dang / khang bzangs skar khung bsil khang mchog dang zung dang
180a2(mdo sde): bzhon pa mkha' rten brgyan// me tog phreng ba mdzes dang 'dun sa dag dang bskyed mos tshal rnams dang // rkang pa lag pa mgo dang mig btang ba de byang chub snying por 'dug/ de nas nub byang gi phyogs mtshams
180a3(mdo sde): na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams sprin dang ldan par// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sprin brtsegs 'brug sgrags dbyangs
180a4(mdo sde): shes bya ba 'od des bskul bas byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongasu bskor zhing mdun du bdar te/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba
180a5(mdo sde): der song ste byin nas// byang chub sems dpa' la mtsho da ba'i las kyi phyir// dus kyi rjesu 'brang ba'i a garung/ sprin mngon par sprul te 'khor gyi khyams der can dang sbrul gyi sing
180a6(mdo sde): ngo'i bye ma'i char mngon par bab bo// dus kyi rjesu 'brang ba'i sprin gyi dkyil 'khor de las kyang tshigasu bcad pa 'di byung ngo // rig rnam par grol ba'i 'od kyi sprin gyis srid gsum thams cad khyab/ 
180a7(mdo sde): dam chos 'dod chags bral ba bdud rtsi mya ngan 'das pa thob byed char pa 'bebs// 'dod chags nyon mongs 'ching ba'i khri shing thams cad bag chags bcas te gcod par gyur// bsam gtan rdzu 'phrul
180a8(mdo sde): stobs dang dbang po'i me tog rgyas pa dad par byed pa 'byin// de nas byang dang shar gyi phyogs mtshams na// de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i gdugs mngon par 'phags pa snang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig
180b1(mdo sde): rten gyi khams gser gyi dra bas khebs pa na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gser gyi dra bas brgyan pa zhes bya ba 'od des bskul bas// byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis
180b2(mdo sde): yongasu bskor cing mdun du bdar te byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba der song ste byin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir khang pa brtsegs pa de dag
180b3(mdo sde): thams cad dang rin po che'i mkha' rten rnams byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa dag mngon par sprul te/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs de dag thams
180b4(mdo sde): cad kyang // lba dang mi'i me tog gi phreng ba thogs shing byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba de logasu lus btud nas/ me tog gi phreng ba sbyangs te tshig su bcang ba 'di smras so// gang gis sangs
180b5(mdo sde): rgyas khrag khrig sngon bstod cing // gus dang bcas pas dad pa che skyed la// tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs snyan pa'i tshigs smras pa// byang chub snying por byon la mgos phyag 'tshal// de nas
180b6(mdo sde): 'og gi phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu rnam par bltas par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i snying po zhes bya ba 'ong
180b7(mdo sde): nges bskul pas// byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongasu bskor ning mdun du bdar te byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang byang chub sems dpa' gal ba der song ste phyin nas byang chub
180b8(mdo sde): sems dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir bai DU r+ya'i 'khor gyi khyams der 'dzam bu'i gling gi gser gyi pad+ma rnams mngon du thung bar ston to// pang ma de dag gi snying po la bud med lus bye sdang ba/ kha dog dang
181a1(mdo sde): gzugs phun sum tshogs brgyan thams cad kyis brgyan bstan te/ lag pa g.ya sun mgul gdub dang gdu bu dang dpung rgyan dang / gser skud dang mu tig gi do shal la sogs
181a2(mdo sde): brgyan rnam pa mang po thogs shing me tog dang dar gyi lda ldi sbyangs nas/ byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ga la ba de logasu btud de tshig su bcad pa 'di smras so// gang zhig rtag tu
181a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas nyan thos dang // rang rgyal dag dang bla ma rnams la 'dud// khrims ldan rtag dran dga' la nga rgyal med// yon tan ldan pa de la bdud pa byos// de nas steng gi phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa
181a4(mdo sde): tshogs kyi dbang po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams tshe dgus kyi dam par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen dpo na mkha' mdzod ces bya ba 'od nges bskul bas/ byang chub
181a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' bgrang ba las 'das pa dag gis yongasu bskor cing mdun du bdar te byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang byang chub sems dpa' gal ba der song ste phyin nas byang chub sems
181a6(mdo sde): dpa' la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir na mkha'i dkyil na 'dug bzhin du phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na sngon ma thos ma mthong ba'i me tog dang bdug pa dang spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang
181a7(mdo sde): bdug spos dang / gos dang rgyan dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang / rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa dang rin po che dang / nor bu dang gser dang dngul dang mu tig dang rta dang glang po che dang shing rta dang
181a8(mdo sde): dpung bu chung dang gzhon pa dang // shing ljon pa dang lo ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu dang khye'u dang bu mo dang lba dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang / lha ma yin dang namakha' lding dang // mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen
181b1(mdo sde): po dang brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba dang mi dang mi ma yin pa ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad namakha'i dkyil nas char chen po mngon par bab ste thams cad dga' ba dang / bde ba skyed kyi
181b2(mdo sde): sems can gang la yang 'jigs pa'am gnod pa mi byed do// de bzhin du sbyar te de la 'di skad ces bya'o// phyogs bcu de dag rnams nas rgyal ba'i sras po gang // phan pa byed pa mchod par byang chub
181b3(mdo sde): lpags gyur pa// 'gro la ban pa de dag rnams kyi bkod rim dang // rtsa dang rim pa mdzes pa dag gis dpe tsam nyon// kha cig do shal khrag khrig rab tu sbyang byas te// na mkha' las ni 'brug ltar shin tu
181b4(mdo sde): sgrogs shing lhags// kha cig mkha' las me tog gzhal med khang ston cing // cod pan rin chen thogs la gtsug pud 'phyang zhing lpags// kha cig stong pa mtshan med smon med mchog brjod cing // 
181b5(mdo sde): sa la seng ge lta bur shin tu sgrogs shing lhags// kha cig/ sngon chad ma mthong me tog mdzes 'thor zhing // khyur mo/  de 'drar shin tu sgrogs shing lpags// kha cig rang gi
181b6(mdo sde): lus kyi kha dog stong ston cing // rma bya lta bur mkha' las shin tu sgrogs shing lhags// kha cig bde gshegs sras kyi yon tan phreng brjod cing // zla ba lta bur mkha' las shin tu rgyas shing
181b7(mdo sde): lpags// kha cig nyi ma lta bur 'od zer rab 'gyed de// bdud kyi gnas rnams thams cad mog mog byed cing lhags// bsod nams tshogs bsags kha cig dbang po'i mchod sdong 'dra'i// dri med
181b8(mdo sde): tog thogs byang chung po der lpag so// kha cig mkha' las nor bu na chen dra ba 'thor// zla bzla bzangs thang skyes rnam mdzes man dang // bar sha tsam pa ka dang sna ma'i me tog phreng // byang chub sems dpa'
182a1(mdo sde): shing rgyal drung na zhugs la 'thor// kha cig rkang pa gnyis kyis sa ni rab skyong la// sa bskyod nas kyang skye bo dga' bar byed cing lpags// kha cig ri bo lhun po lag na thogs
182a2(mdo sde): byed la// bar snang gnas te me tog skon bus 'thor zhing lhags// kha cig rgya mtsho bzhi po mgo la thogs nas ni// sa la spos chu 'thor te chag chag 'debs shing lpags// kha cig ri ca chod sdong
182a3(mdo sde): sna tshogs thogs nas ni// rgyang ring 'dug ste byang chub sems dpa ston cing lhags// kha cig tshangs pa lta bur zhi ba'i gzugs bsgyur te// yid zhi rab zhi gnas shing bsam gtan bsam pa/ de
182a4(mdo sde): dag ba spu dag las byams dang snying rje dang // dga' dang btang snyoms tshad med yid 'ong sgra 'byin lhags// kha cig brgya byin lha ltar stong phrag khrag khrig gi/ lha rnams dag gis mdun du bdar
182a5(mdo sde): nas lpags gyur cing // de dag byang chub shing drung phyin nas pal stur te/ brgya byin thogs pa'i nor bu rin chen sna tshogs 'thor// kha cig phyogs pa ni dag gi sbyang ba
182a6(mdo sde): ji lta bar// dri za srin po mi 'am ci'i yongs skor te// glog lte ra gsal ba'i me tog char pa 'bebs shing lhags// dri za mi 'am ci'i skad kyis ston pa bstod// kha cig me tog rgyas
182a7(mdo sde): ba'i ljon shing 'bras bur bcas// me tog bcas shing mchog gi dri ni rab 'byin la// lo mar sangs rgyas sras po lus phyed gnas thogs lhags// btud nas sa'i snying por me tog rnams
182a8(mdo sde): kyang 'thor// kha cig pad+ma ud dpal pad+ma dkar pos rgyas// pad+ma'i snying por sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan ldan gnas// de 'drar me tog rgyas pa'i rdzing bu thogs te lhags// chags med yid ldan
182b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' mkhas la bstod// kha cig lhun po lta bur lus chen bsgyur te lhags// bar snang gnas nas rang gi lus kyang rab tu 'dor// bor ma thag tu me tog phreng ba rnamasu gyur// 
182b2(mdo sde): stong gsum dag gi rgyal ba'i zhing rnams khebs par byed// kha cig mig gnyis sreg pa'i skal ba lta bu dang // de bzhin chags pa dang ni 'jig par ston cing lhags// de dag lus la chos kyi sgo mo
182b3(mdo sde): mang grag ste// de dag thos pas sems can khrag khrig sreg pa spong // kha cig mchu ni bim pa 'dral bzhin mdzes shing // kha bzhin rdzogs la mi 'am ci 'dre sgra sgrogs lpags// do shal sna tshogs
182b4(mdo sde): legs rgyan bu mo chas pa 'dra// de la blta bas lha'i tsho gas rnams ngoms mi 'gyur// kha cig rdo rje lta bur mi phyed lus can te// rkang pas 'og gi chu'i phung po 'bog cing lhags// nyi ma 'dra zhing zla ltar bzhin
182b5(mdo sde): rgyas snang byed la/ 'od byed nyon mongs sgron rnams bcom pa la cig lhags// kha cig rin po ches rgyan lag na rin chen thog sa/ zhing mang bye ba stong dag khebs par byed cing lpags/ som
182b6(mdo sde): mngal ban dang bde dang tshim bya phyir// rin chen me tog dam pa dri zhim char pa 'bebs// kha cig gzugs can rin po che'i mdzod gyur cig / kha spu rnams nas mdo sde khrag khrig rab brjod la// spobs
182b7(mdo sde): bam ldan ning blo gros ldan la blo mchog ldan// rgyags shing rab dregs skye bo rdzogs par byed cing lpags// kha cig ri bo lhun po rnga lngar thogs nas ni// rab tu gdung zhing mkhar las yid 'ong sbra 'byim ldas
182b8(mdo sde): de'i sgra ni phyogs bcur bye ba'i zhing gang ste// bdud rtsi ma thob ston pa ngo mod 'tshang rgyar sgrogs// // byang chub kyi snying por bkod pa'i le'u zhes bya nyi shu pa'o// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa'
183a1(mdo sde): la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dag gis byang chub kyi snying por bkod pa rnam pa de lta bu de dag mngon par byas par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyis kyang phyogs
183a2(mdo sde): bcu dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan bkod pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad byang
183a3(mdo sde): chub kyi snying po der kun tu bstan to// dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug nas 'di snyam du sems te/ 'dod pa'i khams 'di'i bdag po dbang phyug dbang bsgyur ba// bdud
183a4(mdo sde): sdig can de la bdag gis ma sbran par/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de ni bdag gi mi chas/ bdag gis bdud sdig can bskul bar
183a5(mdo sde): bya'o// de las rnam par rgyal na/ 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha la sogs pa thams cad tshar bcad par 'gyur ro// 'on gying bdud kyi 'khor na bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu sngon dge ba'i rtsa
183a6(mdo sde): bskyed pa 'khod pa dag gis nga'i seng ge'i rnam par rol par mthong na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyuraro snyam mo// dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpas de ltar
183a7(mdo sde): bsams na/ de'i tshe smin mtshams kyi bar gyi mdzod spu nas bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad mdzes par byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer cig byung ste 'od zer des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
183a8(mdo sde): khams 'di thams cad bdud kyi gnas thams cad snang bar byas nas/ mogo mog par byas te rab tu g.yos par byas par gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad
183b1(mdo sde): kyang snang ba chen pos yongasu khyab par gyur to// bdud sdig can gyis 'od de las rnam pa 'di lta bu'i sgra de yang thos so// sems can shin tu dag pa skal mang spyod spyad pa/ zas gtsang sras pos rgyal srid dag ni
183b2(mdo sde): rab spangs te// phan byed de ni bdud rtsi mngon par 'dod pas byung // byang chub shing drung 'ongs kyis de ring bsgrim bgyis// de ni bdag kyang rgal la gzhan yang sgrol bar byed// des ni bdag nyid grol bas gzhan yang
183b3(mdo sde): sgrol bar byed// de ni bdag kyang dbugs byin gnan dag dbugs kyang 'byin// yongasu mya ngan 'das nas gzhan dag mya ngan zla// ngan song gsum po ma lus stong par byed par 'gyur// lha mi rnams kyi grong khyer
183b4(mdo sde): gang bar byed par 'gyur// phan par byed pa de ni bdud rtsi thob gyur nas// bsam gtan mngon shes bdud rtsi bde mchog sbyin par 'gyur// gang tshe rang byung nyid kyis chos char mngon pab tshe// nag po'i rtsa lag
183b5(mdo sde): khyod kyi grong khyer stongs byed 'gyur// stobs med pas kyang stob/ sa med 'gyur te dpung nyams 'gyur// phyogs ni phyogs min ci bya gar 'gror shes mi 'gyur// dge slong dag de ltar bdud sdig
183b6(mdo sde): can bskul ba'i tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gis bskul nas rmi lam rnam pa sum bcu rtsa gnyis rmi so// rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na 'di lta ste bdag gi gnas mun pas khyab par rmis pa
183b7(mdo sde): dang rang gi gnas rdul gyis gang zhig gyo mo dang / bseg mas gang bar rmis pa dang bdag nyid sngangs skrag nas/ phyogasu 'bros par rmis pa dang bdag cod pan dang 'bral zhing rna cha lhung bar
183b8(mdo sde): rmis pa dang / bdag mchu dang gre ba dang rkan skams par rmis pa dang bdag snying kun tu gdungs par rmis pa dang / bskyed mos tshal gyi lo ma dang / me tog dang 'bras bu rnams snyis par rmis pa dang / 
184a1(mdo sde): rdzing rnams skams de chu med par rmis pa dang ngang ba dang / khrung khrung dang rma bya dang ka la bing ka dang / kun la dang shang shang te rul sogs pa bya'i tshogs rnams mdarag shog
184a2(mdo sde): theg par rmi ba dang / rnga dang dung dang rdza rnga dang / khar rnga dang rgyud gcig pa dang / pi bang dang rgyud gsum pa dang pheg dang khar ba'i sil grol la sogs rol mo'i cha byad rnams chag grugs te sa la ltung bar
184a3(mdo sde): rmis dang 'khor sdug pas kyang bdud spangs te/ ngo 'dzum gnag cing phyogs cig du dong nas/ sems shing 'khod par rmis pa dang / chung ma'i dam pa phreng ba can yang mal nas sa la lhung ste/ lag
184a4(mdo sde): ba gnyis mgo la rjod par rmis pa dang bdud kyi bu gang dag shin tu brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang shin tu brtson 'grus dang ldan pa drang shin tu stobs dang ldan pa dang / shin tu gzi brjid dang
184a5(mdo sde): ldan pa dang shin tu shes rab dang ldan pa de dag kyang byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam pa la 'dug pa la phyag 'tshal bar rmis pa dang bdag gi bu rnams kyang kyi hud yab
184a6(mdo sde): ces chos nges 'dod par rmis pa dang bdag lus la gos dri ma can gon par rmis pa dang bdag mgo rdul gyis gang la skye ru bseng bseng po dang nyam chung ba dang mdangs nyams par rmis pa dang / 
184a7(mdo sde): bsil khang dang khang pa brtsegs pa dang / skar khung dang rta babs rnams kyang rdul gyis gang nas rdib par rmis pa dang de'i sde dpon dang gnod sbyin dang srin po dang grul bum dang dri za'i bdag po
184a8(mdo sde): gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang skom tshugs bcas te ngu zhing chos nges btab nas byer bar rmis pa dang 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi lha'i bdag po 'di lta ste yul 'khor srung dang
184b1(mdo sde): 'phags skyes po dang mig mi bzang dang / rnam thos kyi bu dang brgya byin dang rab 'thab bral dang yongasu dga' ldan dang rab 'phrul dang / dbang sgyur la sogs pa gang yin pa de dag thams
184b2(mdo sde): cad kyang 'dud la mi gus shing byang chub sems dpa' la phyogs par rmis pa dang thab mo'i nang na de ral gri shubs nas ma phyin zhing bdag mi shes pa'i sgra 'byin par rmis pa dang / rang gi 'khor
184b3(mdo sde): gyis bdag por rmis pa dang / bkra shis kyi bum pa sgor lhung bar rmis pa dang / bram ze mes byin gyi bu yang bkra mi shis pa'i sgra sgrogs par rmis pa dang sgo ba kun tu dag byed kyang kun tu
184b4(mdo sde): mi dga' ba'i sgra sgrogs par rmis pa dang na mkha'i dkyil mun pas khebs par rmis pa dang 'dod pa'i gnas na gnas pa'i dpal yang ngu bar rmis pa dang / bdag gi dbang ba yang
184b5(mdo sde): dbang med par gyur par rmis pa dang rang gi phyogs kyang phyog/ sa ma yin par rmis pa dang nor bu dang mu tig gi dra ba rnam sa kyang chad cing rnam par chad nas drul bar rmis pa dang / 
184b6(mdo sde): bdud kyi gnas thams cad kyang rab tu g.yos pa dang shing rnams kyang bcad cing ba gam yang ltung bar rmis pa dang / bdud kyi sde bkod pa thams cad kyang khas bub tu 'gyel bar rmis te dge
184b7(mdo sde): slong dag de ltar bdud sdig can gyi rmi lam du rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di lta bu rmi so// de sad pa dang 'jigs skrag spangs nas/ nang mi thams cad bsogs te dpung dang bcas pa dang 'khor
184b8(mdo sde): dang sde dpon dang sgo ba dang de dag 'dus par rig nas tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag smraso// bdud des rmi lam de dag mthong nas nyams thag ste// sde dpon bdud po seng ge za 'gram
185a1(mdo sde): // zhes bya dang / bu rnams dag dang 'khor rnams gang dag yin la smras/ nag po'i rtsa lag de dag kun la yengasu dris// shAkya'i nang du skyes pa mtshan mchog yan lag spras// lo drug bar du bya dka'
185a2(mdo sde): brtul zhugs drag pos spyad// byang chub shing drung 'ongs kyis rab tu bsgrims shig ces// mdang gsum par snang las ni tshigs bcad de skad skrag/ byang chub sems dpa' de nyid rnam par sangs
185a3(mdo sde): rgyas nas// sems can bye khrag khrig mang po rnam rtog byed// gang che bdud rtsi thob ste bsil ba'i dngos reg tshe// des ning gnas ma lus stengs par byed par 'gyur// dpung chen rnams dang
185a4(mdo sde): lhan cig der ni rang dong la// shing dbang drung 'dug dge sbyong ga/ cig de gzhom par byed// yan lag bzhi pa'i sde rnams myur du rab tu sgrim// gal te nga la sdug sems phyi shel ma byed cig/ 
185a5(mdo sde): dgra bcom rang sangs rgyas kyis 'jig rten gang gyur gyi nga // mya ngan 'da' bas bdag dpung nyams chung yong mi 'gyur// de yang gcig pu rgyal ba chos rgyal gyur na ni/ 
185a6(mdo sde): bgrang las 'das pa'i rgyal ba'i rigs ni gzhar mi 'chad// dge slong dag de nas bdud kyi bu ded dpon zhes bya bas bdud sdig can de la tshigasu bcad de smras pa// yab cig ci nongs zhal mdas
185a7(mdo sde): nyams// thugs kyang 'phar la khod kyi yan lag nyid lag 'dar// khod kyis cigasan cigazigs myur du bka' stsol cig/ yang dag bsams nas de bzhin sbyong ba 'tshal bar bgyi// nga rgyal
185a8(mdo sde): med bdud smras pa bu gcig nga la nyon// ngas ni sdig pa'i rmi lam shin tu mi bzang rmis// de ring 'khor 'dir de kun ma lus spras nas ni// khyed rnams brgyal te sa la rab tu 'gyel bar 'gyur
185b1(mdo sde): ded dpon gyis smras pa// gal te thub dus bab ste rgyal na nongs ma mchis// gal te der ni bcom par gyur na nongs dang bcas// gal te khyod kyi rmi lam de 'dra'i ltas lags na// gzha// 
185b2(mdo sde): na dge ste g.yul ngor yongs ltas mi 'gyur// bdud kyis smras pa/ brtsal pa 'grub pa'i skyes bu g.yul ngor grags par 'gyur// gal te brtan la brtan te logs byas bdag cag rgyal// kho za
185b3(mdo sde): 'khor dang bcas pa mthong nas langs nas su// kho bo'i rkang par mgos phyag mi 'tshal de mi nus// ded dpon gyis smras pa/ rgya chen dpung bdog kyang ni shin tu mthu chung ste/ stobs ldan dpa' bo
185b4(mdo sde): gcig pu mchis na g.yul las rgyal/ gal te srin bu me khyer stong gsum gang gyur kyang / nyi ma gcig pu'i zil du brlag ste 'od mi bgyid// gzhan yang gang la nga rgyal
185b5(mdo sde): gti mug mchis la spyod ma mchis// mkhas dang mi 'bru na bgyid pa de ni gsod mi nus// dge slong dag de ltar ba dud sdig can gyis ded dpon gyi tshig ma mnyan nas/ yan lag
185b6(mdo sde): bzhi pa'i phung chen po stobs che ba// bab mo la dpa' ba 'jig su rung ba spu bang zhes byed nus pa// lha dang mi rnams kyis sngon ma ma'ong ma thos pa bzhin bsgyur ba rnam pa mang po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma bskur
185b7(mdo sde): ba'i rnam pa dang ldan pa// rkang lag sbrul brgya stong gi dkris pa dang ldan pa ral gri dang mdang gzhu dang mdung thung dang mnga' bo che dang sta gri dang rtse gsum kha gdengs dang bong dang / gtud shing dang be con dang zhag pa dang dbyeg
185b8(mdo sde): to dang 'khor lo rdo rje dang rdo rje rtse gcig pa thogs pa lus la go cha bzang po bgos pa mgo dang nang lag dang mig log par 'dug pa mgo dang mig dang gdong 'bang ba lto dang rkang lag dbyibs mi sdug
186a1(mdo sde): / ba bzhin gzi brjid drag po dang ldan pa shin tu bsgyur cing so gtsigs pa 'jig su rung bar mche ba gtsigs pa/ lce stug cing zheng che ba mang po 'phyang ba lce 'bar 'bu na lce re lde dang 'dra ba
186a2(mdo sde): mig me dang sbrul nag po dug gis brgyan pa'i mig ltar dmar bdag char bcug ste/ de la kha cig ni sbrul gdug pa za kha cig na na mkha' lding gi rgya mtsho nas phyung ba bzhin du lag 'thil du sbrul gdug
186a3(mdo sde): ba bzhag ste za/ kha cig ni mi'i sha dang khrag dang rkang lag dang mgo dang mkhal ma dang nang 'grol dang ngan sprugs la sogs pa za/ kha cig ni gzugs sngo bsangs dang kha ba pa po dang sngon po dang dper po dang
186a4(mdo sde): ser po 'dug ste/ 'jig su rung ba'i gzugs sna tshogs can kha cig ni mig zhigs pa dang / mig khron pa lta bu dang mig phyung ba lta bu dang mig 'bar ba dang mig gzur ba mi sdug pa kha cig ni mig log
186a5(mdo sde): ba dang 'bar ba dang mi sdug pa kha cig ni ri 'bar ba thogs te 'a gying ri gzhan la la zhon te 'ong kha cog ni shing rtswa thon bya/ sa te/ byang chub sems dpa' log su rgyug cing 'ong // kha cig/ 
186a6(mdo sde): ni phag na lta bu dang zhib ma lta bu dang glang po che'i rna ba lta bu dang 'phyang ba dang / phag rna lta bur 'dug pa kha cig ni rna ba med pa kha cig ni kang rus mang po sprul nas lus rid cing gsus pa che la sna zhom pa/ 
186a7(mdo sde): gsus pa bum pa lta bur 'dug pa rkang pa mgo'i thod pa ltar 'dug pa lpags pa dang sha dang khrag skams pa rna ba dang sna dang rkang lag dang mig dang mgo bcad pa kha cig ni khrag 'thung 'dod pas gcig
186a8(mdo sde): lag gcig mgo gcod pa/ kha cig ni sgra sha sha bo dang sgra mi snyan pa dang / 'jig su rung ba dang sgra rtsub pa dang ldan pa hu tu zhes bya ba dang pi tsi zhes bya ba dang hu lu dral zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin pa skyugs len
186b1(mdo sde): bdang dge sbyong go ru ta ma 'di shing dang chos te 'on cig ces zer chu sa chen ma na zhes zer ba dang / rab tu rgyob cig ces zer ba dang chings shig cig ces zer ba dang zung shig ces zer ba dang / chod cig ces
186b2(mdo sde): zer ba dang gtugs shig ces zer ba dang gtogs shig ces zer ba dang / bab bag tu 'o cig ces zer bdag go// kha cig wa dang ce spyang dang phag dang bung bu dang / b.lang dang glang po che dang rta dang rnga mo dang
186b3(mdo sde): rkyang ma he dang ri bo dang / g.yag dang bas dang ri dgas ltar sgo ska la sogs pa'i kha gdong sna tshogs 'jigs su rung ba spangs par byed pa mi sdug pa dang ldan pa dag go// kha cig ni seng ge dang stag dang
186b4(mdo sde): bog rgod dang dred dang / spre'uru dang gzigs dang byil dang radang lug dang sbrul dang / ne'u le dang / nya dang chu srin dang chu srin byas pa bsod dang rus sbal dang bya rog dang rgod dang 'ug ba
186b5(mdo sde): bdang rnam pa' lding lta bu'i lus dang ldan pa dag go// kha cig ni gzugs mi sdug pa dag gi// kha cig ni mgo gcig pa dang / mgo gnyis pa nas mgo brgya stong gi bar nga ldan pa dgan/ 
186b6(mdo sde): kha cig ni mgo med pa'o kha cig ni lag pa gcig pa nas lag pa brgya stong gi bar dang ldan pa dag go// kha cig ni lag pa med pa dag go/ kha cig ni rkang pa gcig pa nas rkang pa brgya stong gi bai re
186b7(mdo sde): ldan pa dag go// kha cig rkang pa med pa dag go// kha cig ni na ba dang kha dang snga dang lte ba'i khung nas sbrul gdug pa 'byin to// kha cig ni ral gri dang mdar gsungang mdung bung dang rtse gsum pa kha gangs
186b8(mdo sde): rang gra sta ngang 'khor lo dang mdar po che dang rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang rdo rje dang bong dang mtshon rtse gcig pa la sogs pa mtshon cha gsor zhing gar byed la byang chub sems dpa' la sdigs byed // 
187a1(mdo sde): // kha cig ni mi'i sor mo bcad nas phreng ba basmras te thog so// kha cig ni keng rus dang thod pa dag phreng ba lta bur brgyus te thogs so// kha cig ni lus sbrul gdug pas dkris so// 
187a2(mdo sde): kha cig ni mgo la zhugs ling me can thogs te glang po dang rta dang rnga mo dang ba lang dang bong bu dang ma he la zhon no// kha cig ni spre'u chug su 'dug pa khab lta bu'i spu can dag go// khe cig ni ba lang dang / 
187a3(mdo sde): bong bu dang phag rgod dang ne'u le dang ra dang lug dang byi la dang spre'u dang ce spyang gi spu lta bu dang ldan la/ sbrul gdug pa skyug cing lcags kyi thu lum mi de pa dang me 'byin pa dang lcags kyi zangs 'bar
187a4(mdo sde): ba'i char du 'bebs pa dang lce 'bebs pa dang rdo rje'i lce 'bebs pa dang lcags kyu bye ma chen po che'i char 'bebs pa dang sprin nag po sdus te rlung gi char 'bebs pa dang mda'i sprin bsdus te char
187a5(mdo sde): 'bebs pa dang mun gnag bstan pa dang sgra 'byon cing byang chub sems dpa' logs su rgyug pa dag go/ kha cig ni zhags pa bskor ba dang rin chen po spel ba dang / 
187a6(mdo sde): rgya mtsho chen po 'khrag par byed pa dang rin chen po las mchod ba dang ri'i rgyal po lhun po bskul ba dang / rgyugs pa dang 'bros pa dang yan lag dang nying lag 'thor ba dang lus bskor ba dang / 
187a7(mdo sde): gad mo cher dgod pa dang brang rdung ba dang brang la rdob pa dang mgo bsig pa dang mgo 'ab ri zhing skra gyen du 'greng ba dang phan tshun shugs phyung ste rgyug cing wa'i mig lta bus byang chub se der la 'jigs
187a8(mdo sde): par byed do// bud med rgan po dag kyang ngu zhing byang chub sems dpa'i gan du lhags te 'di skad du kyi hud nga'i bu longs shig longs la myur du bros shig ces 'dzer to// srin mo'i gzugs dang
187b1(mdo sde): sha za mo'i gzugs dang yid btags long ba theng po skom pa bkres par ring ba lag pa bgreng ba kha banus pa dag kyang ngu zhing 'jigs pa ston te// sngangs par byed cing byang chub sa nga'i mdun na rgyug
187b2(mdo sde): go bdud kyi dpung 'dus pa rnam pa de lta bu des dpag tshad brgyad bcu khor khor yug tu gang bar gyur to// bdud gcig gi ji lta ba de bzhin du stong gsum gyi stong chen po bye ba phrag rgyar gtogs
187b3(mdo sde): bi'i bdud sdig can rnam kyi dpung dag gis thad ka dang steng gang bar gyur to// de la 'di skad ces bya ste gnod sbyin grub bum lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs/ srin po yid btags ga 'i gzugs dang bcas
187b4(mdo sde): 'jig rten mi sdug drag gzugs ji snyed pa// thams cad sgyu y-i sa der ni sprul pa byas// mgo cig mgo gnyis mgo gsum ldan pa nas// mgo stong bar du ldan pa'i gnod sbyin dang // lag
187b5(mdo sde): gcig lag ginyis lag gsum ldan pa nas// lag stong bar du/ ldan pa rab tu mad// rkang cig rkang gnyis rkang gsum ldan pa nas// rkang stong bar du ldan pa gzhan yang mang // kha bzhin sngo la
187b6(mdo sde): lus ni ser ba dang // ba bzhin ser la lus ni sngo ba dang // ba bzhin dkar la lus ni gnag pa dang // ba bzhin nag la lus ni dkar ba dang // kha bzhin gzhan la lus kyang gzhan pa dang // de 'drir kas brnyan dag gi
187b7(mdo sde): dpung yang lhags// stags dang sbrul dang phag gi gdongs can dang // glang po rta dang bung bu rnga mo'i gdong / spre'u dang seng ge dred kyi gdong can dang // de 'dra'i / kha stong ldan pa'i dpung rnams lhags// ral ba rjes la 'jigs
187b8(mdo sde): ba'i gnod sbyin ma // lug dgi rus pa 'bar 'bur sba ba can// lus ni mi'i khrag gis rab tu sbags// gnod sbyin de 'dra bdag deng yang lhags// rkang pa dag ni dgor ba'i
188a1(mdo sde): rkang ba 'dra// mig gi 'bras du spre mi 'amathus// mche bdag ni glang po'i mche ba 'dra// kha ga dang 'dra'i bung rnams deng yang lhags// lus kyi das de su sri 'drabs/ 
188a2(mdo sde): mig gi 'bras bu gnyis ri rab tu 'bar// rna ba dag ni ri'i rna ba 'dra// kha gdeng de 'dra'i dpung rnams der yang lhags// kha cig dag de lag na dbyig pa zegs// theb mdung zung rtse gsum lag dazegs// 
188a3(mdo sde): kha cig ri be ldu dpe lag na thegs// 'jig su rung ba'i gzugs can gnod sbyin lhags// bshol thegs 'khor le thegs shing mig bsgyur dang // ri rtse chen po lag na zegs pa dang // rlung dang rdod
188a4(mdo sde): gnam lcags ral 'debs shing // gnod sbyin 'jig su rung ba der yang lhags// rlung ni rab tu gtong zhing char yang 'babs// brgya phrag stong gi gleg kyang rab tu 'byir// 'brug gi sgra yang
188a5(mdo sde): sgrog cing ljon pa bsgyel// byang chub shing gi lo ma tsam mi g.yo/ char pa rab tu 'beb shing rlung yang gteng // chu bo 'bebs shing chu yis sa yang gang // de ltar 'jig su rung ba mtshan me byung // de
188a6(mdo sde): nub me sems med shing yang sprul// thams cad dbyibs mi sdug cing gzugs mi sdug/ 'jigs pa'i gzugs ldan de dag mthong nas kyang // yon tan mtshan dang gzi brjid ldan pa po// lhun po lta bu sems
188a7(mdo sde): ni g.ye ba meng // sbrub 'dra zhing rmi lam mtshungs pa dang // smon dang 'dra bar ches rnams kun la rtog/ de ltar chos kyi tshul la rtogs pas na// legs nas pas ma gtan byed cing chos la gnas/ 
188a8(mdo sde): gang zhig nga dang nga'i snyim sems shing // dngos dang lus la yang dag mngon zhen pa// mi mkhas 'dzin par gnas des mthong na ni// 'jigs par gyur cing bdag kyang rab tu myos// shA
188b1(mdo sde): sras pos chos brten byung ba// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du rtogs// na mkha' lta bu'i sems dang rab tu ldan// dpung bcas g.yo sgra mthong yang myos pa med// dge slong dag de ltar bdud sdig
188b2(mdo sde): can gyi bu stong po de dag gi nang nas de dben la sogs pa bdud kyi bu gang dag byang chub sems dpa' la mngon par dad pa de dag ni bdud kyi g.yas rol du 'khod par gyur to// gang dag bdud kyi byegs
188b3(mdo sde): byed pa de dag ni bdud sdig can gyi g.yon rol tu 'khod par gyur to// de nas bdud sdig can gyi rang gi bu de dag la smras pa yul bu cags ni 'dri ba'i dpung gis byang chub sems dpa' gdul
188b4(mdo sde): bar bya'o// de nas g.yas rol nas bdud kyi bu dang dben zhes bya bas pa la tshig su bcad de smras pa/ klu'i dbang po gnyid log slong 'dod dang // glang po'i dbang po gnyid leg sreng 'dong dang// 
188b5(mdo sde): ri ngags rgyal po gnyid leg slong 'dod dang // de ni mi dbang legs gnas slong bar 'dod// g.yen rol nas bdud kyi bu blo gres ngan pa zhes bya bas 'di skad ces smras// bltas
188b6(mdo sde): pa tsam gyis snying ni rab tu 'gas 'gyur la// 'jig rten dag ni snying po ldan pa'i shing chen lags// bdag ni lta bas phog na 'gro ba 'chi phog ltar// 'tshe bar 'gyur ba'i mthu ni nga lag la
188b7(mdo sde): mchi g.yas rol nas dbyangs snyan ces bya bas smras pa// bltas pa tsam gyis shing yang 'gas na mi rnams la bdag sgrim ci dges shes smras snying po ga la yeng // gal te bltas pas ri ba
188b8(mdo sde): lhung po 'jigs gyur yang // de'i mdun du khyod ni mig 'byed yod mi nus// gzhan yang mi gang rgya mtsho lag pa gnyis kyos rgal 'dod cing // de'i chu ni brngubs te mthung bar nus gyur gyi// de yi ba
189a1(mdo sde): / gzhin dri ma med la mngon sum du// blta ba de ni debs sdug bsngal che zhes smras// g.yon rol ras lag pa brgya pa zhes bya bas smras pa// bdag gi lus 'di lag pa brgya mchis pa/ 
189a2(mdo sde): gcig gis kyang ri mnga' brgya pang bgyis te// dge slong de'i lus ni dbug par bgyi// yab cig bder 'gyur ma shol khyed gsheg shig/ g.yas rol nas blo bzang po zhes byabs smras pa// baspu rnams kyang
189a3(mdo sde): phyir lag pa min// lag pa brgya dang khyad par ci zhig yod// lag pa rer de ltar mdung yod kyang // de dag gis kyang de la ci mi nus/ ci'i phyir zher/ des ni 'jig rten 'das pa'i byams pa bsgoms// bya bas
189a4(mdo sde): lngan thub pa de'i sku la ni// dug dang mtshon dang me yis mi drug ste/ mchod Na 'phangs pa thams cad ma tig 'gyur// gzhan yang mkha' las dang tshul stebs ldan gang // mi 'am gnod sbyir ral
189a5(mdo sde): gr-i dgra snga thogs// mi dbang bzod pa'i stobs ldan de drung phyin// stobs cher stobs ldan dkur stobs chung 'gyur// g.yen ra la ras gzi brjid drag shul cad zhes bya bas smras pa// bdag ni
189a6(mdo sde): de'i lus bzang gi/ khong du zhugs te bsreg par bgyi// 'brog gi me ltar chung ngu yis// rkang dang bcas pa'i shing yang skams// g.yas rol nas mig bzangs kyis smras pa// khyed reri ri rabs yi rang
189a7(mdo sde): bzhugs te// thams cad pa lus sreg par nus gyur kyang // khyed dang 'dra ba gang ga'i bye snyad kyis rdo rje'i thugs ldan de ni sreg mi rus// gzhan yang ri bo thams cad 'grel yang sringad // rgya la tsho chen po
189a8(mdo sde): zad kyang srid // nyi zlas la lhung yang srid// sa ni zhu bar gyur kyang srid// 'jig rten don du rtse ma mdzad pa// thug dam nges par mdzad pa'o// byang chub dam pa ma thob par// shing chen drung nas bzhengs
189b1(mdo sde): mi sring // g.yon rol nas lag rings kyis bsgyings te smras pa// khyod ni gnas 'dir mchis bzhin du// bdag gi sug pas nyi ma dang // zla ba skar ma rnams kyi gnas// thams cad rab tu mnye bar
189b2(mdo sde): bgyi/ rgya mtsho chen po bzhi po las// tshul du shis par chab kyang blang // yab cig dge sbyong de bzung ste// rgya mtsho'i pha rol dor bar bgyi// yab cig dpung 'di gzhag tu gsol// khyod ni thugs ngan cha
189b3(mdo sde): ma mdzad// byang chub shing de drangs phyung ste// sug pas phyogs phyogs gtong bar bgyi// g.yas rol nas dang ba thob pas smras pa// gal te khyod ni dgas bsgyings te// lha dang lha min dri za bcas// 
189b4(mdo sde): sa dang ri dang rgya mtshor bcas// de dag las pas phyir rlog kyang khyod dang 'dra ba stong phrag ni// gang ga'i bye ma snyed rnams kyis// byang chub sems dpa' shes rab dang // de'i ba spu g.ye mo nus// g.yo
189b5(mdo sde): rol nas 'jigs byed kyis smras pa// dpung gi nang na bzhugs bzhin du// yang khyod ci smad rab tu banang // de la dpung grogs gal mchis// ji srang khyod de de la brnyas// g.yas ri la nas
189b6(mdo sde): gros rtse gcig gis smras pa// 'jig rten dag na nyi zla dpung ma mchis// 'khor los sgyur dang seng ge dpung ma mchis// byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni dpung pa mchis// 'on kyang gcig pus bdud ni gzhom par
189b7(mdo sde): spyod// g.yed rol nas glags ltas kyis smras pa// mdung thung rtse gsum dbrug te ral gri rta// glang po shing rta rkang thang ma mchis pa// dge sbyong gcig pu mchis pa de dag gis// de med dgum gyis
189b8(mdo sde): tsu bang ba snyas lab// g.yas rom nas bsod dpas brgyan gyis smras pa// sring bang bu ltar la byed mi shigs spu dang ldan// bzang dpas ge ba dbas brtson 'grus brtan pa'i ral grol ngas/ 
190a1(mdo sde): rnam par thar gsum bzhon pa shes rab gzhu lags yab// bsod nams sdebs kyis dor bdud kyis dpung las rgyal// g.yod rol nas phyir mi ldeg pas smras pa// 'breg me rtsal tshig
190a2(mdo sde): pa phyir mi ldog/ lebs pas 'phangs pa'i mda' yang phyir mi ldog/ mkha' las rdo rje 'bar ba phyir mi ldog/ shAkya'i bu las ma rgyal bdag gnas med// g.yas rel nas chos 'dod kyis smras pa// gshes
190a3(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa dang phrad na me yang ldog/ brag gi rtse mer bab na mda' yang ldog/ rdo rje sar bab de nas gang du 'gro/ zhi ba bdud rtsi ma thob da ni phyir mi ldeg/ ci'i phyir zhe na yab cig bar snang la ni ri mi bro bar rus kyang
190a4(mdo sde): gdar// sems can ji snyed kun gyi sems ni gcig bsdur rus kyang gda'// yab cig nyi zla rlung ni zhags pas bcing bar nus kyang gda'// byang chub sems dpa' byang chub snying po
190a5(mdo sde): las ni bskyod mi nus// g.yon rol nas nye bar ma zhi bas smras pa// lta ba'i gdugs pa chen pos lhun pe bsreg par bgyi// rgya mtsho chen po rnams kyi chab kyang skam par
190a6(mdo sde): bgyi/ bdag gis ngo med de nyid thal bar brlag par bgyi// yab cig byang chub dang ni dge sbyong gzigasu gsel// g.yas rol nas den 'grub kyis smras pa// gal te dug gis 'di kun
190a7(mdo sde): gang gyur la// stong gsum dam pa rab tu 'bar gyur kyang // yon tan 'byung gnas kyis ni gzigs tsam gyis// dug ni dug ma yin par rab tu 'gyur// srid pa gsum gyi gdug pa drag
190a8(mdo sde): po ni// 'dod chags zhe sdang de bzhin gti mug ste// de dag de yi sku dang thugs la med// mkha' la rdzab dang rdul ni med pa bzhin// sku dang gsung dang thugs kyang rab tu dag/ sems can kun la
190b1(mdo sde): byams pa'i thugs dang ldan// de la dug dang mtshor gyis yongs mi tshugs// de bas lab cig thams cad gazlog tu gsol// g.yon rol das dga' ba chags pas smras pa// bdag gis sil
190b2(mdo sde): snyan steng dag rab bgyis te// lha yi bu mo brgyad pa bye steng gis// chags par bgyis te gleng khyer mchog tu bkri/ 'dod la dga' bar khyod kyi dbang du bgyi// g.yas rol nas chos dag smras pa/ 
190b3(mdo sde): nge 'dir rtag tu chos la dgyes pas dgyes// bsam gtan dgyes shing bdud rtsi don la dgyes// sems can thar par mdzad dang bya bas la dgyes// 'did chags dga' la de bzhin dgyes mi mdzad// 
190b4(mdo sde): g.yon rol nas rlung gi shugs shes bya bas smras pa// bdag gis shugs kyis nyi zla mid bgyis la// nam mkha' las ni rlung yang rab tu btang zhing // yab cig do mod dge sbyong bzung nas ri// rlung gis
190b5(mdo sde): phub ma bzhin du gter bar bgyi// g.yas rol nas bdud kyi bu blo gros mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smraso// ji ltar khyod kyi shugs mgyogs drag pa ltar// gal te lha dang
190b6(mdo sde): rnams de 'drar gyur// de dag thams cad gcig tu 'dus pas kyang // zla med gang zag de la gnod mi nus// g.yon rol nas tshangs pa'i blo gros kyis smras pa// de 'da'i drag po phal cher gyur kyang ni// khyod kyi
190b7(mdo sde): cung zad 'dzem ma rus// bgyi ba thams cad mang pos 'grub lags na// gcig pu khyod la ji bgyi smos ci 'tshal// g.yas rol nas seng ge'i blo gros kyis smras pa// sa la seng ge khyung 'khong sdod pa byung / 
190b8(mdo sde): lta ba'i gdug pa dag kyang khrus pi 'khod// gza'i lda bded pa pa rel gad pa bo// skyes bu khru mcheg rnams kyang khrud mi 'khod// g.yon rel nas thams cad du gdel ba zhes bya bas smras pa// ji ltar khrod
191a1(mdo sde): kyi sras pa brtsod 'grus dang // shugs dang stobs dang ldan pa sgra sgregs pa// tshig 'bar de 'dra lab kyis sdod bsar gtab// myur dung dge sbyong de de gzhong du gzhung // g.yas rol das se
191a2(mdo sde): ge'i sgra sgrogs shes bya bas smras pa// nags tshal dag gi khrid da wa lang po// seng ge pad pader sgra yang sgregs// seng ges sgra sgrags 'jigs pa thob pa dang // skrag nas phyogs phyogs ngag tu rab tu bros// de
191a3(mdo sde): ltar bdud bu mi mkhas 'di dag kyang // mi mchog gsung ni ma thes de bar du// de dag spyi til byed cing byung rgyal spras// mi'i seng ges gsung sgrags 'bres par 'gyur// g.yon rol nas nye bar bsam pa sems
191a4(mdo sde): pas smras pa// bdag gis gang bsams byung du 'dir 'grub na// de ni ci slad dpung tshogs 'di pi la// gang phyir langs te myur du mi 'bros pas// de ni glen pa tshes gam 'tshal ba// 
191a5(mdo sde): g.yas rol nas der legs par bsam pa sems pa zhes bya bas smras pa// de ni mi glen pha rol gnod pa ste// khyed cag glar zhing shir tu ma sngangs pa// khyed kyis de'i mthu rtsal long la
191a6(mdo sde): shes// de'i shes rab stobs kyis thams cad pas// bdud kyi bu gang ga'i bye ma snyed// khyed cag rnams kyis de 'dra'i mthu rtsal can// de'i ba spu gcig kyang g.ye mi nus// gsang par bsams
191a7(mdo sde): pa mi 'grub smos ci dgos// khyod ni de la yid kyis gnod ma sems// gus dang bcas par dad pa'i sems su gyis// 'di ni srid gsum rgyal por 'gyur bas na// thab mo ma byed par ni slar
191a8(mdo sde): log shig/ de bzhin du sbyar te de ltar bdud kyi bu dkar po'i phyogs dang nag po'i phyogs pa stong du tshang ba de dag thams cad kyis so so nas bdud sdig can la tshig su bcad de smra so// de nas bdud
191b1(mdo sde): sdig can gyi sde dpon sde bzang po zhes bya ba des// bdud sdig can la tshig su bcad de smras pa// gang dag khyod kyi rjes 'brang brgya byin dang // skyeng dang mi 'am ci'i tshogs rnams dang // lha mir dbang dang
191b2(mdo sde): mkha' lding dbang po rnams// thal mo sbyar te de la phyag 'tshal na// khyod kyi rjesu 'brings pa ma lags pa// tshangs pa 'od gsal lta bu'i lha rnams dang // gnas gtsang ris kyi lha rnams de dag
191b3(mdo sde): kun// de la phyag 'tshal ba lta smos ci 'tshal// khyod kyi sras po shes rab can// stobs dang ldan zhing yid gzhungs pa// de dag byang chub sems dpa' la// snying dang mthur 'gyur
191b4(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo// dpag tshad brgyad cur khyab pa yi// gnod sbyin la sogs bdud dpung 'di// phal cher rab tu dang yid kyis// kun kyang nyes pa med pa lta// 'jigs su
191b5(mdo sde): rung zhing drag bsgyur ba// dpung tshegs ma bzang 'di gaN+DI gas nas// nge mtshar rmad gyur zhub mi mnga'// nges par ngo med 'di rgyal 'gyur// gang na dpung 'a
191b6(mdo sde): gnas pa der// wa dang 'gra ba sgra 'byin la// bya rog bong bu sgra 'byin pas// myur du slar ni ldog pa'i rigs// byang chub snying por gzig su gsol// pa ta kun ta nga pa dang / 
191b7(mdo sde): khu byug rma bya mngon skor bar // nges par do mong 'di rgyal 'gyur// gang na dpung 'di gnas pa de// rdul dang snag cha'i char bab la// sa dkyil me tog char bab pas// bdag gi tshig
191b8(mdo sde): bzhin ldog pa'i rigs// gang na dpung 'di gnas pa de// shang shong gyur cing cher mas gang // sa dkyil dri med gsal gyur pas// shes rab can dag ldog pa'i rigs// gal ta mi 'did lnga dris
192a1(mdo sde): / ba'i rarmi lam de dag mngon supa 'gyur// drang srong rnabs kyi yum brlag pa// de bzhin dpung 'di thal bar klog/ rgyal po 'gro ba drang srong mchog/ tshangs pas byin gyis khros byas pa// dar
192a2(mdo sde): dka'i rigs tshal tshig/ lo ma ba zhig tu rtsa ma skyes// drang srong brtul shugs spyod pa po// dka' thub ldan pa 'jig rten na// ji snyed 'khod pa kun gyi mchog/ 'thung po kun la mi 'dze 'di// gang gi lus la mtshar
192a3(mdo sde): rab 'bar// khyim nas kyang ni byung ba dang // nyon mongs ma byas 'tshang rgya zhes// khyod kyi sngon chad pa gsan tam// rgyal sras rnams kyis mchod don du// 'byor pa 'di 'dra 'di dag sprul// de bas nges par
192a4(mdo sde): sems can mchog/ sbyin sreg dam pa len par 'gyur// 'di'i mdzod spu dri med pa// bye ba khrag khrig zhing du mdzes// de yis bdag cag mog meg bgyis// bdud dpung des bcom gded mi 'tshal// 
192a5(mdo sde): srid pa'i rtse gnas lha rnams kyis// de'i spyi gtsug daltar mi nus/ nges par gzhan gyis ma bstan par// thams cad mkhyen nyid thob par 'gyur// ji ltar lhun po khyer yug dang // 'i zla brgya
192a6(mdo sde): byin tshangs pa dang // shing ljon rnams dang ri mchog kun// sa dkyil phyag 'tshal bgyid lags na// bsod nams stobs can shes rab stebs// ye shes stobs can bzad pa'i stobs// brtson 'grus stobs
192a7(mdo sde): dang ldan pa de// bdud phyogs stobs med mdzad par nges// glang pos som btang snod dang // seng gas ji ltar wa bcom dang // nyi mas srid bu ma khyer ltar// bde bar gshegs pas dpung bcom 'gyur/ 
192a8(mdo sde): tshig de skad thos pa dang // bdud kyi bu gzhan zhig shin tu khros nas mig dmar por bsgyur te smras pa// khyod ni gcig pu de'i sngags pa dag/ shin tu dpag tu med par brjod byed na// gcig pu des/ 
192b1(mdo sde): ni ci zhig bya bar nus// 'jig su rung ba'i dpung chen ma mthong ngam// de nas g.yas rol nas bdud kyi bu bdud rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya bas smras pa// 'jig rten nyi zla seng ge dang // 'khor los sgyur la
192b2(mdo sde): grogs byed med// byang chub bzhugs nas nges pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' grogs mi dgos// de nas byang chub sems dpa' bdud mthu chung bar bya ba'i phyir// gang mthong bas bdag dpung byang chub
192b3(mdo sde): sems dpa'i khri rir du zhug so// snyam du sems shing bdud bres par gyur pa dang // bres nas kyang ci yang ma yin ni snyam nas yang slar log ste 'khor dang bcas pas/ mtshon cha sna tshogs byang chub sa
192b4(mdo sde): nga ba'i steng du 'phen cing ri rab tsam gyi ri de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i steng du 'phangs pa dang me tog gi bla bre dang gzhal med khang du gyur te gnas pa dang gang dag mig gdug pa dang myur du bdug pa dang / 
192b5(mdo sde): dbugs gdug pa rnams me lce gter ba'i dkyil 'khor de yang bya nga chub sems dpar la 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gnas par bya ba'i phyir bad+ma 'dab ma 'argya ba rgyas pa lta bu'i bzhid snyid / dengs pa
192b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' lag pa g.yas pas mgo la brug pa dang / bdud kyis byang chub sems dpa'i lag pa na ral gri thogs par mthong ste lce phyogasu bres pa dang ci yang ma yin de snyam ras yang slar log ge// slar leg ras
192b7(mdo sde): kyang byang chub sems dpa'i steng du mtshor cha rnam pa sna tshogs ral gri dang mdang gzhu dang mdung zung dang mnga' bo che dang dgra sta dang / bong dang gtun shing dang mtshon rtse gcig pa dang / dbug the dang 'khor lo dang zo
192b8(mdo sde): ngag gang drung brang dang pa bong dang / zhags pa dang lcags kyi thu lul shin tu 'jigs pa du ba 'ber te/ de dag kyang 'phangs ma thag tu me tig gi phreng ba dang me tog gi bla brer gyur te gan so// me tog sil mar
193a1(mdo sde): yang gyur nas// sa la 'thor ba dang phreng ba'i chung por yang 'phyang bas// byang chub kyi shing brgyan par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'i bkod pa 'byor pa dag mthong nas bdud sdig car
193a2(mdo sde): phrag dog dang ser snas sems la gnod nga byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa// kye rgyal bu gzhon nu bzhengs bzhengs rgyal srid la spyod cig/ khyod kyi bsod nams de tsam gyis khyod kyi thar pa ga la 'theg/ 
193a3(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpas brtan la zab cing rgya che ba dang 'jam zhing snyan pa'i tshig gis bdud sdig can 'di skad ces smraso// sdig can khyed kyis ni gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin gcig gis 'dod pa'i
193a4(mdo sde): dbang phyug thob du zad de// ngas ni mchod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas gtan pa med pa'i mchos sbyin byaso// lag pa dang rkang pa dang mig dang mgo dag kyang bcad cing slong ba rnams la byir
193a5(mdo sde): sems can rnams thar par bya ba'i phyir// khyim dang nor dang 'brud mal cha dang // gos dang 'chags dang bskyed mos tshal/ rnam pa du ma dag kyang slong ba rnams la byin no// de nas bdud
193a6(mdo sde): sdig can gyis tshig su bcad de byang chub sems dpa' la slar smras pa// sngon chad kho bos mchod sbyin kha na ma theb med// gtan pa med par byas pa khyod 'dir dbang du yod// khyod la 'di nadas
193a7(mdo sde): bo gang yang yod min pas// smras kyang phan pa ci yid khyed ni phan par gyur// byang chub sems dpas smras pa// sdig can sa 'di ni nga'i dbang yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpas bdud sdig can
193a8(mdo sde): dang bdud kyi 'khor la byas pa dang snying rje sngon tu 'gro ba'i sems kyis khyab par byas nas seng ge ltar mi 'jigs mi skrag la// bag tsha ba med cing mi man la ma zhum pa dang ma 'khrugs pa dang pa brnyogs pa/ 
193b1(mdo sde): dang 'jigs pa dang spu zing zhes byed pa med par lag 'thil na du dang rgyal mtshan dang nya dang bum pa dang bkra shis pa dang lcags su dang 'khor lo'i mtshan ma yod pa/ sor mo bor dra bar 'brel ba sen po shin tu mdzen
193b2(mdo sde): shing zangs kyi ldeg ltar 'dug pas brgyan pas/ 'jam zhing gnyen la shin tu gzhon pa skal pa dpag tu med par dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshigs bsags pas grub pa'i lag pa g.yas pas lus thams
193b3(mdo sde): cad la blugs na tshul du shes par brdabs te de'i tshe tshig su bcad pa 'di yang smraso// sa 'di 'gro ba kun gyi gnas yin te// rgyu dang mi rgyu snyems shing nye mgon med// 'di na
193b4(mdo sde): bdag gi dbang ste bdag brdzun med// 'di la khyod ni bdag gi dbang byos shig/ byang chub sems dpas sa chen po 'di la reg ma thag tu rnam pa drug tu g.yos// rab tu g.yos/ kun tu ra
193b5(mdo sde): tu g.yes so// che mtsham rab tu tsham tsham kun tu rab tu chem chem mo// 'di lta ste dper na/ yul ma ga ta'i gdang khar sgra 'thung zhing sgra rgyud ring ba de bzhin dus chen po 'di
193b6(mdo sde): yang byang chub sems dpas lag pas bsnun ma thag tu sgra 'byung zhing sgra rgyun ring du thung // 'phags pa brgya che rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// 
193b7(mdo sde): mang bcu bzhi pa/ de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nas sa'i lha mo chen mo brtan ma zhes bya ba// sa'i lha me'i 'khor bye ba phrag brgya dang ldan pa
193b8(mdo sde): gang yin pa nges pa cher po de thams cad g.yos par byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig dus la brtol te lus rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa phyed phyung nas byang / 
194a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' ga la de lag su lus btud de thal me spyad nas// byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces smras// de de bzhin te/ skyes bu chen po de de bzhin de/ 
194a2(mdo sde): khyod kyis ji skad gsungs pa bzhin te 'di ni bdag la mngon sum mo// de lta lags med kyi 'od kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das nyid lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi dbang du gyur pa dang / tshad mar gyur
194a3(mdo sde): pa dam pa lag so// sa'i lha mo chen mo brtan mas de skad ces smras nas rnam pa du bar bdud sdig can gyi klags ni med par byas// byang chub sems dpa' la ni bstod de/ rang gi mthu rnam pa mang po
194a4(mdo sde): bstan nas/ 'khor dang bcas te de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// g.yon can dpung bcas sgra de thos nas ni// nag su seng gres sgra sgags was thos dang // bya rog rdo 'phangs mod la
194a5(mdo sde): 'byer ba bzhin// sngangs skag snying gas thams cad rab tu byed// de nas bdud sdig can sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste// yi ma rangs la skyengs bzhin du nga rgyal gyi zil gyis don
194a6(mdo sde): pas ma song la// phyir yang ma log cing bros kyang ma bros te phyir bltas nas yang dpung rnams la smras pa/ khyed lhan cig 'dus te cung zad cig sdod cig rnam pa 'di lta bu'i sems can rin po che gle
194a7(mdo sde): bur du chud mi gzan par kho bos rje su 'chags pas 'di bslang bar nus sam mi nus sad par bya'o// de nas bdud sdig can gyis rang gi bu mo rnams la smras pa/ bu mo khyed dong ste/ byang chub
194a8(mdo sde): kyi snying por song la byang chub sems dpa' 'dod chags dang bcas pa 'am/ 'on te 'dod chags med cing gti mug can nam 'on te shes rab can nam/ ci ldongs pa zhig gam 'on te phyogs shes
194b1(mdo sde): pa zhig gam 'on te dpung gnyen med pa zhig gam/ dman pa zhig gam brtan pa zhig yin pa dgom shig/ tshig de thos na bdud kyi bu mo de dag byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba dang / byang chub sems dpa
194b2(mdo sde): ga la ba der song ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du 'khod de/ bud med kyi sgra rnams pa sum cu rtsa gnyis nye bar bstan to// rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste de'i nang nas kha
194b3(mdo sde): cig ni bzhin phyed 'gebs pa dang / kha cig ni nu ma mkhrang zhing 'bur bston pa dang / kha cig ni cung zad 'dzum pas so'i phreng ba ston pa/ kha cig ni lag pa brkyang ste bya ba spangs byed cing mtshan
194b4(mdo sde): khung ston pa dang / kha cig dri brim pa ltar dmar ba'i mchu ston pa kha cig ni mig phyed btsums te/ byang chub sems dpa' wa blta zhing bltas nas myur ba myur bar 'dzum pa dang / kha cig/ 
194b5(mdo sde): ni num phyed g.yegs te ston pa dang / kha cig ni gos snyil bar byas te gser gyi phag ska dang bcas pa'i rkyer ba ston pa da/  kha cig ni dugu la srab mo gyon te gser gyi phag ska
194b6(mdo sde): bcas pa'i rkang pa ston pa dang / kha cig ni rkang gdub sgra sil sil 'byin pa dang / kha cig ni nu pa'i bar nas phreng ba cig nye bar ston pa dang / kha cig ni brla phye tsam brjes par nye bar
194b7(mdo sde): ston pa dang / kha cig ni mgo dang phrag pa dag la bya 'dab skyeng dang ne tse dang ri skegs 'dug par nye bar ston pa dang / kha cig ni byang chub sems dpa' la mig zur gyis lta ba dang / kha cig
194b8(mdo sde): ni gos legs par bgos kyang mgo pa legs pa lta bur 'ches pa dang kha cig ni rked pa dang / gser gyi phag skang skyod pa dang / kha cig ni 'khrul pa ltar 'chos shing skegs te/ par
195a1(mdo sde): tshun 'chags pa dang kha cig ni gar byed pa dang / kha cig ni glu len pa dang / kha cig ni bsgegs shing ngo tsha ltar yang 'chos pa dang / kha cig ni rku shing rlung gis
195a2(mdo sde): bskyed pa ltar brla skal pa dang kha cig ni brjed pa'i sgra 'byin pa dang / kha cig ni seng ras bgos te gser gyi bag ska dril bu can bcings nas dgod cing 'chag pa dang / kha cig no gos dang rgyad
195a3(mdo sde): rnams la 'das zhing che ba ltar yang len pa dang kha cig ni gsang ba dang gsal ba'i rgyan thams cad nye bar ston pa dang kha cig ni lag pa spos kyis bskus pa ston pa dang / kha cig ni khur ba bskus shing
195a4(mdo sde): rnacha yang ston pa dang / kha cig ni mgo yang g.yogs shing bzhin yang g.yogs la skad cig tsam gyis ston pa dang / kha cig ni sngon dgod dgod pa dang dga' dga' ba dang / rtse rtse ba na rkun drar par
195a5(mdo sde): byed cing yang ngo tsha ba ltar 'dug pa dang kha cig ni gzhon nu'i gzugs dang / bu brtsas pa'i gzugs dang na chung tshad la bab pa'i gzugs ston pa dang kha cig ni 'dod pa dang ldar pas
195a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' la skyugs pa dang kha cig ni byang chub se mas dpa' la me tog sil ma 'thor ba dag ste byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du 'dug nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa la rtog
195a7(mdo sde): cing gdong du yang lta ste/ 'di ci chags pa'i dbang pos lta 'am/ 'on te mig rgyang ring du lta 'am g.yo 'am mi g.yo zhes ltas nas byang chub sems dpa'i bzhin dag cing dri ma med la/ sgra gcan
195a8(mdo sde): las thar pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur 'dug pa dang nyi ma thog mar shar ba lta bu dang gser gyi mchod sdong lta bu dang / pad+ma 'dab ma stong pa brgyas pa lta bu dang gtor bar bya bar gtor ba'i ma
195b1(mdo sde): tog lta bu dang / lhun po ltar mi g.yo ba dang 'khor yug ltar mngon par 'phags pa dang dbang po shin tu bsrungs pa dang glang po ltar sems shin tu dul bar mthong ngo // de nas bdud kyi bu me de dag gi
195b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' shin tu chags par bya ba'i phyir klu dang gar du sbyar ba'i phyir tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag smraso// dus kyi dpa pases ka bzang la bab// zhugs shing me tig rgyas shing sa
