195b3(mdo sde): bar rol// khyed kyi gzugs ni gzugs bzang mdzes pa ste// mtshan gyis spras pa'i dbang du bdag cag gyur// bdag cag skyes pa legs skyes dbyibs legs te// lha pi bde ba'i rkyer du bdag
195b4(mdo sde): cag byung // byang chub rnyed dkas thugs ni slar sbyar la// byur du bzhengs la dar la bab pa spyod// khyod kyi ched du chas nas rab tu brgyan te lcags gyur pa// lha'i bu mo lags par brgyad pa 'di dag
195b5(mdo sde): rnams la gzigs// gzugs 'di ltas nas shing rul lta bur sreg tsam lus pa yang // chags par 'gyur na chags bas dga' ba su zhig chags mi 'gyur// skra 'jam shir tu dri zhim
195b6(mdo sde): dri dang ldan// cod pad rna Na 'dab ris bzhin rgyas la// 'phral ba legs shing legs byugs bzhin dang ldan// pad+ma rgyas pa lta bur mig yangs legs// kha bzhin zla ba nya ba lta bu ste// shing tog bim
195b7(mdo sde): smid 'dri sa chu dang ldan// dung dang kunang kha bkar so lngar// sdug pa dga' la chags pa rnams la gzigs// num shin du mkhrang zhing rgyas la 'bur// lto ba'i rkye ra gnyer gsum shing tu mdzes/ 
195b8(mdo sde): rkang pa 'khor sa lta bur yangs shing mdzes// na chung shin du mdzes la mgod pe gzigs// glang po'i sde 'dra brla ldan zhing // lag pa gdu bus chal par gang bcar// rkeng pa gser gyi bag
196a1(mdo sde): skarab mdzes brgyad// khyod kyi bran mo 'di la 'gon po gzigs// ngang pa'i stobs lngar ngal gyis mchi bgyid pa// 'jams shing yid 'ong 'ding ldan mdzes pa smra// rnam pa
196a2(mdo sde): 'di ltar shin tu legs brgyan la// lha'i dga' ba rnams la shin tu mkhas// glu dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra gar rab bslabs// dga' ba'i ched du mdzes pa'i gzugs car skyes// 'dod la rab dga'
196a3(mdo sde): gal te pi bzhed ra// 'jig rten dgar khyod ni shin tu bsrubs// mi glen der gyi bde ba mi shes 'ga'// gter mthong nas ni 'bros par bgyid pa ltar// khyed kyang 'dod chags mi mkhyen rang lhags
196a4(mdo sde): pa na chung rnams la mi sbyong nga dang 'dra// dge slong dag de nas byang chub sems dpa' mig mi 'dzums par 'dzum phul te bzhin gyi 'dzum phyung zhing dbang po rnams par ma 'khrug pa dang lus ma bcos pa
196a5(mdo sde): dang / brjid pa dang chags pa dang mi snang ba dang ma rmongs pa dang ri'i dbang po ltar mi g.yo ba dang ba zhub pa dang ma gyur pa dang / 'dzem pa med pa dang bro shin tu legs par gnas pa dang nyo
196a6(mdo sde): mongs pa rnams shin tu spang ba'i phyir// rang gi kha na las pa'i ye shes kyi sgra dang 'jam zhing snyan pa'i tshig dang tshangs pa las lhog pa'i nga ro bya ka la bing ka'i sgra dbyangs snyan pa dang yid du 'ongs
196a7(mdo sde): bas bdud kyi bu mo de dag la tshigs su bcad pas slar smras pa// 'dod pa sdug bsngal mang po la sogs sdug bsngal rtsa ba ste// mi mkhas rnams la bsam gtan rdzu 'phrul dka' thub nyams
196a8(mdo sde): par byed// bud med 'dod pa'i yon tan chog pa med ces mkhas pas smras// nga ni mi mkhas rnams la shes rab chog par byed par 'gyur// 'dod pa sten na srad pa'i phyir zhing rnam par 'phel
196b1(mdo sde): 'gyur te// dper mi dga' la la tsha chu 'thungs par gyur pa bzhin// de la bzhugs pa dag gi don min gzhan gyi don kyang min// nga ni bdag gi don dang gzhan gyi don la spro ba yin// khyed kyi gzugs
196b2(mdo sde): ni chu bur dag dang dbu ba mtshungs zhing 'dra// sgyu ma'i tshen ltar rang gi blo yis rnam par bsgrubs pa ste// rmi lam dag na brtse ba lta bur mi brtan po rtag kyang // byis pa mi mkhas rnams kyi sems ni/ 
196b3(mdo sde): rtag tu rmongs par byed// mig ni chu'i chu bur mtshus shing lpags pas g.yogs// khrag brlang mkhrang zhing 'bur ba dper na nad kyi 'bras dang mtshungs// lha ni gcin dang byis sogs te shin tu
196b4(mdo sde): mi gtsang ba// sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor las dang nyon mongs pa las yang dag byung // byis pa'i blo can dag de rmongs gyur phyin ci log pa yis// lus gang las ni lag par rtog pa mkhas pa de lta yin// 
196b5(mdo sde): sdug bsngal rtsa bar gyur pa'i 'khor bar gyur pa'i 'khor byed na/ sems can dmyal ba rnamasu sdug bsngal mi bzad mang be nga // rkang pa nas ni rab tu yid mi 'ong ba'i dri can 'dzag/ brla dang
196b6(mdo sde): byid pa rkang pa dag na 'khrul 'khor lta bur gnas// nga yis khyed la yang dag brtags ra sgyu ma ji bzhin te// phyin ci log gi rgyu dang rkyen las byung bar gyur pa yid// 'phags pa'i ye shes lam las gos
196b7(mdo sde): bar phyin ci log gyur pa// be dang dug gi lo ma 'dra zhing sbrul chen khros 'dra ba// 'dod pa'i yon tan min zhing yon tan nyams mthong na// de la byos pa bde ba'i 'du shes skyed cing rgyal bar gyur// mi gang 'dod pas
196b8(mdo sde): bud med rnams kyi khol por gyur pa dang // gang zhig chos kyi dga' ba bor te 'dod pas dga' byed cing // dga' las brkam pa de ni tshul khrims lam las gol gyur cing // bsam gtan lam gos blo nyams len
197a1(mdo sde): las ni rab ring gnas// nga ni 'dod chags zhe sdang lhan cig gnas pa ma yin te// rtag dang sdug dang bdag dang lhan cig gnas par byed ma yin// mi dga' ba dang dga' dang ldan cig/ 
197a2(mdo sde): gnas pa ma yin la// nga yi sems ni rab tu grol te mkha' la rlung dang 'dra// gal te khyed 'dra'i 'gro ba kun gyis 'dir ni gang gyur la// skal pa de dag rnams dang lhan cig 'dre zhing gnas kyang ni// ngal ba
197a3(mdo sde): ba med cing chags med gti mug mi 'gyur te// rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs ni namakha' mtshungs shing 'dra phyir ro// lha dang lha mo shin tu dri med la// khrag dang rus pa med cing rab bzang ba// de dag kur
197a4(mdo sde): kyang 'jig pa cher gnas te// rtag dngos bral zhing ther zug med phyir ro// de nas bdud kyi bu mo bud med kyi rgyu rnams shin tu bslabs pa de dag de bas kyang cher 'dod chags dang rgyags pa dang dregs pa
197a5(mdo sde): bsgred de bstag pa brtan nas// lus rnams brgyan de bud med kyai g.yo nye bar bstan nas// byang chub sems dpa' la rjod de de la 'di skad ces bya ste// bu mo nang na ces mchog sre
197a6(mdo sde): dga' can lhan cig tu// bdud kyis btang ba tshul du shis pa rings par lhags gyur te// shing gi lcag ma gzha nu lo mar bcas pa rlung gis bskyod pa bzhin// gar byed cing ni rgyal po'i sras po shing drung
197a7(mdo sde): 'dug la rjod par byed// dus kyi nang na dam pa mchog tu bgyi ba ses ka'i dus ni 'di lta ste// skyes pa dag dang bud med dga' bar byed cing mun pa rdul yang bcom// khu blugs dang ni ngang pa rma bya sgra 'byir bya
197a8(mdo sde): tshogs rnams kyis gang // 'dod pa'i yon tan dga' ba myed bar bgyi ba'i dus drab pa// bskal pa steng du tshul khrims dga' zhing brtul zhugs dka' thub spyad gyur pa// re'i rgyal po lta bur mo
197b1(mdo sde): / g.yo nyi mang shar ma thag pa'i gzugs// 'brug bsgrags lta bur sgra snyan ri dgas dbang pos sgra bsgrags 'dra ba bo// 'gro la phan pa byed pa de yis don dang ldan pa'i tshigs smras pa// 'dod pa rtsed dang ngagra dang thab
197b2(mdo sde): dang nyen mongs bcas dang 'jigs byed pa// byis pa'i skye bos nye bar snyen gyi mkhas pa'i skye bos rtag spangs pa// gang du bde gshegs rnams kyis bdud rtsi rnyed pa'i dus la ba' gyur gyis// dbang bdu
197b3(mdo sde): las rgyal te stobs btsurna ma dang ldan pa dgra bcom gyur// sgyu rnams snyan nas smras pa zhal ras pad+ma 'dra ba gsung du gsol// khyed ni rgyal po dbang phyug dam pas bdag cag stobs dang ldan par
197b4(mdo sde): 'gyur// bud med dam pa'i tshogs kyis sil snyan stong dag rab tu bgyid 'gyur na// thub pa'i cha byad kyis ni ci bgyis spongs la dga' ba sten du gsol// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ 
197b5(mdo sde): nga ri sring ba gsub dbang phyug lha dang mi rnams kyis mchod la// chos kyi 'khor los 'gro zhing stobs bcu'i stobs dang lnga/ na pa'i rgyal por 'gyur// slob dang mi slob bu rnams khrag
197b6(mdo sde): khrig rtag tu 'dungad ba mngon du byed// chos kyi dga' bas dga' yo yul lang yid dga' ma yin// de dag gis smras pa/ ri shog dar la bab pa ma yo drang po ther bur gyur pa dang // khyod
197b7(mdo sde): shig snyan gyis ma btab mi shes bgres par ma gyur dang // ji srid dar la bab cing bdag cag grogs kyang dar la bab gyur pa// de srid bar du 'dzum pa'i zhal gyis 'dod pa'i dga' ba
197b8(mdo sde): spyad du gsel// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ ji srid de mod dal ba dam pa 'chi med dkon pa rnyed pa dang // ji srid lha dang lha pi grong khyer mi khom sdug bsngal spangs pa dang / 
198a1(mdo sde): ji srid dga' dang da dang 'chi ba'i dgra yis dkrugs par ma gyur pa// de srid nga ni 'jigs med grong khyer 'gro ba'i lam mchog bsgoms par bya/ de dag gis smras pa
198a2(mdo sde): lha'i gnas ra sum cu rtsa gsum bdag po lha mes bskor ba dang // 'thab bral 'thab bral rab dang dga' ldan dag dang bdud kyi gleng khyer na// lha mchog bstod pa bzhin du bud med dbang du gyur nas
198a3(mdo sde): 'dod dga' la// rel cing spyod la bdag cag rnams dang lhan cig dgyes pa rgya chen mdzod// byang chub sems dpas spras pa// 'dod pa rtsa rtse'i zil thigs bzhin du m+WAr la ston ka'i sprin dang mtshungs// 
198a4(mdo sde): klu'i bu ri khro ba lta bur shin tu 'jigs par byed pa yin// brgya byin 'thab bral rab lha dga' ldan pa dag bdud kyi dbang du song 'phags mid rnams kyis 'dod pa sdug bsngal ldan pa
198a5(mdo sde): 'di su zhig dga'// de dag gis smras pa// shing mchog 'a de dag lo ma gzhon dang ldan zhing me tog rgyas gyur la/ shang shang te'u dang khu byug sgra 'byi bung ba sgra 'byin ldan pa
198a6(mdo sde): gzigs// sa las rtsa 'khrungs rab sngo 'jam zhing snum la lcang lo can mchis pa// gas mchog mi ci tshogs kyis bstan par na chung rnams kyang dgyes par mdzod// byang chub sems
198a7(mdo sde): dpas smras pa// le bar bcas pa'i shing rnams 'di dag dus kyi dbang gis me tog rgyas// bung ba dag kyang bkres dang skem pas nyen nas me tog rnams su lhags// gang zhig dus nas la
198a8(mdo sde): skyes pa rnams kyang nyi mas skams par 'gyur// nga 'dir sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams kyis spyad pa bdud rtsi nges par spyad// bdud kyi bu mo rnams kyis smras pa// zla 'dra'i zhal mnga' gzigs
198b1(mdo sde): shig bad+masar pa 'dra ba'i kha bzhin car// smad cing yid du 'ong ba'i tshig ldan sa dang dus dang khab 'dra// 'di 'dra glanas na dkon na mi'i gnas dag la mchis// gang dag lha mchog rnams kyi ta/ 
198b2(mdo sde): du 'dod par bgyi ba khyed kyis nes// byang chub sems dpas smras pa// lus ni ngan sngags mi gtsang srid bu'i rigs kyis gang ba shig shig po// slar du gyes shig 'jig pa bde ba ma yin
198b3(mdo sde): rnams dang ldan par mthong // rgyu bar bcas dang pi rgyu ba'i 'gre la bde ba mchog byed pa// ge 'phang 'chi 'pho med pa skye bo mkhas pas mchod pa de thob bya// de dag 'dod pa'i rgyu rtsal drug cu rtsa
198b4(mdo sde): bzhid meng bar gyur pa ste// rkang rngub gser gyi bag ska 'khrol zhing gis kyang shag shig byas nas ni// 'dod po'i mnga' yis phog pa rgyags pa 'dzub zhing 'di skad smras// ji ba khyed
198b5(mdo sde): la rengs pa ci zhig bgyis na 'di dag sted mi bgyi// sring ba/ kun gyi nyes pa rig nas rdul dang bral bas 'di skad smras// / 'dod pa ral gri mdung thung rtse gsupa sdang rtsi can gyi sku
198b6(mdo sde): gri 'dra// sbrul gyi mgo dang me mur 'dra bar ngas 'dir rab tu rig pa nas// bud med yon tan 'phrigs pas de phyir nga yis bud med tshogs rnams spangs// bud med yon tar rnam pa mang po
198b7(mdo sde): khrag khrig byed pa de dag gis// gang gi tshen glang po'i phrag stabs can de brjod ma nus che// ngo tsha skyengs nas thub pa'i rkang pa gnyis la rab tu phyag 'tshal te// dga' zhing mgu
198b8(mdo sde): bskyed ras phan pa byed pa de la stong pa byas// pad+ma dri ba med pa'i snying po 'dra zhing ster zla lte bu'i zhal// mar gyis sbyid bdag bgyis pa'i 'od 'phro me 'dra gser gyi ri 'dra ba// srid pa brgya
199a1(mdo sde): nas sna mangs sna lam bad pa grung gyu ga/ bdag nyid na la nas sdug brdul dag pang ldan pa'i 'gro bsgra la drugasal// dag sa sa dag
199a2(mdo sde): dang cam paka 'dra rnams yang bstod// mchog tu gyur pa ri ltar mi g.yi ba la skor ba byas nas ra// seng sde pa'i rkang la mge bas phyag 'tshal 'di skad cig kyang smras// yab cig lnga dang mi'i bla ma des
199a3(mdo sde): khong khre spongs na legs// bzhin ni 'dzum par gyur nas pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dra ba'i mig gis blta// de ni chags pa skye bo ma lte de la khro gnyer mchis ma lags// lhur po g.yo shing rnam
199a4(mdo sde): skams la nyi zla lhung bar 'gyur yang gda'// srid pa ga/ sum gyis nyes mthong de ni bud med rnams kyi dbang mi 'gyur// / de nas bdud sdig can gyis de skad bris nas pas kyang cher sdug
199a5(mdo sde): bsngal zhing yid mi bde ba la yid ma rangs shing tshig pa'i za'i yid kyis rang gi bu mo de la smras pa// kye mi shes shing klen de khyed kyis gzugs dang rem mthong ba ci ltar gyur nade byang chu
199a6(mdo sde): kyi snying po las bslang bar nus// de nas bdud kyi bu mo de dag gis rang gi phal tshig su bcad de slar smras pa// snyan cing 'jam por smra yang chags pa ma mchis te// gsang ba chen po lta yang sdang ba
199a7(mdo sde): mchis ma lags// spyod lam dag dang spyod pa lta yang rmongs ma mchis// lus rnams thams cad rtogs kyang bsam pa shin tu zab// bud med nongs pa rgya chen the tshom ma mchis rtogs/ 
199a8(mdo sde): 'dod las dben pa'i yid ldan 'dod chags ma mchis// gang zhig de'i sems dang spyod pa yongs 'tshal ba// lha yul mi yul 'di ni lha mi de ma mchis// de la bud med smra rnams gang lags
199b1(mdo sde): stan na yab// chags bcas gang lags de'i snying zhu 'gyur rigs na// de dag mthong yang de'i sems ni gcig ma g.yos// ri dbang rgyal po bzhin du de ni mi g.yo mchis// bsod nams gzi
199b2(mdo sde): brjid brgyas bstam yon tan gzi brjid rdzogs// bskal pa bye ba mang por tshul khrims brtul shugs spyad// lha dang tshangs pa sems cad gzi brjid rnam dag dge// de dag de yi rkang par mgos gtug
199b3(mdo sde): phyag kyang 'tshal// sde dang bcas pa'i bdud rnams bcom nas sngon chad kyi// rgyal bas bzhengs pa byang chub dam pa 'thob 'gyur nges// yab cig bdag cag g.yul ngor 'thab pa mi 'tshal te/ 
199b4(mdo sde): stobs ldan dag dang 'thab par sbyor 'di tshigs rab che// yab cig mkha' la nor bu rin chen tsug phud can// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig gus par gnas// rin chen 'byung gnas
199b5(mdo sde): ya lag me tog phreng bas brgyad// stobs bcu mnga' bas mchod phyir 'di btang rnams la gzigs// gang dag sem sa dpa' mchis dang gang dag sems ma mchis// shing ltung ba
199b6(mdo sde): gnod sbyin nagakha' lding dbang po dag/ yon tan rib mngon par 'dud cing tshogs pa las// yab cig do modo slar leg na ni lags pa 'dra// gzhan yang gang gi pha mthar phyid pa de ni rgyal mi bgyi/ 
199b7(mdo sde): gang zhig rtsa nas mi phyin de ni brko mi bgyi// gang la bzod pa yang gsol de ni dkrug mi bgyi// gang gis yid mi bde bar 'gyur ba de mi bgyi// dge slong dag de nas de'i tshe shing gi lha po brgyad la 'di lta
199b8(mdo sde): ste dpal ldan dang 'phel mo dang // dka' thub dang dge ma dang mkhas ma dang mdangs stobs dang // dben sgra dang ldan pa ste/ de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' la yang dag par mchod nas// dpal rnam pa bcu
200a1(mdo sde): / drug gis byang chub sems dpa' 'phel bar byed// mngon du spyod par byed de son dag pa khyod ni dgung zla yar gyi ngo ltar mdzes pa'o// blo rnams par dag pa khyed ni gdugs dang pog
200a2(mdo sde): ba ltang lga nga ba'o// sems can dag pa khyod ni chab kyi nang na pad+ma lta bur rab tu rgyas pa'o// seMn dag pa khyod ni nags dang nags 'dab na rgyu ba'i seng ge ltar sgrogs pa// sems can dag pa khyod ni rgya latsho
200a3(mdo sde): dbus na ri'i rgyal po ltar mdzes pa'o// sems can dag pa khyod ni khor yug gi ri ltar mngon par 'phags pa'o// sen dam pa khyod ni rgya mtsho ltar rin po ches bsnams zhing gting dpag dka'o// 
200a4(mdo sde): 'jig rten mgon po khyod na na mkha' ltar thug pa ma mchis shing thugs kyi rgya che ba'o// sen rnam par dag pa khyod ni dog sa ltar sems can thams cad kyi 'tshe bar gyur cing thugs shin tu
200a5(mdo sde): bstan pa'o// sems can dam pa khyod ni mtshe ma dros pa ltar rtag tu dang zhing thugs rnyog pa mi mnga' ba'o// sen dang ba khyod ni rlung mar ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thad la rtag tu
200a6(mdo sde): mi chags shing thugs gnas pa ma mchis pa'o// sen dam pa khyod ni gzi brjid kyi rgyal po ltar rlom sems thams cad spang shing bsnyen par dka' ba'o// sems can dam pa khyed ni sred
200a7(mdo sde): med kyi bu ltar thub par dka' zhing stobs dang ldan pa'o// 'jig rten gyi mgon po khyod ni byang chub kyi snying po las mi bzhengs pas dam bcas pa bstan pa'o// sems can dam pa khyod ni dbang po
200a8(mdo sde): lag gis 'phangs pa'i rdo rje ltar slar mi ldog pa'o// sems can dam pa khyed ni ring por mi thigs par stobs bcu dang ldan par byon pas bsnyes pa lags par bsnyes pa'o// dge slong dag/ 
200b1(mdo sde): de ltar byang chub kyi shing gi lha mo rnams kyis dpal rnam pa bcu drug gis gis byang chub sems dpa' 'phel bar byed do// dge slong dag de na gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis rnam pa bcu
200b2(mdo sde): drug gis bdud nyams dmas par byed do rnam pa bcu drug gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sdig can khyod ni khrung khrung rgan mo ltar sems khongs su chud cing dmas pa'o// sdig can khyod ni glang po rgan mo 'dam
200b3(mdo sde): du bying ba ltar nyam chung ba'o// sdig can khyod ni dpa' bor khas 'chas pa pham pa ltar cig pur gyur pa'o// sdig can khyod ni nad kyis nyen pa 'breg tu bor ba ltar gnyi su med pa'o// sdig
200b4(mdo sde): can khyod ni glang bu khal gyis nyon mongs pa ltar stobs med pa'o// sdig can khyod ni shing rlung gis btab par skyel ba'o// sdig can khyod ni 'gron po lam stor ba ltar lab ngan par gnas pa'o
200b5(mdo sde): sdig can khyod na mo dbul po bu lon can ltar dman pa pas kyang dben pa'o// sdig can khyod ni bya rog byung ba ltar mu tsho// ra smra ba'o// sdig can khyod ni ma dul ba byas pa mi bzo
200b6(mdo sde): bltar nga rgyal gyi zil gyis mi non pa'o// sdig can khyod ni seng ga sgras wa 'bros pa ltar deng 'bros par 'gyur ba'o// sdig can khyed ni rnam par 'thor rlung gis gtor ba'i bya bzhin du dang
200b7(mdo sde): 'dar bar 'gyur ba'o// sdig can khyod ni sprang po bsod nams zad pa ltar dus mi shes pa'o// sdig can khyod ni snod chags pa rdul gyis gang ba ltar deng rnam par spang bar 'gyur
200b8(mdo sde): ba'o// sdig can khyod ni sngags la dpa' ba sprul bab pa ltar deng tshar chod par 'gyur ba'o// sdig can khyod ni mi rkang lag bcad pa ltar stobs thams cad dang bral ba'o// 
201a1(mdo sde): zhes bya'o// dge slong dag de ltar gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis rnam pa bcu drug gis bdud sdig can nyams spang ba byas// dge slong dag de la byang chub kyi bsnyen
201a2(mdo sde): bkur ba'i lha rnams kyis rnam pa bcu drug gis bdud sdig can bzlog par byed de bcu drug gang zhe na 'di lta ste sdig can khyod ni dpa' bas pha rol gyi sngo bcom pa ltar byang chub sems dpa' de yod
201a3(mdo sde): pham par 'gyur ro// sdig can khyod ni gyang stobs chu ngu la gyad stobs chen po 'bab pa ltar de mod byang chub sems dpas tshar bcad par 'gyu ro// sdig can khyod ni srin bu me khyer la nyi
201a4(mdo sde): ma'i dkyil 'khor bab pa ltar de mod byang chub sems dpas zil gyis non par 'gyuraro// sdig can khyod ni phub ma spar gang la rlung mar bab pa ltar do med byang chub sems dpas ster bar
201a5(mdo sde): 'gyuraro// sdig can khyod ni wa la seng ge bab pa ltar ngo mo dbyang chub sems dpas spangs par byas par 'gyur ro// / sdig can khyod ni shing sa la chen po rtsa nas chad pa ltar/ 
201a6(mdo sde): do mod byang chub sems dpas bsgyel bar 'gyuraro// sdig can khyod ni mi mdza' ba'i grong khyer la rgyal po bab pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpa'as brlag par 'gyuraro// sdig can khyod
201a7(mdo sde): ni brjes kyi tshu la nyi tshan chen po bab pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas yongs su zad par 'gyuraro// sdig can khyod ni mi g.yon can gsad par bya ba shor ba ltar// do mod byang chub sems dpas
201a8(mdo sde): bros par byed par 'gyuraro// sdig can khyod ni mi'i tsha bas bung pa'i khyu ltar de mod byang chub sems dpas mgo 'khor bar byed par 'gyuraro// sdig can khyod ni chos kyi rgyal sringad nyams pa ltar// do mod byed
201b1(mdo sde): chub sems dpas mya ngan byed du 'jug par 'gyuraro// sdig can khyod ni khrung khrung rgan po 'dab ma bregs pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas sems khong du bcug par 'gyuraro// sdig can khyod ri 'brog
201b2(mdo sde): dgon par lam rgyags chad pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas phongs par 'gyur// sdig can khyod ni rgya mtsho chen por gru zhig pa ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas smre sngags 'don du bcug par 'gyuraro// 
201b3(mdo sde): sdig can khyed ni sregs pa'i skal ba las rtswa dang nags tshal ltar do mod byang chub sems dpas rnyis par byas par 'gyuraro// sdig can khyod ni ri'i rtse mo la rdo rje bab pa ltar do mong byang chub sems dang
201b4(mdo sde): snyil bar 'gyur ro// zhes bya'o dge slong dag de ltar byang chub kyi bsnyen bkur ba'i lha'i bu rnams kyis rnam pa bcu drug gis bdud sdig can zlog par byed kyang bdud sdig can phyir ma log go// 
201b5(mdo sde): de la 'di skad ces bya ste lha yi tshogs kyis yang dag bskul ba thes kyang bdud ni phyir log ma gyur te// slong shing rgyob shig 'di ni brlag par gyis shig srog kyang sbyin
201b6(mdo sde): bar ma byed cig/ 'di ni rang nyid rgal nas nga yi yul nas gzhan yang sgrol bar byed par 'gyur// langs bros pa ma gtogs dge sbyong 'di la thar gzhan cung zad med ces smras/ 
201b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ ri'i rgyal po lhun po gnas nas g.yo srong 'gro ba thams cad med 'gyur srid// ska ma'i tshogs rnams thams cad zla ba bcas par mkha' las sa la lhung
201b8(mdo sde): yang srid // sems can kun gyis bsam pa cig byed 'gyur srid rgya mtsho chen po skams srid kyi// nga 'dra shing gi rgyal po'i drung na 'dug pa la ni g.yo ba yong mi srid// bdud gyis smras pa/ 
202a1(mdo sde): kho bo 'dong ba'i dbang phyug 'jig rten 'di kun dbang // lha dang lnga mid ngogs bcas pa dang dud 'grogre rnams// khe bos khyab ste thams cad kho bo'i dbang du 'gyur// khe bo'i yul
202a2(mdo sde): na 'dug pa langs la tshig bzhin gyis// byang chub sems dpas smras pa// gal te 'dod dbang khyed yid gsal bar khyod dbang med// yang dag nga ltas nga yang chos kyi dbang phyug yid// gal te ngan
202a3(mdo sde): 'grer mi 'gro khyod ni 'dod dbang phyug/ dbang med khyod ni lta bzhin byang chub ngas theb 'gyur// bdud kyis smras pa/ dge sbyong bdag nyid cig pu dgen par ji zhig byed// khyod kyis gang btsal de dang
202a4(mdo sde): phrad par sla ma yin// rab 'gro shes ldan la sogs dka' thub rab sgribs kyang // go 'phang mchog de ma thob mor gyurakhyod ci smras// byang chub sems dpas spras pa/ khro ba'i
202a5(mdo sde): zil rer blo dang lnga yul 'dod pa dang // bdag la rtag dang mi rtag snyam du gnas pa dang // yul du 'gro bas pa/ nas bzar snya ma gnas pa yi// drang srong mi shes sder du 'gro
202a6(mdo sde): bas dka' thub spyang // de dag yang dag don dang bral zhing skyes bu smra// khyab dang phyogs cig ces dang kha cig rtag ces smra// lus can lus min yon tan mid dang yod tad can// byed ba rtse
202a7(mdo sde): dang byed pa ma ni zhes gzhan dag mdzer// stan 'dir 'dug ste nga rgyal bcom pa ste dpung bcas// khyod pa ma byas te byang chub rdul med deng thob nas// 'gro ba 'di la 'byung dang byung dang mya ngan 'das/ 
202a8(mdo sde): sdug bsngal zhi ba bsil ba'i dngos po bstan par bya// bdud ni khros shing 'khrugs te tshig pa zos nas mdun du rtsub pa'i tshig tu smras pa// dge sbyong 'di zung shig/ cig pu dgon par bor bar gyur pa 'di
202b1(mdo sde): dri ba'i mdun nas rung la song ste srung du dbang du gyis// nga'i khyim du myur du song la shing smrig dang ni lcags sgrogs phrugs drug sde sleb byed du drug/ sdug bsngal nyin nas kuro rnam pa lang po 'di tsa na
202b2(mdo sde): khel po yin par bdag gis bdag mthong byas// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ namakha' la ni ri mi rnam pa sna tshogs cha cha ris ris phye ste sa ser bri bar nus kyang srid// phyogs dang phyogs
202b3(mdo sde): mtshams 'gre ba'i shugs can rlung ni me yes rab tu sgribs te zhags pas bcing du nus kyang srid// nyi ma zla ba mun pa rab rib rab rib med byed mkhar las sa la lhung bar byed par nus srid kyi/ 
202b4(mdo sde): khyod dang 'dra ba rab tu mang po bgrang las 'das pa dag gos shing drung nas ni nga bskyed nus mi 'gyur// bdud dpung stobs dang ldan pa langs te ha zhes zer// dung dang rnga dang rdza rnga mchog gi sgra 'byin
202b5(mdo sde): langs// bdung dpung shin tu 'jigs pa 'di dag mthong / nas ni// kyi hud ba sdug khyod cis ma rung gyur ces da / 'dzam gling gser dang tsam pa'i snying po 'dra bar sar/ 
202b6(mdo sde): shin tu gzhon nu lnga mis bstod cing mchod pa'i 'os// khyod dang g.yul ngo chen por rab tu brlags 'gyur te// dbang po lha min lta bur bdud kyi dbang du gyur// tshangs pa'i dbyangs/ 
202b7(mdo sde): dang ka la bing ka'i sgra skad kyis// bde bar gshegs pas gnod sbyin srin tshegs de la smras// mi mkhas gang zhig na mkha' skrag par byed 'dod pa// de ni shing mchog drung ras nga'adra/ 
202b8(mdo sde): sreng bar 'dod// gang zhig stong gsum chen po gshig nas rdul 'grang dang // gang zhig ba spu yis ni rgya mtsho chu 'byin dang // skad cig gis ni rdo rje'i rang bzhir ri mthor ba/ ngas kyang
203a1(mdo sde): drung 'dug pa la na 'tshe mi nus// bdud khros sems kyis mnya' shing gang gi bar tsam 'dug/ shugs nas byung ba'i ral gri rdon po lag na thogs// dge sbyong byur longs nga yis
203a2(mdo sde): bsam pa bzhin du seng // 'od ma'i myu gu sden ltar do mod bcad da re// byang chub sems dpas smras pa// gal te stong gsums rnams 'di dag thams cad bdud kyis rab tu gang gyur la// kun gyi lag na ri
203a3(mdo sde): bo lcu dpe ma chog 'dra ba'i ral gri thogs gyur kyang // de dag nga yi ba spu bskyed par mi nus nga la gnong byed smos ci dgos// sun 'byin ma rings shig dang de rur btags te nga yis brtan por dran par bya/ 
203a4(mdo sde): rnga mi ba lang chen po mgo dang 'jigs mig dang // myur 'dug sbrul dang mig gdug mi bzad 'dra ba dag/ me 'bar kha dog rtse mor bcas pa'i ri 'phen cing // rtsa bar bcas pa'i shing
203a5(mdo sde): dang zangs dang lcags rnams 'phen// sprin ltar langs te/ phyogs bzhi dag tu sgra sgrogs cing // rdo rje'i lce dang lug sa kyi thu lum char pa 'bebs// ral gri mdung thung rje dang dgra sta
203a6(mdo sde): dug can 'bebs// sa ni rdol bar byed cing shing dag rab tu 'joms// kha cig lag pa brgya dag gis ni mnga' brgya 'phen// kha nas myur du gdug pa'i sbrul dang ma yang mthor// rku skyes chu srid la
203a7(mdo sde): sogs pa dag mtshe nas len// kha cig namakha' lding du bsgyur nas klu yang len// kha cig khros nas lcags kyi thu lum ri rab tsam// me 'bar kha dog rtse mor bcas pa rnams kyang 'bar// 
203a8(mdo sde): sa la lags nas sa ni rab tu 'khrugs par byed// 'og gi chu'i phung po'i chu yang rnam par 'khrug/ kha cig de'i mdun dang de bzhin rgyab du 'tshong // kye ma bu zhes g.yas dang de bzhin g.yon du 'tshong // 
203b1(mdo sde): rkang pa lag pa log par 'dug cing mgo 'bar la// klog ltar rab tu 'bar ba mig nas mngon du 'byin// bdud kyi dpung ni sbyar ba mi sdug byas mthong nas// sen dag pa sgyu ma byas pa ci bzhin rtog/ 'di las
203b2(mdo sde): bdud med stobs mad 'gro med bdag kyang med// chu zla'i tshul 'dra ba'i 'jig rten gsum po'i 'khor// mig dang skyes pa bud med med cing bdag gis med// rna dang sna dang de bzhin lce dang de bzhin lus/ 
203b3(mdo sde): ches 'di bang ba po dang tshol ba po dang bral// brten nas skyes te nang yang steng zhing bya yang steng // bden tshig gang gis 'dir chos shin tu stong zhe na// 'dul mthun gnod sbyin nges pa gang yin de dag gis// lag
203b4(mdo sde): ba'i mtshon cha me tog phreng ba mthong gyur ces// rtag tu bden smras de yis bden tshig byas te// de yis lag mthil g.yon pa 'dra ba mchog smras pa// san ma zangs mdog rab mdzes rtsib stong
203b5(mdo sde): 'khor lo can// 'jam gling gser 'bar 'dra ba bsod nams dgyes bstan pas// tshul du shis par mgo nas rkang pa'i bar du blugs// mkha' las glog 'dra bar ni lag brkyang byas nas
203b6(mdo sde): tshig du smras pas 'di ning yi dbang yin te// ngas ni sngon chad mchod spyir khrag khrig sna tshogs byas// slong la mi sbyin snyam ste don meng gzhan ma byin// chu dang me dang rlung ni nga yi dbang yin te// tshangs pa
203b7(mdo sde): skyes dge bdag dang skar bcas nyi zla dang // gang dag phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang // bdag khrims brtul zhugs byang chub yan lag 'phags pa dang // sgyid dang rtul khribs
203b8(mdo sde): ba' ri bang mi'ang // btsun 'grus de bzhi bas pa gtan banan shes ba dang // tshad med pa nga bzhin mngon shes yi gang // rim gyis byang chub skyeng pa thams ca sa da/ 
204a1(mdo sde): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten sems can mtha' dag ji snyed ga/ de dag rnams kyi bsod rapas tshul khribs ye shes dang // gtad ba med pa'i mchod sbyid byas pa sngoms kyang ni/ 
204a2(mdo sde): de dag nga yi bsdu brgya yi char mi phod// de yis tshul du shis par lags pas brdabs// khar ba'i snod ltar sa ri sgra yang byung bar gyur// bdud kyi sgra thos nas nis la 'gyel gyur te// dag po'i rtse lag
204a3(mdo sde): rgyob shig zung shig/ sgra yang thes// lus la rdul byung gzi brjid nyams shing bzhi mdog gyur// rga bas bcom par bdud de nyid kyis mthong bar gyur// brang rdung chos nges 'dod cing 'jig
204a4(mdo sde): nyen mgon yang med// bdud kyi yid 'khrul gyur cing sems ni myos par gyur// glang po lnga dang bzhon pa shing rta sa la ltung // / sridan bu grul bum dag dang sha za sngangs shing rgyug/ 
204a5(mdo sde): mge rmongs lam mi rnyed cing gnas med skyabs kyang med// rlung btab nags mes bya ltar bstad nas song bar gyur// pham bu dang sring mo de bzhin pu nu dag/ gang na mthong zhing ga
204a6(mdo sde): du 'dong zhing 'dri bar byed// de yi rkyen gyis de dag phan tshun 'thab cing rtsod// bdag ni sdug bsngal gyur te 'tshe ba'i skabs kyang med// bdud dpung rgya che mang ba mi mkhrugs snyed po de// 
204a7(mdo sde): thams cad rnam par mthor zhing tha gur gyes 'gyur te// zhag bdun 'das kyi bar du phan tshun phrad ma gyur// mthong nas smras pa gal te gson na dga' zhes mdzer// shing
204a8(mdo sde): gi lha mos de tshe de la snying rje byas// chu yi bum pa thogs te nag po'i rtsa lag gtor// myur du longs la phyi shol ma byed skyed du song // bla mi'i tshig ma mnyan pas de ltar gyur pa yin/ 
204b1(mdo sde): bdud kyis smras pa/ bdag gi bu yi skad tshig phan pa ma mnyan te// sed shin tu dag la nyes pa byas pas na// sdug bsngal 'jigs phengs mya ngan brlag dang bsdus pa dang // cir mi rung
204b2(mdo sde): ba'i sgra dang dman nyid bdag gis theb// lha mes smras pa/ mi mkhas gang zhig nyes pa med la nyes byed pa// de ni nyes dang sdug bsngal ba dang phengs pa dang // cir mi rung ba'i bya ba'i sgra dang
204b3(mdo sde): dman nyid dang // bsad dang bcing dang nyes pa du ma rnyed par 'gyur// lha dang lha min mkha' lding mo ci srin po'i dbang // tshangs pa brgya byin gzhan 'phrul reg min bcas pa dag
204b4(mdo sde): 'di ltar khyed kyis 'di 'dra'i bdud kyi dpung bcom pas// 'jig rten dpa'o rgyal zhes rgyal brjed// rgyad 'phreng chun po zla ba gang gas dang rgya mchar ba ngan 'bul// me teg a ga ru dang rgya
204b5(mdo sde): sdes tsan dang phye char 'bebs// sil snyan dag kyang rab tu dbrel byed cing ni tshig brjed pa// dpa'i dgra tshogs rgya/ la rnams khyed la dga' ba mdzad par 'gyur// stad
204b6(mdo sde): mchog 'dir ni byabs pas g.yod can bdud kyi phyogs// rgya chen par mdzad dpa'i ngo bong byang chub banas// phyogs bcu mo 'dres so so yang dag rig pa dang // sangs rgyas yul rnams
204b7(mdo sde): thams cad de med brnyes par 'gyur// bdud 'dul cheng du 'dir ni g.yul ngor rab tu zhugs// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i stobs rtsal sus mthong ba// bye ba sum cu rtsa drugu dang khrag
204b8(mdo sde): khrig nyi shu bani// dad gsang sa rgyas byang chub mchog tu ming khyim sbed/ bdu 'dul ba'i 'i zhes byaste/ nyi shu gcig pa'o// dge slong dag de ltar byang chubs mas dpa' 'du bya byi nas
205a1(mdo sde): / bcom pa dgra btul ba// g.yul ngor g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba// gdugs dang rgyal la tshan dang ba dang bsgreng bas 'ad pa rnams dbyed pa// sdig pa pi dge ba'i ngos
205a2(mdo sde): rnams las dber pa// sdig pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa// dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde bcad bsam gtan dang po rdzogs par bya ste gnas so// de rtag pa dang dbyed pa dang bral
205a3(mdo sde): zhing nang yengasu dang ste/ sems kyi rmad gcig tu gyur pas rdeg pa med pa dang dpyod pa med pa/ ting 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang 'de ba cad bas pa gta gnyis pa rdzogs par byas te gan so// 
205a4(mdo sde): de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyems la gnas shing / dran pa dang shes bzhin cad yid te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis gang de dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la gnas
205a5(mdo sde): pa bdang snyoms pa'o zhes brjed pa ste/ dga' ba med pabs ma gtan gsum pa rdzogs par byas te gan so// de bde ba yang spangs te snga nas sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing
205a6(mdo sde): yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba yang nub pas bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa btang snyoms dang dran pas yengasu dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa rdzogs par byas te gnaso// de ras byang
205a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' de lta bur snyoms par zhugs pa'i sems yongs su dag pa yongs su byang ba 'od gsal ba nyon mongs pa med pa/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/ mnyen pa las su rub
205a8(mdo sde): bar gnas pa mi g.yo bar gyur pas nam gyi cha stod la lha'i mig las ye shes mthong ba'i rig pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir sems mngon par sgrub cing mngon par gtod do// de nas byang chub
205b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' lnga'i mig yongasu dag pa mi'i las shin tu 'das pa sems can 'chi 'pho ba dang kha dog bzang po dang kha dog ngan pa dang bzang po dang ngan pa rnams mthong ngo // las ji lta ba bzhi dbu gro
205b2(mdo sde): ba'i sems can rnams kyang rab tu shes te/ kye ma sems can 'di dag ni lus kyi nyes par spyod pa dang ldan pa ngag dang yid kyi nyes par spyod pa dang ldan pa 'phags pa rnams la skur pa 'debs leg
205b3(mdo sde): par lta ba'i las yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyud lus zhig ste shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnamasu skye bar 'gyur ba dgo/ sems cad 'di dag ni lus
205b4(mdo sde): kyis legs par spyad pa dang ldan pa dag dang yid kyis legs par spyad pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa rnams la bskur ba mi 'debs pa yang dag par lta bdag ste
205b5(mdo sde): de dag yang dag par lta ba'i las yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus lus zhig nas// bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'dzi garten du lha'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ba dag ces bya bar rab tu
205b6(mdo sde): shes so// de ltar lha'i mig mig rnam par dag pa mi las shin tu 'das pas sems can 'chi 'pho dang skye ba dang kha dog bzang po dang kha dog ngan pa dang / ngan 'gro song ba dang ngan pa dang / 
205b7(mdo sde): bzang po dag dang / las ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba rnams mthong ngo // dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' nam gyi cha stod la rig pa mngon sum du byed do// mun pa sel to
205b8(mdo sde): snang ba skyed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de lta bur snyoms par zhugs pa'i sems yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba 'od gsal ba nyon mongs pa med pa/ nye ba'i
206a1(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa dang bral ba mnyen pa las su rung bar gnas pa / mi g.yo bar gyur pas ram gyi gung thun la sden gyi gdas rjesu dra pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i
206a2(mdo sde): rig pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir// sems dngon par sgrub cing mngon par gtod de// de bdag dang sems can gzhan dag gi sden gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjesu drar te/ 'di lta ste skye ba gcig dang
206a3(mdo sde): gnyis dang gsum dang / bzhi dang lnga dang bcu dang / nyi shu dang su su dang bzhi bcu dang skye ba lnga bcu dang bskye ba brgya dang / skye ba steng dang skye ba brgya steng dang / skye ba brgya stong phrag du ba
206a4(mdo sde): skye ba byeb dang / skye ba bye ba phrag brgya dang / skye babye ba phrag steng dang skyeb bye ba brgya steng dang / skye ba bye ba zla ga khrig brgya stong dang skyeb bye ba brgya phrag du ba dang / skyib
206a5(mdo sde): ba steng phrag du ma dang / skye ba bye ba brgya stong brag du ma dang / skye ba bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ba das 'jig pa'i bskal pa dang / 'chags pa'i bskal pa dang 'jigs pa dang
206a6(mdo sde): 'chags pa'i bskal pa dang 'jig pa dang 'chags pa'i skal ba du ba dag kyang rjes dran de// bdag thege pa zhes bya ba zhig du gyur te ming 'di zhes bya bar gyur te dus ri 'di zhes bya'o// rig ni 'di zhes bya'o// 
206a7(mdo sde): kha dog ni 'di lta bu'o// kha zas ni 'di lta bu zhig za za'o// tshe'i tshad ni 'di tsam zhig thub po// yun ni 'di srid cig gnas gnas// bde ba dang sdug bsngal ni 'di lta bu zhig bye // 
206a8(mdo sde): bdag de nas shi 'phos nas che ge mo zhes bya ba zhig tu skyes so// de nas shi 'phos nas kyang che ge mo zhes bya ba zhig tu skyes so// de nas shi 'phos ras 'dir skyeso// zhes rnam
206b1(mdo sde): ba dang bcas/ yul phyogs dang bcas par bdag dang sen thams cad kyi sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rje su drad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de lta bur snyoms par zhugs pa'i sem
206b2(mdo sde): yongasu dag pa yongs su byang ba 'od gsal ba nyon mongs pa med pa nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/ mnyen pa la su rung bar gnas pa/ mi g.yo bar gyur pas/ nam gyi cha spang skya
206b3(mdo sde): reng 'char ba'i dus kyi tshe rnga brdung ba'i namachod tsam na/ sdug bsngal ba dang kun 'byung ba nub par bya ba dang / zag pa zad pa shes pa mthong ba'i rig pa mngon du bya ba'i bya
206b4(mdo sde): sems mngor bar sgrub cing mngon par gtod de// 'di snyam du sems te kye ma 'jig rten 'di ni 'di lta ste skye ba dang rga ba dang / 'chi ba dang 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye bas sdug
206b5(mdo sde): bsngal bar gyur pa yin na 'on kyang rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' shig 'di las byung bar mi shes te/ e mo'o
206b6(mdo sde): rga ba dang na ba dang / 'chi ba la sogs pa sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' shig 'di thams cad zad par bya bar shes na ci ma rung snyam nas/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam
206b7(mdo sde): ngus pas te/ gang yeng bas rga ba dang 'chi ba rnan pa dang 'chi ba'i rkyen ni gang yin sA ma ras nges 'di snyam du sems te skye ba yong bas rga shi byung sde rga shi'i tsher ri skye ba yid das pa
206b8(mdo sde): me de ras byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yod pas skye ba byung / skye ba'i rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas/ des 'di snyam du bsams te/ srid pa yod pas skye ba
207a1(mdo sde): byung ste skye ba'i rkyer ni srid pa yin snya mo// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yod pas srid pa byung srid pa'i rkyed ni gang yin snyam ras/ 
207a2(mdo sde): nges 'di snyam du sems te len pa yod pas srid pa byung ste srid pa'i rkyen ni len pa yid ni snyam me// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yod pas len pa byung / 
207a3(mdo sde): len pa'i rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas des 'di snyam du bsams te/ sred pa yod pas len pa byung ste len pa'i rkyen ni sred pa yin no snyam// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di
207a4(mdo sde): snyam du sems te/ gang yed bas srid pa byung srid pa'i rkyen ni gang yid snyam nas/ des 'di snyam du bsams te/ tshor ba yeng bas srid pa byung ste/ srid pa'i rkyer ni cher
207a5(mdo sde): ba yid de snya mo// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yod pas tshor ba byung / tshir ba/ 'i rkyen ni gang yid snyam des/ des 'di snyam du bsapas
207a6(mdo sde): reg pa yod pas/ tsher ba byung ste tshor ba'i rkyed ni reg pa yin ni sA mo// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yod pas reg pa byung / reg pa'i rkyer ni
207a7(mdo sde): gang yin snyam nas/ des 'di skam du sems te skye mched drug yod pas reg pa byung ste/ reg pa'i rkyen ni skye mched drug yid do snyam mo// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa'
207a8(mdo sde): 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yod pas skye mched drug byung / skye mched drug gi rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas/ nges 'di snyam du sems te ming dang gzugs yod pas skye mched
207b1(mdo sde): drug byung ste/ skye mched drug gi rkyen ni ming dang gzugs yin no snyam mo// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yong bas ming dang gzugs byung / ming dang gzugs kyi
207b2(mdo sde): rkyen ni gang yinasam nas/ ngas 'di snyam du sems te/ rnam par shes pa yod pas ming dang gzugs byung ste/ ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen ni rnam par shes pa yin ne snyam mo// de nas yang byang
207b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te gang yod pas rnam par shes pa byung / rnam par shes pa'i rkyen ni gang yin snyam nas ngas 'di snyam du sems te/ 'du byad yang yod pas rnam par shes
207b4(mdo sde): pa byung ste/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen ni 'du byed yin no snyam mo// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yod pas 'du byed brung / 'du byed kyi rkyer ri gang yin
207b5(mdo sde): snyam du bsams te/ ma rig pa yed bas 'du byed byung ste/ 'du byed kyi rkyen ni ma rig pa yin no snyam du sems te ma ri/ ga pa'i rkyen gyi 'bre du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa rnam
207b6(mdo sde): par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/ ming dang gzugs kyis rkyen gyis skye mched drug skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa sred pa'i
207b7(mdo sde): rkyen gyis len pa len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang / mya ngan dang smre sngags 'den pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug
207b8(mdo sde): pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' shig 'di 'thung bar 'gyur ro snyam mo// dge slong dag sngor ma thos pa'i chos rnams la kun 'byung zhes tshul bzhin yid la byed
208a1(mdo sde): byed cing yang du byed pa byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes skyes mig skyes/ rig pa skyes rang po shes pa skyes yi gzungs bsgos/ shes dab skyes sa sdung bzung / 
208a2(mdo sde): de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang med pas rga shi mad par 'gyur gang 'gags pas rga shi 'gags pa nas/ de 'dis mdus pas te sgrub med darga shi med par 'gyur te/ 
208a3(mdo sde): skye ba 'gags pas rga shi 'gag go snyam po de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te gang med pas skye ba med par 'gyur gang 'gags pas skye ba 'gagasnyam das/ des 'dis pa du byas pa
208a4(mdo sde): te srid pa med na skye ba med par 'gyur te/ srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag ge sA me// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang med pas shes bya ba nas rgyas par sbyar
208a5(mdo sde): te 'du byed par 'gyur/ gang 'gags pas 'du byed 'gags snyam pa'i bar du'i des 'di snyam du bsams te ma/ rig pa med pas 'du byed med par 'gyur tem rig pa 'gag
208a6(mdo sde): pas 'du byed 'gag go/ 'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag ge zhes bya ba nas skyes pa 'gag pas rga shi dang mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba dang / 
208a7(mdo sde): 'khrug pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur te de ltar sdug bsngal gyis phung po chen po 'ba' shig 'di 'gag par 'gyur ro snyam pa'i bar du'o// dge slong dag de ltar sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la
208a8(mdo sde): tshul bzhin yid la byed cing mang du byed pas byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes skyes/ mig skyes rig pa skyes mang po shes pa skyes yid bzhungs pa skyes/ shes rab skyes so snang ba byung ngo // 
208b1(mdo sde): dge slong dag ngas de'i tshe 'di ni sdug bsngal lo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu sheso// 'di ni zag pa'i kun 'brung // 'di ni zag pa 'gog pa'o 'di ni zag pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam po na
208b2(mdo sde): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhinar du rab tu shes so// 'di ni 'dod pa'i zag pa'o// 'dir srid pa'i zag pa'o// 'di ni mi rig pa'i zag pa'o// 'di ni lte ba'i zag pa'o// 'dir zag pa ma lus par
208b3(mdo sde): 'gag go// 'dir zag pa ma lus par mi snang bar 'gyur zhing nub par 'gyur ro 'di ni rin po na 'byung ba'o// 'di ni ma rig pa'i 'gog pa'o 'di rim rig pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo
208b4(mdo sde): zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes// 'dir ma reg pa ma lus par mi snang bar gyur te nub par 'gyur zhes bya bar de bzhin du sbyar ro// 'di dag ni 'du byed rnams so// 'di ni 'du byed
208b5(mdo sde): kyi kun 'byung ba'o// 'din 'bru ras lam mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so// 'di ni rnam par shes pa'o 'odi ri rnam par shes pa'i ku
208b6(mdo sde): 'byung ba'o// 'dir rnam par shes pa 'gog pa'o// 'dir rnam par shes pa 'gog par 'gre ba'i la mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes// 'di ni ming dang gzugs 'a
208b7(mdo sde): ni ming dang gzugs kyi kun 'byung ba'o// 'di ni ming dang gzugs kyi 'gog pa'o// 'di ni ming dang gzugs 'gog par 'gro ba'i la mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so// 'dir skye
208b8(mdo sde): mched drugo/ 'di ni skye mched drug gi kun 'byung ba'o// 'di ni skye mched drug 'gog pa'o// 'di ni skye mched drug 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so// 
209a1(mdo sde): / 'di ni dag pa'o// 'di dag pa'i kun 'phru ba'o// 'di rig pa'i 'gog pa'o// 'di ni rig pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam ma nas yang dag paji lta ba bzhi du ga/ 
209a2(mdo sde): 'di ni tshor ba'i 'di ni tshor ba'i kun 'byung ba'o// 'di ni tshor ba 'gog pa'i// 'di ni tshor ba 'gog par 'gre ba'i la po 'dir sred pa'i 'di ni sred pa'i kur 'brang ba'o// 'di ni srid pa 'gog pa'o/ 
209a3(mdo sde): ni sred pa 'gog par 'ge ba'i la me 'di ri len pa'o 'di ni len pa'i kun 'byung ba'o 'di ni len pa 'gog pa'o 'di ni len pa 'gog par 'gro ba'i la mo// 'di ni srid pa'o 'di ni srid pa'i kur 'byung
209a4(mdo sde): ba'o// 'di ni srid pa 'gog pa'i 'dir srod pa 'gog pa bar gro ba'i lamo// 'di nani skye ba'o 'dir skye ba'i kun 'thung ba'o 'di ni skye ba'i 'geg pa'o 'di skye ba 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'di riH/ 
209a5(mdo sde): ba'o 'di ni rga ba'i kur 'byung ba'o// 'di ni rga ba 'gog pa 'o 'di ni rga ba 'gog pa 'gro ba'i lam mo 'di ni 'chi ba'o/ 'di ni 'chi ba'i kun 'byung ba'o 'di ni 'chi ba 'gog pa'o 'dzim
209a6(mdo sde): ba 'gog par 'gro ba'i la mo zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du sheso// 'di ni mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams te de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung
209a7(mdo sde): po 'ba' shig 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ba nas 'gog par 'gyuraro zhes bya ba'i bar du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes// 'di ni sdug bsngal lo 'di ni sdug bsngal kun 'thung ba'i 'di ni sdug bsngal
209a8(mdo sde): 'gog pa'o 'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lamo// zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so// dge slong dag de ltar byang chub sems dpas ram gyi cha smang skya reng 'char ba'i tshe/ 
209b1(mdo sde): rnga brdung ba'i na mchod tsam na skyes bu dang skyes bu dam pa dang skyes bu mchog dang skyes bu khyu mchog dang skyes bu glang po dang skyes bu seng ge dang skyes bu bskyes mchog dang skyes bu dpa'o dang skyes bu rtul po pa
209b2(mdo sde): dang skyes bu cang shes pa dang skyes bu pad+ma dang skyes bu pad+ma dkar po dang skyes bu lding khyer ba dang sgras bu kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pas 'bigs pa'i ye shes kyis shes par bya ba dang khong du chud bar
209b3(mdo sde): bya ba dang thob par bya ba dang / lta bar bya ba dang mngon du bya ba gang ci yang rung ste de thams cad sems kyi skad cig cig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
209b4(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas rig pa gsum thob bo// dge slong dag de nas lha'i bu rnams kyis smras pa/ grogs po dag bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
209b5(mdo sde): kyis me tog gtor cig ces byas// de nas lha'i bu gang dag sngon gyi sangs rgyas mthong ba de dag 'dus ras de dag gis bdag la smras pa/ grogs po dag sdor gyi
209b6(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang brda'am dzad cing / brda' mngon par sprul pa mdzad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis brda mdzad kyi bar du me tog ma gtor
209b7(mdo sde): cig/ dge slong dag de nas de bzhin gshegs pas lha'i bu de dag yid gnyis su gyur pa mkhyen nas/ shing rta la bdun tsam du na mkha' la mngon par 'phags te/ der bzhugs
209b8(mdo sde): nas lam gyi rgyun ni 'chang ngo do// rdul ni nye bar zhi ba'o// zag gi skams te yang mi zag/ lam ni cheng de yang mi 'jug go// 'di ni sdug bsngal gyi mtha' zhes bya'o// zhes cheng du brjod
210a1(mdo sde): bcang du brjod do// de das lha'i bu de dag gis de bzhi gshegs pa lnga'i me tog gis tong te/ de ngas lha'i mi tog dus po du tsam du krab par gyur te// das bani
210a2(mdo sde): gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ mung pa dang na bral/ srid pa rnab par sbyangs/ lnga ba ni bzlog/ nyen dngangos pa rnams de rnam par dkrugs/ zug du byung / bdud pa dang
210a3(mdo sde): nga rgyal gyi rgyal tshan ni snyal/ chos kyi rgyal mtshad ni bsgreng / bag la nyal rnams ni gtod/ ches kyi de bzhin nyid de mkhyer/ yang dag pa'i mtha' de thugs su chud/ ches kyi dbyings ni
210a4(mdo sde): yongasu mkhyen sems can gyi khabs ri rnam par bkod/ yang dag pa nyid du nges pa'i phung po ri sngags/ leg pa nyid du nyes pa'i phung po spang nges pa'i phung po ri yengasu bcu
210a5(mdo sde): sen gyi dbang po rnams la rnam par gzigs/ sems cad/ gyi spyod pa ni yongasu mkhyed/ ser gyi nad gso ba ni thu/ gsu chud/ bdud rtsi'i slar sbyar ni grub/ 9 na
210a6(mdo sde): da las rab tu thar par mdzad pa por gyur/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba la 'jig por ni gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi rgyal ba'i khrichen
210a7(mdo sde): po la ni bzhugs// rnam par grol ba'i thabs ni bsnyes/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer du dri zhugs/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang yang dag par ni 'dres/ chos kyi dbyings thug su chung pa las
210a8(mdo sde): dbyer med par ni gyur te// dge slong de bzhin gshegs pangs 'dir thogs pa med pa'i skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal mthar phyung ngo zhes mdun pa dang sa byang chub snying po de nyid na bzhugaso
210b1(mdo sde): 'phags pa rgya che rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// / dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ma thag tu
210b2(mdo sde): dade nas skad cig de nyid la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad skad cig de dang yud tsam de la mchog du bde ba dang ldan par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams zad kyang / snang ba ched po snang bar
210b3(mdo sde): byas nas/ 'jig rten gyi bar sdig pa sdig pas khyab pa mud dag ces bya ba snga ma bzhin do// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams thang rnam pa drug du g.yos rab tu g.yos/ kur tu rab tu g.yos/ 
210b4(mdo sde): ldeg pa rab tu ldeg kun tu rab tu ldeg go// 'gul rab tu 'dra/ wa kun tu rab tu 'gul to// 'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs kun tu rab tu 'khrug so// chem cheb rab tu che ma chem/ 
210b5(mdo sde): kur tu rab tu tsha ma cher mo// 'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ung / kun tu rab tu 'ur 'uro// sangs rgyas thad kyis kyang de ba zhing gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa la
210b6(mdo sde): legaso// zhes bya ba byin te/ chos kyi dga' ba de dag kyang skare// chos kyi dgab pa de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che'i gdugs gcig gis khebs par
210b7(mdo sde): gyur te/ ri pe che'i gdugs de las kyang rnam pa 'di lta bu'i 'od zer gyi dra babyung ste/ de dag gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khabs grangs med dpag tu med pa dag/ snang bar byas nas/ phyog bcu'i
210b8(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / lha'i bu rnams kyang / kun tu dga' ba'i sgra rjod par gyur te/ sad mkhas pa'i pad+ma ye shes kyi rgyal cholas byu ba 'jig rten po sa sa gyis pags par byung / 
211a1(mdo sde): thugs rje chen po'i sprin yang dag par 'phags te/ chos kyi dbyings kyis gnas khyab par mdzad nas/ 'dul ba'i skye bo'i sman gyi chos kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon thams cad kyi mu
211a2(mdo sde): gu bskyed pa/ dad pa'i myu gu rnams rnam par 'phel bar byed pa/ rnam par grol ba'i 'bras bu rnam par 'byin par byed pa'i char 'bebs par 'gyur re zhes mdzer te// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ skyes bu
211a3(mdo sde): seng ge de yis dpung bcas bdud btul te ston pa'i bsam gtan bde ba mngon du mdzad nas ni// gang tshe stobs bcus rig pa gsum po brnyes gyur te// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhing mang byed
211a4(mdo sde): g.yos par gyur// chos 'dod byang chub sems dpa' gang dag yongs lhags pa// zhabs la gtugs te 'di skad tshig smras ma bsnyel tam// bdag cag mngon sum ci 'dra shin tu 'dzag
211a5(mdo sde): dpung de// shes rab bsod nams stobs dang brtson 'grus stobs kyis bcom// khrag khrig zhing nas sangs rgyas rna mas kyis gdugs rnams bskur// nges pa skyes bu chen
211a6(mdo sde): bo bdud kyi sde rnams btul// khyod kyis gnas mchog 'chi mad mya ngan med pa brnyes// srid pa gsum du dam chos char pa myur du bob// phyogs bcu'i sems can snying po rnams kyis phyag
211a7(mdo sde): brkyang ste// ka la ring ka'i sgra yis gsung du brjod na ni// bdag cag ji ltar byang chub ba ba ltar khyod sangs rgyas/ dper na mar dang mar gyi nying khu mtshungs 'dra bzhin/ dge slong dag des na 'dod pa na
211a8(mdo sde): spyod pa'i lha'i bu mo dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa/ byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa/ mngon par shes pa brnyes pa dang / banag pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / g.yul las rnam par
211b1(mdo sde): rgyal ba dang / bdud phyir rgol ba pham par mdzad pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sgreng ba dang / dpa' ba dang / rgyal ba 'phags pa dang / skyes bu dang / skyes bu chen po dang / sman pa'i/ 
211b2(mdo sde): mchog dang / zug rngu 'byin pa chen po dang / seng ge ltar mi bsnyengs shing spu zing zhes byed pa mi mnga' ba dang / glang po ltar thugs shin tu dul ba dang / dri ma gsum spangs pas dri ma mi mnga' ba
211b3(mdo sde): dang rig pa gsum brnyes pas mkhyen pa po dang / chu bo bzhi las rgal bas pha rol tu byon pa dang / rin po che'i gdugs gcig 'dzin pas rgyal rigs su gyur pa dang sdig pa'i chos
211b4(mdo sde): spangs pas 'jig rten gsum gyi bram zer gyur pa dang ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pas dge slong du gyur pa dang cha gras pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pas dge sbyong
211b5(mdo sde): du gyur pa dang / nyon mongs pa bsal bas gtsang sbra can du rgyu ra ba dang / rgyal mtshan ma skal bas dpa' ba dang stobs pa/ nu mnga' ngas shin tu stobs dang ldan par dang / rin po che'i
211b6(mdo sde): 'byung gnas ltar chos rin po che thams cad yengasu rdzogs par rig nas byang chub kyi snying po log su phyogs te tshogasu bcad pa 'di dag gi mngon par stong ngo do// 'di ni shing gi rgyal drung du/ bdud sde mngon
211b7(mdo sde): du bam mdzad nas/ ri rab lta bur mi g.yo bzhugs// bsnyengs pa mi mnga' 'bros mi mdzad// 'dis ni bskal pa bye mang du// sbyin dang dul dang sdom pa yis// byang chub dam pa yang dag sgrubs// des ni
211b8(mdo sde): 'di ni de mong mdzes// byang chub dam pa tshol ba na// 'di yis bskal pa bye mang du// tshul khrims brtul zhugs dka' thub kyis// brgya byin tshangs pa zil du brlag/ 'di
212a1(mdo sde): / yis bsgral 'bye mang du// bzod pa'i stobs kyi go mnabs te// sdug bsngal rnams ni dang du blangs// des na gser mdag 'ad dang ldan/ 'di yis bskal pa bye mang du/ 
212a2(mdo sde): brtson 'grus stobs dang rtsal gyis ni// gzhan dag phyir bsnyal mdzad mdzad de// des na bdud kyi sde las rgyal// 'di yis bskal pa bye mang du// bsam gtan mngon shes ye shes
212a3(mdo sde): kyis thub pa'i dbang po yang dag mchod// des na de med 'di la mchod// 'di yis bskal pa bye mang du// shes rab dang ni gsan pa bsags// sems can bye ba pa na yang btags// 
212a4(mdo sde): des na byang chub myur du brnyes// 'di ni phung po'i bdud las rgyal// 'chi bdag nyon mongs bdud las rgyal// 'di ni lha'i bdud las rgyal// des 'di mya ngan mi mnga'o// 'di
212a5(mdo sde): shin tu lha yi lce// lha rnams kyis kyang mchod pa'i cha// 'jig rten gsum na mched pa'i nges// bsed nams don du gnyer ba'i zhing // 'chi med 'bras bu sbyin
212a6(mdo sde): mdzad pa// 'di ni sbyin gnas dam pa ste// 'di la sbyin pa btang na de// byang chub dam pa thob bar du// bar ma dor ni chud mi za// 'di yis mdzod spu mdzes pa yis// zhing mang bye ba gsal bar bgyid
212a7(mdo sde): nyi zla dag kyang zil du brlag/ sems can rnams la snang bar gyur// 'di yi gzugs ni gzugs mdzes te// gzugs kyi dam pa legs pa'i gzugs// mtshan mchog mnga' zhing phan pa bzhed// / 
212a8(mdo sde): 'jig rten gsum na mchod pa'i 'os// 'di spun shin tu rnam dag ste// zhing rnams dang ni sems can tshegs// sems dang ldan dang sems med pa// mang po dag le rang byung gzigs 'di
212b1(mdo sde): snyan shin tu rnam dag ste// lnga yi dag dang mi yi dang // rgyal ba rnams kyi chos snga dang // mtha' yas pa'i sgra rnams gsan// 'di yi ljags ni yangs pa ste// ka la bing ka'i 'jam pa'i
212b2(mdo sde): dbyangs// 'chi med rab tu zhir 'gro ba'i// chos ni 'di las bdag cag mnyan// bdud kyi sde rnams gzigs gyur kyang // de yi thugs ni 'khrugs mi mnga'// lha yi tshogs rnams gzigs
212b3(mdo sde): gyur kyang //  shin tu thugs bzhungs dgyes mi mnga'// 'di yis mtshon dang mda' rnams kyis// bdud kyi sde las rgyal ma lags// bden pa brtul zhugs dka' thub kyis// sdang ba'i gyang
212b4(mdo sde): las 'di rgyal lo// gdan las ma bskyod bzhin du ni// de yi sku la gnod ma byung // de yi skabs su byams mi mngar// zhe sdang gyur pa'ang ma lags so// gang dag khyod las ches bos nas
212b5(mdo sde): sgrub pa bgying bar 'tshal ba yi// lha dang mi rnams de dag ni rnyed pa legs pa rnyed pa lags// rgyal ba bsod nams gzi mnga' ba// khyed las bstod pa'i bsod nas kyis// mi yi
212b6(mdo sde): zla ba byed 'dra bar// kun kyang myur du gyur par shog/ skyes bu khyu mchog 'dren par byang chub sangs rgyas nas// khrag khrig zhing rnams bskyod cing bdud kyang pham mdzad de// tshangs pa'i dbyangs
212b7(mdo sde): dang ka la bing ka'i sgra skad kyis// 'dren pas thog mar tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so// bsod nams rnam smin bde sde sdug bsngal thams cad sel// bsod nams ldan pa'i mi yi bsam pa
212b8(mdo sde): rnams kyang 'gru // bdud bcom nas ni byang chub myur du reg par 'gyur// mya ngan 'das pa zhi ba bsil ba'i dngos po 'theg/ de phyir bsod nams bya bas chog par su zhig 'dzin/ bdud rtsi'i chos
213a1(mdo sde): zhanapas kyang chog par su nig 'dzin// skye bo med pa'i nags gnas chog par sa dge 'dzin/ sems can dor byangs kyang chog par su zhig 'dzin// byang chub sems dpa' lag par rgya
213a2(mdo sde): sde tshig brjod pa// mchod pa byas pas rang rang dag gi zhing du deng // kun gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ sna tshogs bkod pas rang rang dag gi zhing du dong // dpung rnams phan tshun chen po byung
213a3(mdo sde): bde gzig nas// bde bar gshegs pa tshul du shis par rnam par rol// dpung bcas pa dad las rgyal te dadang reg shog ces// sems can rnams kyis mtshungs med sems kyis byang chub smon// dge
213a4(mdo sde): slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi shing drung na// seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs te// mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ skad cig de la sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa dpag tu
213a5(mdo sde): med pa mdzad de// de dag ni skal par yang bstan par sla ba ma yin no// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// sa ni lag mtha la lta bu mnyam par gnas par gyur// mdab ma brgya pa 'ang
213a6(mdo sde): dang ldan pa byung // lnga rnams brgya stong byang chub snying por rab tu 'dra // seng ge sgra yi mtshan ma dang po 'di 'dir mthong // stong gsum shing brgya dag dang ri rnams du ma dang // ri yi rgyal po lhan
213a7(mdo sde): bo byang chub snying po dud // stobs bcu'i gon du song ste brgya byin tshangs pa 'dud// 'di yang mi yi seng ge byang chub snying por rol// sku las 'od zer brgya stong dag ni thab kyi ste/ rgyal ba'i zhing mchog
213a8(mdo sde): byab nas ngan song gsum po ni// de na skad cig lung tsam mi kho bo skams par gyur// sems can gang la'ang tha brgyags dang gnod pa med// 'di yang mi yi seng ge gdang la bzhugs pa'i
213b1(mdo sde): rol// li zla nor bu me dang glog ltar b+hi ra 'od// 'od dang ldan pa'i rlags kyis zil nad lam me min/ 'gro ba gang gis kyang ni ston pa'i gtsug mi mthong // 'di yang mi'i seng ge gdan la/ 
213b2(mdo sde): bzhugs pa'i rol// phyag gi mthil gyis reg nas sa yang rnam pa drug du g.yos// de yis bdud kyi sde rnams shing bal bzhin du dgugs// bdud ni mdang thogs sa la ri mo gang rli ga// 'di
213b3(mdo sde): yang pi yi seng ge gdan la rol pa lags// mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i le'u la 9/ oM shurtsa gnyis pa'o// // de nas gnas gsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis// byang
213b4(mdo sde): chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la bskor ba byas te// lha'i tsan dan gyi bye ma'i char mngon par phab nas// tshul dang 'thun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod
213b5(mdo sde): 'jig rten gsal bar mdzad pa byung // 'jig rten mgon po 'od mdzad pa// 'jig rten ldongs pa gyur pa la// nyon mongs spangs pa mi sbyin pa// khod ni g.yul
213b6(mdo sde): las rnam par rgyal// bsod nams ngag gis dgongs pa rdzogs// dkar po'i chos rnams kun tu rdzogs// khyod ni 'gro ba'i tshim mdzad 'gyur// sdig pa mi mnga'
213b7(mdo sde): 'dapa las rgal// go'u tam ni thang la bzhugs// sems can gzhan dag klung chen gyis// khyer ba rnams kyang sgrol bar 'gyur// shes rab chen po khod 'phags te// 'jig
213b8(mdo sde): ter dag na khyod kyi zlam mchis/ 'jig rten chos kyis khyod ma gos// chab na mchis pa'i bangam bzhin// 'jig rten riris nas gzing log 'di// mun pa'i phung pos gnyis pa lnga
214a1(mdo sde): khyod ni shes rab sgron ma yis// ba tu sang pas mdzad pa spyod// 'tsho'i 'jig rten ring nas ni// 'on mongs nad kyis gzing ba la// nang rnams kun las thar mdzad pa
214a2(mdo sde): sman pa'i rgyal po yang dag byung // 'jig rten mgon po khod byung bas// mi khom rnams ni stongs par 'gyur// lha rnams ngag dang mi rnams kyang // bde ba dag dang ldan par 'gyur// skyes bu
214a3(mdo sde): khyu mchog nges pa khong // blta bar gang dag 'dod dgyid pa de dag skal ba stong rnams su// nam yang ngan 'gror mchi mi 'gyur // gang dag chos nyan gyur pa rnams// de dag ma
214a4(mdo sde): gang nang dang bral// zang dang phung po zab pa des// 'jigs pa med pa rnams su 'gyur// nyon mongs bcings pa bcad nas ni// kun kyang len pa ma mchis par// 
214a5(mdo sde): myur du rab tu grol 'gyur te// dge ba mchog gi 'a// bras bu 'thob// de dag 'jig rten sbyin gnas// te// sbyin pa rnams ni blang ba'i 'os// de dag yon
214a6(mdo sde): phul mi chung ste/ kun kyang mya ngan 'das rgyu lags/ dge slong dag de ltar gnas gtsang mi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstong nas thal mo sbyar
214a7(mdo sde): te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas 'od gsal gyi lha'i bu rnams kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa la// 
214a8(mdo sde): me tog dang / bdugs pa dang // spos dang / phreng ba dang / drug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis cho ga bzhin du mchod nas// lan gsum bsam
214b1(mdo sde): bskong du byas te/ tshigs su bsang ba 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// rngub bzhugs rapa gsung ni shin tu snad// thub mchog changs byangs glu lhur gsung snyan mchog/ byang chub sa
214b2(mdo sde): mchog ngom pa shin tu brjes// dbyangs kun mthar 'byin khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// khyod skyabs khyod gling khyod ni dpung gnyen te// khyod ni 'jig rten mgon po byams thugs mdzad// khyod ni
214b3(mdo sde): sman pa'i dam bzug rngu 'byin// gso ba phan mdzad khyod ni dam pa mchog/ mar me mdzad pa gzigs ma thag tu khyod// byams dang thugs rje'i sprin gyi dab bsgrubs// mgon po bdud rtsi'i rgyun ni char phob la// 
214b4(mdo sde): lha dang mi rnams gdung ba zhi bar mdzod khyod ni srid gsum mi go sa pad+ma 'dra// khyod ni mi g.yo mi bskyod lhun po 'dra// khyod no/ thugs dang mi g.yo rdo rje bzhin// yon tan mchog kun mnga'
214b5(mdo sde): ste zla ba 'ang // dge slong dag de ltar 'odo gsal ba'i lha rnams kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par ji stod nas thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing // phyogs
214b6(mdo sde): gcig tu 'khod do// de nas lha'i bu rab tshangs pa la sogs pa tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa la// nor bu ni rin po che bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dums spras
214b7(mdo sde): ba'i rin po che'i dra bas bkab ste/ lan gsum bskor byas nas// tshul dang 'thun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod// dge ba di med shes rab 'od dang gzi brjid ldan// mtshan gyi dam pa sum cu rtsa
214b8(mdo sde): gnyis mchog mngar ba// dran dang ldan zhing blo gros ldan pa ye shes mnga'// mnyel ba mi mngar khyod la mgo bos phyag 'tsha'o// de gsung di mnga' dri med dri ma bral/ 'jig rten du gnas shing rig pa gsum brnyes pa
215a1(mdo sde): // rnam par thar pa dam pa gsum gyis mig sbyin pa// sbyin gsum dri ma mi mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dus ngan rtog pa gsal ba rab tu ni thugs lngar/ zhugs pa
215a2(mdo sde): thugs rjes 'phags pa 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa/ thub pa dgyes pas 'phags pa thugs ni rab zhig pa// khyod ni ying gnyis grol ba mdzad pa btang soms dgyes// brtul khu dka' thu
215a3(mdo sde): 'phags pa grol ba'i don mdzad pa// rang spyod rnam par dag cing spyod pa'i pha rol byon// bden pa bzhi po ston pa rnam thar dgyes pa po// grol bas gyur nas 'gro ba gzhan yang grol ma
215a4(mdo sde): pa/ stobs dang brtson 'grus ldan pa'i bdung po 'dir lhag ngas pa/ shes rab brtson 'grus de bzhin byams pas phan ma dzang nas/ khyod kyis go 'phang dam pa 'chi ba meng pa brnyes g.yon
215a5(mdo sde): can dpung rnams bcom pa khyod la phyag 'tshalo// dge slong nga dag de ltar rab tshangs pa la sogs pa tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa la tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gi
215a6(mdo sde): mngon par bstod nas/ thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas bdud kyi bu dkar po'i phyogs pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der seng
215a7(mdo sde): ste phyin pa dang / rin po che'i gdugs dang / bla bre chen po rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bkab nas thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la tshul dang mthun pa'i tshig su bcad
215a8(mdo sde): pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// khyod stobs shin tu rgya che ba dang bdud dpung drag po bdag cag mngon sum ste// bdud dpung rab 'jigs chen po de yang khyod kyis skad cig gcig la
215b1(mdo sde): bas par mdzad/ khyod ni bzhengs par ma gyur sku yang ma g.yo gsung yang rjod pa ma mdzad de// thub pa den kun grub pa 'jig rten gsum gyis mchod pa khyod la bdag phyag 'amal du
215b2(mdo sde): po bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag du ma gang ga'i bye ma snyed// de dag rnams kyis byang chub shing mchog drung nas khyed ni bskyed cing g.yos ma nus// mchod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag du
215b3(mdo sde): ma gang ga'i bye ma snyed mdzad de// byang chub shing drung bzhugs pa des na de ring khyod ni rnam par mdzes pa lags// byang chub spyad pa dam pa spyod mdzad chen shin du sdug pa'i btsun mo dang // phangs
215b4(mdo sde): pa'i sras dang bran mo de bzhin skyed mos tshal dang grong khyem ra dang // yul 'khor grong rdal dag dang rgyal srid rnams dang btsun mo'i 'khor dang glang po dang / dbu dang spyan dang ljags dang
215b5(mdo sde): de bzhin zhabs btang des na de ring rnam par mdzes// nga ni sang+yas 'gyur te bsam gtan rdzu 'phrul blo yi go bgos nas// sems can bye ba khrag khrig mang po sdug bsngal rgya mtshos
215b6(mdo sde): khyer par gyur pa rnams// dam chos gru yis nyid kyis bsgral bar bya zhes khyod kyis lan mang gsung brjod pa/ khyod kyi smon lam de ni grub lags srog chags rnams kyang sgrol bar mdzad par
215b7(mdo sde): 'gyur/ smra ba'i khyu mchog 'jig rten mig sbyin mdzad lnga bstod pa'i bsod nams de// bdag cag thaMd dga' mgu yid gyur thams cad mkhyen pa nyid smon lam 'debs// sang+yas rnams kyis rab
215b8(mdo sde): bsngags byang chub dam pa mtshungs med yang dag bsgrubs de ltar bdud sde 'khor de bcom nas thams cad mkhyen nyid 'tshang rgyar 'gyur par shog/ dge slong dag de ltar bdud kyi bu
216a1(mdo sde): / rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod de// de nas lha'i bu gzhan 'phrul
216a2(mdo sde): dbang byed lha'i bu brgyad stong du mas yongs su bskor te mdun du bdar nas// de bzhin gshegs pa la 'dzam bu'i gling gi gser gyi pad ma dag mngon par gtor te// spyan snga nas tshigs
216a3(mdo sde): su bcad pa 'di dag mngon par bstod do// gsung ni dpyas ma mchis ma 'khrul rnam par ma 'khrugs pa// mun rdul bral zhing mchi mang rtogs par thugasu chud par gyur// lha yul
216a4(mdo sde): mi yul ba'i dpal dang bgyi ba gzhal med 'os// rab tu 'bar ba'i blo gros ldan la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo// dka' ba mdzad pa nyon mongs spong ba rdul dang dri ma sel/ 
216a5(mdo sde): shin tu dga' ba'i gsung gis lha dang mi rnams dga' bar mdzod// sku mchog 'od zer rgyas pa dri ma shin du mi mngar bas// lha dang mi yi bdag po gzhin du 'gro ba
216a6(mdo sde): 'di las rgyal// pha rol tshegs rnams rab tu 'joms pa gzhan gyi spyod mkhas pa// lha dang mi yi srid par dga' ba gzhan gyi blo sel ba// shin tu mkhas pa blo ldan gzhan gyi spyod
216a7(mdo sde): pa rnam par phye// stobs bcu mnga' ba gshegs pa'i lam 'dir rnam par gyu pa mthong // srid pa 'dzin dang sdug bsngal log 'dzin rgya chen 'dor sel te// lha mi blo gros 'dul ba rdzi
216a8(mdo sde): lta bzhin du 'dul bar mdzod// ze ba bzhin du 'dul bar mdzad// zla ba bzhin du mkha' las phyogs bzhi dag tu rnam rgyu ba/ srid pa gsum 'di mang byung mig dang dpung gnyen gyur par
216b1(mdo sde): shog/ lha dang mi yi srid par dgra' yang yul la 'khrul mi mnga'// 'dod pa'i dga' dang bral zhing dge ba'i dga' la dgyes pa po// 'khor la spogs pa 'jig rten gsum na khyod
216b2(mdo sde): dang mtshungs ma mchis// khyod 'dir 'gro ba rnams kyi mgon skyabs dang ni dpung gnyen lags// dge slong dag de ltar lha lung dbang sgyur la sogs pa gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu rnama?
216b3(mdo sde): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas lha'i dus su 'dra bra la lha'i tshogs kyis
216b4(mdo sde): yongs su bskor zhing bdun du bdar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la dar gyi lnga ldis g.yogs nas/ spyan snga nas tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// dri ma rnam gsum spangs
216b5(mdo sde): pas khyod na chos kyi snang ba yang dag 'phags// gti mug rang ni lha dang ma rig 'joms pa 'dzes dang dpal gyi sa brgyan// log pa'i lam la dga' ba'i skyes bu 'dig
216b6(mdo sde): 'chi med 'god mdzad pa// 'jig rten 'dir byung mchod rten lha yul dang ni mi yul bas mchod pa// khyod ni gso ba'i sman pa mkhas pa bdud rtsi bde ba sbyin pa'o// lha dang nyon mongs
216b7(mdo sde): ba dang ma rig bsags pa sngon gyi bag la nyal// lus can rnams kyi nad kun sngon gyi rgyal ba'i lam gyis sel ba ste// de bas sman pa 'drab 'dren pa khyod ni sa la rnam par rgyu// nyi zla'i
216b8(mdo sde): 'od dang skar ma rnams dang ma dang de bzhin nor bu dang // brgya byin tshangs pa'i 'od rnams dpal sdug spyan sngar lam me ma lags te// shes rab snang ba mdzad dang 'od mdzad 'od
217a1(mdo sde): / dang dpal gyis rab tu rgyas// khyod kyi ye shes rmad byung mngon sum gyur pas mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo// rnam par 'dren pa snyan pa'i gsung ldan bden dang bden mang
217a2(mdo sde): gsung // dul ba thugs zhi dbang po thul ba rab tu zhi ba'i thugs ldan pa// ston pa lha yi 'khor la bstan par bgyi bston mdzad pa// shAkya thub pa mi yaM khyu mchog lha mis mchod la
217a3(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo// ye shes mnga' bas ye shes bka' mching mchog can srid gsum go mdzad pa/ dri ma gsum bsal rig pa gsum dang rnam thar gsum ston pa// thub pa blo gros ji ltar
217a4(mdo sde): gdul ba skal dang skal mang rab mkhyen pa// stong gsum rmad du byung lha mis mchod pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dge slong dag de ltar lha'i bu rab 'phrul 'khor dang bcas pa de bzhin
217a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs pa cig tu 'dug go// de nas lha'i bu yongasu dga' ldan gyis
217a6(mdo sde): ris kyi lha'i bu dang lhan cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ lha'i gos kyi dra ba chen pos byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon
217a7(mdo sde): par bkab ste/ spyan snga nas tshig su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bskyed do// khyod ni dga' ldan gnas na bzhugs te der ni khyod kyis rgya chen chos kyang bshad// khyod kyi bstan pa de
217a8(mdo sde): ni da dung lha'i bu rnams chos spyod rgyun mi 'chang / khyod la blta bas ngoms par mi 'gyur chos mnyan pas kyang ngoms pa rnyed mi 'gyur// yon tan rgya mtsho 'jig rten sgron ma khyod la
217b1(mdo sde): mgo dang yid kyis phyag 'tshal lo// khyod ni dga' ldan gnas nas 'phos te de tshe khyod kyis mi khom thams cad spyang // gang tshe byang chub shing drung bzhugs tshe 'gro ba kun gyi nyon
217b2(mdo sde): mongs rab du zhi// gang gi ched du rgya chen byang chub btsal ba bsnyes te bdud kyang pham par mdzad// khyod kyi smon lam de ni rab tu rdzogs kyis 'khor lo rgya chen myur du skor// chos
217b3(mdo sde): 'tshal pa dag chos gnyen bgyi zhes te// srog chags stong phrag mang pos bstod cing mchis// 'khor lo rgya chen myur du bskor du gsol// srog chags stong rnams srid las @
217b4(mdo sde): du gsol// dge slong dag de ltar lha'i bu yongs su dga' daldan 'khor dang bcas pas de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs
217b5(mdo sde): pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de na sa lha'i bu rab 'thab bral la sogs pa 'thab bral gyi lha rnams/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ 
217b6(mdo sde): me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / brug pa sna tshogs kyis byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod de/ spyan snga nas tshul dang mthun pa'i tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag
217b7(mdo sde): gis mngon par bstod do// tshul khrims ting 'dzin de bzhin shes rab kyis/ khyod dang mtshungs pa ma mchis ga la lhag/ mos dang rnar grol la mkhas pa po// de bzhin gshen pa khyod la mgos
217b8(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal// byang chub snying por lha yis gang bgyis pa/ bkod pa mdzes pa de dag mthong laDa te/ ji ltar khyod la lha dang mis mchod pa// de ni gzhan gang la yang 'os ma lags/ khyod
218a1(mdo sde): byung don ma mchis pa ma lags te/ gang gi don du dka' ba mang po spyad// shin tu g.yon can sde dang bcas las rgyal// khyod kyis bla na med pa'i byang chub brnyes// phyogs bcu
218a2(mdo sde): ngag tu snang ba mdzad par gyur// shes rab sgron mas 'jig rten gsum po gsal// khyod kyis rab ribasel bar gyur pa ste// 'gro la bla na med pa'i mig sbyin pa// khyod la bstod pa skal bar brjod
218a3(mdo sde): kyang ni/ khyod kyi ba spu khung bu'i mtha' ma mchis// yon tan rgya mtsho 'jig rten rnam par grags// de bzhin gsher pa khyod la mgos phyag 'tshal// de ltar rlab 'thab bral la sogs pa 'thab bral
218a4(mdo sde): gyi lha'i bu de dag gis de bzhin gshe pa la mngon par bsngo nga nas// thal mo sbyar te de bzhin gsheg pa la phyag 'tshal shing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin
218a5(mdo sde): sum bcu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha rnams dang lhan cig tu me to ga dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / khrug pa dang / phye ma dang / gdu gas dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bkod pa rnams kyis de bzhin
218a6(mdo sde): gsheg pa la mchod nas// tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gis de bzhin gsheDa pa la mngon par bstod do// thub pa ma 'khrul kha na ma tho mi mnga' rtag tu legs bzhugs lhun po 'dra// phyogs bcu
218a7(mdo sde): ngag tu ye shes 'od grags bsod nams gzi brjid ldan pa po// thub pa khyod kyis sngon chad sangs brgya phrag mtha' yas yang dag mchod pa mdzad// de yi yul de yis ni byang chub shing drung bdud kyi
218a8(mdo sde): sde las rgyal bar 'gyur// tshul khrims dang ni thos dang ting 'dzin shes rab 'byung gnas ye shes rgyal mtshan tog/ rga shi 'joms par mdzad pa sman pa dam pa 'jig rten dag la mi skye/ 
218b1(mdo sde): ga/ thub pa dri ma gsum dang tha ba spangs shing dbang po zhi la thugs zhi ba shAkya khyu mchog 'gro ba dag gi chos kyi rgyal po khyod la skyabasu mchi// khyod kyis brtson 'grus mthu yis 'phags pa'i
218b2(mdo sde): byang chub spyod pa mtha' yas gyur lags te/ shes rab stobs dang thabs dang byams pa'i stobs dang bsod nams stobs rnams dang // stobs rnams de dag bcom ldan 'das khyod
218b3(mdo sde): byang chub bzhugs pa'i tshe na mtha' yas te// stobs dang ldan pa de ring byang chub snying por bzhugs nas stobs bcu mnga' bar gyur// dpung tshonaDa mtha' yas mthong nas dge sbyong rgyal po
218b4(mdo sde): byang chub snying por bzhugs pa de// nyams par mi 'gyur/ gang zhes lha rnams thaMd rab tu bsngangs shing skrag par gyur// khyod ni 'byung po rnams kyis bsnyungs par ma gyur sku yang
218b5(mdo sde): g.yo ba mi mnga' ste// khur lci phyag gis brdabs nas kun tu g.yos te bdud kyi sde las rgyal bar gyur// ji ltar snga ma rnams kyis seng ge'i khri la byang chub dam pa brnyes gyur
218b6(mdo sde): paNade ltar khyod kyis rjesu sang+yas mtshungs shing mnyam ste gzhan du gyur pa lags// yid kyang mnyam zhing sems can mnyam ste khyod bdag nyid kyis tha~Md mkhyen nyid brnyes// des na khyed ni
218b7(mdo sde): 'jig rten dam parang byung 'gro ba rnams kyi bsod nams zhing // dge slong dag de ltar lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang lhan gcig tu de bzhin gash+ye pa la mngon
218b8(mdo sde): par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te// de bzhin gsheg pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi dag rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang ldan
219a1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa kal ba sa sa byin nas/ me gas 'ag tag dang / cam kang ga/ skam ma ga dang /  gas dang / na se ma'i phreng ba dang / dran pa
219a2(mdo sde): lha'i bu mo brgya stong gis bskor nas/ lha'i bu dbyangs len pas de bzhin gshe pa mchod pa byas te/ tshul dang 'thun pa'i tshogasu bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// shin tu gsung
219a3(mdo sde): snyan dbyangs ni yid du ma chi// zla ltar rab tu zhi mdzad thugs dang ba// 'dzum pa'i zhal ldan ljags ni rab yangs pa// thub mchog dga' mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshalo// lha mi rnams kyi snyan cing dag
219a4(mdo sde): 'gyur ba/ sgra skad gang dag 'jig rten mchis pa kun khyod kyi 'jam pa'i gsung ni phyung ba ni/ mi'i sgra skad thams cad zil gyis non// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug nyon mongs zhi/ mi
219a5(mdo sde): min dga' ba rnam par dag pa skyed// rnyog pa ma mchis snying gis chos thos nas// de kun 'phags pa'i nor gro/ la ba thob// khyod ni mo mkhas rnams la bsdus mi mdzad/ 
219a6(mdo sde): mkhas pa'i rgyags pas rnams kyang rgyags ma gyur// khyod ni 'gying ba mi mngar zhum mi mnga'// rgya mtsho'i dbus nas ri mchog 'phags pa bzhin// de 'dra'i sems can 'jig rten 'byung
219a7(mdo sde): bas na// mi rnams 'di ni rnyed pa lags pa rnyed/ pad+ma dpal ltar nor rnams sbyin pa po// de ltar 'jig rten kun la chos sbyin mdzad// de ltar rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa rgyal chen bzhi'o
219a8(mdo sde): ris kyi lha rnams kyis byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te// de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu
219b1(mdo sde): 'dug go// de nas bar snang gi lha rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du lhags te/ mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir bar snang thams cad rin po
219b2(mdo sde): dra ba dang / dril bu g.yer kha'i dra ba dang / rin po che'i gdugs rnams dang / rin po che'i ba dan rnams dang / rin po che dang / dar gyi lda ldi dang / rin po che'i me tog rna rgyan dang / mu tig gi lnga
219b3(mdo sde): ldi sna tshogs rnams lus phyed thung ba'i lha rnams kyis bzung ba/ zla gam rnams kyis lags par brgyan nas/ de bzhin gsheb pa la phul lo// phul nas kyang spyan snga nas tshig su bca
219b4(mdo sde): ba 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// thub pa mkha' la ba gcag mchis nas ni// 'gro ba'i spyod kun ji bzhin gsal bltas shing // sems can dag pa khyod kyi spyod bltas na/ 
219b5(mdo sde): ltar khyod kyi gdugs gcig 'khrul ma mthong // mchod phyir byang chub sems dpa' gang lhags pa// mi yi 'dre/ pa gang dag na mkha' khyab// 'di ltar de dag na mkha'i lus
219b6(mdo sde): lags pas// gzhal med khang rnams la yang gnod ma mchis// bar snang nas ni me tog char bab pa// stong che byur bu tu gang gyur pa// de dag ma lus khyod kyi skur bab kyang // 'bab nu na
219b7(mdo sde): mtshor 'dab pa bzhin du gyur// gdugs dang me tog na rgyan me tog brang // me tog tsam pa ka'i lnga ldi dang / rgyan phreng zla ba zla gam rnams kyang mthong // lha yis gtor kyang 'dres par gyur ma
219b8(mdo sde): mchis// bar snang tha~Md lha yis gang gyur te// 'di la skra tsam gzhag pa'i gnas ma mchis// rkang gnyis mchog la mchod pa bgyid kyang ni// khyod la rgyags pa'am ngo mngar gyur mi mnga'/ 
220a1(mdo sde): de ltar bar snang gi lha rnams kyis byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod nas thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag
220a2(mdo sde): 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas sa zla ba'i lha rnams kyis// de bzhin gsher pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir sa gzhi thaMd legs par phyags te/ blugs nas spos chus chag
220a3(mdo sde): chag btab ste/ me tog gis chal bar bkang nas/ ras bcos bu na rigs kyi bla bre bres te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phul nas tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// stong gsum rdo rje lta
220a4(mdo sde): bur mi shigs gyur// nga 'dir lpags pa sha dang rus pa rkang bskams kyang // byang chub ma reg nga ni 'di nas mi ldang zhes rdo rje'i gnas kyis de ni byang chub snying por zhugs/ gal te ma yi seng ge khyed kyis
220a5(mdo sde): stong gsum kun// byin gyis ma brlabs na ni gang dag rkang mthil gyi sa// bye ba'i zhing rnams bskyod pa de ltar shugs che ba/ byang chub sems dpa' lhags tshe ma lus ring bar gyur/ 
220a6(mdo sde): sa phyogs gang du sems can dam pa 'chag pa ni// sa yi lha yi sa rnyed pa rgya chen legs pa rnyed// 'jig rten rdul rnams ji ste da khyod kyis snang bar mdzad// stong gsum 'jig rten gyur
220a7(mdo sde): na khyod sku smos mi 'tshal// 'og gi chu yi phung po brgya stong ji snyed dang / sa yi steng na 'gro ba'i 'tsho ba ji snyed pa// stong gsums rnams thaMd bdag cag gzung bar gyi/ khyod la kun 'bul
